31a5(rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bstan pa ni// pho nya'i mtshan nyid shes bya ba// gang gis yang dag shes 'gyur ba// mkha' 'gro'i dam tshig la gnas pa'o// /
31a6(rgyud): ming po dang ni pha dang yang // bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong // lce sbom mig ni dmar ser la// rtsub cing spu ni dmar ser yin// thun mong dngos grub thams cad dang // bzlas dang brtul zhugs
31a7(rgyud): la rtag dga'// dran pa dang ni yang dag ldan// pho nya mo sogs go 'phang bcas// mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster// rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos/
31b1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// bdud kun rab tu zhi bar byed// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// rnal 'byor rol pa'i 'bras rab ster// gsang sngags 'di las 'byung ba yin// sngags dang
31b2(rgyud): phyag d+har yang dag ldan// sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson// phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags te// lus can rnams la 'grub mi 'gyur// ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag/ mngon par brtson nas rtogs/
31b3(rgyud): par bya// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i// rnal 'byor che la gang zhig sdang // khyi yi skye gnas brgyar skyes te// smye sha can du skye bar 'gyur// dper na la la mar 'dod pas// 'bad
31b4(rgyud): pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang // mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad// 'dzin cing mchod par byed pa ni// 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor//
31b5(rgyud): gzhan la brten pa yi// gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur// rnal 'byor che mchog dpa' bo che// yul phyogs gang na gnas gyur pa// rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang // yul de yongs su
31b6(rgyud): brtags pa ste// sems can yongs su gzung ba'i rgyur// de rung ni rtag par gnas// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las pho nya'i mtshan nyid dang / nus pa'i gnas skabs kyi cho ga'i
31b7(rgyud): le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin tu rnyed dka'i dgos pa ste// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub sgrub byed pa'o//
32a1(rgyud): sa yi cha ni mnyam nyid 'ong // tsan dan gyis ni nye bar byug/ dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni// me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhing // mar me'i 'phreng ba yang dag dkrigs/
32a2(rgyud): spos kyi dri yis nyams dga' bar// bdag gis thams cad byas nas ni// phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su// de nas rdza rnga bcing bya ste// ri mo dgu pa yongs su zlum// zlum po'i ri mo
32a3(rgyud): dgu bya ste// yi ge phyi mo mnyam bris la// shin tu mnyam gzhag dgod par bya// der gnas pa las dpa' bo ni// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed du// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog pa yis//
32a4(rgyud): dbyangs dang yi ge sgrub pa pos// grangs de dag gi nang chud par// dge ba thub pas byas nas ni// re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yis ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang //
32a5(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yi phyi// re mig sum cu drug pa blang // gsum pa yi ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum cu gnyis pa blang // lnga pa yi ni khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung // nyi shu bzhi pa
32a6(rgyud): ngag dang sbyar// sum cu gsum pa yang dag blangs// re mig bco lnga pa yir ldan// lnga pa dag dang yang dag bcas// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// dang po'i tshig tu brjod par bya// re mig
32a7(rgyud): bcu dgu pa gzung bya// me yi bu dang yang dag ldan// re mig gsum pas phye ba'o// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re mig sum cu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger gyur// slar yang
32b1(rgyud): tshig ni de dag nyid// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// de nas rang byung blangs nas ni// re mig las ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor nA da thig ler sbyar// don kun sgrub ces bya ba yi// tshig ni gnyis
32b2(rgyud): pa yin par bshad// re mig bcu dgu pa nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa dag dang yang dag ldan// sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te// re mig gi ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang
32b3(rgyud): yang dag ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag ste btu// de nas
32b4(rgyud): go rims bzlog pas gzung // re mig las ni dang po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang bcas// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad//
32b5(rgyud): re mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // re mig sum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yang // sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang // re mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan// re mig las ni bcu pa nyid//
32b6(rgyud): rims bzlog pas sgrub pos blang // re mig las ni bcu dgu pa// re mig nyi shu gsum pa la// re mig gnyis par yang dag ldan// steng du thig les rnam par brgyan// de nas sa bdag bzung byas
32b7(rgyud): la ra brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me li bu yis khyad par dbye// yi ge hUM gis mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya'i// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'i// oM ni kun la
33a1(rgyud): gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru sbyar// rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags// 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje
33a2(rgyud): 'jigs byed du// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// skad cig gis ni sku brgyad 'gyur// de yi dkyil 'khor srung don du// gdug pa thams cad khyad par gyis// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang // brtag
33a3(rgyud): mi dgos par 'chi bar 'gyur// 'khor lo'i sbyor bdag nyid kyis bzla// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM suM b+ha na~M suM b+ha huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya
33a4(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya hoHb+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaTaH/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rdza rnga bcing ba'i sngags btu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//
33a5(rgyud): de nas sha chen thams cad kyis// 'jigs byed rdo rje bskyed yin bshad// 'di ni gdug pa thams cad kyi// 'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do// 'di ltar khyi dang phag gi sha/ zangs kyi
33a6(rgyud): gtsug pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma yi// bya ba rnam dpyod med par bya// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // rgyal srid thams cad rab grub
33a7(rgyud): 'gyur// dung dang nya phyis mu tig gi/ rgyu mtshan gsum po 'byung ba yin// chos kyi sku yi lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhig smod// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// zla ba phyed pas rgyan du
33b1(rgyud): byas rnam pa de ltar gyur pa nyid// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug yin par bshad// brda ni lnga po bstan pa dag/ sgrub pa po yi lag g.yon gyis// 'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te// brda rnams kyi ni
33b2(rgyud): rab 'jug pa'o// khams gsum chu dang mi rgyu dang // 'gro kun g.yon las 'byung ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa' bla mar bzhugs// lcug mar de bzhin rnam snang mdzad// cho ga'i rnam pa de ltar bur/
33b3(rgyud): gtso bor pad+ma gar mdzad de// brtan par dngos grub thams cad ni// rab stsol ba yi dpa' bo bzhugs// mthe'u chung la ni mkha' snying po// mi zad sku dang ldan pa nyid// sen mo'i ngos nirdza
33b4(rgyud): mgrin gyi// gnas su gyur par bshad pa yin// 'di dag thams cad dpa' bo ni// g.yon pa las byung rgyu yin no// lag mthil shrI he ru ka yi// phag mo'i 'dus pa dga' byed yin// rgyab tu
33b5(rgyud): shin tu nges byas nas// brda nyid lnga po bstan par bya// 'di dag lag tu dgod pa ste// bza' ba thams cad 'dus pa yin// rnam pa de lta'i cho ga yis// dpa' bo dam pa mchod par bya// sa ni
33b6(rgyud): spyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu khams mA ma kI ru brjod// me ni gos dkar mor bshad de// rlung ni sgrol mar rab tu brjod// tsum+bi ka ni stong pa ste// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa yin// dbus su
33b7(rgyud): dpa' bo kun gyi gnas// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol// gsang ba 'di ni mi bshad cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar brda bya dpa' bo rnams// gcig tu zas la
34a1(rgyud): brtsam par bya// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las bza' ba dang / sbyin sreg dang
34a2(rgyud): gtor ma'i bya ba la lag pa'i brda'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// bza' dang ston mo 'dus pa ste// yang dag cho ga gang gis
34a3(rgyud): ni/ dngos grub myur du rab 'jug pa'o// phyugs rnams kyi ni dgug pa nyid// sgrub pos sngar bstan rim pa 'dis// phyugs rnams dang ni de bzhin lnga// bong bu rus sbal mi rnga mo// ce spyang rta la
34a4(rgyud): sogs rnams kyis// dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyugs 'di dag ni sgrub yan lag/ rigs rnams las ni rigs mchog phyugs// rkang bzhi rnams las glang por brjod// 'dab chags
34a5(rgyud): rnams las ngang pa nyid// dud 'gro rnams las rus sbal rgyal// lha rnams las ni mchu g.yo ba// rnam pa de ltar brjod pa ste// dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor du// phyugs de dag ni rnam par
34a6(rgyud): bshad// khwa dang chu skyar ce spyang dang // skye gnyis blon po chen po dang // khrung khrung bzhad dang ka dam pa// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor bya bas// 'dod pa dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// khyi nag po yi
34a7(rgyud): 'o thug ni// ma sha'i 'bras ni nag por ldan// 'dod pas dgos pa med pa ru// ji srid brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar// ro yau khar ni sbyin sreg bya// de nas yi dgas langs nas ni// sgrub po de la 'dri
34b1(rgyud): byed de// ci bgyi zhes ni sgra 'gyur zhing // sa 'og las sam ral gri 'am// tshar gcod pan 'dogs nyid dag dang // ril bu mig spun gter rnams sam// rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis
34b2(rgyud): len// dngos 'dri de bzhin gcig byin nas// 'gro bar 'gyur gyis gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub// rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin// ba lang gnas dang lding ba nyid// lhag ma skam
34b3(rgyud): po rtsa de nas// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor bya// yang na rus sbal dag gi'o// 'di de dngos grub sbyin 'gyur zhing // phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa// ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar// sku ni dkar po'i/
34b4(rgyud): khro bo che// de nas drag shul gzugs 'chang ba// rdo rje phag mo la gzigs pa// de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang // dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sku la thal bas nye bar byugs/
34b5(rgyud): ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// phyag rgya yis ni sku la brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// yi dgas chen po gdan du byas// sgrub pa po yis dus rtag tu// sngags de shes nas
34b6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// de lta'i yon tan khyad 'phags pas// 'dod pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las/ dud 'gro'i phyugs dang ro langs sgrub pa dang / bskyed pa'i
34b7(rgyud): rim pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas sgrub po'i mchog kun ni// sbyor ba kun la med pa'o// bza' dang bca' dang nya sho sogs// nus pa ji
35a1(rgyud): bzhin bya ba ste// med par gyur kyang bza' ba dang // lnga po nyid du bya ba yin// bza' dang bca' ba rgya che ba// rtag tu mtshan mo nyid du bya// de nas pho nya rab sbyin zhing /
35a2(rgyud): khyad par du ni sgrub pa po// rang gi pang du mgo bzhag la// dpa' bo gnyis med rab tu mchod// ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo 'am yang na chung ma gnyin// rnam pa 'di lto'i cho ga yis//
35a3(rgyud): bcings pa las ni rab grol bya// de nas sngags ni grub 'gyur te// ji srid 'byung ba yod par du'o// slob dpon lus su legs gnas te// sgrub pa po las mchod pa len// dpa' bo
35a4(rgyud): rnams kyi stan dag dang // phyag rgya nyid du the tshom med// sgrub po shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// glu dang gar la sogs pa bya// ji srid lus can thams cad kyang // rnal 'byor ye shes zhen ma
35a5(rgyud): gyur 'di sring 'khor bar 'khor 'gyur zhing // sdug bsngal mya ngan gyis g.yengs 'gyur// dngos po kun gyis sgrub pa pos// de nas phyag rgya mchod par bya// mchod pas mchod par 'dod/
35a6(rgyud): pa seMd brnyas pa yis ni nges par bsreg/ phyag rgya chen po dang po 'grub// rnal 'byor rgyud du mi rnams kyis// rab tu 'bad pas mchod par bya// dngos po kun gyis rnal 'byor pa/
35a7(rgyud): byinas dpa' bo rnams byas ni// dpa' bo nyid la spyad par bya// de ltar mchod byas de nas ni// sa 'og sgrub po langs pa dang / gzhi pa nyid ngong rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dbug pa dag dag
35b1(rgyud): sa dang babyung pa la rnams dang // rnams dang mas pa mas te// bye gas dang/ la ngas rjod par bya// dru
35b2(rgyud): na ma mos par 'grub gyur te/ thatshom med par grub pa pag// dang sa dub thams cad 'asgrub par 'gyur/ dang la ba ga ngas par brjod pa las gsung babar cod pa ring ste
35b3(rgyud): bkur gyimadzad par mams sam cu gsum pade nas byapa' 'khyi mdzu 'aM// 'khor ba zhes pa'i ma rgyas/ lus kyang cisang de myu ba/
35b4(rgyud): po ni the tshom med// dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// pad+ma'i lte bar nges par sbyar// smin ma'i dbus su gzhug par bya// a ba d+hU tI'i gnas de bzhin// dpa' ji'i 'chol bar bya
35b5(rgyud): chags par// bza' ba yang ni de nas sreg/ gau mang sa dang ru d+hi ra// 'bad pas bsreg bya lnga dag bya// de nas 'bar ba'i byin zal// sreg blugs dgu ni sbyin par bya// 'bar 'dre
35b6(rgyud): rgya mtsho blta bar bya// kun nas sgro yi 'khor lo nyid// dpa' bo'i dbang po zhal bzhi pa// dpa' bo dpa' mo'i gnas de bzhin// 'dab la po nya mo bzhi yin// dpa' bo kun dang gnyis
35b7(rgyud): med bde// cho ga ji bzhin rnam pa yis// khaN+Da ro he phyi rol sbyin// rang gi gzugs su rnam bzhugs pa// 'khor lo'i dbus su blta bar bya// 'khor lo 'di dag gsal bar ni/
36a1(rgyud): rim pa ji lta ba bzhin bya// rig pa'i rgya mtsho'i las de bzhin// mdor bsdus nas ni gsungs pa yin// pho nya gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/ 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom
36a2(rgyud): med dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las pho nya mo'i sbyin sreg dang 'gugs pa'i las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas las kyi rab mchog ni/
36a3(rgyud): ji bzhin rim gyis mtshon pa ste// mchod pa gnyis med sbyor ba'i bdag/ las ni so sor sbyar bar bya// gang dag rab grub byed pa'i sngags// de yi dbye ba rim bzhin bshad// kha dog pho nya
36a4(rgyud): sogs sngags gang // mda' yi shugs kyis yongs su 'khor// phan tshun mdud rgyus dpa' bo ni// yul nyid kyis ni phye ba'o// sa bon 'phreng bas de nas gzung // hUM ni mtha' ru gnas
36a5(rgyud): pa yin// bsgrub bya 'gog par gyur pa ni// gom pa gcig kyang mi 'gro'o// kha sbyor sbyar bar gyur pa dang // rdo rje lu gu rgyud bcings pas// rdo rje dbye ba nyid dang ni// de bzhin bung ba ltar
36a6(rgyud): 'khor bya// lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug pa dang // gtun shing gis bskyod de bzhin te// rdo rje nyid kyis 'debs par bshad// dbugs la mdas ni sbyar bya ste// dus min 'chi ba bslu ba la//
36a7(rgyud): yan lag kha T+wAM dag dang sbyar// thod pa'i mchod yon snod du ni// zhal du mtshon cha nges par sbyar// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las gnyis su med pa'i las dang dus ma yin par
36b1(rgyud): 'chi ba bslu ba'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o// de nas phyag rgya'i mchod chen dang // sngags kyi dgod par rab tu grags// myur du dngos grung byed par mi// phyag/
36b2(rgyud): rgya'i mchod 'di the tshom med// mtshan ma gnyis la sngags sbyar te// mkha' 'gro dpa' bo gnyis med pa// snying po rnams kyis de bzhin du// sngags pa mkha' 'gro ma la sbyar// blo ldan
36b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma bsrub bya// gang yang phyag rgya gnon pa zas// las dang mtshon cha dag gi mthu// de bzhin sngags pas snying pos dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor ma sbyar bya// dag pa'i lus ni/
36b4(rgyud): rang 'dod pa// dpa' bo mchod pa rnams byas nas// las ni 'bad pa nyid kyis bya// rnam dbye rang dgas sngags pa ni// phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar// tshar gcod pan 'dogs don
36b5(rgyud): rnams la// las kyi dngos por rnam par bsgom// de nyid dbye bar phye nas ni// rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya// rab tu sgrub pas sbyor don la// phyi rol ji bzhin nang de bzhin// 'di
36b6(rgyud): yis myur du lnga dang ni// lha min mir bcas bsgrub par bya// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa dang las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o//
36b7(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gzugs ni gnon pa'i cho ga ste// phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu sbyar// bza' ba zos ming de nas
37a1(rgyud): ni bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya// mtshan mo bdun ni rdzogs pa dang // bza' dang btung ba dag la sbyar// 'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar// dbang du 'gro bar /
37a2(rgyud): tshom med// ser skya'i mar ni 'thungs nas su// bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya// de yis rang gi gdong bskus na// gal te rtag tu khros gyur pa// mthong ba tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur// til/
37a3(rgyud): mar sa lu btags pa dang // ldan pas lus ni bskus gyur cing // snum khur sngags pas byas nas ni// bza' ba la ni rab tu sbyar// gal te las 'di ma btang na// ji srid 'tshe bar rtag/
37a4(rgyud): dbang 'gyur// til nag dag ni zos nas su// sku tshe bcas pas skyugs pa dang // ru rta bshang ba dang ldan pa// las skyes lto bo'i srin bu ni// rang gi khrag dang btags nas ni// rang gi
37a5(rgyud): khu ba nyid dang sbyar// bza' btung mig sman gos la ni// zug pa nyid du rab tu sbyar// 'di yis ji srid 'tsho yi bar// dbang du 'gyur bar gdon mi za// ba lang sha sreg sbyin sreg ni// zag
37a6(rgyud): sa bsdus man rnams ni// de mong dbang du 'gyur ba'am// gal te sa 'ongs 'tsho bar 'gyur// bdag nyid de mi mdun duni// bsgoms nas mkhas pas spyan theb bya// blon theg mthar
37a7(rgyud): mas gsum nad cig gas 'thugs pa// mtshan bdun gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ 'jig rten pasum na med dka' ba'i// ngamakyis spyod pa'i yon pa ma// rdzas
37b1(rgyud): rdzags tham pa yis/ ra tu bar de gsang par bya// thas ngan rnyeng par mi 'gyur bag/ sbrul bdunan pas 'grub 'gyur// bsod nams chung ba'i thab pos kyang //
37b2(rgyud): pas rnye par 'gyur/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nang gi bdag nyid kyi dbang du bya ba'i cho ga'i le rtsesam rgyum bdun du'o// de nas ban mkha' 'thom pa/
37b3(rgyud): lus kyi mtshan nyid gang yin dang // dpa' bo'i yan lag dbye ba ni// grub par 'gyur ba de grub 'gyur// dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi bri zhing // rnam pa kun tu sba bar bya// gang gi zang du'ang po
37b4(rgyud): gdon te// g.yon pa'i kun spyod sgrub pa pos// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid mkha' 'gro yi// sngags rnams bag med pas 'don na// de lang ni mi blta ste// mkha' 'gro stong phrag du ma yis//
37b5(rgyud): ngan pa'i bdag nyid can de za// dam tshig 'joms shing ngan spyod de// bram ze gsod par the tshom med// sdig spyod rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can// bslus gyur ngan pa'i bdag nyid de// mkha'
37b6(rgyud): 'gro ma yis zos gyur kyang // de la nga ni skyob mi byed// gsang ba pa yi nang na ni// sgrub po de ni phyugs dang 'dra// bla ma dam tshig la 'khu ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten de las lhung // he ru
37b7(rgyud): ka dpal blta dka'i rgyud// gang zhig srung bar byed pa ni// mkha' 'gro mar bcas dge gdong zhes// de la nga ni rjes su 'dzin// bla ma la ni bsnyen bkur byed// gsong por smra ba'i sgrub pa
38a1(rgyud): po mkha' 'gro ma la rtag dga' ba// de la dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po ni dpa' nyid 'gyur// khams gsum mkha' la rgyu ba'i bdag/ sgrub po dpa'
38a2(rgyud): po nyid 'dod pa// thams cad du ni mchod par 'gyur// de ni rnal 'byor la rab 'jug/ yang dag sbyin pa'ang rig par gyur// he ru ka yi brtul zhugs 'dzin// slob dpon dpa' bo mthong gyur
38a3(rgyud): na mthong zhing mthong zhing kun tu dga'// sgrub pa pos ni sngags 'di yis// dpa' bo'i rtsa ba'i gsang sngags mchog/ lan bdun du ni brjod par bya// rab bsngags hUM la sogs pas phye/
38a4(rgyud): de rnams 'bad de phyag byas na// sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad mchod// rtag pa nyid du dpa' chen dang // rol par ldan par the tshom med// de yi thugs kar gnas phag mo// nga dang dpa'
38a5(rgyud): bo rnal 'byor ma// pho nya rnams dang lhan cig bcas// de dang gang zhig legs skyes pa// srog chags bsod nams mthong ba yin// 'bab chu'i 'gram dang rgya mtsho dang // ri bo dang ni bzhi
38a6(rgyud): mdo dang // lteng ka dang ni khron pa mtshe'u// khang stong dang ni lam srang dag/ thams cad du ni mkha' 'gro ma// kun tu zhen par lta la gnas// 'jigs pa chen po dur khrod du// mkha' spyod
38a7(rgyud): de bzhin sa 'og dang // ro langs kyang ni du ma zhig/ 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang stobs chen pos// de dag lhan cig dpa' bo che// ci bde bar ni rol par mdzad// ri sul tshang tshing gsang ba
38b1(rgyud): dngang rnal 'byor ma dang gsang ba'i mi// phyogs ni de dang de dag tu// sgrub pa po dang sa steng rol// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub pa'i sa dang gsang ba'i dpa' byor/
38b2(rgyud): gnas kyi cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// / de nas bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor che// sngags ni rnam pa brgyad kyis dgod// de nas 'di la yang dag mthong // gsol/
38b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rnam mang po// mi bzad mkha' 'gro 'jigs byed pa// dpa' bo 'jigs par gyur na ni// skrag cing rnam par 'byer bar byed// gal te
38b4(rgyud): dpa' bo mi 'jigs na// lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni// rang gi gnas su khyer nas su// mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag dang // rtag tu mngon par rtse byed de// bde ba can gyi gnas 'gro 'gyur//
38b5(rgyud): he ru ka dpal gus 'dod pas// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// sgrub pa po ni sngags lus can// 'khor bar 'chi dang rga ba med// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las blta ba dang /
38b6(rgyud): ha har dgod pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa dgu pa'o// / da ni rab tu bshad bya ba// gang gis sa steng dbang du 'gyur// dpa' bo'i sngags kyis zla ba yis// rnal
38b7(rgyud): 'byor cho gar gnas pas 'grub// sgron ma myos byed bcas pa dang // nya yi sha dang ldan par ni// dpa' dbang gnas skabs thams cad du// nyi ma bdun gyis sgrub pa po'i// mtshan mo'i
39a1(rgyud): sbyin sreg byed la gzhol// dngos grub rgya chen gsol bar 'gyur// brgya dang rtsa brgyad ldan nyid kyis// thun gsum du ni sgrub byed na// rgyal po dpung dang bcas par
39a2(rgyud): ni nyin bdun gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// phyed kyis dpa' bo'i blon po ste// de yi phyed kyis blon po yi// rgyal phran sogs la sum cu gnyis// sreg pa'i rim gyis sbyin sreg bya//
39a3(rgyud): nyi shus bram ze nyid la ni// nyi ma bdun gyis sbyin sreg bya// de bzhin rgyal rigs dag la bdun// sbyin sreg lnga po rje rigs la// dmangs rigs la ni sbyin sreg gsum// tha ma la ni
39a4(rgyud): sbyin sreg gcig/ de ltar dpa' bos rigs rim gyis// zla ba gcig ni yang dag spyad// sngags kyi nus pa sgrub pa pos// 'gro ba thams cad dgug par bya// dpa' bos cho ga snga
39a5(rgyud): ma yis// 'dod pas bsten na thob par 'gyur// sa steng 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bzhon// dpal ldan skal ba bzang por 'gyur// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// yid 'ong 'gyur/
39a6(rgyud): bar gdon mi za// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rigs lnga po dbang du bya ba dang phyag rgya chen po bsten pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// / de nas las
39a7(rgyud): kyi mchog rab ni// gang gis shes nas sgrub pa pos// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang // gsad dang bskrad pa la sogs dang // rmugs dang rengs par bya ba dang // rmongs dang de bzhin
39b1(rgyud): thar byas pa dag / cig 'thog grags par 'gyur ba dang / bon dang de bzhin long ba dang / ma nang dudu bya ba dang / gzugs na sas su gyur ba ste/ smras rten bcu gnas 'dus
39b2(rgyud): ni 'jug tu sgrub pa po yis bsgrub// dngos grub sgrub pa po la ni// dran pas 'grub 'gyur gdon mi za// thams cad tha ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab/
39b3(rgyud): ye shes ldan pa'i rang skye gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// de rnams mkha' 'gro ma ru bshad// ku lu ta dang dgon pa dang // sin+d+hu'i yul
39b4(rgyud): dang grong khyer dbang // gser gyi gling dang sau raSh+Ta/ de bzhin lha yi khyim dang ni// yi dgas grong dang kha ba'i gnas// kAny+tsi 'am la pa ka yi yul// ka ling ka dang ko sa la// tri sha ku na
39b5(rgyud): o tre dang // kA ma rU pa mA la wa// lha mo'i mkhar dang rA mi'i dbang // go dA wa ri arbu ta ra// oMr+ya na dzA lan+d+ha ra dang / pul+lI ra ma la ya sogs// yul 'di dag gi bu mo gang // dpa'
39b6(rgyud): bo gnyis med rnal 'byor ma// de kun 'dod pa'i gzugs can te// yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug pa yin// rnal 'byor ma drug ku lu ta ra// mya ngam yul nam mo rnams// san+ne'i yul
39b7(rgyud): na lA ma ste// rigs kyi gtso mo na ga rar// lam+pA ka dang so rany+dza ra// rigs kyi lha mo rnams yin no// yi dgas grong du nag chen mo// mkha' 'gro rU bi kA ru bcas// kha ba'i ri ring ka tshur ni//
40a1(rgyud): byi bcas ma ru bshad pa ste// pany+tsa lA yi yul dag na// khyim gyi lha mo ka ling kar// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa rnams yin no// ko sa lar ni sha za ba// yi dgas
40a2(rgyud): grong du de bzhin du// rdo rje mkha' 'gro sbom dbang phyug/ tri sha ku ner dum skyes ma// pul+lI ra ma la ya de bzhin// gser rir sme sha can rigs skyes// bud med stong phrag nyi shu gcig/
40a3(rgyud): lhag ma gzhan dag ji snyed pa// dpal ldan he ru ka li ni// 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor ma yin no// he ru ka dpal sbyor ba che// de yi dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'das/
40a4(rgyud): rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// 'gro ba kun ni 'di yi khyab// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig 'di// sprul pa sgom pa nyid yin te// bsam gtan la sogs gang ci'ang rung // sa steng na ni rdzogs
40a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba'o// g.yon gyi spyod pa gcer bu yis// mtshan mo rtag tu mnyam bzhag pas// skyes pa'am gal te g.yon pa kun// rnal 'byor ma kun dpa' bo 'gro// phyag rgya bar gyi mchod pa las/
40a6(rgyud): rang byung rtab tu mchong na ni/ ma lus lus pa med grubacing // g.yon pa'i mchong ba la rab 'jug/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa la sa yi ga nyi shu rtsa ba'i'i dkyil 'khor dbod pa'i cho ga'i len
40a7(rgyud): ni rgyam mtshig pa// den sa dpa' bo mi tog tu/ 'grus nas sngags 'di rjes dran bya// rag tu 'di ltar bya ba nyid/ khyab rgya ldan cis sgrub pa pos/ mtsha/
40b1(rgyud): rtag tu sha bza' ba// sngags 'di nyid kyis lan gsum sngags/ myur du bde bathob par 'gyur/ 'thungs dang de bzhin byi pa dang // reg nas bzhag na gtso mo che / bden pas tshangs par spyod pa/
40b2(rgyud): dang thog mar bzhad pa'i phyag rgya yis// blta ba'i bsnyems pa grags ldan pa// mtshan mo'ang de bzhin nyin mo ni// 'dis ni bzhad pa dag tu bya// gzugs dang las kyi gsang ba gang // ji ltar
40b3(rgyud): gnas pa dpa' bo nyin// rtag tu de yi mchi ma 'byung // dad pas de yi spu yang ldang // rdo rje la ni 'gom mi byed// de bzhin gcer bur mchod pa ste// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad kyi// phyag rgya'i chog
40b4(rgyud): kyi rim pa nyid// dbugs 'byin skul dang dgod pa dang // sgeg pa'i gar ni ngo mtshar bas// sna tshogs dbang phyug mdun byed cing // phyag rgya sngags ni rjes dran bya// ha ha he he rnam brgyad bzhad// sna
40b5(rgyud): tshogs dbang phyug mchog tu dga'// hA hA zhes bya 'di nye bar// rtag tu mchi ma 'byung ba dang // de nyid kyis de dgar 'gyur zhing // bsam gtan gyi sngags legs par sbyor// gtso mo rnams dang
40b6(rgyud): dpa' bo ni// spu ldang ba dang lhan cig bde// rdo rje 'gom par mi bya ba// g.yon pas yongs su brtags pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las bzhad pa'i sngags dang mkha' 'gro
40b7(rgyud): ma'i gzugs kyi smye ma'i cho ga'i le'u rtse pa'i bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas spyan ras gzigs pashad de// dpa' bo dang ni gnyis med ma// gnas kyi dbye ba co ga shes
41a1(rgyud): sgom la rtag tu mngon dga' ba'o// lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am khyim dag gam// dpa' bo'i gnas dang ri bor ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dam tshig gnas// ring po nus kyang gzigs
41a2(rgyud): par 'gyur// phyag rgyas gcer bu mchod pa yi// lag pas go 'phang dam pa ste// gos nyid kyis ni bkab pa'am gzhan// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur// de bzhin sgra grol gtsor gyur pas//
41a3(rgyud): las rnams thams cad brtsam par bya// rtsa ba'i sngags dang de bzhin gzhan// phyogs bcing bar ni 'jug pa yis// lha dang lha yi tshogs kyis kyang // ma mthong bar ni mchod par gyis// snyim
41a4(rgyud): pa me tog gis bkang ste// mkha' la spyod la gyen du 'thor// me tog de dag ma lhung zhing // me tog sa la ma mthong na// gnas kyi khyad par la gnas dang // mkha' la 'gro ba stong phrag gi
41a5(rgyud): gnas la dbang ni byed par 'gyu re// ngag gi dbang phyug ma rnams dang // ngag gi dbang phyug 'gugs par 'gyur// lha dang lha yi gtam shes shing // rim pa ji lta bzhin du'o// skar ma'i rgyu ba
41a6(rgyud): shes par 'gyur// sa 'og rnams su gang byung dang // grong dang grong dang dgon pa dang // grong khyer dang ni bzhi mdo dang // shing gcig dang ni dpa' bo'i khyim// ri rtse dang ni mtshan drung du/
41a7(rgyud): snying po'i nye snying rtag dran na// lha dang me yis mthong mi 'gyur// de bas yul phyogs 'di dag tu// srub pa po ni rtag tu gnas// yi ge bdun gyi bdag nyid can// shing rtser kha dog dam
41b1(rgyud): khams naH/ myur du spad bam byed par// sa rnams kyang na gzhan du man// bdag gA sul rnas pakod // sa lag sha na durtul/ ma bdun ma bdag du rtags/
41b2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad ni nyid du bzlas// rmi lam du ni bya ba kun// yid la 'dod pa ston par 'gyur// dus min 'chi dang bcom dang nyams// bya ba kun tu gang 'gyur dang // rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang //
41b3(rgyud): thams cad tshalam dag tu ston// de bzhin sngags bzlas ral gri chu// mthe bong mar me me long la// sngags pa bdag nyid rtag rnal 'byor// pra sen ni 'bebs par byed// bsgoms nas
41b4(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas brjod pas// dge dang mi dge ston par 'gyur// de nas dpa' bo'i yi ge bdun// sngags dgod dbye ba nyid kyis te// nyi ma'i dbus su bsams nas ni// stong gi bar du
41b5(rgyud): bzlas par bya// shel gyi rnam pa lta bur ni// nad kyis gdungs la bstan par bya// mthong ba tsam gyi mod la ni// nad kun 'jig par the tshom med// nang las rnam par grol gyur na// ston ka'i
41b6(rgyud): dus kyi zla ba 'dra// zla ba'i dus su rnam bkod cing // lag pa g.yon par 'khor lo nyid// yi ge shel gyi mdog ltar snang // nad rnams kun la dgod par bya// rims dang gdon sogs brjed byed dang /
41b7(rgyud): gzer sogs kun dang mdze can dang // dug gis zin sogs nang rnams dang // nang kun the tshom med par ni// zla gzugs yi ge bsams na ni// phyogs bcur rnam par 'byer bar 'gyur// mtshan
42a1(rgyud): mo gsang ba la gnas te// gau mang sa ni mngar gsum btags// yig bdun gsang sngags shes pa dang // stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas// sngags pas nang par dus sun/
42a2(rgyud): gser srang stong ni rnyed par 'gyur// sbyin sreg stong phrag bcu yis ni// yul 'khor dam pa rnyed par 'gyur// yang na gsang sngags rgyal po ni// gnas ni gang du bsams pa dang // de dang der ni de
42a3(rgyud): yi tshe// skye bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// dkar po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur// nag pos skad cig dag gis gsod// dmar pos dbang du 'gyur ba ste// 'phral du nges par 'gugs par 'gyur// se ra/
42a4(rgyud): pos thams cad gnon 'gyur te// 'di ni bstan bcos nges pa yin// ser pos dpung ni gnon pa dang // gru dang 'khrul 'khor glang po gnon// dkar po bsams pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba nges
42a5(rgyud): par slong bar 'gyur// sbrul chen brgya yis zin pa ni// de yang myur du slong bar byed// dug gis brgyal ba rnams mthong nas// rab tu sad pas sad par 'gyur// rims dang gdon dang brjed
42a6(rgyud): byed ni// lag pa mthong bas 'jigs par 'gyur// brgyan po'i dus su khu tshur bcings// yid la rtag tu zlos byed na// khu tshur ma bkrol de srid du// bya ba thams cad sgrub par 'gyur// ngagra brogan
42a7(rgyud): ti lag na ni// mtshon tsha 'phyar bar byed pa yang // ji srid khu tshur ma bkrol bar// mtshon cha gtong bar mi nus so// gzhan yang bya ba thams cad ni// de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed// 'bras bu me
42b1(rgyud): 'das pa dang // sargyad bsta pas rnams pa// ma gyu pa pa ma// de napa chus pa sa// gtsun pa gan gad // ba gas pa /
42b2(rgyud): ba 'grub par 'gyur/ sa rban shing dang bcas pa dang / l+h+wamatsho skye rags btags de la/ 'dir ni 'grub par mi chos srung / khams gsum gyu dang mi rnar bar// dod 'dres su pa du dugs
42b3(rgyud): pa yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las nye ba'i snying po'i las sgrub pa'i cho ga'i le'u skye bzhi bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas pho nya la brten te// yi ge bdun pa
42b4(rgyud): dang ldan pa// gang du las ni yang dag brtsams// de yi mod la myur du 'grub// yi ge bdun pa'i cho ga yis// rnal 'byor ma jug rnam par dgod// 'khor lor legs par gnas pa drug/ rnam pa de ltan
42b5(rgyud): cho ga yis// g.yon pa nyid du bskul dang bcas// gang gis gzugs 'dzin bsams nas ni// kha nas gsang sngags rgyal po zlos// gang la lag pa de bstan pa// de ni nges par 'gugs par
42b6(rgyud): 'gyur// tsan dan dmar po'i rdul dang ni// de bzhin ske tshe lan tshwa dang // bsgrub par bya ba'i rkang rjes rdul// gcig tu byas nas btag par bya// lag pa gnyis kyis mnyes nas ni// rnal 'byor
42b7(rgyud): ma la sbyin sreg bya// mtshan mo sme sha can me 'am// dur khrod me la phye ma srog/ bsgrub par bya la mngon phyogs te// sbyor ba 'di ni brtsam par bya// ji srid brgya yi bar du bzlas// des ni nges
43a1(rgyud): par 'gugs par 'gyur// bsgrub par bya ba'i bdag nyid dang // nor dang skye bo dbang du 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni grub pa ste// gzhan du na ning mi s+thA/ rdul de nyid ni blangs nas su/
43a2(rgyud): lcags phye dang ni rnam par bsres// dur khrod ras la gtums nas ni// lan bdun bzlas la bzhi mdo ru// sor brgyad tshad du sa brkos nas// dgra yi ming dang bcas par ni// gang gi ming spos sbas
43a3(rgyud): gyur ba// de ni myur du gnon par 'gyur// phye ma de nyid bzlas nas su// 'bad de ba yi 'o ma yis// de ni slar yang gsos gyur na// 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med// phye ma de nyid blangs nas ni// mos byed lnga/
43a4(rgyud): dang ldan pa ru// de ni dur khrod ras kyis bcings// dgra yi ming yang bri bar bya// bzlas brjod lan brgya byas nas ni// dur khrod du ni nges sbas na// bsgrub bya spro ba nyid du 'gyur// bton pa nyid kyis thar
43a5(rgyud): par 'gyur// bton nas pa yi 'o ma yis// 'bad pas de bzhin bkru bar bya// slar yang gso ba de dag ni// 'grub pa nyid du the tshom med// dpal he ru ka'i ngos par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug gi
43a6(rgyud): yi ge bdun gyi las kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas las kyi rab mchog ni// ngag gi dngos grub byed pa'o// kA ra wI ra'i me tog dmar// pargya rtsa brgyad ni
43a7(rgyud): blangs nas su// 'bad de pa yi 'o ma dang // bzlas brjod brgya yang bya ba yin// lan re bzlas pa'i me tog gis// ling ka'i spyi bor bsnun par bya// de ltar shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// nyi ma bdun du
43b1(rgyud): bya ba nam/ de nas sbyin thag pacwa btsug pa pa// me ga dag ni blangs nas su// nub chen por myod nas na// re renas na rtul du// de dag thams cad ma ldazhin du/ nu bzlas sa /
43b2(rgyud): chu bor me tog zas ni// d+h+ya las bzlog ste rab 'bab ma/ chu dang bcas par blangs nas ni// sosas reg par de 'thungs na// gsang ba'i rgyud las byung ba ste// srub po'i tshig ni 'grub par 'byor/
43b3(rgyud): de nas skye gnas rgya bcings la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas nas ni// sngags pas bsgrub byar mngon phyogs na// bsgrub par bya ba'i lto bar gnas// de la yid kyi gnas bzhin du// zo ldan bur gsum
43b4(rgyud): mthe'u chung bskyod// bram ze gsod pa dag gis kyang // zhag bdun brgya byin sogs nges 'gugs// tsan dan dmar po'i rdul las ni// bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas la// tsha ba gsum gyis
43b5(rgyud): lus la bsku// pra tshil gyis kyang rab tu byug/ sgrub pa po yi gsang gnas su// zangs ma'i khab kyis phug nas ni// seng ldeng mdag me du med la// mkhas pas nyi ma bdun du bsro// lan brgya
43b6(rgyud): bzlas te bzlas pa'i mthar// mi yi bdag po mdun na 'don// btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni// nges par 'gugs par byed pa yin// mi bdag 'khor bcas gro ga yi// 'dab mar bri bya'i rgyu
43b7(rgyud): lang dang // ro yi san rtsis bris nas ni// ming dang spel nas gang la ni// mngon par phyogs te brgya bzlas nas/ seng ldeng me la de gdungs shing // ngur khrod me steng sbub phyir bshad// ji sring
44a1(rgyud): tha tshal ma nub par// bzos par thar na rgyal phan// 'khor mo sgyur dang bcas par 'a// nges par 'thugs par 'gyur ba yin// bsgrub par byung ba dang rjes las// can/
44a2(rgyud): ngan dmar po nyid dang ni// dur khrod lhag ma thal bas spyos// grub pa po yis gcig bsdus la// seng ldeng me ni du med la// rab tu 'bad pas bsngo bar bya// rdul de lag pa gnyis kyis nI// mnyes
44a3(rgyud): nas sbyin sreg byas nas ni// ji srid du ni bsregs pas 'grub// rdul de blangs nas ma yengs par// dbugs mi 'byin par sbas na ni// brgyal zhing sems dang bral 'dra la// myos shing nyon mongs pa nyid
44a4(rgyud): dang rlung gi shugs kyis 'ongs nas ni// sgrub pa po yi steng du lhung // phyugs sam yang na pho nya mo// mkhas pa yis ni dbye ba yin// de nas las kyi pho nya mor// bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa nyid// ka ra wI
44a5(rgyud): ra'i lcug ma ni// brlan bcas dpung pa'i tshad mnyam blangs// sgrub pa pos ni gang zhig gis// gang gis sngags ni mngon bris nas// 'bar 'gyur ro bsregs me la dor// ji srid de ni ma tshig pa// myur/
44a6(rgyud): du song ste de blangs la// rig pa lan bdun bzlas nas ni// gang zhig bzlas te bskor na ni// de ni de yi skad cig la// skyes pa'am bud med rang gzugs can// rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur// ka ra
44a7(rgyud): wI ra'i me tog dmar// brgya bzlas rgyal gyi sbyor ba las// sgrub pos gi'u wang gis byugs la// me tog chu la gnas pa la// chu bo chen por zhugs nas ni// lte ba man chod chur bcur ste// lag pa sbyar/
44b1(rgyud): pa'i byas gnasal / dam pa blod du zlas nas mi las pa gnyis kyis phyir thags sde / rgya dang brtas pa badrang bar bya/ de nas sgrub pa po de yis/ cig gi dngos thang thob par 'gyug
44b2(rgyud): po'ab rgyal ba'i drung ma ni// yid kyis nges par 'gugs par 'gyur/ lhar bcas lha min mi rnams ni/ myur du dbang du byed par 'gyur// khros pas tshig gis gsod 'gyur zhing // dab dang bskrad/
44b3(rgyud): pa nyid kyang byed// sgrub pa po yi chog nyid kyis// tshar gcod par ni byed par 'gyur// tshig tsam gyis na dra ba dang // shing rta 'khrul 'khor rgya mtsho dang // glang po rta dang de bzhin sbyin// skyes bungam/
44b4(rgyud): yang na bya yang gnon// yid kyis yid la gang 'dod pa// tshig gis thams cad byed par 'gyur// dgug pa yi ni sbyor ba dag/ bud med thams cad rmongs byed pa// ka ra m+b+hi ra'i me tog ni// dmar
44b5(rgyud): po yang dag blangs nas su// rig pa lan brgya bzlas pa dag/ skye gnas dbus su gzhug par bya// me tog de ni khaM sbyar byas// gsang ba'i gnas su nges par sbyar// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor
44b6(rgyud): ldan sngags pas brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas// skye gnas dbus gnas me tog de// sgrub pa po yis gcig blangs la// me tog gis ni gang bsnun pa// de ni mod la dbang du 'gyur// brgya la
44b7(rgyud): zhing sems dang bral ba dang // yan lag tshigs kun gzhan dbang ste// mngon gyur sems ni bzlog pa ru// skad cig gis ni dbang du byed// 'di ni yid ches dngos grub ste// don yod dbang du byed pa yin//
45a1(rgyud): dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las rnal 'byor ma drug dang tshig gi dngos grub lung bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas yi ge ha lA ni//
45a2(rgyud): las rnams thams cad sgrub byed pa// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub rab 'jug pa'o// haM haM ho he haH/ yi ge ha lnga lag pa yis// bskul dang ldan pas mnyes na ni// kha nas kyang ni
45a3(rgyud): khrag 'dzag cing // dgra bo de yi mod la 'chi// rang gi khrag ni thod gnas pa// srin lag gis khrag mnye bar bya// ji srid bskams kyi bar du ste// des ni bsgrub bya rnam par 'jig/ gal te khro ba 'bar ba
45a4(rgyud): dang nga mi dmar ba yis bzlas na ni// dpung tshegs banon par bcas pa yi// rgyal po myur du 'chi bar byed// byi la dang ni ne'u le dang // khwa dang wa dang chu sbyar ni/ mkha' 'gro ma la stobs can sbyar// 'di dag
45a5(rgyud): myur du thub yin par// rgyud 'di la ni bye tshom med// ri bong la sogs su las ni// srang bu byas te lan stong bzlas// gang gi mgul du bcings gyur ba// de ni de dang 'dra bar 'gyur// lag par bzlas
45a6(rgyud): rje slong byas te/ kAr DI ri ma tog dang // mi ge re re mngor bzlas la// skam ma la ni rig gyur na/ yang ma ni rnam par 'pho 'gyur te// btang na thar bar 'gyur ba yin// gang la rdzogs mdzub byas
45a7(rgyud): byed pa sa/ la ga sa pa ga mas kyi ma tsha #de sa pas /
45b1(rgyud): mkha' gro na kyi nang bste/ 'dir brjod pa cam byas kyang // dngas thathathams cad byed byed tshim // de rnanas papa 'thal sa bachen pa bzlas na gas pams du byung du byed par gyu
45b2(rgyud): rtab tu bzlas brjod byas pas ni dpal chen po byed par 'gyur ro// mi rus kyi rgyal phur bu mor drug pa byas la brgyas brgyad mngon par bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas pa de'i rigs brgyang rnams gtsang
45b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// zhing dang / ra ba dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rta'i gnas su sngar bzhin du bcwa rtsa brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas brkos te smras na thams cad rtag par 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po
45b4(rgyud): 'am rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na rgyal po'i sgor sa la byas pa'i gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa byas la/ mkhas pas bzhag nas nyin zhag dang po la ma tu lung ka'i me tog dang / 'bras
45b5(rgyud): bu rnams dang / ku sum bsres pas sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro// sngags 'di nyid kyis dgug pa dang / gnon pa dang / skems pa dang / rmongs pa dang / tshig 'phrog pa
45b6(rgyud): dang long bar byed pa dang / rig pa nyid dang / slar gtang bar byed do// de nas skyes pa bud med du bya bar 'dod na skyes pa'i ro'i me tog dang / kA kaN+Da kI'i 'bras bu dang / khwa'i sen mo dang / rkang
45b7(rgyud): ba'i 'og gi pags pa cha mnyam par byas la ri bong gi khrag dang btags te ril bu bcu gcig byas la grib ma la bskam mo// de bzhin du nyim nag bzang po la lag pa la bcings te nyi ma bcu gnyis
46a1(rgyud): ba la gang gi spyi bor phye ma banag pa de bud med du 'gyur ro// de nas skyes pa khyir bya bar 'dod na skar ma rgyal gyi gnam lcags ne'u mo'i mgo bor bzhag la mtshan mo bdun gyi ba/
46a2(rgyud): du brgya stong bzlas par bya'o// nyin zhag brgyad pa la gur kum dang mnyam por sbyar te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bzlas nas phye ma'i sbyin sreg byas la de'i thal ba gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de khyer
46a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro// slar gso ba gcig ni mtshan mo'i dus su mkha' 'gro ma rnams la mchod pa chen po byas te gtor ma byin na de'i 'og tu rnal mar 'gyur ro// rdzas rdzas ma yin par bya bar 'dod na gser
46a4(rgyud): shing gi 'bras bu la sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na rdzas ma yin par 'gyur ro// a ru ra'i sbyin sreg byas na rnal mar 'gyur ro// de nas smyo bar bya bar 'dod na bya chen po'i gnas kyi sbyin sreg byas/
46a5(rgyud): na nyi ma bdun pa la smyo bar 'gyur ro// slar bzlog pa ni 'bras kyi phub ma'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// byi la'i spu zla ba gzas zin pa'i tshe bsdus la gang gi ming nas smos nas sngags kyi
46a6(rgyud): sbyin sreg byas nas thal ba de gang gi spyi bor bzhag pa de byi lar 'gyur ro// slar bzlas na rnal mar 'gyur ro// bya rog gi rgyas pa la srad bu byas pa bzung la mngon par bzlas te gang gi mgul du bcis
46a7(rgyud): pa de bya rog tu 'gyur ro// gang dang gang gi rgyus pa srad bur byas pa la mngon par bzlas te mgul du bcings pa de de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du khwa dang / thi ba dang / rma bya dang / chu sbyar dang /
46b1(rgyud): thug pa dang / wa dang / bya rgod kyi gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi yulas zung bu byas la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas de babul du brjings na de ba yang du 'gyur ro// snang ba ba'i pa la sogs
46b2(rgyud): ba gang dang gang gi skul srad bu byas la mngon par bzlas te mabul du btabs na de de'i gzugs 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bkro len thar par 'gyur ro// 'bras so ba la bzlas la nor gyi bdag po rin po/
46b3(rgyud): khyim du bcug la lhag mas bdag nyid dbang bskur na mtshan mo bdun gyis so ba thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i
46b4(rgyud): sngags kyi las thams cad kyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad b+ha ba// mkha' 'gro kun gar dge ba yi// snying po rnal 'byor ma kun gyi/
46b5(rgyud): 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum pa g.yo byed cing // rjes su dran pa tsam gyis kyang // yang dag dngos grub rim gyis so// hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ye/
46b6(rgyud): d+hU ba badz+ra la nI ki Sh+ThA d+ha bu rbas oM/ sngags 'di bklags pas 'grub par 'gyur// las rnams kun byed dge ba yin// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // khaN+Da ro he lA ma sogs// mkha' 'gro/
46b7(rgyud): ma ni thams cad kyi// sngags ni 'di nyid yin par grags// sa 'og yang na mtho ros sam// de bzhin mi yul dag tu yang // las ni gang dag yod pa dag/ sngags kyis de dag thams cad sdug
47a1(rgyud): dngos grub kun byed dge ba yin// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// 'di las shin tu mchog gyur gang // 'jig rten gsum na ci yang med// gang phyir 'di ni bla med de/
47a2(rgyud): las rnams thams cad sgrub byed yin// lha yi thabs ni rab ston byed// mkha' 'gro ma ni kun gyi gnas// mdor bshad rgyas par ma yin no// me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis// ri bo bzang po
47a3(rgyud): bri bya zhing // de yi steng du rtag bsgom pa// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro he rnal 'byor ma// dpa' bo rnams kyi dpa' bo nyid// ha ha he he zhes bya ba// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi//
47a4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam snang mdzad// de bzhin pad+ma gar dbang dang // shrI he ru ka nyid dang ni// mkha' snying dang ni rta mgrin nyid// rin chen rdo rje stobs po che/
47a5(rgyud): mig mi bzang dang 'jigs byed dang // rdo rje bzang dang rab bzang dang // rdo rje hUM mdzad dpa' chen po// de bzhin rdo rje ral pa can// b+ha gu can dang rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'od ni nyid dag dang // 'od
47a6(rgyud): dpag med dang rtsa yi dgra// de bzhin mche ba rnam gtsigs dang // keng rus keng rus chen po dang // thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad byug
47a7(rgyud): dpa' bo rnams dang mkha' 'gro nyid// rnal 'byor ma ni rab gtum sogs// bya ba kun la sgrub pa pos// 'khor lor bzhugs par blta bar bya// thub 'dod shin tu mnyam bcag pas/ 'khor las
47b1(rgyud): bdas cang drug tums// gyur bshad pa mchog gis/ mtha' 'tho pa'i bde mchos brjod/ 'khor mo chen pa gra kun nas// de bzhi dngas grub pan phyogs// 'don sangs nas d+he bdang/ ra
47b2(rgyud): babyibs legs par gsungs/ mabar 'grom mi rol// 'bar bye ba dag tu 'gyur/ rnal 'byor ma rnamapa' 'a na ci / gzugs can d+hA nga dusu skyes pa/ de bzhin rnam la sogs mi sa
47b3(rgyud): grub kun byed dge ba yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi gnas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
47b4(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ji banin chogs phyugs bsgrub bya// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o// sngags pas 'bras kyi bye ma las// rim bzhin/
47b5(rgyud): du ni phyugs gzugs bya// mi dang rus sbal rnga mo dang // bong bu spyang kau rta la sogs// de ltar sna tshogs phag dag ste// phyugs 'di dag tu shes par bya// mtshan nyid ji ltar gyur pa dang // 'di rnams
47b6(rgyud): las ni bshad par bya// skye ba gcig dang skye ba gnyis// gsum mam bzhi 'am lnga nyid dang // skye ba drug dang bdun gyur pa// phyugs rnams su ni gdon mi za// gang gi kha yi dri zhim zhing // mig mi
47b7(rgyud): 'dzums par rnam par blta// bden par smra zhing mthong na dga'// rtag tu dam chos dgar 'gyur zhing // rang gi skye ba shes pa dang // lus kyi dri ni rtag tu zhim// mtshan nyid 'di dag ldan par ni/
48a1(rgyud): skye ba bdun du 'byung ba yin// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// lha yi gzugs ni 'dzin par 'gyur// bsnams pa'am reg pa tsam gyis kyang // gang zhig thig le byed pa de//
48a2(rgyud): mod la 'grub par 'gyur ba ste// 'di ni rang dga'i gzugs 'chang 'gyur// de yi snying ka'i ro tsa na// mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas ni// snying po'i sngags ni bzlas nas su// de yi thig le bya ba/
48a3(rgyud): yin/ sems can gang dang gang gi ni// gzugs su byed par 'dod pa na// de dang de yi gzugs su ni// thig les 'gyur bar the tshom med// mkhas pas shing lo khu ba ni// ro tsa nar bcas
48a4(rgyud): blangs nas su// dpral bar thig le byas na ni// de gzugs 'gyur bar the tshom med// phyugs nyid kyi ni ba spu yi// lag pa spyi bor bcing bar bya// de yi yan lag lngar ldan zhing // de yi
48a5(rgyud): spu dang rnam bsres la// lag pa spyi bor bcings na ni// de yi gzugs 'gyur the tshom med// rnal 'byor la ni goms shing zlos// mi rnams nus pa ldan yin yang // dkal zhing nyon mongs la
48a6(rgyud): dga' ba// dngos grub lam ni 'gog pa yin// glang po rta dang bong bu dang // rus sbrul rnga mo phag dang wa// khwa dang 'ug sogs bya rgod dang // khrung khrung wa dang sa ra la// gzugs bzung ba nga
48a7(rgyud): gzugs ngan dang // lha mi gzugs su de 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor dpa' chen rang dga'i gzugs// skye 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'di bas shin tu mchog grub pa// 'jig rten gsum na yod ma
48b1(rgyud): yin/ dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las skye ba bdun pa bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs yongs su brje ba'i cho ga'i le'u sde bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas sbyin sreg chog mi/
48b2(rgyud): nges par dbang du byed 'gyur ba// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba shad// go mangs ni myos byed partse// lag pa g.yon pas sbyin sreg bya// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang
48b3(rgyud): 'gyur na// phran tshogs mi ni smos ci dgos// kha chu so shing dag dang ni// de bzhin rang gi lus mnyes pa// myos byed ming dang bcas pa yis// khams gsum dag ni dbang du 'gyur/ ka zla mtshan gyi
48b4(rgyud): ni khrag dang ni// zos nas rlon pa'i zas dag dang // mi li skra dang ldan pa yis// mod la 'gugs par 'gyur ba yin// rang gi lus las skyugs pa 'am// mkhas pas rang skas sbyin sreg bya// nim/
48b5(rgyud): pa'i shing la rab sbar na// mod la dbye bar 'gyur ba yin// mnyam par bzhag pas d+ha dur me// nyungs mar tshan der bsgres pa yi// bya rog gshog pas sbyin sreg bya// 'phral du 'chi ba'am sde
48b6(rgyud): par 'gyur/ 2ma dang parnal 'dug pa'am/ las dang gyur ba sags la yab kAs sa pas chog tu zlos byed na// de la bzhugs ni 'ad ma yin// y-i las thes rnags brgyas5
48b7(rgyud): dab gras rgyams byed pa sa// don thapa gsum rjes pa/ rigs kyi dbul pa 'dzag par 'gyur// gcin dag gis gang la 'i rgyas byed ldan pas sbyin mes byes/ brgya rtsa brgyan gyi bar/
49a1(rgyud): dum sgrub pa pan blan gsas byed/ yanas sa rnams stong pa / bad+hag kyis dbang du 'gyu/ rnam 'gyu ya snos deg tshus rlu / na
49a2(rgyud): ma da lnga rnams thams cad bsgoms nas ni// thun gnyis bar du sbyin sreg byas// rang gi lus ni de nyid kyis// mkha' la 'gro ba nyid thob 'gyur// gom lu sha rang gis// byung
49a3(rgyud): nang gi sbyin sreg bya// myur du de yi lag tu 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad rab tu 'jug/ sngags kyi bzlas brjod mtshan mo bzlas// yul 'khor yang ni 'gugs par byed// de ltar nyin byas na
49a4(rgyud): ni rgyal po nyid du de byed 'gyur// 'di las rab mchog gzhan dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na yod ma yin// rnal 'byor chen po rang dgras 'chi// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin cing rol// bil ba/
49a5(rgyud): de bzhin pa la sha// u dum+ba ra nyid dag ni// sbyin sreg 'bum byas myur du ni// nor gyi bdag po chen por 'gyur// gau mangs dang myos byed bsre// rgyal srid 'dod pas sbyin sreg bya// rnal 'byor//
49a6(rgyud): dbang phyug mnyes byas na// dbul po nyid du ga la 'gyur// gau mA yu ni bsreg byas pas// ci bde bar ni 'grub par 'gyur// gau mA yu yi sbyin sreg gis// myur du nor bdag mnyam par 'gyur//
49a7(rgyud): brtul zhugs gtsang sbra med na yang // bstan pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// lhag pa'i tshe dang kuSh+maN+Dan+na// mud ga mA sha tsa na ka/ sbrang rtsi gtsigs ma ske tshe dang // khyim gyi ta ma la 'dab blangs//
49b1(rgyud): kha bcings par ni 'gyur ba yin// ci rung spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang du dpa' ba der gnas so// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yis dang gnas// he rug dpal yan la gnyipa
49b2(rgyud): thams cad brtan ga le'i bdag nyid can// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing 'dir 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phrog/ Nan+do ha dri mngon 'gyur rig
49b3(rgyud): nye ba'i tshe rdo kyang dka' ba// 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye bar 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo zos nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sbyin// shrI he ru ka gzung spyod pa'i// 'di na
49b4(rgyud): nang gi bdag nyid sa// pha rol phyin bcus rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma yi brda yi skad// mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag/ pu ril la sogs gang bstan pa/
49b5(rgyud): phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // thams cad du ni spyan zhal dbu// kun tu thos ldan
49b6(rgyud): 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te// sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba 'di nyid gsungs
49b7(rgyud): ba yin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa las dbang gi sbyin sreg dang gnas la sogs pa'i sa bstan pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// de nas de yi rab bshad bya
50a1(rgyud): man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni// nga yis rgyud du smras pa yin// gos dang phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra// A li kA li
50a2(rgyud): zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs stong mngon 'gro ba// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas// ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa// bdud ni tshim byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pa'i dbang bskur ba// go cha/
50a3(rgyud): chen pos yang dag srung // sngags rnams kun gyis mchod par bya// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad
50a4(rgyud): rnam dag 'dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa 'thob cing // skyo dang skye bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// ji ltar sngon bsags sdig pa yi// mtshan nyid thams
50a5(rgyud): cang dman pa ste// gang zhig 'di ni rtag sgom pa// sa la 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ dper na mar gyis gang ba'i snod// me yi dbus su bzhag na ni// mar gsar steng du zhu 'gyur zhing // snod kyi/
50a6(rgyud): dri ma 'jig par 'gyur// de bzhin shrI he ru ka yi// mtshan gyis sdig pa 'jig par 'gyur// bsam gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam// klog cing kha ton bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod
50a7(rgyud): 'thob 'gyur ba 'am// yang na 'khor lo sgyur ba 'thob// rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// khrag 'thung dpal sogs rnal 'byor ma// lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan pa dan
50b1(rgyud): sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa yis// 'chi ba zhes bya rnam rtog 'di// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// de 'dra'i dpa' chen rnal 'byor ma/
50b2(rgyud): sa steng na ni rnyed par dka'// dpal ldan he ru ka'i rgyud chen// gang zhig shes nas ma dad pa// dbul po sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par// de la rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur// mgul rgyan gdu bra
50b3(rgyud): dpung rgyan dang // rna rgyun tshangs pa'i skud pa dang // do shal mgo yi 'phreng ba dang // ska rags sil sil sgra sgrog pa// ri steng sna tshogs pad+ma yi// lte bar A li kA li skyes// dkar mo
50b4(rgyud): bdag po rnams gnon cing // rdo rje dril bus sku la 'khyud// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i phyed ldan pa'i// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs dang // he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya//
50b5(rgyud): dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma'i// 'khor bcas dbus su sbyor ldan pa// thams cad dgyes shing gnyis med gyur// 'byin dang sdud par mdzad pa yin// mos pa du ma'i sems can la// spyod pa/
50b6(rgyud): sna tshogs ston mdzad do// sna tshogs tshul gyis gdul bya ba// thabs ni sna tshogs ston pa yin// zab mo'i chos ni ston pa la// gal te mos par ma gyur kyang // smod pa dag tu mi bya ste// chos/
50b7(rgyud): nyid bsam mi khyab dran bya// gang gis 'dir bdag yul min pa// gang gis chos nyid mi shes yin// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang de'i sras ni// bdag nyid chen po rnams kyis mkhyen// sangs rgyas
51a1(rgyud): rnams ni byung gyur tam// ma byung na yang rnam kun tu// bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid ni// 'phel 'grib spangs pas gnas pa yin// de ltar rnam par gnal nas kyang // 'jig
51a2(rgyud): rten pa kur long mi spang// de yi bgrod pa bsam yas shing // sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab// mdo sde bya ba spyod pa rnams// rnal 'byor gsang tha'i dbye ba nyid// sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnam//
51a3(rgyud): de dang de la dga' ba bzhin// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'bum pa'i nang nas phyung ba grub pa'i rtog pa rmad du byung ba ngo mtshar dang bcas pa byed pa bstan bcos thams cad kyi
51a4(rgyud): rgyal po dpal he ru ka dpa' bo chen po bklags pas grub pa thams cad mkhyen pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa gdod nas grub pa bla ma yin no// dpal he ru ka'i nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma
51a5(rgyud): chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar paN chen pad+ma kA ra dang // grags pa yid 'ong rgyal mtshan mtho ldan pa'i// rin chen dang
51a6(rgyud): mtshungs rin chen bzang po yis// mkhas pa pad+ma ka ra'i zhal sngar ni// rig pa'i 'byung gnas kha che'i dpe las bsgyur// lhag pa'i tshul khrims dri yis bsgos gyur cing // dri med bka' don 'thad
51a7(rgyud): pa dang bcas par// rtog pa dang ldan grags pa'i zhal sngar ni// sgra bsgyur dge slong pradz+nyA kIrti dang // mar pa sgra bsgyur chos kyi dbang phyug gis// mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas yul dbus kyi bla ma nA ro//
51b1(rgyud): ba'i phyag dab dang gtugs pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ a b+hi d+ha ma mut+ta ra tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skang du/ mngon par brjod pa'i chung bla ma zhes bya ba/
51b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// ji srid 'gro ba drug gi mthar// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par 'byung // rdo rje sems dpa' yis ni byed// chos kyi dbyings la phyag
51b3(rgyud): 'tshal bstod// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// sku gsum ye shes lnga yi dngos// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lor bzhugs// 'gro ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal bstod// ji srid rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma//
51b4(rgyud): kun tu rtog pa'i bcings pa bcad// 'jig rten bya ba rab tu 'jug/ de srid rtag tu phyag 'tshal bstod// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
51b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi gsang ba'i snying po la rnam par bzhugs te/ der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan
51b6(rgyud): 'das thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje khro bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba
51b7(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma'i snying po ngas bshad kyis/ lag na rdo rje khro bo chen po'i bdag po 'khor sna tshogs par rnam par 'phrul pa rgyas par bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid zung zhig
52a1(rgyud): de la bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to// thal mo sbyar ba btud pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/ de nas gsang ba bshad byas pa// mdor bsdu/
52a2(rgyud): pa ste rgyas pa min// dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ni// mngon par brjod pa'i phyi ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// gas
52a3(rgyud): ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan dpa'// mkha'
52a4(rgyud): 'gro dra ba'i sdom pa yin// thog ma med pa'i tshul chen 'di// b+ha gar srid sgra gzugs skyes gnas// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// 'jig rten
52a5(rgyud): gsum du rnyed dka' ba// bsrubs dang bsrubs par yang dag sbyor// gang la de la ji ltar bzhin// rang bzhin dag pa 'od gsal ba// gsang ba'i gnas las byung ba yin// rtag tu
52a6(rgyud): nyes bral zhi ba ste// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam gyur pa// spro dang sdud par byed pa yin// rang bzhin dag pa rang byung ste// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba ster// bzlas dang bsam gtan ldan pa dang /
52a7(rgyud): sbyor nyid cho ga'i ye shes kyi// de dag rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ gsang ba'i bdag po rab tu nyon// dbugs 'byin par ma mchog dag dang // dri yi chu dang bcas pa dag/ mkhas pas ril
52b1(rgyud): bur byas nas ni// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag la mchod// 'byung ba'i dus kyi khyad par la// pho nyas lhan cig skyes pa 'grub// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma ste// mthar thug dngos grub
52b2(rgyud): thams cad 'byung // dga' ba yid la 'dod pa yi// dngos grub kyang ni 'grub par 'gyur// rang rdzas thig le'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' mchod par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba
52b3(rgyud): yisang rang dang gzhan yang mchod par bya// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur te// de ltar 'di la the tshom med// rnal 'byor pa nyid bsod/
52b4(rgyud): nams mchog/ dag byed sdig pa 'jig par byed// bzlas dang bsam gtan dag pas kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig la
52b5(rgyud): 'jug pa'i gsang ba sbas pa bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting
52b6(rgyud): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ dngos grub thams cad kyi gsang ba gsungs pa/ chags pa med cing chags pa dang bral ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sem/
52b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'di sa ste/ dpa' bo chen po gzugs rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po tshor ba rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po 'du shes rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen/
53a1(rgyud): po 'du byed rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / dpa' bo chen po rnam par shes pa rdo rje zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje dbang phyug chen po
53a2(rgyud): dang dpa' bo chen po gti mug rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rna ba rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po sku rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chags pa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po phrag dog rdo rje dang / de bzhin
53a3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po sa rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po chu rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po me rdo rje dang / dpa' bo chen po rlung rdo rje
53a4(rgyud): dang dpa' bo chen po mkha' dbyings rdo rje dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'phro ba'i gsang ba'i snying po
53a5(rgyud): 'byung bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo sna tshogs 'dus pa/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ dpa' bo chen po rdo rje thod pa'i dum bu dang / dpa' bo chen
53a6(rgyud): po rdo rje keng rus chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje keng rus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lha dgra dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpag med/
53a7(rgyud): dang dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'od dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje lus dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje myu gu dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje ral pa can dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang /
53b1(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rab bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje bzang po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje mig mi
53b2(rgyud): bzang dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje stobs po che dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rin chen dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rta mchog dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje nam mkha' snying po dang / dpa' bo chen po
53b3(rgyud): rdo rje dpal he ru ka chen po dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang / dpa' bo chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / 'di lta bu la sogs
53b4(rgyud): ba'i dpa' bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje gsum
53b5(rgyud): gyi dam tshig gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi gsang ba'i dam tshig gsang ba'i b+ha ga las 'byung ba rnal 'byor ma dang / dpa' bo'i gsang ba'i dam chis
53b6(rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dam tshig chen po gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor ma chen mo ltung byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gsod byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen
53b7(rgyud): mo 'gugs byed ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gar gyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo pad+ma'i dra ba mo zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma
54a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje lA ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje dum skyes ma zhes bya ba dang / mkha' 'gro ma chen mo rdo rje gzugs can ma
54a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab gtum ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo gtum mig ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen
54a3(rgyud): mo sna chen ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dpa' bo'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo mi'u thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo lang ka'i dbang phyug ma zhes bya
54a4(rgyud): ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo shing grib ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sa srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'jigs byed chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen
54a5(rgyud): mo rlung gi shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'thung ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo sngo bsangs ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab bzang ma zhes bya ba dang /
54a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma chen mo rta rnam zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo bya gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i shugs can ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dum skyes ma
54a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo chang 'tshong ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo'i go cha ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo rab dpal mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma/
54b1(rgyud): chen mo stobs chen mo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo 'khor lo sgyur ma zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo brtson 'grus chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de lta bu la sogs pa sna tshogs pas ram
54b2(rgyud): mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs pa/ gar sna tshogs byed cing rang gi dam tshig dang / 'khyud pa dang / tsum+ba nas snying rje chen po'i ro yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpa' bo dang /
54b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis grang bar mthong ngo // mthong nas nus te/ dpa' bo'i mi mchog rnams kyis dam tshig rjes su dran no// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje phag mo'i dam
54b4(rgyud): tshig gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yang dag par 'byung zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi rigs dang gsang ba gsungs pa
54b5(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ rdo rje ma mo khwa gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo 'ug gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo khyi gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo phag gdong ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma me/
54b6(rgyud): gshin rje sreg ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje pho nya mo zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje mche ba ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje ma mo gshin rje 'joms ma zhes bya ba dang / 'di lta bu'i
54b7(rgyud): ma mo'i tshogs kyi mchog thams cad kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad gang ste/ rigs kyi bdag po rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'byung ba dpa
55a1(rgyud): he ru ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig chen po rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig yin te/ chos rnams thams cad dngos po med// mtshan nyid thams cad rnam
55a2(rgyud): spangs pa// bdag med chos las yang dag byung // 'di ni dam tshig mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su med pa'i rdo rje go cha zhes bya ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gsungs pa 'di
55a3(rgyud): lta ste/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang /
55a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje he ru ka dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje nyi ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje rje mchog dang / rigs drug po de ni yan lag drug tu
55a5(rgyud): dgod pa ste/ srung ba gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi mchog de ni thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa las byung ngo // rnal 'byor chen po'i mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa bshad par bya ste/
55a6(rgyud): rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo ya mi ni dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo rmongs byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo g.yo byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo
55a7(rgyud): skrag byed ma dang / rdo rje dbang phyug chen mo tsaN+Di ka ste/ 'di lta bus yang nam mkha'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyis gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yang dag par srung ba'i sbyor ba'i
55b1(rgyud): khrugs gsang ba chen po ste/ de lta bu sna tshogs du ma'i rnal 'byor ma rang gi dag pas zag rnon mo mchog gis mchod pa byas nas thal mo sbyar te/ mos pa mchog gi spyi bos gtugs so nga /
55b2(rgyud): nas dam tshig chen po rnam par 'phrul pa rdo rje sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi ba sru'i bu gnas sems dpa' sna tshogs spos dpung nas gdul ba du ma la
55b3(rgyud): thabs sna tshogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang bar byas te/ sna tshogs pas mdun gyi nam mkha' yongs su gang bar mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sna chog
55b4(rgyud): pa'i snying rje chen po'i khro bo'i cha lugs 'dzin cing / sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i ro dga' ba sna tshogs kyi cho 'phrul rdul snyed dang mnyam pa bstan te/ khams gsum gyi
55b5(rgyud): bdag pos gsung ba/ chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / dbang chen gyi steng du sna tshogs pa'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab sna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs sna tshogs pa'i gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa/ de'i steng du dpal
55b6(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings las rdo rje khro bo chen po phyung nas spros te// rdo rje chen po'i gzhal yas khang dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal por sprul pa kun tu bzang po chen po byung ste/ rdo rje 'khor
55b7(rgyud): dang lhan cig byung nas brtan par bzhugs so// phun sum tshogs pa sna tshogs pas brgyan pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i rgyan gyis srud pa/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i mdog ltar sdug pa/ dril bu dang / rnga yab/
56a1(rgyud): dang du rgyal mtshan dang / g.yer ka'i dra bas mig mangs ris su zos pa/ rdo rje dam tshig srung bu chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i sgra sgrogs pa/ sna tshogs pa'i lnga dang /
56a2(rgyud): dang gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon dang / ma rungs pa dang / shin tu gdug pa dang / ro langs dang /
56a3(rgyud): ro dang / ro sreg pa dang / khyi dang / ce spyang dang / ce spyang mo'i sgra sgrog pa/ dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i sgra 'phreng dang / a la la'i sgra sgrogs pa/ dril bu dang cang te'u'i
56a4(rgyud): sgra sgrogs pa/ mgo bcad pa gar byed pas nye bar brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyod pa dang dge ba'i las kyis grol ba/ sems can thams cad la snying rje'i ros phan 'dogs/
56a5(rgyud): pa rnam par 'khor bas bskor ba/ pad+ma'i gar gyis gar byed cing thal mo sbyor ba/ g.yas brkyang bas gnas pa/ lag pa'i thal mo sbyor ba/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i dum bu'i chos kyi mchog
56a6(rgyud): zab mo'i tshul dang / khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i 'dod pa ston pa/ sku lus chen po 'dzin pa/ zab mo'i sgra sgrog pa/ rang gi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor can/ mngon par brjod pa'i bla ma chen mo
56a7(rgyud): nye bar 'byung ba/ mkha' 'gro dang mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyal po'i dra ba'i dra ba na/ chos sna tshogs pa'i rjes su bstan pa'i ston pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs kyi bde ba ster zhing
56b1(rgyud): ston par byed pa sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje legs par nyon cig/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ zhu ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//
56b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ snying khar zla ba bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje phra mo'i rnam 'phrul ba// bde gshegs
56b3(rgyud): thams cad gsang ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// der ni gsang ba byin brlabs pa// snying po mchog ni legs par nyon// bla ma yi yang bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom/
56b4(rgyud): oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haH sarba d+harmAHbadz+ra shud+d+ho&haM/ oM yo g+ha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+ho&haM/ oM dz+nyA na shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA
56b5(rgyud): dz+nyA na shud+d+he&haM/ oM sa ma ya shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsa ma yau shud+d+ho&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shA n+ya tA a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba It+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta su pra ti bi shud+d+heHsarba d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na badz+ra swa
56b6(rgyud): b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba man+ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHsarba man+ta shud+d+ho&haM/ oM kro d+ha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkro d+ha shud+d+ho&haM/ oM tsit+ta shud+d+heHsarba d+harmAHtsit+ta shud+d+ho&haM/ oM bAka shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbA ka shud+d+ho&haM/
56b7(rgyud): oM kA li shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHkA la shud+d+he&ha~M/ oM dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA dz+nyA na a mr-i ta shud+d+ho&ha~M/ oM nA nA sa ma ya shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAn+danA n+da sa ma ya shud+d+ho&H/ oM tsAr+ya na ya shud+d+haHsarbaH
57a1(rgyud): tsAr+yan la shud+d+ho d+hi/ mo tA yog pA ri shud+d+ha sarbad+harmAHtrai lo ga pa ri shud+d+ho&taM/ oM a b+hi She ka shud+d+haH sarba d+harmA/ a b+hi She ka shud+d+ho&ha~M/ oM b+hu dza shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA pU dza bud+d+ho&/
57a2(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta a dA ya pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM maN+Da laM shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHmaN+Da la shud+d+ho&haM/ oM a d+hi pa ti shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa d+hi pa ti shud+d+ho&haM/ oM bI ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHbA ra shud+d+ho&haM/
57a3(rgyud): oM yo gI ni shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHyo gI ni shud+d+ho&ha~M/ oM tat+ta shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+harmAHta tra shud+d+ho&haM/ he oM ti he tu a pa ga ta sarba d+har+m+mAHha~M tu a ba ga to&haM/ ru oM ti ru ka ra a pa ga taM sarba d+harmAH rU ka ra a pa hA/
57a4(rgyud): to&haM/ ka o ti nA kA tsit+ta s+thi ta sarba d+harmA nA kA tsit+ta s+thi to&he/ oM d+hi Ti ta ka ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHdz+nya Ti ta kA ra shud+d+ho&haM/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ oM dz+wA la shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHdz+wa la/
57a5(rgyud): shud+d+ho&haM/ oM A ha ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHA ha ra shud+d+ho&hUM/ oM b+hak+Sha shud+d+haHsarba d+harmaHb+hak+Sha shud+d+ho&haM/ oM a sa mA hi ta shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHa sa mA hi ta shud+d+ho&haM/ oM si saM bi dan shud+d+haHsarba/
57a6(rgyud): d+har+m+maHsi saM be dan shud+d+ho&hUM/ oM dwe Sha shud+d+heHsarba d+harmAHdwe la shud+d+ho&haM/ oM mo ha shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maHmo ha shud+d+ho&haM/ oM rA ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHrA ga shud+d+ho&haM/ oM mA na shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+maH
57a7(rgyud): mA ni shud+d+ho&ha~M/ oM i ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHi re shud+d+ho&haM/ oM kha badz+ra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHkha badz+ra shud+d+ho&ha~M/ oM tri tsakra pa ri shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHtri tsakra ba ri shud+d+ho&ha~M.oM DA ki nA~M praH/
57b1(rgyud): saHm+b+haT+Ta ki nA pra tra/ oM ku la shram+b+ha sarbad+ham+b+ha tu/ oMm+b+ha d+ha rmAr+dz+dza sar+b+bad+har+m+mA snang bud+d+ho&trAM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha sarbaH pa bud+mod+hA/ 'di ltar dzi bar dUr rjod/
57b2(rgyud): kyi bar thams cad rnam par dag par shes par bya'o// puM dza oM a ga ra de ma kA o tr-i ko ka li ka hi pre gr-I sau su na saM ma ku/ sa bcu rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ pha rol phyin bcu'ang de bzhin te/
57b3(rgyud): shes pa bcu yang rnam dag bdag/ bcu po de dag rnam par sgom// 'khor lo gsum yang yongs dag phyir// nyi shu rtsa bzhi bdag nyid dge/ dus dang tshed rnams rnam grol bas// rnal 'byor/
57b4(rgyud): ma yi yid dga' ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// mngon mthong he ru ka las byung // mngon brjod rgyud ni bla ma'i bla// gsang chen mchog gi dam pa'o// g.yon dang g.yas su
57b5(rgyud): bskor ba yis// dgod cing mchod dang bskor bar bya// gang gis de nyid shes pa yis// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// gang yang dbang bskur med pa la// gzhan du de nyid ma bstan cig/
57b6(rgyud): mngon brjod rgud la bla ma yis// dbang bskur slob ma dag la sbyin// gzhan du slob ma skyo ba dang // brgyal dang rmongs pa dag tu 'gro// mnar med 'jigs pa chen po dang // ngan pa
57b7(rgyud): der ni ltung bar 'gyur// glegs bam ba shes min la ster ba// ngan pa de ma thag tu 'chi// pol mig rims dang dug dang nang // mkha' 'gro gdon gyis gtses par 'gyur// mi bsun rdeg dang /
58a1(rgyud): 'tshog dag gis// gsod cing dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur// ji srid 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma slob mas rim bzhin du// de nyid rtag tu sbas na ni/
58a2(rgyud): myur du sngags kyis dngos grub 'gyur// bla mas thams cad rim bzhin du// mngon brjod rgyud kyi rim pa bzhin// lha yi rnal 'byor la sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes 'gyur//
58a3(rgyud): de ma thag tu byang chub ste// mchog ni nges par rnyed par 'gyur// mi yi bu mo 'di 'dra spangs// bdag gi dam tshig mi shes shing // drag cing log lta rang bzhin ngan// mi bsrun snying rje
58a4(rgyud): med pa dang // brkam chags ser snar ldan pa dang // smra zhing ngan la phrag dog can// skyes pa gzhan la chags pa dang // rnam par rtog pa mang ba dang // 'di 'dra'i phyag rgya spangs par bya//
58a5(rgyud): sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring ba yin// puk+ka sI ni mdzes sdug blang // gzugs sdug gzhon pas rnam par brgyan// sbyor ba la ni gcig tu sems// brtul zhugs brtan zhing dam tshig shes//
58a6(rgyud): dpa' zhing chags bral ngo tsha med// nga rgyal med cing ser sna med// sngags pa rang gi spyod pa ste// rig ma brtul zhugs khyod kyis long // phyag rgya lnga ni rtag tu 'chang // mgo la thod pa'i/
58a7(rgyud): rgyan yang byas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// thal ba'i rdul gyis rnam par byugs// rtag tu ma hA mAM sa bza'// thams cad btung bas myos pa dang // ro yi gdan la 'dug pa dang /
58b1(rgyud): bags pa chen po gos su gyon// rjes su 'thun pa'i bza' ba za// zhag dang khrag gis tshim pa dang // zong ngam dgon pa dag tu yang // gang zhig yul du 'gro ba na// rtag tu chags pas mi/
58b2(rgyud): gnas shing // rtag tu dur khrod spyod byed la// yang na tshong dus gnas pa dang // nyan thos 'jig rten skal med pa'i// mi shes gti mug gis khyab pa/ nyan thos yongs su longs spyod
58b3(rgyud): dra'i gtsug lag khang du gnas mi bya// ji ltar skyes bu dbul po bzhin// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gnas// rdo rje gar gyis rnam par rol// rtag tu dur khrod la gnas shing //
58b4(rgyud): dri chen sha chen zas su bza'// myos byed btung bar ldan pa yi// dpa' ba'i gtso bos rtse gcig pa'i// sems kyis rab tu bsgom par bya// phyag rgya chen po ma rnyed na// g.yeng ba thams cad
58b5(rgyud): rnam spangs pa'i// de ni ye shes 'byung gnas te// shes rab pha rol phyin las 'byung // gzung dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i// gnyis su med pa nyid la gnas// rtse gcig sems ni/
58b6(rgyud): byas nas kyang // sgom pa'i spyod pa la gnas na// bde la dga' ba'i dngos grub 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis cho ga'i rim// phyag rgya che dang nges par rol// sgom pa mngon du gyur pa yis//
58b7(rgyud): rnam grol sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// g.yon pa'i spyod pa shes rab ste// g.yas pa de bzhin thabs yin no// sgom par ldan pa'i mthu stobs ni// sum
59a1(rgyud): cu'i dbang phyug la dbang byed// rnal 'byor ma ni dngos grub dang // gnod sbyin klu li bu mo dang // gzhan yang sna tshogs dri za mo// 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag la spyod/
59a2(rgyud): de nyid gsang ba'i mchog gyur pa// A li kA li rtag tu sgom// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad de bzhin rnam par brtag/ dpa' bos brda rnams bstan pa ni// rnal 'byor pa
59a3(rgyud): yis lag g.yon gyis// brda rnams la ni 'jug par byas// dpa' bos gnas su gyur pa 'di// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// 'gro kun g.yon las byung ba yin// rdo rje sems dpa'
59a4(rgyud): mthe bong nyid// mdzub mor rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs// gung mor pad+ma gar dbang gnas// srin lag dpa' bo dngos grub can// tha ma la ni mi zad sku// sen mo'i ngos la rta mgrin gnas/
59a5(rgyud): g.yon pa'i rgyu las byung ba ni// dpa' bo thams cad yin par bshad// lag mthil po nya 'dus pa'i mchog/ rgyab tu shin tu nges byas te// brda ni lnga po bstan par bya// sgrub pa po
59a6(rgyud): yis shes pa gyis// sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu khams mA ma kI ru bshad// me ni gos dkar mo ru bshad// rlung ni sgrol ma dag tu grags// 'o byed ma ni stong pa ste// de bzhin pa rol
59a7(rgyud): phyin pa yin// dbus kyi dpa' bo thams cad ni// mkhas pas rgyab tu gshegs su gsol// gsang ba 'di ni mi bstan cing // rab tu 'bad de sba bar bya// de ltar brda yis dpa' bo rnams//
59b1(rgyud): de dang lhan cig bza' bas bza'// dpa' bos thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mtha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin// phan tshun rjes 'gro thams cad kyi// sna tshogs brda nu pa gang bar ga/ mkhar 'gro
59b2(rgyud): ma mi mtshan nyid dang // bo nya rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang // sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// de dag thams cad bshad par bya// ras ris dang ni sku gzugs dag/ 'dri na de bzhin dam tshig dang /
59b3(rgyud): mdog gi ni khyad par gyis// gang gis sgrub pa po 'grub pa// sna tshogs sngags kyis mdzad pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // lha yi dam tshig yid 'ong ba/ rnal 'byor ma
59b4(rgyud): sna tshogs mchog/ dpa' bo sna tshogs yid 'ong ba'i// rnal 'byor ma ni yang dag 'dus// mkha' 'gro ma yang yang dag 'dus// rang rigs sna tshogs mchog dam pa// bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' bzhin
59b5(rgyud): du/ slob ma la ni phan pa'i phyir// bdag po'i las la shin tu mkhas// sngags dang rgyud la legs par bslabs// gzhan yang cho ga'i rim pa dang // mngon brjod bla ma'i las la mkhas// phyug
