117b3(rgyud): can kun gyi snying la gnas// oM a AM/ i I/ u AM/ oM au/ oM au/ aM AHhUM/ 'di ni bcom ldan de nyid kyi// he ru ka ni dbang phyug mchog/ mkha' la dri med zla
117b4(rgyud): ba li lte ba'i dbus su bsgom par bya// r-i r-I l-i l-I/ mkha' 'gro ma ni pad 'dab bzhugs// ka khaM gaM b+hU / tsaM tsha rje dz+hanya/ rbar+thaNad+haN/ ta thaM daM d+ha naM/ paM pheM baM b+ha maM/
117b5(rgyud): de yi thod pa'i dum sogs dang // gtum mig ma la sogs kun gyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// yaM raM laM waM/ sha Sha saM haM kAM/ de yi
117b6(rgyud): khwa gdong la sogs dang // gshin rje sreg sogs kun gyi'o// yi ge kA yi bdag nyid ni// bde ba chen po'i shu kra'i gzugs// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs//
117b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas yin zhing // kun la khyab cing rtag tu stong // brjod du med cing phra ba'i dbus// 'di ni tshad med rtag pa'i thugs// rang gi gzugs ni mkha' lta bu/
118a1(rgyud): 'di ni bdag nyid bcings pa ste// 'di ni dgrol la mkhas pa yin// 'di ni lte ba'i dbus bzhugs shing // shu kra'i gzugs kyi bde chen gnas// sku gsung
118a2(rgyud): thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo gsum gyi dbus su dgod// 'di ni gsang ba mchog yin te// gang la yang ni bstan mi bya// sngar bshad phyag dang phyag mtshan dang // go cha yang /
118a3(rgyud): ni de bzhin te// sngar bshad bzhin du bkod nas kyang // phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ dpa' bo'i yan lag rnam dag nyid// byang chub phyogs kyang de bzhin te// lugs su 'byung
118a4(rgyud): dang bzlog pa yis// sngar bshad 'khor lo rnam par dgod// thams cad dkar ba'i mdog can la// 'khor lo gsum ni bcu drug dgod// dpa' bo yang ni so sor dgod// rnal 'byor/
118a5(rgyud): ma yang so sor te// rang gi thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa yin// dpa' bo'i rang gi rig pa dang // gnyis su med par gnas pa yin// mkha' 'gro sogs dang khyi gdong/
118a6(rgyud): sogs// rang gi thabs dang gnyis med gnas// de ni rdo rje snying po'o// rnal 'byor ma yi dam pa ste// mchog tu gsang ba sbas pa dag/ rdo rje snying pos zhus nas ni// bcom ldan 'das
118a7(rgyud): kyis gsungs pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dpal he ru ka dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / dpa' bo dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams bsgoms pas bskyed pa ste/
118b1(rgyud): le'u bcolnga pa'o// de nas gnan mang bshad bya ba// dang po'i las kyi sgom pa'o// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog gyur pa// cig car du ni bskyed pa dag doH/
118b2(rgyud): snying pos gsungs pa yin// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig la// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnams bsgyur// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yis mgo la mnan//
118b3(rgyud): rgyan drug sna tshogs rdo rje dang // zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zod pa kha T+wAM ga bsdams shing //
118b4(rgyud): de ni rdo rje mchog kyang gsor// phag mos kyang ni rnam par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag gi gnas// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// thod pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis//
118b5(rgyud): phyogs su bsdigs shing skra grol la// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// 'khor la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa ste// phyag rgya lnga ni mnyam/
118b6(rgyud): par sbyor// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i gzugs// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// sgom pa mchog gi sgom pa'o// dbus su khrag 'thung rdo rje ni/
118b7(rgyud): sngo ba'i mdog can bde ba che// pad+ma'i dbus su sgom pa ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'i mdog/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma yi
119a1(rgyud): khyad par ni// dpa' bo mdog ni nag po la// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar ba nyid// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// dmar ba'i mdog can cher 'bar ba/
119a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro'ang de bzhin nag po ste// sku mdog gnyis su rnam par sgom// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni// zla ba ser skya legs brgyan pas// de la mkha' 'gro ma yang dmar// ci 'dod
119a3(rgyud): gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin// khwa gdong la sogs kun ljang khu// gshin rje sreg sogs kun dud kha// de ltar mdog gi bye brag gis// sgom pa'i mchog gis shes par bya// mkha' 'gro ma
119a4(rgyud): thotho kha nA 'dzin// cang te'u gar gyi rnam par bzhugs// thams cad dbu spu grol ba ste// phyogs kyi gos can bzhad pa'i zhal// zugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// rdo rje dril bus legs
119a5(rgyud): par 'khyud// rnal 'byor ma ni zod rdo rje// sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig bcas// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// pad+ma dril bus rnam par brgyad// rnal 'byor ma ni thod pad+ma/
119a6(rgyud): sdigs mdzub dang ni lhan cig pas// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams// 'khor lo dril bu rab tu 'bar// rnal 'byor ma 'khor sdigs mdzub can// thod pa rkang gis
119a7(rgyud): gang ba'o// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo ni// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug dang ni sdigs mdzub bcas// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo ni// cang te'u mgo bo sdigs
119b1(rgyud): mdzub dang // zod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// skyil krung phyed pas gar dang bcas// dpa' bo g.yas brkyang gnas pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi byin pas 'khril// gnyis su/
119b2(rgyud): med par mnyam ldan pa// thugs rje chags pa'i bde ba che// ye shes 'khor lo mnyam ldan pas// bde ba'i bde ba gcig tu 'gyur// chos kyi ro las yang dag 'byung // rang min sa bon /
119b3(rgyud): dang bcas pa// 'phreng ba'i sngags dang mnyam par sbyar// gsal byed mnyam par sbyar nas su// hUM gnyis phaT dang yang dag sbyar// dpa' bo'i gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// rnal 'byor/
119b4(rgyud): ma yang de bzhin bshad// rang gi ming gi sa bon dbus// gsal byed dang ni mnyam par ldan// huM hUM phaT kyang de bzhin te// sngags pa 'di ltar sbyar bar bya// dbus su khrag
119b5(rgyud): bzung rdo rje ste// gsang sngags 'di ni mkhas pas bzla// oM shrI he badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM hrI ha ha huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bA rA hi hu hUM
119b6(rgyud): phaT oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// dus bzhi dag tu cho ga bzhin// rnal 'byor pa yis bzlas pa bya// mdun du ba spu'i khung bu
119b7(rgyud): las 'chos dang longs spyod rnam par spro// sems can rnams la phan gdags phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo bstan par bya// 'gro ba rigs drug grol nas ni// bla med gnas
120a1(rgyud): su 'jog par byed// sngags pas ji ltar 'dod sbyor ba// rigs lnga rnams kyi dbus su yang // gang gis rigs gsum dbus khyab pa// khams gsum gyi ni
120a2(rgyud): bdag po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ lus dang po pa'i sbyor ba'i sgom pa
120a3(rgyud): bstan pa ste le'u bcu drug pa'o// / rdo rje snying pos rab bshad pa// dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa ste// phyag bzhi pa yi cho ga yis// dbang po bar ma rnam
120a4(rgyud): par sgom// cig car bskyed pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgom pa dag ni rnam par sgom// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas
120a5(rgyud): bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnon// sku lus mi mgo'i do shal can// thod pa'i dbu rgyan mchog can to// zla ba phyed pas mdzes pa yin// sna tshogs rdo rjes rnam par mtshan//
120a6(rgyud): phyag rgya drug po drag po'i gzugs// sku mdog dkar po 'jigs pa ste// sngo zhing ljang khu dmar po ste// steng gi zhal gdong rnam par sgom// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje dril bu cang
120a7(rgyud): te'u dang // rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i ku rtsa 'tshir ba ste// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// skra grol dum bu'i ska rags
120b1(rgyud): can de phyag zhal dang mdog gis mtshan// mkha' 'gro ma ni sngo la ser// lA ma ljang dang ser po ste// dum skyes ma ni dmar la ldang // gzugs can ma ni ser la dmar// zong/
120b2(rgyud): pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug mgo ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ cang te'u sgra ni du ma sgrog/ gcer bu s+tha ni grol ba ste// thod pa dag gis cod pan byas// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i
120b3(rgyud): zhal rang gi mdog dang phyag de bzhin// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar can te// bdud bzhi zhabs 'og gnon pa dang // 'dod pas lta zhing rtog pa ste// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni//
120b4(rgyud): sngo dang ser bar rnam par sgom// de bzhin rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'ang // dkar zhing sngo bar rnam par sgom// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje dril bus legs par 'khyud// cang te'u yi
120b5(rgyud): ni sna tshogs sgra// rdo rje sgra ni yongs su rdzogs// thod pa dang ni sdigs mdzub dang // gri gug dang ni mi thod 'dzin// lha mo'i phyag rnams de bzhin te// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par
120b6(rgyud): 'khril// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs pa chen po bzhin rnam bsgyur// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i cod pan byas// dpa' bo rdo rjes mtshan ma'o// gsung gi 'khor
120b7(rgyud): lo'i dpa' bo gang // dmar zhing gnag la 'jigs pa ste// pad+ma'i dpa' bos rnam par khyab// rang gi phyag mtshan 'dzin pa ste// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// ljang dang
121a1(rgyud): dkar ba'i sku lus can// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo yang // ser dang ldang ba'i sku lus can// 'khor los dpa' bo yongs su khyab// 'khor lo sgyur/
121a2(rgyud): ba'ang ster bar byed// 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// dkar dmar dang ni yid 'phrog pa'o// rang gi mtshan dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba// khwa gdong sogs/
121a3(rgyud): bzhi mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog pa'o// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug mgo bo cang te'u 'dzin// gshin rje sreg byed sogs lha mo// dud kha dmar po
121a4(rgyud): de bzhin no// gshin rje dbyig to gri gug go/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// 'khor gyi ma sogs mkha' 'gro ma// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam
121a5(rgyud): par 'khril// mkha' 'gro ma ni dgyes pa che// skra grol phyogs kyi gos 'chang zhing // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin cing // dpa' bo mkha'
121a6(rgyud): 'gro ma yi 'khor// spyan gsum drag po rnam bsgyur ba// dpa' bo 'dod pa'i zas la rol// chags pa'i mig gis rnam par blta// sngar bshad cho ga'i rim pa bzhin// gsang
121a7(rgyud): sngags rang min sa bon dang // dpa' bo gsang sngags 'di ru bshad// mkha' 'gro ma yang de bzhin te// rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid ni// gsang sngags mchog kyang de
121b1(rgyud): bzhin no// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hrIHha ha hu hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra bA rA hi bi hu hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI le huM hUM phaT/ thams cad bsgoms te mthong ba na/
121b2(rgyud): bdag po dang ni 'khor la sogs// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// legs par dbang bskur gzhug par bya// bsgom pas gcig tu byas nas ni// bdud rtsi mchog gis tshim par
121b3(rgyud): bya ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// khro bo tshogs mchog spos nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mthong ba na// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa yis// dam tshig can gyis bzlas pa
121b4(rgyud): bya 'khor sogs dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// don dam bzlas par bshad pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbang po
121b5(rgyud): bar ma'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje snying po'i gsang ba ste// gang yang de nyid rim pa dag/ sgrub pa
121b6(rgyud): po la phan pa'i phyir// dbang po rnon po'i bsgom pa bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba dag/ sgom pa de yis bsgom par bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// lam
121b7(rgyud): gyi rnam mkhyen ye shes so// A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// bdag nyid he ru kar yang bya// mgon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// spyan gsum rnam par bsgyur ba'i zhal/
122a1(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo bo la ni zhabs kyis gnon// na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs/
122a2(rgyud): zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mnan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sku lus phyag rgya drug gis btab// rdo rje phag mo mnyam par ldan/
122a3(rgyud): gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gcer bu sgra ni grol ba ste// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba ste/
122a4(rgyud): snying rje bde bas rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// 'dod pa'i chags pas bde bar dgyes// zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri dang ni cang te'u 'chang /
122a5(rgyud): tshangs pa'i mgo bos phyag gzhan la// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// de yi sku mdog zhal phyag mtshan// 'on kyang gri gug 'dzin pa yin// gnam mdog ser skya dmar dang /
122a6(rgyud): dkar// rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum dang // thams cad 'khor sogs mkha' 'gro ba// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mkha' 'gro// thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/
122a7(rgyud): spyan gsum g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs// yi dgas gdan la brtan par gnas// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni dkor sngo dmar
122b1(rgyud): lA ma ljang khu sngo la dkar// dum skyes ma ni dmar dkar sngo// gzugs can ma ni ser sngo dmar// 'di dag ni spyan gsum pa/ gcer bu sgra grol ba/ yi dgas kyi steng du
122b2(rgyud): g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gri gug dang / mgo bo dang / cang te'u bsnams pa'o// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa'
122b3(rgyud): bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la shar du thod pa'i dum bu dang / rab gtum ma ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// byang du keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma ste
122b4(rgyud): dmar ba dang / dkar ba dang / sngo ba'o// nub tu keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma ste dkar ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang khu'o// lho ru mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang /
122b5(rgyud): sna chen ma ste ljang khu dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// me'i phyogs su lha dgra dang / dpa' ba'i blo gros ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// bden bral
122b6(rgyud): du 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mi'u thung ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje 'od dang / lang ka'i dbang phyug ma ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang /
122b7(rgyud): dmar ba'o// dbang ldan du rdo rje lus dang / shing grib ma ste ldang ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// gsung gi 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su myu gu can dang / sa srungs
123a1(rgyud): ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// byang phyogs su rdo rje ral pa can dang / 'jigs byed chen mo ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o//
123a2(rgyud): nub tu dpa' bo chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma ste ldang ba dang / da ka ra ba dang / dmar ba'o// lho ru rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / dmar ba'o/
123a3(rgyud): me'i phyogs su rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo ste ldang ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// bden bral gyi phyogs su rdo rje bzang po dang / rab bzang ma ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang /
123a4(rgyud): dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ser ba'o// dbang ldan du mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang /
123a5(rgyud): ljang khu'o// sku'i 'khor lo'i shar phyogs su stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma ste dkar po dang / sngon po dang / ser po'o// byang phyogs su rdo rje rin chen dang / dum
123a6(rgyud): skyes ma ste ser ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// nub phyogs su rta mgrin dang / chang 'tshong ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// lho phyogs su nam mkha'i snying po dang /
123a7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste sngo ba dang / dmar ba dang / ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su khrag 'azung dang / rab dpa' mo ste ljang khu dang / ser po dang / dmar po'o// bden bral
123b1(rgyud): du pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen mo ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// rlung gi phyogs su rnam par sdung mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma ste ldang ba dang / dmar ba
123b2(rgyud): dang ser ba'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson 'grus chen mo ste nam mkha'i mdog can sngo bsangs dang / ser ba dang / ljang khu'o// shar phyogs
123b3(rgyud): kyi sgor kha gdong ma ste sngo ba dang / ser ba dang / dmar ba'o// byang du 'ug gdong ma ste ljang khu dang / dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o// nub tu khyi gdong ma ste ser ba dang /
123b4(rgyud): sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// lho ru phag gdong ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o// me'i phyogs su gshin rje sreg ma ste dkar ba dang / sngo ba dang / ljang khu'o//
123b5(rgyud): bden bral du ga shin rje pho nya ma ste sngo ba dang / dkar ba dang / dmar ba'o// rlung gi phyogs su gshin rje mche ba ma ste dud kha dang dmar ba dang / dkar ba'o//
123b6(rgyud): dbang ldan du gshin rje 'joms ma ste dmar ba dang / sngo ba dang / dkar ba'o// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa dang / rab gtum ma la sogs pa rdo rje dril bus mnyam par
123b7(rgyud): ldan pa/ ral gri dang / cang te'u dang / mgo bo dang / zod pa dang kha ga 'dzin pa/ pad+ma pa d+ma'i dril bu dang / 'khor lo 'khor lo'i dril bu ste/
124a1(rgyud): gsung dag ni gnyis po yang // thugs kyi 'khor lo ji lta ba'o// lha mo cang te'u ral gri dang // gri gug kyang ni de bzhin te// khwa gdong la sogs pa ni ral gri
124a2(rgyud): dang cang te'u dang / gri gug dang / thong ba dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / mgo bo dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa ni thod pa dang / khA T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang
124a3(rgyud): lcags kyu dang / cang te'u dang / dril bu dang / mgo bo 'dzin pa'o// de thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ na ra'i pags pa mnabs pa/ dpa' bo rnams
124a4(rgyud): ni g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ rang gi rigs kyi cod pan can/ yi dgas kyi steng na bzhugs pa/ rnal 'byor ma'i byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril
124a5(rgyud): ba gcer bu skra grol ba/ dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can/ khwa gdong ma la sogs pa dang / gshin rje sreg ma la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni gcer bu skra grol ba/ yi dgas kyi steng
124a6(rgyud): du g.yas brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ gsus pa rlob/ skye gnas ring ba/ mche ba rnam par
124a7(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ thugs rje'i chags par myos pa/ 'jigs pa'i g.yo bas 'jigs su rung ba/ 'di ltar ma lus bsgoms nas ni// ye shes 'khor lo mthong ba dang /
124b1(rgyud): ye shes chu sogs ar+g+ha dang // dam tshig mchog gi mchod par bya// mthong ma thag tu dbang yang bskur// mchod nas thim par byas nas ni// ye shes bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin/
124b2(rgyud): btab nas 'thor 'thung rab tu bya// srog dang rtsol ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob pa yin// dam tshig 'khor lo bzlas byas nas// 'chi med ye shes lnga lhan cig/ gsang
124b3(rgyud): sngags khro bo'i tshig gis bzla// bde ba'i dngos grub ster bar mdzad// dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad bya// mnyam par gzhag ste bzlas pa bya// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga bzhin//
124b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor bzlas pa don chen ster// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro dpa'// mngon sum du ni mchog kyang stsol// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM a A/ i I/ u U/
124b5(rgyud): e ai/ oM oM/ aM aHhUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI yai huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI ye badz+ra ban+d+ha nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal khrag 'thung
124b6(rgyud): dang phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI ya Sh+Ta huM hUM phaT/ oM lA me lAM huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da re he kha~M hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM rU pa~M NI ye r-I hu~M hUM phaT/ oM ka ra ka ra kaM hu~M hUM/
124b7(rgyud): phaT oM pra tsaN+Da huM hUM phaT/ oM ku ru ku ru kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM tsan+d+ra kI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha kaM huM hUM phaT/ oM pra b+hA ba tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM trA sa ya trA sa ya baM huM hUM phaT
125a1(rgyud): oM ma hAn sarba hU phaT+Ta/ oM ko b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya sa rba d+ha / oM b+hai ra ma tI li ts+tsha d+hu phaT/ ar+d+ha r+dz+dza A tsu hU phaT/ oM khaH rI ma tu d+g+ha / oM mrarba ba cudz+dza
125a2(rgyud): baT oM lo ke shwa rA la huM hUM phaT/ oM bo pheM btsu cu phaT/ oM dru man+d+ha ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM phaT phaT oM hu~M hUM phaT/ oM e ra ba tI le tsu hUM phaT/ oM da ha da he btsu hUM phaT/ oM ma ny+dzu
125a3(rgyud): b+hI ra bI le huM hUM phaT/ oM pa tsa pa tsa maM huM hUM phaT/ oM bA yu be ge ts+tsha hUM phaT/ oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha ba sA ru d+hi ra an+d+ra mA lA ba la~M bi nI ye tsu rbu pAT/ oM su ra b+hak+ShI ye hu~M hU~M phan+tu/ oM gr-iH
125a4(rgyud): thAHsap+pa bI t+tA la ga ta b+hu dzA ga s+yAr+b+ba d+ya tat+tA la~M tat+t+wa ya d+ha d+hu phaT/ oM sh+yA ma de b+h+rUM ye hu~M hU~M phaH/ oM A kAn+ta e kAD+D+h+ya ba dz+ra d+hu phaT/ oM su b+hA dz+re hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM dz+riM dz+ra mats+tsha d+hU phaT/
125a5(rgyud): oM hA la kir+t+ti hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM d+h+r-i dz+r-IM badz+ra hU~M phaT/ oM kha~M gA na na hu hUM phaT/ oM d+hAk+Sh+ma saM tsu hU phaT/ oM tsakra bo gi tsu hU~M phaT/ oM tsA tA r-I hUM hU~M phaT/ oM khan+da ro hA hu hU~M phaT/
125a6(rgyud): oM d+hI hI haM hUM hU~M phaT/ rma shar+d+hi nI ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM d+hu d+hu ai huM hUM phaT/ a tse kr-i ba N+Da le huM hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li haM hu hUM phaT/ oM suM bI re huM hUM phaT/ oM sa li si li
125a7(rgyud): baM huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba le huM hUM phaT/ oM hi li hi li ba~M hu~M hUM phaT/ oM tsakra brta ri ye huM hUM phaT/ oM d+hi li d+hi li ba huM hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA bIr+ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM kA kAts+yai
125b1(rgyud): huM hUM phaT/ oM u lA ka s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shU nA s+ye tsu hUM phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dA b+hI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma daSh+NI ni ye huM hUM phaT
125b2(rgyud): oM pa~M ma pa tha rI le huM hU~M phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas dang bsgom pa byas nas ni// ye shes bdud rtsi bsgom byas nas// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas gnas// mngon
125b3(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dbang po rnon po'i sgom pa rjes su bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa/ de nas mchog
125b4(rgyud): gi dam pa bshad// mnyam par sbyor ba'i sdom pa dag/ sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa mchog/ cig car 'jug pa mthong nas su//
125b5(rgyud): sems dpa' bsgoms nas spro// A li kA li las byung ba// he ru kar ni bdag nyid byas// ser dang sngo dang ljang khu ste// steng ni dkar po zhi ba'o// dbu rgyan zod pa'i cod
125b6(rgyud): pan can// spyan gsum thugs rje drag po ste// phag mo yis ni rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gyi// mgo la g.yas brkyang gnas pas bzhugs//
125b7(rgyud): drag po gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs rnams thams cad 'dul bar mdzad// zla ba phyed dang ral pa 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gnon// sku la phyag rgya drug
126a1(rgyud): gis mtshan/ phyag rgya sdom pa mchog yin te// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje phag mo dmar mo ste//
126a2(rgyud): gcer bu sgra ni grol ba yin// de yi sku dang zhal dang mtshan// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mchu dang mchu ni pi di dam//
126a3(rgyud): g.yer kha yi ni ska rags can// rigs kyi dga' bas rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku rtsa 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags/
126a4(rgyud): kyu mchog kyang 'dzin// tshangs pa'i pags pa brkyang nas ni// mgo bo'i steng du phyag gis 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni snyan pa dag/ chos kyi sgras ni rab tu 'gengs// g.yon dang g.yas
126a5(rgyud): kyi zad du ni// mkha' 'gro bzhi po rnam par sgom// g.yas phyogs mkha' 'gro ma lA ma// byang du dum skyes gzugs can ma// sngo dang ngur smrig dkar la ser// spyan gsum rnam
126a6(rgyud): bsgyur drag po dang // dkar sngo ljang dmar ngur smrig ste// de ni rab tu cher 'bar ba'o// g.yas pa'i phyogs su bsgoms nas ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// g.yon
126a7(rgyud): phyogs dmar dang sngo dang ldang // dkar po steng gi zhal de bzhin// ljang dang dmar po ser po ste// steng gi sngon po bde ba'ang de// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/
126b1(rgyud): phyogs kyi gos mchog 'chang ba dang // skra grol ba ni 'jigs pa ste// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyar
126b2(rgyud): thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje dung ni phyag na bsnams// na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs// dril bu cang te'u de bzhin te// mgo bo'i gri gug phyag na bsnams// g.yer ka'i ska rags sgra
126b3(rgyud): sgrog pa// rkang rkyen ru lu ru lu'i sgra// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs te// gdan gcig la ni rnam par bzhugs// snying la dam tshig ye shes ni/
126b4(rgyud): mdog phyag dang phyag mtshan te// rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka/ mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can// thams cad de ltar bsgoms nas ni// mtshan dang dpe byad dang bcas pa// ye shes gcig tu
126b5(rgyud): byas nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa bzlas// oM AHshrIHbadz+ra he he ru ru kaM DA ki nI dz+wA la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ oM AHbadz+ra bA rA hI ye h+ya baM/ DA ki nI dzA la shaM
126b6(rgyud): huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM badz+ra be ro tsa nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ dpal khrag 'thung dang / phag mo'i snying po dang / nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra DA ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra lA me huM hUM phaT/ oM
126b7(rgyud): badz+ra khaN+Da ro he huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rU pi NI ye/ phaT/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bzlas pa dang ni bsgom pa bya// dus bzhi rjes 'brang rim pa yis// dam tshig sdom pa
127a1(rgyud): gnyis med pa// mar me lnga yang bza' bar bya// rtag tu dur khrod nang du sgom// nub bdun gyi ni sbyor ba yis// mi snang dngos grub nges par 'grub// mthong bar byed/
127a2(rgyud): par yang kur 'gro'o// sna tshogs gzugs can bde ba che// bza' ba rnams ni bza' bya zhing // skom gyi btung ba'ang de bzhin te// phyogs kyi gos can gar gyis ni// myos shing myos
127a3(rgyud): ba lta bur gnas// grib mi yang ni med pa ru// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// ma hA ru d+hir bcas pa yis// dri chen chu ni mnyam ldan pas// mAM sa sna tshogs du mdog/ rtse gtsog
127a4(rgyud): pa ru bza' ba bza'// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rtag tu zhen pas 'gro bar bya// mnyam par ma bzhag sbyor ba'i bdag/ ye shes mig gis mthong ba yin// mngon par brjod
127a5(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sbyor ba'i sdom pa'i cho ga le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga bzang po bzhin nang /
127a6(rgyud): ni zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ yang na zhal ni bcu gnyis te// phyag ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// yang na sna tshogs phyugs kyi zhal// phyag ni brgya dang ldan par bya// yang na de bzhin
127a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i rigs// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gzungs dang ri// pha rol phyin pa'ang de bzhin te// phan tshun bye brag can gyi zhal// mdog ni bye brag sna
127b1(rgyud): tshogs dang // phyag ni stong dang 'bum gyi bar// sna tshogs phyag mtshan 'dzin pa dang // sna tshogs pa yi zhal ldan pa// sna tshogs pa yi gar mdzad cing // g.yas brkyang ba yi g.yengs
127b2(rgyud): pas bzhugs// 'jigs byed chen po dang / dus mtshan la sogs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang dang / drag po dang / khyab 'jug dang / kun 'byed gzhon nu dang
127b3(rgyud): karti ka dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / ku be ra dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / sna tshogs pa'i bdud dang / bgegs thams cad kha/
127b4(rgyud): sbub tu zhabs kyis mnan par bltas te/ 'jigs su rung ba/ bzhin rnam par 'gyur ba/ drug po/ mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa/ bzhad pa/ mi sdug pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa/
127b5(rgyud): dpa' ba/ sgeg pa/ rngam pa/ smin ma rnam par g.yo ba/ snyems pa/ zhi ba/ g.yo ba/ zhal mi g.yo ba/ zhal rnam par gdangs pa/ rnam par rol pa/ ljags
127b6(rgyud): rnam par bskyod pa/ sna tshogs pa'i nyams kyis mchog ster bar mdzad pa'o// thod pa'i 'phreng ba dang / zla ba phyed pa dang / sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// sangs rgyas lnga yi
127b7(rgyud): cod pan can// rdo rje sems dpa' spyi gtsug brgyan// spyan gsum stag gi pags pa mnabs// mgo rlon 'phreng bas sku lus brgyan// phyag rgya drug po sku la rdzogs// 'phreng ba'i
128a1(rgyud): rgyan gyis spud mdzad pa'o// sku la phag mos 'khril mdzad cing // phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska ragra/
128a2(rgyud): can zod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyun can te// rdo rje sdigs mdzub thod pas 'khyud// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khyud// dga' bas khyab cing rnam par myos// rdo rje dril bus mnyam
128a3(rgyud): par ldan// lha mo'i ku rtsa 'tshir ba dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// glang po'i pags pa brkyang ba ste// lcags kyu zhags pa dgra sta dang // mdung rtse gsum pa mgo bo nyid// cang
128a4(rgyud): te'u dang ni gri gug dang // mda' dang gzhu yang de bzhin te// thod pa'i dbyug to mdung thung dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni gtun shing dang // 'khor lo ral gri rin chen dang // pad+ma snga
128a5(rgyud): tshogs rdo rje dang // dbyug to yu ba rdo rje can// ga da gdung dang pa Ti s+ya// gshin rje dbyug to chu gri dang // dung dang ru dung pa Ta ha// pi wang gling bu rdza rnga che// rdza rnga mtshon cha phyag
128a6(rgyud): mtshan bsdams// rtse mo rno bar bltas nas su// sna tshogs phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'byung // ji srid phyag ni 'bum gyi bar// phyag rgya sna tshogs de bzhin te// cho ga sna tshogs de bzhin
128a7(rgyud): no mkha' 'gro ma sogs 'khor rnams dang // dpa' bo dag ni thams cad dang // rnal 'byor ma ni sna tshogs dag/ mdog ni mtha' yas sna tshogs mdog/ phyag mtshan sna tshogs
128b1(rgyud): 'dzin pa yin// phyogs kyi gos 'chang sbra grol zhing // sna tshogs nyams kyi bde ba can// 'jigs rung drug po ha ha bzhad// sna tshogs gar gyis longs spyod cing // glu dang rol mo nyams
128b2(rgyud): de bzhin// sna tshogs dam tshig zas rnams dang // me tog sna tshogs yid 'ong ba// dri dang bdug pa de bzhin gos// mar mi 'phreng ba yid 'ong ba// phun sum tshogs pa'i mchod pa
128b3(rgyud): rnams// mdog ni sna tshogs mchog dam pa// 'di ltar sngags pas bsgoms nas ni// rnal 'byor mchog gis rdzogs byas nas// der ni 'phreng ba'i sngags kyang bzlas// yi ge
128b4(rgyud): nyi shu gnyis bsres nas// lha mo rdo rje phag mo ni// 'di ltar de bzhin bsgom par bya// zhal gdong sna tshogs legs mdzes pa// phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste// phyogs kyi gos
128b5(rgyud): can skra grol bya// byang chub pha rol phyin pa ste// sa 'dzin thams cad de bzhin no// 'di ltar cho ga byas nas ni// 'phreng bas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oM shrI badz+ra hi he ru ru/
128b6(rgyud): ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ bats+tsha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ dza~M dza~M/ hra hraH/ pheM phe~M/ phaT+Ta phaT/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ b+hak+Sha b+hok+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi ra/ an+d+ram+b+ha/
128b7(rgyud): # lag ngas rgyas pa/ #
129a1(rgyud): hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li/ tsu hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra hu hUM phaT swAhA/ 'di ni snying po mchog yin te// las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ dpa' bos
129a2(rgyud): sa bon rang ming dang // rnal 'byor myos pas rtag bzlas na// ma lus lus pa med 'grub cing // 'gro ba'i gnas su 'gro bar byed// dus ni de ma thag tu yang // sdom pa mchog
129a3(rgyud): ni grub pa yin// rdo rje phag mo'i gsang sngags 'di// 'dod pa'i bde ba thams cad stsol// oM badz+ra bA rA hi/ pro taM ge pro taM ge/ ha na ha na/ pra NAM kaM ki Ni/ kha~M khi Ni khu la ni
129a4(rgyud): d+hu na d+hu na/ badz+ra ha ste/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ kha thA ga ka pA la d+hA ri ni/ ma hA pi shi ta/ mAM sA sha ni/ mA nU Sha aM tra pra br-it+taM/ sin+na d+h+ya na ra si ra mA lA gan+thi ta d+hA ri ni/ sum+ba ni sum+b+he
129a5(rgyud): ha na ha na prANA/ sarba b+hA pa satwAn+tu/ sarba pa shA nAM/ ma hA mAM sats+tshe di na/ kro d+ha mAd+he dar+tha ka ra li ni ma hA mu dr-i/ shrI he ru ka de ba s+ya/ a gra ma hi Shi/ sa ha sra shai re/ sa ha sra bA da \u0f7f
129a6(rgyud): sha tA sa he A na ne/ dzA li ta te dze sa/ dz+wa le mu She/ piM ga la lo tsa ni badz+ra shA rI ra badz+ra A sa ne tse li te/ oM mai ti mr-i ti/ oM he he hu~M ng+ku kha kha/ d+hu d+hu ru ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ mu ru mu ru
129a7(rgyud): a dwai te/ ma hA lo gi ni pa thi ta sad+d+ha/ dr-i rbo dz+nye dz+nye/ daMd/ d+ho d+ho/ gr-i br-i he he he he b+hI me ha sa ha sa bI re hA hA ho ho hUM hUM/ trai lo kya bi na sha ni/ sha ta sa ha sra ko Ta~M ta thA ga ta pa ri bA ri ti/
129b1(rgyud): dzu hUM phaT/ pa sa~M ha rA pe khaHga dza rU pe gaHtrai lo kya u da re/ sa mu dra me kha le gra sa gra se tsu hUM phaT/ bI ra dwe te hUM hUM hA hA ma hA pa shu mo ha ni/ yo gI shwa ri trA DA ki nI sarba lo ka rA
129b2(rgyud): ban+d+ha nI/ sa t+ya huM hUM phaT/ b+hU ta dzA sA ni/ ma hA bI re pa ra ma sId+d+he yo gI br-i d+he shwa ri phaT/ hu~M hU~M phaT swAhA/ rdo rje phag mo'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// 'di ni rdo rje phag mo mchog/ snying
129b3(rgyud): po michog tu grub pa yin// gang gis bzlas dang sgom pa yis// de yis las rnams kun grub ste// the tshom med par mod la 'grub// bdag nyid gnas su mchod pa ste//
129b4(rgyud): phyi rol nam yang ma yin no// grub pa'i khrag 'thung de nyid kyi// gsang sngags rtsa ba brgyad ldan pa// oM na mo b+ha ga te bI re shA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kalpAg ni sa ni b+hA ya huM hUM phaT/
129b5(rgyud): oM dza Ta mu ku Tot+ka TA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM daSh+Ta ka rA lo gra b+hI Sha na mu khA ya huM hUM phaT/ oM sa ha sra b+hu dza b+hA su ra huM hUM phaT/ oM pa ra shu pA sho d+ya ta shU la kha T+wAM ga d+hA ri Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM byA g+h+ra/
129b6(rgyud): dzi nAm+ba ra d+hA ra ya huM hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA d+hA prA Shan+ta ka ra ba pu ShA la huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni khrag 'thung gsang sngags te// bdag nyid bsgoms shing mchod par bya// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te brje
129b7(rgyud): bA ra ti bi hu~M hUM phaT/ oM Ar+yA pa ra dzi trai lo kya mA te bi d+yaM shwa ri hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra sarba b+hU ta b+ha ya ba te ma hA badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra A sa ni a pa rA dzi ti ba sh+yaM ri ne tra b+h+ra ma Ni huM hUM phaT/
130a1(rgyud): oM shwa Sha Ni ro Sha ni kro d+ha ka rA li ni huM hUM phaT/ oM san+na sa ni mA ra Ni su pra b+he da ni pa ra dza ye huM hUM phaT/ oM bi dza ye dzaM b+ha ni staM b+ha ni mo ha ni huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra bA rA hi
130a2(rgyud): ma hA yo gI nI kA me shwa ri kha ge huM hUM phaT/ na maHni thams cad du bya'o// gsang sngags 'di yis las kun bya// A li kA li rdo rje ni// phag mor bdag nyid bsgoms byas na/
130a3(rgyud): rtsa ba brgyad kyi sngags ldan pas// bdag nyid kyang ni mchod par bya// zhal bzhi byin brlabs byas nas su// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+has mchod// yang na zhal bzhi kun rdo rje// de yi lte
130a4(rgyud): bar he ru dpal// bdag nyid bsgom pa byas nas ni// 'khor dang bcas pa'ang de bzhin bsgom// ba sha la sogs bza' zhing sgrub// bde gshegs bstan la 'gro ba gdug/ skye ba
130a5(rgyud): can ni ba shar grags// dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrog dang // mtshams med pa ni byed pa dang // gang zhig slob dpon smod pa dang // theg pa chen po smod pa dang // phyugs de rnams//
130a6(rgyud): ni bsad nas kyang // rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig bza'// phyugs de rnams ni dgug pa yang // sgrub pos sngon du bskyed pas bya// phyugs bdun dang ni de bzhin phyugs// bong bu/
130a7(rgyud): mi dang rus sbal dang // khyi dang rnga mo ce spyang rta// phyugs kyi mar me 'di rnams ni// sgrub pa'i dbye ba'i yan lag grags// rigs kyi kha dog dbye ba'i phyugs// rkang bzhi rnams/
130b1(rgyud): las glang po che// bya rnams las ni ngang bsgyur te// dud 'gro rnams las mchu g.yo ba'i// lha rnams kha ru lha bshos te// 'di ni phyugs kyi brtag par bshad// grub pa'i sgrub pa
130b2(rgyud): rnam bshad pa// bya rog bya skya ce spyang dang // skye gnyis dang sngags chen po dang // khrung khrung bzhad dang kang bu ka/ bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya// dngos grub 'dod pas bsgom bya ba//
130b3(rgyud): khyi mo nag mo'i 'o ma dang // sran mo nag po 'bras dang ldan// ro yi khar ni sbyin sreg bya// sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad par bya// de nas ro de langs nas ni// ci bgyi zhes ni smra 'gyur zhing // sa
130b4(rgyud): 'og 'gro ba'am ral gri 'am// tshar gcod phan 'dogs nyid dang ni// ril bu mig sman gser rnams sam// rkang mgyogs dag gam bcud kyis len// gcig cig sbyin par byas nas ni//
130b5(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// steng dang 'og tu pho nya 'grub// rgyud 'dir the tshom med pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor gyi sdom pa'i cho ga'i le'u
130b6(rgyud): ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// srung dang phyir bzlog rim pa ni// rgyud gnan las ni sbas pa yi// srung ba'i mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rgyud
130b7(rgyud): 'dir rab tu bshad par bya// nges brjod rlung ni bla ma'i bla// the tsom za bar mi bya ste// sems can rjes su srung ba'i phyir// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// pad+ma'i lte bar ge sar can// de rgyab
131a1(rgyud): sna tshogs rdo rje ste// gnod mdzes gsang sngags yang dag sbyar// de yi phyi rol ska rags bya// 'dab ma bcu drug bri bar bya// der ni cha rnams rnam bkod de// de yis
131a2(rgyud): phyi rol yongs su bskor// mkhas pas lte bar bri ba ni// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// de yis lte bar dgod pa ni// hUM ni 'jigs pa rnam 'jigs pa// hUM gi lte bar yi ge baM// baM gyi lce
131a3(rgyud): bar yi ge gsum// bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel zhing bri// mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhi po dag/ de yi g.yon nas dgod bskor ba// DaM lAM khaM ruM de ru dgod// raM r-I l-i l-I lhan cig tu// mkha'
131a4(rgyud): 'gro dgod cing ming dang ni// rnam par spel zhing bri bar bya// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i rim ji bzhin// mkhas pas 'dab mar dgod bya ba// khaM praM shar gyi 'dab ma la// byang du kaM tsa nyid
131a5(rgyud): yin te// nub tu kaM paM kho na'o// lho ru baM maM nyid yin no// me sogs dbang ldan phyogs rnams su// paM aM khaM baM laM baM hraM// 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// yi ge hUM dang spel nas
131a6(rgyud): su sa bon dag ni bri bar bya// kaM kha ga g+ha / rje tshedza/ 'di dag ni pad+ma'i ska rags su bri'o// rdo rje cha ni bcu gnyis pa// bskor la bin dus rnam par brgyun// 'dub mam
131a7(rgyud): phyi rol bcu drug tu// 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa bri// de 'dir shar phyogs lha sogs pa// g.yon nas bskor zhing dgod par bya// mkha' 'gro dang ni dpa' bo'o// aM e/
131b1(rgyud): bAM maM maM paM baM suM suM shaM baM suM maM haM baM khaM/ maM tsi raM khaM haM saM/ aM tsaM haM su paM maM bai/ tsaM baM maM/ 'di ni hri dang spel nas su// oM dang spel zhing bri bar bya// sgrub pa'i ming ni nang du bya/
131b2(rgyud): ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brang bri// dz+nyA nya r+tha traM DaDaM D+haM NaM/ taM thaM daM d+ha naM/ paM pha baM b+haM maM/ phyi rol du ska rags bri'o// 'khor lo'i phyi rol gru bzhi pa'i// nang du sgo ni 'brel bar bri// ji ltar
131b3(rgyud): khwa gdong la sogs rim pa'i bar// gshin rje 'joms sogs sa bon dgod// kaM oM shAM suM/ yaM yaM yaM yaM/ yaM ra laM waM shaM She sa haM sbyar zhing // hUM dang phaT dang rnam par spel/
131b4(rgyud): ming dang yang ni spel bar bya// sgo yi steng du rtse bzhi pa'i// rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya// zur rnams su ni nyi zla dang // rdo rje phyed pa bri bar bya// de steng rkang brgyad kyis brjod pa'i// khro bo
131b5(rgyud): brgyad pa'i zhal du blta// phyi rol ska rags dbus dag tu// phyi bzlog 'di dag bri bar bya// na maHsa man+ta kA ya bA krit+ta badz+ra he ru kA nI/ oM hUM badz+ra he ru ka tsakra brti sarba lo ki ka lo kot+ta
131b6(rgyud): rA Ni/ yan+na man+tha tan+ta tsAr+N+Na pra yau ga d+hi ni ye na ke na tsit+ta na sarba ni A kaD+D+h+ya A kaD+D+h+ya/ tardza ya tardza ya/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/
131b7(rgyud): pa rnam ma brnas / tam nyis la/ myi bab te gyi bsul brta/ d+ya/ a
132a1(rgyud): shAn+tiM ku ru tsu hUM phaT/ 'di yis yongs su bskor byas nas// kA li lto ba'i dbus su dgod// yi ge kA yi phyi rol tu// tha yis yongs su bskor byas nas/
132a2(rgyud): dbyangs kyi mtshan nyid kyis yongs bskor// he ru kar bdag bsgoms byas nas// yi ge bdun pa'i sngags kyang bzla// oM hrIHha ha a mu ka s+ye shAn+tiM ku ru huM hUM phaT/ rigs ngan yang na bram
132a3(rgyud): ze 'am// rgyal po'i bu mo'i khyad par du// rang byung me tog blangs nas su// glang chen me tog dang bsres dang // byang chub sems ni mnyam ldan pa// ro tsa na dang lhan cig sbyar// pad+ma rdo rje chu
132a4(rgyud): de bzhin// mig sman chen po dang bskyes nas// lha mchog 'khor lo bri bar bya// rdo rje 'phreng bas rnam par bskor// mi yi pags pa'am gro ga 'am// yang nA yi dgas gos kyang rung //
132a5(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// mar dang 'o ma blangs nas su// gsang sngags rkang pa brgyad ni brjod// de bzhin brtul zhugs can gyis mchod// gser ram dngul gyi bum pa dag/ ye shes
132a6(rgyud): lnga yi bdud rtsi chu// gang ba'i dbus su bcug nas su// 'khor lo srang bu dkar pos dkri// 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags de la bzla// de nas dbang bskur sbyin par bya// nad yod pa ni
132a7(rgyud): nad med byed// nad med pa yang nang du byed// myos byed chang gi dbus su ni// mkhas pas de la bcug nas ni// nad med nang du byed pa ste// ji lta'i las kyi rjes su 'brang // gang
132b1(rgyud): yang rung ba'i las rnams la// 'phreng ba'i sngags kyis rnam par bskor// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i 'khor lo ni// mgo bo'i nang du sbas nas ni// mkha' 'gros de la byin rlabs ni// gdon mi
132b2(rgyud): za bar byed par 'gyur// ci 'dod thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// bgegs med par ni dngos grub 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba'i phyir bzlog gi le'u
132b3(rgyud): ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas de yis sgom pa bshad// sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa'i// skad cig gis ni bdag nyid dag/ lha mo phyir bzlog rim
132b4(rgyud): pa ste/ zhal bzhi pa la phyag bcu drug/ gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i// bgegs ni pad+ma'i 'og mnan nas// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
132b5(rgyud): dbus na gnas// dkar zhing sngo la dmar dang ser// steng gi zhal gyis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// na bza' dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan// sangs rgyas
132b6(rgyud): lnga yi dbu rgyan can// 'chi ba yang dag 'tsho ba'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa la 'jam pa'i ngag/ gzhan ni gdug cing gtum pa la// sdigs mdzub rdo rje gsor mdzad cing // dril bu zhags
132b7(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje ral gri mdung dang ni// dgra sta zod pa lcags kyu dang // gzhu dang kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mnga' ni dam pa 'gengs par byed// tho ba 'khor lo mi 'jigs pa/
133a1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o// yang 'di la ni zham brgyad pa// galus dang g.yon pa'i ngos dag tu// g.yas pasngo zhid dmar la ser/ drag shul hA/
133a2(rgyud): har bzhad pa'o// g.yon pa ldang zhing dmar ba dang // dung kha dag gi mdog can yin// steng ni mdzes shing zhi ba ste// sku lus zla ba'i mdog can no// de yi thugs kar 'khor lo ni//
133a3(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// dad pas shin tu mnyam gzhag ste// 'chi ba 'tshe ba'i rigs sngags bzla// oM a mr-i ta saM dzI bi na/ ma hA a mr-i ta su mu khe dzI ba/ pra be sha ya
133a4(rgyud): pra be sha ya/ sarba badz+ra pad+ma sa ma yo ga mA ya/ bo d+hi tsit+ta bi tha bi ta mUr+he tsuM hUM/ A A A a swA hA/ 'di ni khri tsam bzlas byas pas// 'chi ba thams cad 'tsho bar byed// dus min/
133a5(rgyud): 'chi bzhi 'gyur zhing // 'chi ba las ni nges par slong // gzhan du rnal 'byor ma dgyes nas// rmad du byung bar mdzad pa ni// so so nas ni gar mdzad cing // hi hi dag gis dga'
133a6(rgyud): ba dang // ho ho dag gis dgyes pa dang // he he dag gis tshig tu smra// huM phreM dag gis rdzogs pa'o// huM hU~M dag ni bsam gtan no// phaT phaT dag gis gsod pa dang // huM huM dag
133a7(rgyud): gis phur bu'o// dza dzaHdag gis legs par drongs// sa sa dag ni bden par byed// nges par legs so zhes pa'i sgra'o// huM bruM dag ni gsod pa'o// hUM b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUM hUM b+h+rUM dag ni thal
133b1(rgyud): par rtog pa'o// ha bdag gis gsal bar byed pa'o// dz+ha b+hUM dag ni gzi byin byed// d+h+r-i dz+dza dag gis legs par rmongs// d+hu d+ha dag ni mchod pa'o// saM sa dag gis dngos grub thams
133b2(rgyud): cad kyi 'bras bu ster ba'o// hi hi dag ni rmongs pa'o// l-i laM dag ni shis pa'o// di di dag ni 'dzin pa'o// dzAM dzAM dag ni legs par drongs// huM hUM dag ni 'khor ba'o// hri tre dag ni
133b3(rgyud): gsod pa'o// dzI dzA dag ni rmugs par mdzad pa'o// ho ho dgu pa rjes su chags par bya'o// ha ha dag ni srung ba'o// ho ho dag ni dgyes pa'o// rdo Ta dag ni gdug pa'o//
133b4(rgyud): dag nimi tog ga/ g-is dag ni rdo'o// ra dag ni gas pa'o// 'di dag lta sa pams// 'buM la sogs chen ste// rnam pa 'dis rjes su mangs/
133b5(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'chi ba slong bar byed pa'i las thams cad byed pa'i sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
133b6(rgyud): bshad bya ba// sngags kyi de nyid cho ga'i rim// rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// gsang ba kun gyi mchog tu bshad// rnal 'byor ma yi bde ba mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud
133b7(rgyud): pa'i rim// gsang zhing gsang la mchog tu gsang // bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sgom pa'i mchog yin te// bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// mkha' 'gro
134a1(rgyud): mas ni yongs su khyab// sku lus dmar po 'jigs pa che// ye shes lnga las nges byung ba// dmar zhing sgrol ldang ba dang // ser zhing zhi la steng zhal dkar/
134a2(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la phyag bcu gnyis// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jigs byed che dang dus mtshan dag/ skyabs su 'ongs nas zhabs 'og gnon// phyag rgya drug dang zla ba
134a3(rgyud): phyod/ sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa 'chang // glang po'i pags pa gos su mnabs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri mdung ni 'jigs pa'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin/
134a4(rgyud): zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam
134a5(rgyud): par brgyan// de mdun rdo rje phag mo ni// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mchog/ cang te'u tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam
134a6(rgyud): par brgyan// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam ldan pa// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kA yi ye shes las byung ba// de yi sku dang zhal phyag
134a7(rgyud): mtshan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sems dpa' rnam par sgom// bcu gnyis cha las nges 'byung ba// dam tshig sems dpa' bde ba che// thams
134b1(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa nges 'byung ba/ sngags kyi rgyud ni 'di ru ba gla/ oM grI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM/ a A/ i I/ u U e ai/ oM au oM A DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra d+ha d+hu/
134b2(rgyud): phaT swAhA/ oM a A aM a huM hUM phaT/ snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra bA rA hi/ a yA/ i au/ u U/ e ai o au a a huM hUM phaT sAH
134b3(rgyud): oM badz+ra be ro tsa nI ye a A/ aM aHhuM hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o// oM DA ki nI raM huM hUM phaT/ oM l+yA me ra~M huM hUM phaT/ oM khaN+Da ro he l+yaM huM hUM phaT/ oMR+Sha
134b4(rgyud): piN+Di mo bcu d+hu phaT/ oM khaN+Da ka pA la ka ts+tsha hU~M phaT/ oM pra hu hUM phaT/ oM kr-i ka la Shadu d+hU phaT/ oM \u0f7f hu~Md+d+hi phaT/ oM ma hA ka~M kA la ka hu~M d+hu phaT/ oM br-i hu~Md+d+ha phaT/
134b5(rgyud): kA TadaSh+mi Ne b+hu hUM phaT/ oM ma~M hu~M phaT/ oM su ra bai ra Ni da huM hUM phaT/ oM bA~M hUM phaT/ oM a mi tA b+hA tsa hUM phaT/ oM khaM hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra pra b+hA tshaM hUM phaT/ oM la~M d+hu
134b6(rgyud): badz+rade hadza~M nr-i d+hu baT/ oM d+g+ha d+hu hU~M phaT/ oM a~M ku ri kar+d+ha hU~M phaT/ ma mo hUM phaT/ oM bar+Nadze nI la nye d+ha phaT/ oM mo d+hu / oM ma hA b+hair Na hu~M d+hupha/ oM ba~M d+hA
134b7(rgyud): oM badz+ra d+ha kA ra dza hU~M phaT/ oM su~M hU~M ba~MHoM su b+ha dra Na d+hu phaT/ oM n+d+ra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra b+ha dzaHhU~M phaT/ a su sU phaT/ oM ma hA b+he ra ba Na d+hu phaT/ oM ha hUM phaT/
135a1(rgyud): oM bi ru pAk+Sha taM hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA ba la thaM hu~M phaT/ oM tsa huM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na badz+ra daM hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI ba d+haM hUM phaT/ oM
135a2(rgyud): sho hUM phaT/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha na hUM phaT/ oM tsa~M hUM phaT/ oM he ru ka paM hUM phaT/ oM suM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma na rte shwa ra paM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM bai ro tsa na baM hUM phaT/ oM sha
135a3(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra satwa b+haM hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM yaM hUM phaT/ oM ra~M hUM phaT/ oM laM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM shaM hUM phaT/ oM ShaM hU~M phaT/ oM saM hUM phaT/ oM haM hUM phaT/
135a4(rgyud): 'di dag ni dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor gyi snying po'i gsang sngags gsang ba'i mchog tu gyur pa/ de nyid sbas pa 'khor lo gsum gyi yin te/ thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo
135a5(rgyud): dmar// mkha' 'gro ma ni sngon po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// 'jigs byed chen po bzhin nus bsgyur// zhe sdang gis khyab bde chen po// gsung gi 'khor lodza dpal
135a6(rgyud): dkar// mkha' 'gro ma ni dmar po ste// pad+ma dril bu mnyam par ldan// 'dod chags kyis khyab bde chen po// sku yi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ser// mkha' 'gro ma dkar me yi
135a7(rgyud): mdog/ gti mug gis khyab bde ba che// mkha' 'gro ma sogs lha mo rnams// sna tshogs mdog can snod chen po// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// dmar ser dkar la
135b1(rgyud): ljang khu'o// gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang // de bzhin dkar ba'i mdog can no// 'khor la sogs pa thams cad kun// spyan gsum
135b2(rgyud): g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis bzhugs// dpa' bo stag gi pags mnabs shing // lha mo thams cad gcer bu ste// skra grol ba ni rnam par mdzes// byin pa gnyis kyis
135b3(rgyud): legs par 'khril// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// thams cad thod pa'i 'phreng ba 'chang // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dpa'
135b4(rgyud): bo dang ni lha mo rnams// thod pa rdo rje pad+ma dang // 'khor lo yang ni de bzhin no// mkha' 'gro ma sogs khwa gdong dang // gshin rje sreg sogs lha mo rnams// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//
135b5(rgyud): me long dri dang ro dang reg/ gos mchog yid du 'ong ba dang // cang te'u dang ni zil bu 'dzin// mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga yang 'dzin mdzad cing // dril bu cang
135b6(rgyud): gri gug bsnams// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo rnams// phyag mtshan 'di yis rab tu brtag/ thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ thugs
135b7(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo drag po ste// gsung gi 'khor lo skyod pa'i zhal// sku yi 'khor lo zhi ba ste// mkha' 'gro ma ni bzhin rnam bsgyur// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsgoms nas ni// dbus kyi
136a1(rgyud): gtso bor rnam par brtag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// khro bo sna tshogs du ma 'am// kha cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'am// ma mo rigs kyi khyud/
136a2(rgyud): par dang // 'od zer can nam skul byed ma// shes rab pha rol phyin de bzhin// gang dang gang dag sgom pa ni// yid kyi dbang po sbyor ba dag/ de yis dregs par byas pa ni// sna tshogs
136a3(rgyud): gzugs can rin chen bzhin// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sna tshogs gzugs kyis 'gro bar gnas// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad mdzad// bde ba chen pos kun
136a4(rgyud): khyab yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rnal 'byor ma'i gsang ba'i dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi sgom pa bstan pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// /
136a5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro rigs kyi cho ga'i rim// sna tshogs du ma'i rigs su bshad// mdor bsdus na ni gsum dang lnga// drug tu yang ni rab tu gragra/
136a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i bla ma ste// mkha' 'gro ma 'khor la sogs kun// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// rigs las yang dag 'byung ba yin// sku kun so so 'byung ba ste//
136a7(rgyud): gzhan du thams cad ma mo'i rigs// dga' zhing dgyes la yid 'ong ba// yid las skye zhing 'byung ba yin// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i rigs kyi bdag pos de kho na
136b1(rgyud): nyid kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i sa bon 'di bshad cing bstan pa/ hUM bruM aM hrIM khaM baM/ de nas sngags chen bshad pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras po rnams// rab tu g.yo zhing brgya
136b2(rgyud): nas kyang // rdo rje ye shes rjes su dran// mi 'khrugs pa dang rtag pa'i rigs// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// 'di
136b3(rgyud): ltar sangs rgyas sku lus kyang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab tu grags// thog mar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// gnyis pa sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin// gsum pa rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/
136b4(rgyud): bzhi pa pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin// lnga pa sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yin// lnga po he ru kar shes bya// rdo rje dpa' bo yang de nyid// nam mkha'i zas kyis
136b5(rgyud): longs spyod cing // zla ba'i zas kyis longs kyang spyad// sprul pa'i longs spyod nam mkha' ste// pad+ma'i zas kyis longs spyod cing // sna tshogs longs spyod sprul pa ste// sna
136b6(rgyud): tshogs rigs kyi mchog dam pa// mkha' mnyam dri med rnam par dag/ gangs kyi rang bzhin lta bur bsil// dag pa'i mdog can mchog gi mdog/ zla ba'i zer dang 'dra ba'i mdog
136b7(rgyud): spyan gsum skal ba sna tshogs bzang // sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus na gnas// rdo rje skyil mo krung ngu bzhugs// thams cad ral pa'i cod pan can/
137a1(rgyud): thod pa'i 'phreng ba'ang de bzhin te// phyag rgya drug ni thams cad rgya// rang gi gdan la legs par bzhugs// glang po seng ge rta dang ni// rma bya dang ni nam mkha'
137a2(rgyud): lding de yi steng du yi dgas gdan// bsgoms na dngos grub rab tu stsol// rdo rje lag gis sa la reg/ rdo rje dril bu dkur brten cing // zhal gyi mchu ni rnam par bsgyur/
137a3(rgyud): 'khor lo dril bu 'gying dang bcas// rin chen dril bu'ang de bzhin te// pad+ma'i dril bu'i rim pa dang // dril bu sna tshogs rdo rje nyid// thams cad snyems par rnam bsgoms te/
137a4(rgyud): rigs kyi rdo rje mchog dam pa// dkyil 'khor drug ni bri bar bya// sgo bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'khor los sgyur ba ste// rin chen pad+mas de bzhin sgor// sna tshogs rdo
137a5(rgyud): rjes bskor ba ste// dbus su rdo rjes bskor bar bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// khang pa brtsegs pa yid 'ong mchog/ rigs drug dag ni rnam par dgod// der ni gnas
137a6(rgyud): sogs rim par dgod// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// de yi shar phyogs kyi sgo la// pul+lI ra ma la ya na thod pa'i dum bu dang /
137a7(rgyud): rab gtum ma'o// byang du dzA lan+d+ha ra na keng rus chen po dang / gtum mig ma'o// rub tu oMr+yan na keng rus can dang / 'od ldan ma'o// lho ru ar pu ta na mche ba rnam
137b1(rgyud): par gtsigs pa dang / sna chen ma ste dbus ni sa dang po rab tu dga' ba ste/ dpa' bo sku mdog nag po/ mkha' 'gro ma thal ba dang sprin gyi mdog can/ dpa' bo ni rdo rje dang /
137b2(rgyud): rdo rje dril bu dang / mkha' 'gro ma ni thod pa dang / rdo rje sdigs mdzub bo// rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro bde ba chen po'o//
137b3(rgyud): shar phyogs kyi sgor go dA ba rin lha dgra dang / dpa' bo'i blo can ma'o// byang du rU pe shwa ra na 'od dpag med dang / mi'u zung ma'o// nub tu de bi ko Ta na rdo rje 'od dang /
137b4(rgyud): lang ka'i dbang phyug ma'o// lho ru mA la ba na rdo rje sku dang / shing grib ma ste dpa' bo'i sku lus dkar po/ mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po'o// dri ma med pa'i sa ni dbus ma ste sangs
137b5(rgyud): rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'o// 'od byed pa'i sa'i dbus na rin chen mkha' 'gro ste/ shar gyi sgo ru kA ma rU pa na myu gu can dang / sa srungs ma'o// byang du o tre na rdo rje ral pa car
137b6(rgyud): dang 'jigs byed chen mo'o// nub tu tri sha ku ne na dpa' ba chen po dang / rlung gi shugs can ma'o// lho ru ko sa la na rdo rje hUM mdzad dang / chang 'thung ma ste dpa' bo ser
137b7(rgyud): bo mkha' 'gro ma ljang khu'o// 'od 'phro ba'i sa'i dbus su pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor ka ling ka na rab bzang dang / sngo bsangs lha mo'o// byang du
138a1(rgyud): laM pA kA na rdo rje bzang dang / rab bzang mo'o// nub tu kAny+tsin 'jigs byed chen po dang / rta rna ma'o// lho ru hi ma la pha na mig mi bzang dang / bya gdong ma ste dpa'/
138a2(rgyud): bo dmar po/ mkha' 'gro ma ni dkar mo'o// sbyang dka' ba'i sa dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro/ de'i shar gyi sgor pra ta pu rin stobs po che dang / 'khor lo'i shugs can ma'o//
138a3(rgyud): byang du gr-i ha de ba tA na rdo rje rin chen dang / dum skyes ma'o// nub tu sau raSh+Ta na rta mgrin dang / chang 'tsheng ma'o// lho ru su bar+Na dI pa na nam mkha'i snying po dang / 'khor lo'i go cha ma ste
138a4(rgyud): dpa' bo nag po/ mkha' 'gro ma ser mo'o// mngon du gyur pa'i sa'i dbus su sna tshogs mkha' 'gro// de'i shar phyogs kyi sgor na gA rA na he ru ka dang / rab dpa' mo'o// byang du sim+b+ha
138a5(rgyud): na pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang / stobs chen ma'o// nub tu ma ru ta na rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'khor lo sgyur ma'o// lho ru ku lu ta na rdo rje sems dpa' dang / brtson chen mo ste dpa' ba
138a6(rgyud): ni sna tshogs kyi mdog can la/ mkha' 'gro ma dud pa'i mdog can no// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rol tu// yi dgas 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// de yi phyi rol kun rdo rje// zur du mkha'
138a7(rgyud): 'gro ma yang bri// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// thod pa bzhi ni mtshams su bri// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni// ring du song sa mkha'
138b1(rgyud): 'thog// mam ma g.yo ba mis// legs pa'i blo thos dus skyesnyam// gzugs can mni chos kyi smon// sde zhing ser la ldang ba dang // bzhi pa dmar ba'i mdog can yin/ 2
138b2(rgyud): gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs mdog can yid 'phrog ma// gshin rje sreg sogs mkha' 'gro ma// phyed ni bud med dbang phyug zhal// dpa' bo thams cad g.yas
138b3(rgyud): brkyang gnas// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos 'chang skra grol ba// yid 'ong /
138b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs// thams cad yi dgas steng du bzhugs// dkyil 'khor mchog ni rnam par sgom// pad+ma la gnas 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor sdom pa'i mchog yin
138b5(rgyud): no thod pa dang ni khra T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u ni phyag g.yas na// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro ma yi gzugs// phyag mtshan dag gis rnam par brgyan// khwa gdong la sogs
138b6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma// lcags kyu zhags pa la sogs mtshan// g.yon par kha T+wAM g.yas par ni// ji srid zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu yang ni de bzhin no// gshin rje sreg
138b7(rgyud): sogs mkha' 'gro ma// me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang ro ni g.yas pa na// g.yon la thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'i// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can//
139a1(rgyud): thod pa'i steng na yang dag gnas// 'khor lo so sor bsgoms nas ni// 'khor dang bcas pas yongs su khyab// ye shes sems dpa' thugs kar blta/
139a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor kun gyi sbyor ba yis// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// bsgoms pas thim par byas nas su// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes kyis// dbang bskur nas ni rim par spro/
139a3(rgyud): oM AHbaM hUM/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// srog dang rtsol ba rim pas bya// mnyam par spros nas dbang bskur byin// ji lta rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// dogs pa med par bzlas bsgom
139a4(rgyud): bya/ ji ltar gsang sngags rjes mthun par// dam tshig can gyis bzlas par bya// hA bruM/ oM dz+r-IM khaM baM/ oM a baM hUM/ oM shrI ma hA su khaM badz+ra satwa DA ki nI dz+wA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/
139a5(rgyud): shrI bud+d+ha DA ka a la la aHd+hU DA kin+ni dz+wa la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI rat+na DA kau tra~M A a/ DA ki nAM dzA la saM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ki dzA dzI a druM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM bA ra hUM phaT swAhA/
139a6(rgyud): oM shrI badz+ra DA ka aHhUM phaT/ DA kiM nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI bi shwa DA ka ho khaM A hU DA ki rI dzA la saM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ oM khe hUM phaT/ oM br-i hUM phaT/ oM kaM hU~M phaT/
139a7(rgyud): oM kaM tse hUM phaT/ oM maM hUM phaT/ oM gr-i hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/ oM ma hUM phaT/ oM suM hU~M phaT/ oM bi hUM phaT/ oM A hUM phaT/ oM khaM hUM phaT/ oM baM hUM phaT/

139b6(rgyud): yis// dam tshig dam tshig mchog gyur pa// gnyis med 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas na dngos grub 'gyur// zla drug nges te gzhan min par// 'khor lo sgyur

140a1(rgyud): yis/ mkhas pas nges par bsgoms nas ni// rim par sbyor ba'i rim pa dang // brgyad pa'i gnas kyi rim pa dang // rnal 'byor ma yi bka' dag ni//

140a7(rgyud): ni ser la mdzes// dpa' bo zod pa'i 'phreng ba can// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin rlabs can// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/
140b1(rgyud): 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyi pad+mar gnon par bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam pas 'khyud// phag mo yi ni byin pas 'khril// gnyis med sbyor ba mnyam
140b2(rgyud): ldan pas// dbu skra grol ba phyogs gos can// sku mdog mnyam zhing mtshungs par ldan// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// de yi zhal dang phyag mtshan can// rnal 'byor dngos grub
140b3(rgyud): rab tu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste// zo ba mdung ste gzhan du min// tshangs pa'i mgo bos brgyan pa la// zla ba phyed pa zhi pa 'dzin// sna tshogs
140b4(rgyud): rdo rjes dbul brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// 'og pag ngag gis sa rags byas// dpung rgyun rdo rjes
140b5(rgyud): mtshan pa ste// sngags pa'i gtso bos gsang sngags ni// 'di ltar cho ga'i snying po shes// phag mo bde bar gnas pa ni// rgyal ba'i pags pa rnam par spangs// phag mo'i rgyal ba'i/

140b7(rgyud): cang rnam dag mchog dab pa// shar gyi 'dab sogs phyogs chal// mkha' 'gro ma sogs bzhi po dgod// shar du mkha' 'gro ma dgod cing // byang du lA ma de bzhin te/
141a1(rgyud): nub tu dum skyes ma yin no// lho ru gzugs can ma yin te// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dag ni bzhi pa'o// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/
141a2(rgyud): spyan gsum drag po gzi brjid can// skyil mo krung ni phyed par bzhugs// skra grol ba ni yid 'ong ba// phyogs kyi gos can mgo yi 'phreng // phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan//
141a3(rgyud): thod pa khA T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // de bzhin gzhu dang mda' 'dzin cing // rdo rje mdung mchog phyag na 'dzin// snyems pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing //
141a4(rgyud): thugs rje tshigs pas rnam par myos// sngo ba dang ni ser ba dang // ljang khu steng gi zhal dkar po// ser zhing sngo la ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal gdong drag la dmar// dmar dang
141a5(rgyud): sde dang ldang ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dkar la zhi// ljang dang dmar dang sngo ba dang // steng gi zhal ni ser po mchog/ bdud bzhi po ni zhabs kyis gnon// bcom ldan 'das la
141a6(rgyud): gdong gis blta// zur gyi char ni bum pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// de yi steng du thod pa ni// byang chub 'o mas rab gang ba// phyi rol dam tshig gsum 'khor lo//
141a7(rgyud): khang pa brtsegs pa legs par mdzes// shar phyogs su ni gau rI ste// byang du de bzhin tsau rI ma// nub tu rab rmongs ma yin no// lho ru yang ni ro langs ma// me la lbos byed ma yin te/
141b1(rgyud): bden bral du ni gtum mo yin// rlung phyogs skye mo nyid yin te// dbang ldan he ru ka ma ste// de bzhin rnal 'byor ma brgyad ni// dkar mo ser la sngo ljang khu// skul byed dmar la/

141b3(rgyud): yang ni dud sngo ljang // he ru ka ma sngo ljang dmar// 'di ltar de dag thams cad kyang // spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos 'chang gar dang bcas// yi dgas gdar la

142a4(rgyud): shar du ni// me tog ma byang bdug pa ma// nub tu mar me lho ru dri// ser dang dung kha dmar dkar po// me long ro dang reg bya chos// me phyogs la sogs mtshams bzhi ste/

142a6(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // cang te'u ni phyag na bsnams// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba can// lha mo de dag 'dus pa dang // nye ba'i 'dus pa dur khrod dang // nye ba'i dur khrod dag yin te//

143b5(rgyud): hu.a la la la ho/ su ra a ut+ta ma ma dzU/ ma hA siSh+Tha/ u ma dze i ni dza la ma ho/ A I/ a A ra ho/ a r+ya he byin nu su ba yan+na ta/ su ra a ru hu de hi ba ra TA i na/ dza la su hU bi sa
143b6(rgyud): pha na ta ro Na Na pa de he ma hA su hU madz+dza mu hU mo k+Shu pa la ka kha u/ tud+d+ha sa d+hu na i su hU/ badz+rI u mo lu su hUM/ i na i du/ khe la tha i mo khu su hu/ ba su i paM ka u madz+nyA ta nu na ba ra/ A
143b7(rgyud): ba da traM/ b+hu dzata ru pu lA ma ha su hUM/ oM la da~M dz+wa la/ u ma d+hu/ a ra g+h+ra a gi a pa~M ur suM/ 'di yis mgon po bskul nas ni// dkyil 'khor dngos grub nges be ste// snyan cing
144a1(rgyud): 'jam pa'i mgrin pa'i dbyangs// dpyid kyi rgyal po'i glu blangs pas// mkha' 'gro'i dra ba dri med rnams// gzigs shing las kun mdzad pa yi// rdo rje pad+ma yid 'ong /

144a3(rgyud): mthar thug par// yi ge brgya pa'i gsang sngags bzla// 'khor lo dag ni brtan byas te// dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// 'di ni kun gyi gsang sngags te// khro bo sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs/
