144a5(rgyud): nu pA lA ya badz+ra he ru ka/ tre no pa tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me tsit+ta shre yaHku ru ts+tsha/ ha ha ha ha hoH/
144a6(rgyud): b+ha ga ban/ badz+ra he ru ka mA me muny+tsa he ru ka b+ha ba/ ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan kun khyab cing // yi ge brgya pa mchog gyur pa// he ru ka mchog rang nyid yin/
144a7(rgyud): phyir bzlog pa ni gang yin pa// bcu drug 'dab ma la bkod cing // rjes su bstan pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// bdag gis bsgoms shing brtan par bya// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis/
144b1(rgyud): nga skar bde bar gnas par bya// na 'byor 'di 'dra bsgoms na ni// khams gsum pa yang mthong 'gyur te// bdag nyid dpa' bo'i mtshan nyid de// dun+d+har bring pa nga stong pa yin// bsgoms/
144b2(rgyud): pas bdag nyid yang dag gnas// 'dir ni draka 'a thub bshad pa med// 'phreng ba med cing sngags kyang med// gzungs dang sbyin sreg las rnams dang // cho ga'i rim pa'i gni yang med// rnal
144b3(rgyud): 'byor phyag rgya byed pa'ang med// g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis rim pa'ang med// rdo rje chen po dngos 'dzin pa// rang byung dngos grub kun mdzad pa// 'gog pa nyid kyang mdzad pa med// bdag nyid bdag
144b4(rgyud): gis mchod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang ba ni// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par sgom// yi ge gnas kyi mchog gyur pa// lha yi gzugs su bsgom pa ni// de yi dbus su rnam par bsam/
144b5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs ni 'dus pa can// de yi lus las 'das gyur te// sems kyi dngos kyang btsal du med// chags pa med cing chags bral med// chags bral dang ni ldan gyur pa// snying
144b6(rgyud): gau pad+ma'i dbus su ni// brtags pas legs par rnyed pa ni// yid kyis ngal bsos byas pa ste// rnal 'byor ma kun bud med yin// phyag rgya mchog tu bshad pa'o// zla ba'i steng du brgya
144b7(rgyud): phyed brgyan// ye shes sems ni bsams pa ni// mchog ste spyad par bya ba med// bla ma'i man ngag lam dang ni// sems ni mchog tu 'bad pa yis// 'di ltar zhi ba'i gnas de ni/
145a1(rgyud): 'jig rten du mas ma rtogs te// sbyor dang sbyor ba bral byas nas// go 'bang gcig pus khyab pa yi// 'di ltar byang chub 'bras bu rnyed par dka' ba ste// dang por dbyangs/
145a2(rgyud): kyi yi ge las byung gzhan du yang // stegs ngan gzhung lugs legs pa'i blo gros de nyid ni// ma ning shes rab long ba gzugs bzhin 'bras bu med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma
145a3(rgyud): las/ sku gsung thugs kyi gnas kyi rim pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// thod pa sangs rgyas mchog dam pa// de nyid sbyor ba kun gyi
145a4(rgyud): mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// gsang ba legs par sba bya zhing // gang gis su la'ang mi bstan to// de nyid mchog gi sgom pa bzung // rnal 'byor ma yi snying la gnas// gsang ba
145a5(rgyud): bstan par sba bya zhing // bla ma'i ngag ni bsgom par bya// dur khrod gnas ni yid 'ong ba// sgrub pa po yis nges bstan pa// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa dang gnas kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje ste/
145a6(rgyud): ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bya// de yis khyab par bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas thod pa can gyi mchog/ gnas med zhi zhing dag pa ste// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs yis// A li kA/
145a7(rgyud): li las rang 'byung // gnyis med mchog tu zhi ba ste// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyan// 'dzam bu mdog can mnyam pas khyab// 'od zer 'phreng bas kun
145b1(rgyud): tu 'khrigs// zod pa'i 'greng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spun gsum pa la band pa'i nal// sems dpa' kun gyi sgom pa ste// gnyis med chos ni bla na med// stag gi pags pa gos su ma na bas/
145b2(rgyud): na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgya can// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de yi phyag g.yon
145b3(rgyud): zothod pa ni// rkang gis rab tu gang ba dang // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// ye shes 'chi med lngas bsres pa// kha T+wAM ga ni lha'i rnal 'byor// thod pa dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma// g.yas pa mi
145b4(rgyud): 'jigs dag pa ste// 'jigs pa ma lus mi 'jigs grol// gdug cing 'jigs pa ma lus kun// 'dir ni zhabs kyis gnod par mdzad// gdug pas 'jigs pa thams cad spong //
145b5(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mtshan// rdo rje 'phreng bas dpral ba mdzes// rkang rgyan yid 'ong rgyan cha can// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad kyi// lte ba'i dbus nas
145b6(rgyud): bzhengs pa ni// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ chags pa zhe sdang zhabs kyis gnon// ye shes sems dpa' de gzugs cad// yi ge bruM las byung bar sgom// thugs kyi
145b7(rgyud): 'khor lo snying kha ru// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// gsung gi 'khor lo kha la sgom// sku yi 'khor lo snga ma bzhin// sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba dang // phyag drug pa la nal gsum pa// rdo rje
146a1(rgyud): dril bu mnyam par ldan// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnams bsgyur// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rtse gsum pa dang thod pa 'chang // rang gi lus dang yang dag 'dus/
146a2(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi dbus dag tu// yi ge gsum sogs las byung ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rang gi mtshan ma'i mchog dang ldan// gnas la
146a3(rgyud): sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sdom pa gsum gyi mchog dam pa// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas la dgod// zod pa bzhi po mchog yin te/
146a4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma ni kha dog ser// ldum pa la sha yi mdog/ dum skyes ma ni sngon po ste// gzugs can ma ni dmar la 'bar// zod pa dang ni kho T+wAM 'dzin// g.yas pa mi 'jigs mchog yin te// sgra
146a5(rgyud): rnams su ni lha mo bste// khrag dang la sogs mkha' 'grom// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khru drag po'i gzugs can no// mtshams su gshin rje sreg la sogs// rab 'jigs kyi
146a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa sa// thod pa dang rmi a dz+dza 'dzin// mi 'jigs mchog kyang de bzhin te// cang te'u dang ni gri gus nyid// bdud ni ban po'i snang na bcugs// spyan gsum pa la sna grol ba// phyogs kyi gos
146a7(rgyud): mchog 'dzin pa ste// thod pa'i 'bring ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// me long ro dang dri dang ni// reg gi mchod pa ba ni me ste// so bcu dag ni rim pa dang // sku gsung thugs
146b1(rgyud): kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi dang nang gi chos rnams kun// byang chub phyogs kyis rnam par dag/ ka la sogs pa nyi shu pas// mgo la zin dus mnan pa ste// gsal byed dru gnyis dang yang sbyar// bathar/
146b2(rgyud): ni phaT dang rab tu sbyar// dpa' bo kun gyi gsang sngags ni// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yi ming // mthar ni huM hUM phaT yin te// 'di ltar rab gtum
146b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma// sngags kyi de nyid bde ba ster// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// hUM AHoM/ 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// pad+ma'i 'dab la mkha' 'gro ma// gsal byed ma ning dang bcas pa/
146b4(rgyud): hUM ni gnyis pa nyid yin te// mkhas pas mthar ni phaT dang sbyar// khwa gdong la sogs gsang sngags ni// ya ra la wa/ gsal byed dang ni bcas pa ste// mthar ni hUM dang phaT dang sbyar// gshin/
146b5(rgyud): d+hI sgeg ma la sogs pa// sha Sha sa ha/ gsal byed dang ni hUM gnyis dang // phaT kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus su sangs rgyas thod pa yi// gsang sngags de bzhi rjes su dran// oM a~M A
146b6(rgyud): aM I/ uM AM/ e ai/ aM aHSha swA hA/ khams dang phung po skye mched la// go cha dang ni sbyar bar bya// ye shes 'khor lo dam tshig dag/ mnyam pa'i ro yis mchod par bya//
146b7(rgyud): mchod pa bzhi po'i gsang sngags rnams// rang ming gsal byed hUM byas te// 'di ltar dkyil 'khor dag dang sbyar// sangs rgyas thod pa las byung ba// rdo rje rgyan ni bgos pa ste// thams
147a1(rgyud): cad rim pa bzhin du sbyar// 'thor 'thung du ni rab sbyar bas// gsang ba bzhi po bzla bar bya// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo gsum gyi rim pa dang // 'dir ni/
147a2(rgyud): cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dus bzhi dag tu sbyar nas su// dam tshig 'khor lo'i bzlas pa bya// dam tshig mchog ni dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig can gyi gsang sngags kun// sangs rgyas thod pa
147a3(rgyud): mchog yin te// mnyam par ma gnage sbyor ba yis// 'di ltar thams cad rab tu brtag/ dam tshig rtag tu bskyang bya zhing // ye shes 'chi med lnga yi mchog/ yang na rang ming bzlas pa bya// sngags
147a4(rgyud): kyi de nyid bzlas par bya// oM shrI bud+d+ha ka pA li bruM AHhUM DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba raM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni yid 'ong sbyor ba'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes mchog/ gang du dam tshig nyams pa la/
147a5(rgyud): sbyor ba 'di sbyin par bya// zhi bar gyur nas bla med pa// rnal 'byor ma yi dbang yang bskur// dus bzhi dag tu rim pa yis// phyi dang nang gi chus khrus bya// yang na dam tshig sdom pa rlung /
147a6(rgyud): bla ma la ni gsol ba gdab// bdag ni mi shes rmongs pa ste// dam tshig las ni 'gal zhing nyams// bla ma mgon pos skyabs mdzod cig/ gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa ste// thugs rje chen po'i bdag
147a7(rgyud): nyid can// 'gro ba'i gtso la skyabs su mchi// des ni the tsom med byas nas// nges par dngos grub can du 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig las sdang ba sangs rgyas
147b1(rgyud): thod pa bskyed pa ste le'u nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i de nyid rnyed dka' ba// gsang sngags kun ni bskyed pa dang // 'gro ba'i
147b2(rgyud): gnas dang 'gro ba dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo kun// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas mchog yin// mi zad gnyid med rnam par dag/ thog ma dbus mthar dri ma med// a yi ye shes las
147b3(rgyud): byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// rang bzhin dag cing dri ma med// ral pa zla phyed dbu
147b4(rgyud): la brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la mtshan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par
147b5(rgyud): brgyan// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rin chen zhags pa mdzes pa 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal/
147b6(rgyud): rnam thar gsum gyi gnas kyi mchog/ ye shes sems dpa' snying kha r+ya// 'khor lo gsum gyi mchog kyang sgom// hUM las thugs kyi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan sngon po dang /
147b7(rgyud): aHlas gsung gi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dmar po'o// oM las sku yi 'khor lo ste// de yi phyag mtshan dkar po yin// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mnyam sbyor// sku gsung
148a1(rgyud): zugs ni dri ma med// raM las phyag rgya chen po ste// lte ba'i dbus su rnam par bsam// i las b+ha ga pad+ma ste// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// su ni snying khar bsam pa ste/
148a2(rgyud): e ni mgo la rnam par dgod// a ni spyi gtsug dag tu dgod// aM ni mig tu dgod pa ste// aM ni go char byas nas su// a ni mdun gyi mtshon cha'o// l-i las lha mo spyan yin te// raM las dam tshig
148a3(rgyud): sgrol ma yin// l-I las lha mo gos dkar mo// r-I las rin chen yang dag 'byung // rin chen sgron dang ye shes sgron// dkar zhing pa la sha yi mdog/ dmar zhing 'dzam bu chu bo'i mdog/ zhal gsum
148a4(rgyud): pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum dgyes pas rnam par myos// thams cad phyogs kyi gos can te// rang gi thabs dang mnyam par ldan// 'khor lo sna tshogs rdo rje dang // pad+ma dmar po rin chen
148a5(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dril bu lhan cig sbyar// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// ral gri mnga' dang lcags kyu 'dzir// gzhu ni 'gugs par 'dzin pa ste// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs//
148a6(rgyud): thod pa yi ni cod pan can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dbus su ni// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// de dag sgo ru dgod pa ste// dbus su gtso bo'i zla ba'i gdan// zur la mchod pa rnam pa
148a7(rgyud): bzhi/ phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// me long dang ni pi wang dang // dri dang dung dang bcud kyis len// chang gi btung ba
148b1(rgyud): lag pas mchod// gzhan du ji ltar bdag po bzhin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// skyil krung phyed pas legs par bzhugs// lag pa snyim pa'i thal mo yis// mchod pa
148b2(rgyud): lag tu thogs nas ni// 'di lta'i tsho gas thams cad mkhyen// A li de nyid dri ma med// gsang ba mchog ni rnyed dka' ba// rdo rje sems dpas bshad pa yin// sngags kyi de nyid cho ga dag/
148b3(rgyud): sku gsung thugs su yang dag sbyar// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa A/ ya hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra sAhA/ oM sid+d+hi lo tsa nI la AHhUM swA hA/ oM sa ma ya tA re tut+tA re tu re raM AHhUM swA hA/
148b4(rgyud): pad+mo d+hA we pAn+d+ha ra ba si ni se l-I AHhUM swA hA/ oM rat+na ku la ke ka rat+na dz+wa li nI rA AHhUM swAhA/ oM rU ba badz+rI bruM/ oM shap+ta badz+rI rU/ oM gan+d+ha badz+rI khaM/ oM rA sa badz+rI hrI/ thams cad mkhyen
148b5(rgyud): pa dbang phyug mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su gnas par sgom// A li rdo rje gsang ba ste// sems can kun gyi snying la gnas// gang gis dngos po kun gsang ba// de yi gsang ba bshad pa yin//
148b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis dus bzhi ru// bzlas dang bsgom par ldan par bya// som nyi thams cad spangs nas ni// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtan// ye shes 'khor lo mthong nas
148b7(rgyud): ni dam tshig can gyis mchod dbang bskur// de dag gcig tu bstims nas su// spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa// thams cad rdo rje 'dzin ltabu/
149a1(rgyud): 'das pa dang ni da ltar dang // ma 'ongs pa yi dus gsum po// de ltar sems can gsum po la// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// lhan cig skyes dga' dag pa'i/
149a2(rgyud): bdag/ thog ma med pa'i mchog yin no// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas mchog gi
149a3(rgyud): cho ga bshad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa ni// maM gyi yi ge las byung ba'i// 'jam pa'i rdo rje bde ba che// zhal drug phyag drug zhi ba ste// sku mdog dkar po dri ma med// spyan gsum rdo rje skyil
149a4(rgyud): krung can// phyag rgya drug ni 'bar bas brgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// ral pa'i thor tsugs bcings pa ste/
149a5(rgyud): dkar dang sngo dang ngur smrig nyid// ser dang ljang khu de bzhin te// steng gi zhal ni zhi ba ste// lha yi dngos grub 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// ral gri bo ti 'dzin pa ste/
149a6(rgyud): ut+pa la dang lcags kyu nyid// ye shes lus can rnam par sgom// sku gsung thugs kyi snying po ni// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par sgom// sngar bshad gnas kyi sbyor ba yis// ji ltar rdo rje
149a7(rgyud): sems dpa' ltar// gsang sngags 'di ni rjes su dran// 'jam pa'i rdo rje gsang ba ni// gsang gsum ye shes dam tshig can// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'o// oM shrI ma hA su kha mahA
149b1(rgyud): badz+ra a maM hUM DA ki nI dzA la saM ba raM swAhA/ rang gis dbang bskur byas nas ni// brtul zhugs chen po gsang sngags bzla// gsang gsum 'khor lo spros nas ni// khams gsum dag ni bsdu/
149b2(rgyud): bar bya// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// gang gis su la'ang bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ 'jam pa'i rdo rje sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//
149b3(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yi ge dgu pa sgrub pa ste// kA yi yi ge las byung ba// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// za byed mkha' 'gro za byed cing // rnam rtog zos
149b4(rgyud): shing zad par byed// mkha' mnyam stong pa las byung ba// nam mkha'i longs spyod za byed cing // zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// g.yas brkyang
149b5(rgyud): ba yi zhabs kyis bsgyur// gdug pa'i bdud ni za byed cing // 'jigs byed dang ni 'jigs byed mo// kha sbub zhabs kyis mnan par bzhugs// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// mgo
149b6(rgyud): bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa can// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// zhal gyi mche ba
149b7(rgyud): rnam par gtsigs// 'jigs byed rab tu cher 'jigs shing // sngo dang dud kha ljang khu dang // dmar dang lnga pa ser po'o// drug pa dag ni bong bu'i mgo/ steng gi zhal gdong rab tu 'jigs/
150a1(rgyud): thal ba sprin gyi mdog can la// gdug pa thams cad rab 'joms ma// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dgyes pa'i longs spyod longs spyod cing // bang du rdo rje phag mo ni/
150a2(rgyud): de mdog steng zhal phag mo ste// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// skra grol ba dang phyogs gos can// byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje chags pas rnam par myos// thod
150a3(rgyud): pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i pags pa mnabs pa ste// rdo rje mdung dang cang te'u dang // gri gugazhags pa mgo bo dang // phyag tu ral gri 'phyar ba ste// drag po gdug pa kun 'joms pa/
150a4(rgyud): snying khar ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// khwa gdong la sogs yongs kyis khyab// 'khor lo 'dab brgyad dbus dag tu// g.yon nas g.yas su bskor nas ni// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod// mkha' 'gro/
150a5(rgyud): mchog ni dgod par bya// yaM raM laM waM/ sha ShaM saM haM/ ye shes 'khor lo mkha' 'gro dgod// zhag bdun bar du bsgoms nas ni// gang yang thun ni bzhi yi rim// chu 'gram dang ni dur khrod du
150a6(rgyud): bsgoms pas dngos grub nges par rnyed// 'phrog pa dang ni gsod byed cing // gang du las ni ci 'dod pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los 'grub// las 'dir ying gnyis dpyod pa med/
150a7(rgyud): dang pa la sha yi mdog/ dmar dang ban pa ser po ste// gshin rje sreg sogs pazhi po re// sna tshogs mdog can mdzes pa'i zhal// dmar dang sngo dang dung ba ste// zhal mngag dkar po mchog
150b1(rgyud): tu mdzes// thams cad spyan gsum pa yi nal// sgra grol ba la phyogs gos can// khwa gdong g.yon dang g.yas kyi zham// 'ug gdong zhal yang de bzhin te// gsum pa khyi yi zhal gdong yin/
150b2(rgyud): bzhi pa phag gi zhal gdong ste// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gdong ni// drag po'i gzugs can cho ga bzhin// gshin rje sreg sogs zhal gdong ni// g.yon dang g.yas pa gnyis de bzhin/
150b3(rgyud): thug ri rnga mo rta dang ni// seng ga ra dang glang ma he// gzhan yang dom gyi zhal yin te// thams cad kyang ni mnyam par bya// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// dril bu
150b4(rgyud): cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// yi dgas gdan la gar gyis bzhugs// mi'u zung la skye gnas ring // mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa
150b5(rgyud): zhal 'thugs rje'i ro yis rnam par myos// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// hUM AHoM/ 'di ni gsang bar bshad pa ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dbus/
150b6(rgyud): ye shes mkha' 'gro snying kha ru// mkha' 'gro'i yi ge 'khor lo ni// ye shes 'khor lo de mthong nas// mchod cing thim par rnam par sgom// mnyam par gzhag nas yi ge rnams// srog dang
150b7(rgyud): rtsol bas gsang sngags bzla// rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas su// gsang ba gsum gyi ye shes spro// oM shrI kA DA ki nI dzA la saM ba ra huM hUM phaT swAhA/ thog mar gsal byed ming dang hUM/
151a1(rgyud): mthar ni phaT dang rnam par sbyar// mkha' 'gro zla bas bshad pa yi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// mchog 'di dag ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni sbyin mi bya// zhag/
151a2(rgyud): bdun gyis ni dbang 'gyur te// rtse gcig pa yis bsgoms na ni// 'khor lo gsum gsang mkha' 'gro ma'i// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ kA'i
151a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// de nas mchog tu bshad bya ba// A li mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste// A li ye shes las byung ba// A li mkha' 'gro mchog
151a4(rgyud): dam pa// zhal brgyad pa la phyag bcu drug/ spyan gsum 'jigs pa rab 'jigs pa// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// zla ba phyed pa ral par 'ching //
151a5(rgyud): thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi gtsug mnan// dpral ba la ni rdo rje 'phreng // stag gi pags pa gos su mnapas// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// rnam par rtog pa 'jig/
151a6(rgyud): byed nyid// sred dang phrag dog dus mtshan nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon par mdzad// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // bgegs kyi mgo bo'i 'phreng ba can// sna tshogs mdog can
151a7(rgyud): legs par mdzes// dkar ba'i mdog can rked pa bre// lha yi gzi brjid 'bar ba can// sngo zhing ser la dud kha dang // g.yas pa'i zhal yang de bzhin te// ljang khu dmar dang ser skya ste/
151b1(rgyud): g.yon pa'i zhal yang sna tshogs mdzes// steng gi thal kha sprin mdog ni// chags shing rjes su chags pas blta// thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag rdzogs// sku lus ldem zhing 'jo bag can// A li
151b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi sku// phyag gnyis pa la gcer bu'i lus// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu la brgyan// skra grol ba yis rnam par myos// spyan gsum nag po 'jigs pa can// de yi mdog can sku rags
151b3(rgyud): can byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// gnyis med sbyor bas yang dag gnas// rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// lha mo'i ku tsa 'tshir ba'o// ji ltar mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya ltar// mkha' 'gro ma
151b4(rgyud): yang de bzhin sbyar// phyag gnyis dag ni brkyang ba la// khyab 'jug pags pa mnabs pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'chang // mdung rtse gsum pa cang te'u nyid// dgra sta
151b5(rgyud): lcags kyu de bzhin te// zhags pa tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // gri gug dang ni 'khor lo nyid// snying khar rtsibs ni bcu gnyis pa'i// 'khor lo'i rgyal po legs par mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni//
151b6(rgyud): ye shes mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// de mdog zhal dang 'dug stangs dang // phyag dang phyag rgya de bzhin te// shar du dam tshig mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yi ge i'i rig pas byung ba'o// byang
151b7(rgyud): phyogs su sna tshogs mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge I las byung ste bzhugs pa'o// nub phyogs su nam mkha'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge e dang sbyar bar bya'o// lho phyogs
152a1(rgyud): su gnas kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge aM las yang dag par bzhugs pa'o// me'i phyogs la sogs pa'i mtshams rnams su mkha' 'gro ma bzhi po dgod par
152a2(rgyud): bya ste thog mche ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge u dang sbyar bar bya'o// bden bral du drag po mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge U dang sbyar bar bya'o// rlung gi phyogs su dpa'
152a3(rgyud): bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// dbang ldan du khro bo'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma yi ge oM dang sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin 'dis ni mtshams bzhi ru// dbang ldan
152a4(rgyud): la sogs phyogs dgod pa// yi ge raM las dngos grub kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge laM las dur khrod kyi mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge r-I las rnal 'byor gyi mchog
152a5(rgyud): ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / yi ge l-I las gtum pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / mkha' 'gro ba ni dri kun gyi// yan lag bcu gnyis rnam par dag/ zhal gsum phyag ni drug
152a6(rgyud): pa ste// thams cad spyan gsum rnam bsgyur zhal// sku lus dkar po thams cad zhal// sngo dang ljang khru gnyis med bde// g.yon dang g.yas pa'i zhal gnyis ni// mkhas pas rnam par bskyor
152a7(rgyud): par bya// phyogs kyi gos can gar dang bcas// skra grol ba la rab tu 'jigs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u dang gri gug mchog/ mdung dang mgo bo thams cad kun// sna tshogs mdog
152b1(rgyud): dang phyag mtshan bsdams// ro yi mgo yi steng bzhugs shing // thugs rje'i ron yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// thams cad thod pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin/
152b2(rgyud): pa ste thams cad a la la yi sgra// oM ni thugs kyi rdo rje ste// A ni gsung du 'gyur ba yin// a ni sku yi rdo rje ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo'i dbus// 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/
152b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba mchog/ rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa ste// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa yin// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i mkha' 'gro ma// 'khor la sogs pa thams cad dgod//
152b4(rgyud): yeshes 'khor lo de mthong nas// gcig pu chos kyi ro yang sgom// ye shes bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi sngags kyi 'thor 'thung bya// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// 'khor lo mchog gi
152b5(rgyud): tshogs dang spro// mchog de mthong nas slar yang bsdu// yan lag bcu gnyis mchog dam pa// sa ni bcu gnyis dag yin te// rdo rjes ni bcu gsum pa// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od
152b6(rgyud): byed pa dang 'od 'phro ba// sbyang dka' ba dang mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// gzugs med pa dang ye shes ldan// de ltar sa ni bcu gnyis po//
152b7(rgyud): 'khor lo'i lha mo rnam par dgod// dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje sems dpa' dbus su'o// 'khor lo sogs pa kun gyi sngags// ming dang gsal byed hUM byas te/
153a1(rgyud): de dag mthar ni baT dang sbyar// sngags kyi gtso bos gsang sngags ni// rang snying rang gi sa bon dgod// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// ye shes 'khor lo 'di mthong /
153a2(rgyud): nas gcig tu bsdus te mchod par bya// bdag gis phyi dang nang du yang // mnyam par gzhag ste mi smra bzla// rang gis 'thor 'thung byas nas ni// blo ldan srog stsol bzlas pa bya// oM shrI A li DA
153a3(rgyud): ka a aT+Ta ki nI dza la shaM ba ra hUM phaT swAhA/ srid pa ma lus thams cad kun// dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// sbyor ba yi ni bdag nyid rnams// sems can
153a4(rgyud): khams ni cha gnas pas// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid sbyor zhing mchod par bya// mnyam par ma gzhag sems kyis ni// bsgom zhing rab tu bsgoms byas te// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos nyid
153a5(rgyud): de chos gcig ro ni stong pa yin// chos rnams bdag med nyid yin te// rang bzhin med pa'i chos la ni// rjes su brtag par bya ba yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba
153a6(rgyud): chen po'i gsang ba a li'i mkha' 'gro sgrub pa ste le'u sum cu tham pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba bshad bya ba// sna tshogs gar gyi dbang phyug mchog/ thams cad mchog
153a7(rgyud): ste rnal 'byor che// dngos grub chen po legs stsol ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bsgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// siM oM dr-i las rdo rje 'byung //
153b1(rgyud): de nyid longs gyur bdag nyid de// gsal byed mapa' 'gro mchog gyur pa// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs mdog/ thams cad rim gyi mchog dam pa// nal drug pa la phyag bcu gnyis// spyan gsu/
153b2(rgyud): pa la g.yo ba'i sgra// zla ba phyed pa zhi ba 'dzin// thod pa'i 'phreng bas spud pa ste// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu la 'chang // spyi gtsug ral pa 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gis sku la mtshan// lha yi rgyan
153b3(rgyud): gyis spud pa ste// skal ngan mu stegs can rnams ni// zhabs kyi pad+ma'i 'og tu mnan// lta ba lnga yi rim pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar stabs can/
153b4(rgyud): zhabs drug gis ni rnam par brgyan// khyab 'jug gi ni lpags pa mnabs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa ste// rdo rje lha mos rnam par 'khyud// gcer bu 'og pag ska rags can// skra grol ba la/
153b5(rgyud): spyan gsum can// mchu dang mchu ni rnam 'chir zhing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam par 'khril// byang chub yan lag gnas 'tshor zhing // byin pa gnyis kyis mnyam par 'khril// thugs rje chags pa'i
153b6(rgyud): r-i yis bde// tshangs pa'i pags pa'i yan lag ni// phyag gnyis dag gis brkyang nas 'dzin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'chang // dbang phyug chen po'i mgo bo thogs// mdung rtse gsum dang ral gri dang //
153b7(rgyud): cang te'u nags pa lcags kyu bsnams// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba nyid// ser dang dud kha ngur smrig ste// g.yon deng g.yas pa'i ngos dag tu// pi la dang ni nye ba la// mkha' 'gro ma ni gnyis
154a1(rgyud): po sbyar// chos kyi mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// yi ge dr-i las yang dag 'byung // g.yon gyi phyogs su dgod par bya// yi ge sa~M las nges byung ba/
154a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i mchog ces bya ba yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma gnyis ni// sna tshogs mdog can sna tshogs zhal// spyan gsum pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// skyil krung phyed pas gnas pa ste// zhabs ni gar
154a3(rgyud): dang bcas pa'o// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum drag po 'jigs pa ste// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis rab tu mnan par bzhugs// mgrin pa dag ni drug dang bzhi//
154a4(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i ska rags can// rkang gdub g.yer ka'i sil sgra can// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zla ba'i
154a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khyud pa yi ni mchog dam pa// rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub kyis// gnyis su med par rnam par brgyan// thod pa gnyis med rnam brgyan te// zhags pa lcags
154a6(rgyud): kyu phyag na bsnams// thod pa dang ni gri gug mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi dbu la brgyan// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba// ye shes mkha' 'gro ma dbus su// 'khor lo gsum gyi thabs
154a7(rgyud): kyang sgom// oM gyi ye shes mkha' 'gro ni// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mkha' 'gro ni// rang gi snying khar de dag sgom// sngar bshad sbyor ba'i rim pa yis// gnas/
154b1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i rjes rim pa// de ru bsam zhing rnam bsgoms te// gsum po'i rim pa rjes su spro// des ni dngos grub gnyis su med// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sgom// ye shes 'khor lo'i ro rnams
154b2(rgyud): nibasgoms la gsang sngags bzlas par bya// oM shrI pra Na ba DA ka A A/ oM hUM DA ki rI dzA la saM ba ra a swA hA/ oM hrI d+harmA ut+ta me/ ma hA badz+ra DA ki nI ye dI hUM phaT swA hA/ oM saM sA gar ut+ta ma
154b3(rgyud): mahA badz+ra DA ki nI ye si hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang gsum ye shes bzlas na ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma bzlas bya// gsal byed rang ming hUM gnyis dang // mthar ni phaT dang sbyar bar bya// gsang gsum
154b4(rgyud): 'khor lo bsgoms nas no// gsum po bsdu zhing bsgoms nas su// dam tshig gsang gsum sbyor ba yis// b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// byang chub zla ba dri ma med// thugs kyi 'khor lo nA da
154b5(rgyud): gsum// gtso bo dag ni gsum yin te// mkha' 'gro ma gsum gsum mkha' 'gro// sdud cing skyed par mdzad pa ste// b+ha gar rdo rje phag mo ni// gsang ba gsum du rnam par sgom// de nyid
154b6(rgyud): sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// de na nga rgyal rnam spangs nas// dus bzhi dag tu sbyor ba yis// de bzhin bsgom dang bzlas pa bya// rtag tu dam tshig bskyang bya zhing // 'o ma sna tshogs las byung ba// bram
154b7(rgyud): ze che dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hA ma sa mnyam ldan pa// de nyid gsum gyis mngon bsngags te// bza' ba dag ni bza' bar bya// 'du 'dzi med cing sred pa med// yongs su bzung ba'i 'khor yang med//
155a1(rgyud): longs spyod min pas longs spyod la// 'chi ba med pa'i zas bza' zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang bsten// longs spyod med pa'i zas bza' zhing // rnal 'byor/
155a2(rgyud): sgom pa'i skom yang btung // gzhan du gang yang btung ba yin// nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// rang nyid byin gyis brlabs byas nas// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro pi la ba// rnal 'byor
155a3(rgyud): ma ni nye bi la// thabs ni pi la par shes bya// shes rab nye ba'i pi la ba// grong khyer mthar ni pi la nyid// grong gi mtha' ni nye pi la// zla ba nyi ma mnyam sbyor ba// pi la dang ni nye ba'i yin//
155a4(rgyud): skad cig sbyor ba pi la ba// dga' ba nye ba'i pi la ste// mthu stobs du ma ldan par ni// skye ba 'di la 'grub pa yin// pa shu thams cad bza' bya zhing // lha bshos dag kyang de bzhin sgrub// dpa'
155a5(rgyud): bo mkha' 'gro ma 'dus nas// dus la mthun pa 'dus byas nas// glu dang gar dang bza' ba dang // 'dus pa mchog gis mchod par bya// rtog pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// dam tshig gi ni
155a6(rgyud): spyad pa spyod// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsal byed mkha' 'gro'i sgrub pa'i mtshar ma bstan pa ste le'u sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas gzhan
155a7(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// dngos grub sbyor ba'i rim pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro sbyor// dam tshig mchog gi sdom pa yi// chos rnams kun gyi sdom pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde ba che//
155b1(rgyud): mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbus gnas pa// dkyil 'khor dam tshig mchog dam pa// de yi dbus su 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dbus su nyi ma'i gdan yang mdzes//
155b2(rgyud): A li kA li mnyam par ldan// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan// byin gyis brlabs pa byas nas ni// rang gi sa bon las bskyed de// yi ge hi las yang
155b3(rgyud): dag 'byung // dus mtha'i me ltar rab tu 'jigs// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// spyan gsum ljags ni bskyod pa'i zhal// gdug pa thams cad zhabs 'og gnon// khro ba dang ni bzhad
155b4(rgyud): pa'i zhal// bskal pa'i mthar yang 'khrug pa ste// ral pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i
155b5(rgyud): pags pa yis// rked par ska rags bcings pa yin// thod pa'i 'phreng bas dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed 'chang // dpral ba las ni rdo rje 'phreng // khro bo mthong nas rnam par brtag
155b6(rgyud): lha rnams thams cad tshar yang gcod// keng rus can gyi brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'chi ba 'tshe bar byed pa'i mchog/ gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan//
155b7(rgyud): sna tshogs rgyan gyis sdud pa ste// phyag rgya drug pa zhal lnga pa// sna tshogs ro yi bcud mchog can// sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu dkar po zhi ba ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam
156a1(rgyud): ldan pas// phag mo yi ni su lus khyab// lha chen bags pa 'dzin mdzad cing // za re'i tshul du brkyang bar mdzad// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// drug pa na ni cang te
156a2(rgyud): dang zhabs g.yon du ni dus mtshan mnan// g.yas pa yis ni 'jigs byed de// zhabs kyis 'og tu mnan mdzad cing // rmongs shing rab tu myos par mdzad// rdo rje phag mo de mdog can/
156a3(rgyud): skra grol ba dang gcer bu ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// mgul bas 'khyud cing myos pa ste/
156a4(rgyud): de yi phyag mtshan phyag rgya bsnams// gri gug cang te'u mchog kyang 'dzin// drug pa la ni tshangs pa'i mgo/ 'di 'drar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// mkhas pas re'u mig dbus su dgod// shar
156a5(rgyud): du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste// byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro yin// nub tu pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ste// lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro yin// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba dang // ljang khu dang ni ser
156a6(rgyud): po'o// 'khor lo dril bu mnyam par ldan// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// ljang khu ser po dmar po sngo// dkar po steng bltas dril bu dang // sna tshogs rdo rje bde chen 'khyud/
156a7(rgyud): g.yas brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bzhugs// dmar po ser dang ljang khu dang // dkar po yang ni de bzhin no// pad+ma dril bu snyoms 'jug cing // lha mo'i nu ma 'chir ba'o// ser po sngon po de bzhin
156b1(rgyud): dmar// ljang khu dkar po kha dog ste// rin chen dril bus snyoms par 'jug/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// de dag mkha' 'gro lnga yin te// sdom pa lnga yang de nyid do// me dang
156b2(rgyud): bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan de ni bzhi po ru// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro las mkha' 'gro// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rin chen mkha'// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la sgra
156b3(rgyud): grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyun rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar mchog can// mgo yi 'phreng bas
156b4(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mnga' la sogs pas brgyan// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na mdzes// 'dod pa thams cad stsol mdzad cing // thugs rje'i ro ni yang dag
156b5(rgyud): rdzogs// thugs rje'i 'dod pas rnam par myos// cung zad ngo tsha'i mig zur can// dgyes pa stsol bas bde ba ste// de ltar sna tshogs du ma yis// dkyil 'khor rnams ni yongs su khyab// du ma'i/
156b6(rgyud): gzugs dang gzugs sdug ma// rdo rje mchu dang 'od byed ma// rta gdong dang ni drag po'i gdong // rdo rje drag po snyan grags ma// rdo rje pho nya rdo rje sen// rdo rje gzhon nu ma de bzhin// kam po ci yang
156b7(rgyud): de bzhin te// rdo rje ro langs ma dang ni// rdo rje ma mo'ang de bzhin te// dri can ma dang 'jigs byed zhal// zla ba'i spyi gtsug de bzhin te// khro gnyer can dang sna tshogs gzugs// rdo rje
157a1(rgyud): gri gug de bzhin te// rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang ni// sgyu 'phrul lha mo grags byed ma// na lar ki dang ser skya ma// rdo rje 'bar ma thal sbyor ma// rdo rje 'jigs byed ma nyid de// dkyil/
157a2(rgyud): 'khor grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma ni de dag kun// spyan gsum pa la zhal rnam bsgyur// gsus pa 'phyang la skra grol ba// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams
157a3(rgyud): thams cad yang dag rdzogs// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gsang mchog ste// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// thams cad ro yi gdan la bzhugs// snga
157a4(rgyud): tshogs gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// rdo rje mchog ni gsor mdzad cing // dril bu dang ni cang te'u mchog/ zhal gsum
157a5(rgyud): dpa' zhing sgeg pa ste// thugs rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// spyan ni zur gyis gzigs mdzad cing // dgyes pa'i stsol bas g.yo ba ste// dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad cing // sgrub
157a6(rgyud): pa po kun rjes su chags// zla ba drug gis sgrub pa po// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'grub// yid gnyis med par dngos grub mchog/ mkha' 'gro thod par byed pa yi// dus 'dir de ma thag tu
157a7(rgyud): yang / mkha' la spyod par the tshom med// nang gi pho brang de nyid ni// re'u mig dgu sogs sgo dang bcas// sgo ru lha mo bzhi bkod la// mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub ster// phyi rol dkyil 'khor
157b1(rgyud): lha mo gr-i/ sngam bu'i mtshams bzhi dra ni// lha mo nyi bu dgod bya zhig/ mkha' 'gro ba sogs mtshams rnams su// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi rol dkyil 'khor dag tu brtag b+h+yo
157b2(rgyud): rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ste// rta babs pa nis ni rnam par brgyan// zur bzhi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen gyis
157b3(rgyud): brgyan cing // phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de yi nang du re'u mig dgu// sgo rnams kyang ni bya ba ste// 'di ltar mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma// dra ba'i sdom pa stong pa ste// byang chub
157b4(rgyud): phyogs ni sum nu bdun// chos kyi rnam par dag pa yin// dbus su sa ni bcu gsum ste// phyi rol gnas dang nye ba'i gnas// dur khrod dang ni nye dur khrod// 'di ltar sbyor bas rnam dag par/
157b5(rgyud): sdom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya// de ni thugs kyi ye shes te// ye shes mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma'o// phung po khams dang skye mched la// cho ga gnyis po sbyar bar bya// ye shes mchog gi sdom
157b6(rgyud): ba steng gsang ba gsum gyi 'khor lo dgod// phyed dang phyed du rnam par dgod// mkha' 'gro gsum ni 'khor lo'i dbus// dam tshig rnal 'byor 'byung ba che// ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni//
157b7(rgyud): zhabs bsil byas nas gzhug par bya// ye shes chu yos dbang bskur nas// gtso bo dag ni rnam par sgom// bdag med chos kyi ro kun gyis// dab tshig mchog ni dri ma med// ba spu'i
158a1(rgyud): khung bu thams cad las// dam tshig gsang ba gsum spros nas// sems can ma lus dam tshig gi/ mkha' 'gro ru ni rab gnas bya// 'bad pa yis ni bsdus nas/
158a2(rgyud): kyang / gsang ba gsum du gzhug par bya// sngon grub pa yi mkha' 'gro ma// byin brlabs gnas su dgod par bya// 'di ni rdo rje theg chen te// mkha' 'gro spyod pa'i gnas la bzhugs//
158a3(rgyud): sdom pa mchog ni bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i go 'phang ster// dus bzhi dag tu ci 'dod par// skyo ba med par rtag tu sgom// lugs su 'byung dang bzlog po yis// 'khor lo mchog
158a4(rgyud): ni rnam par spro// ba spu'i khu bu las mdun du// bde mchog spros nas mchod par bya// rdo rje gsum ni dbang bskur nas// 'gog pa'i khro bo rnam par sgom// ye shes khro bo lhan cig tu/
158a5(rgyud): sprin gyi 'brug sgra lta bur bzla// 'gro zhing 'ong ba'i sbyor ba yis// mi smra rdo rje brtul zhugs che// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // mthung dang stobs ni 'grub 'gyur te// g.yo zhing
158a6(rgyud): ldeg par byed pa dang // 'khrug cing g.yengs dang gzhug pa dang // nad med pa ni nad yod byed// nad yod pa ni nad med byed// de ltar bsgom pa byas nas ni// las 'dir the tshom med pa
158a7(rgyud): yin nang gi bdag nyid sbyor ldan pas// bsgoms dang bzlas la dga' ba dang // dam tshig zas la dga' ba ni// thogs pa med par tshe yang bstan// 'di ltar ngag gi cho gas bzlas//
158b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas gnas su legs par 'jug/ der ridam tshig 'khor lo mi// mkhas pas bsgom mchod bzlas pa bya// gsang sngags 'di dag bshad par bya// oM shrI brda zla ki n+ti d+hu d+hA DA ka rlu ngal
158b2(rgyud): zhi bar du b+hu phaT swAd+hA/ oM shrI bud+d+ha nA ki ni s+yAd+g+ha d+hAT+Ta kanA dz+wA la shA bar du d+hu baT swAt+ma/ oM shrI kaR+Sha \u0f7fka a Sha d+g+ha T+Ta kad+hA d+hA la shi bar du rtsu pa swAt+ma/ a thA badz+ra nA ka ya trA~M s+saHko nA~M rnam ga par/
158b3(rgyud): d+ha d+ha badz+ra pAdz+haiM/ oM b+hai ratADA/ oM oM dz+dzaHkau la gA ba re d+had+d+hA ya swAhA/ mkha' 'gro bzhi pa rig dang // mkha' 'brim dang l+h+wa ma dang // dum rgyas ma dang gzugs can ma// mthun pa mam/
158b4(rgyud): par bsnol ba ste// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// de yi mdog dang phyag dang zhabs// phyag mtshan rnams kyang rnam par sgom// lha mo mngon du byas nas ni// snying po'i gsang sngags/
158b5(rgyud): cho sa yin// oM shrI badz+rA d+hA ra ha~M btu d+hu ban+d+ha swAt+ma/ oM shrI T+Ta kits+tshir+Natsu hU~M phaT swAt+ma/ oM thI lA me la du d+hu \u0f7fAd+ha/ ma g+ni khan+d+ha ro nam hu~M d+hu Adz+dza/ oM shwA rA pA Ne r+yA d+ha stu phaT
158b6(rgyud): 'do na lnga po'i bdag nyid kyi'o// mtshams kyi mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags ni// oM shrI bud+d+ha DA ko N+Ti huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI karma DA kanA hu hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI pad+ma DA ka nA huM hU~M phaT swAhA
158b7(rgyud): oM shrI rat+na DA kin+da hu~M hUM phaT swA hA/ sgo ru mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad ster// bzhi po sna tshogs mdog can te// ji bzhin rigs kyis kun la khyab/
159a1(rgyud): man+ta ba rgyal/ rdu du d+d+ha bdun / wA ma / ma na pa /
159a2(rgyud): lus dkar po'i mdog car la// de y-i gsang sngags bshad pa yin// oM badz+ra ba DA ba mu kha~M huM hUM phaT/ oM g+ho ra mu khaM huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+ho Ne huM hUM phaT/ oM ya sha sri ri hu~M hUM phaT/
159a3(rgyud): phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po dgod par bya// sku mdog dag ni ser ba ste// de yi sngags su bshad pa yin// oM badz+rA dA ti huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra na khi tsu hUM pAT+Ta/ oM badz+ra ka ma
159a4(rgyud): rI huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kAM pun+di huM hUM phaT/ nub phyogs kyi ni snam bu la// lha mo bzhi po sku mdog dmar po can gyi sngags yin no// oM badz+ra bai tA li huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sa yi ki hu hUM
159a5(rgyud): phaTa.oM gan+d+ha rI huM hUM phaT/ oM bi ma ba da ne huM hUM phaT/ byang gi snam bu la lha mo bzhi sku mdog ljang khu de'i gsang sngags bshad pa yin// oM tsan+d+re shaM kha re huM hUM phaT/ oM TI ku Ti
159a6(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ oM bai shwa rU pa huM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kar+d+ha ni huM hUM phan/ dbang ldan la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru lha mo bzhi po gzugs gnyis pa'i mdog can te/ de'i sngags bshad pa/
159a7(rgyud): oM shrI badz+ra kha li huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma ye huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI ya shaHka ri huM hUM phaT/ oM shrI nA lA rA ke huM hUM phaT/ sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi po sna tshogs pa'i mdog can drag po'i gzugs
159b1(rgyud): dang ldan pa ste/ de'i sngags bshad pa/ shar du/ oM shrI badz+ra baM ga le wa wa du d+hU phaT/ lho ru/ mo thI rA la raka tsu hU phaT/ rub tu/ oM shrI badz+ra kuN+Da ma bab tu d+hu phaT/ byang du/ oM hA
159b2(rgyud): badz+ra thaM rab ho hu hUM phaT/ thams cad gsal byed mthar ru ni/ ka shrI ni sbyar ning tsheg rim bzhin// sngags pas de ltar bzlas na ri// sa pa' 'gro ma ri dra ba yi// sdom pa'i dngos sgrub thob pa ste/
159b3(rgyud): zla ba drug gis bde dbang 'gyur// gcig tu byas te bsdus na ni// rnal 'byor chen po gzi byin can// dra ba'i mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di dag thams cad ro// khri 'am
159b4(rgyud): 'bum du bzlas na ni// gsang sngags rgyal po 'grub pa yin// snying po dag ni bzlas pa yis// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma grub cing // rang nyid ji ltar 'dod par gyur// gzhan gyis lus su ma
159b5(rgyud): 'gro zhing // mi snang ba dag thob nas ni// rnal 'byor chen po rnam par spyod// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dam tshig gi sdom pa
159b6(rgyud): las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro cho ga'i rim//
159b7(rgyud): sngar bshad sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yi// lung la sogs pa'i rim pa bya// rnal 'byor lung ni mi shes pa// sangs rgyas mu stegs can yin te// rtag tu lung ni spang mi bya// dkon
160a1(rgyud): mchog gsum ni mi spang zhing // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su 'gro// shes rab pha rol phyin dmigs na// rnal 'byor gyi ni dngos grub/
160a2(rgyud): 'grub// cig car 'jug pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag gis lus ni rnam par bsam// sngo zhing drag la bzhin rnams bsgyur// gtum zhing 'jigs la 'jigs par mdzad// zhal gyi mche ba
160a3(rgyud): rnam par gtsigs// ral pa zla phyed spyi gtsug 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes ral pa gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// baM hUM/
160a4(rgyud): badz+ra las byung sku lus can// phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan// stag gi pags pa gros su mnabs// skyil krung phyed pas legs par gnas// spyan gsum drag po'i sku lus can/
160a5(rgyud): mgrin pa bzhi la zhal bzhi pa// bcu gnyis phyag dang yang dag ldar// stong pa'i ye shes yang dag mchog/ gdug pa kun gyi thod pa'i 'phreng // dus mtha' las byung do shal can// gdug
160a6(rgyud): pa kun ni zhabs 'og gnon// nyon mongs 'jigs byed mgo bo dang // sred pa gti mug phrag dog ste// dus mtshan ngo ni khas phul la// gdug pa'i bgegs ni 'jigs pa can// thams
160a7(rgyud): cad zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon// nam mkha' dang ni skye ba dang // dkar ba dang ni dmar ba dang // ljang khu steng du bltas pa'i zhal// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa// phag mo dag dang bde bas/
160b1(rgyud): 'khyud// kun tu gnyis med sbyor ba yis// chos rnams kun gyi ro gcig tu// sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya ba// dpal gyi bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje he ru ka nyid yin// thod pa dang ni nga/
160b2(rgyud): T+wAM 'dzin// chos kyi 'khor lo 'khar gsil dang // lhung bzed mdung dang zhags pa dang // lcags kyu mgo bo cang te'u dang // g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag dag gis// na ra'i pags pa
160b3(rgyud): brkyang nas bsnams// shar du ma tang gi dang Do b+hi ka/ dza ra ki dang puk+ka sI// khaM Da kI dang sha ba ri// d+hi ba rI dang sa ma rI// lha mo brgyad po de dag ni// ji bzhin rim pas rjes su dgod/
160b4(rgyud): ser dang sngo dang de bzhin dmar// dud pa yi ni mdog can te// dmar dang ljang dang dud kha'i mdog/ brgyad pa dkar po nyid yin no// sgo rnams su ni dgod bya ba// khrag thung rdo rje gtum mo dang //
160b5(rgyud): rdo rje sring mchog ma dang ni// rdo rje 'jigs byed drag mo ste// gdul dka' thams cad gsol mdzad cing // thal ba sprin mdog ljang khu dang // dmar dang sngo dang lhag par 'jigs/
160b6(rgyud): brgyad pa'i dbus su chos 'khar gsil// thod pa cang te'u gri gug ste// phrag pa'i steng du gos 'dzin pa'o// sgo rnams su ni lha mo bzhi// thod pa kha T+wAM mi 'jigs pa// chos kyi
160b7(rgyud): 'khar gsil cang te'u// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// yi dgas gdan gyi steng du ni// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// bsod snyoms pa dang chos gos gsum//
161a1(rgyud): phyis mi len dang cog pu pa// gzhi ji bzhin dang stan gcig pa// bla gab med dang shing drung ba// dgon pa pa dang dur khrod pa// khrod pa dang ni bying ba po'o//
161a2(rgyud): 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// sbyangs pa'i yon tan rnam dag sgom// ye shes mnyam pa'i dam tshig mchog/ ro gcig tu ni rnam par sgom// oM shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra he he ru ru ka
161a3(rgyud): AHhuM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma taM g+h+ri huM hUM phaT+Ta/ oM D+wA badz+ra DoM b+hI nI huM hUM phaT/ oM ra rA dza kI tsu hUM phaT/ oM paM pu ka sI huM hUM phaT/ oM khaM kha ta kI tsu hUM phaT/ oM sha sha ba rI hu~M hUM phaT/
161a4(rgyud): oM dzaM dza~M ba ri huM hUM phaT/ oM saM sa ma rI huM hUM phaT/ oM he he ru kA~M huM hUM phaT/ oM br-i badz+ra tsaN+Di huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM badz+ra rAk+Sha sI huM hUM phaT/ oM b+haM badz+ra bai ra bI huM hUM phaT/
161a5(rgyud): kun gcer bu skra grol ba// spyan gsum pa la zhi ba ste// mche ba rnam gtsigs lce bskyod cing // phyag rgya lnga yis sku lus brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can//
161a6(rgyud): bzhad dang zhi ba snying rje dang // sgeg pa dang ni rngam pa dang // drag cing khro ba'i nyams can te// bzlas dang sgom pa spro zhing bsdu// lus ngag yid la bde bar gnas// sems
161a7(rgyud): can mos pa sna tshogs pas// gdul ba'i thabs kyi bde ba yis// yus dang yongs su spyod pa na// bla med ye shes 'bras bu 'thob// sems can thams cad 'di yi bde//
161b1(rgyud): 'chi med bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// ye shes 'bras bu rnyed pa yin// 'di ni sems can thams cad kyis// mchog gi go 'phang thob pa'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla/
161b2(rgyud): ma las/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan bskyed pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// char dbab cho ga'i rim pa ni// pad+ma 'dab ma
161b3(rgyud): brgyad mchog gi/ lte ba ge sar bcas pa la// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa can// phyag brgyad pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'ang rab tu 'jig//
161b4(rgyud): rdo rje mtshon ni gsor mdzad cing // sdigs mdzub zhags par ldan pa dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu dang ni mdung bsnams shing // dpa' bo'i pags pa bsnams
161b5(rgyud): shing 'dzin// cang te'u dang ni brgyad par bshad// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// chu lha 'jigs pa myos pa gnon// zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'ching // sna tshogs rdo rjes
161b6(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i cod pani mchog/ mchus
161b7(rgyud): gnon zhal gdong rnam bsgyur zhing // khro bar blta zhing 'jigs par gzigs// 'dab ma brgyad la klu brgyad bri// mtha' yas dang ni nor rgyas dang // 'jog po pad+ma pad+ma ne/
162a1(rgyud): dung skyong dang ni stobs kyi rgyu// dga' bo dang ri brgyad yin te// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang // ser dang dud pa'i mdog can te// ljang khu dang ni ser po ste/
162a2(rgyud): thal mo sbyar bar byas nas ni// bcom ldan 'das la mngon phyogs pa// 'jigs pas bka' drin slong bar byed// skrag pas blta zhing gnas pa'o// bcom ldan sku lus sngon po can/
162a3(rgyud): 'jigs shing shin tu 'jigs par mdzad// g.yas pa dud kha dmar po ste// g.yon pa ljang khu dud kha'o// steng gi zhal ni mkha' lding gdong // zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa'o// nyi ma
162a4(rgyud): dmar po'i gzi brjid can// nyi ma bcu gnyis nyi mnyam 'od// phag mo de dag gis 'khyud cing // byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// bde chen
162a5(rgyud): mchog ni bcu gnyis pa// gri gug tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // rdo rje dril bu yang dag ldan// lha mo'i mchu ni rnam par 'tshir// gcer bu dbu skra grol ba dang // spyan gsum pa la ska rags
162a6(rgyud): can// 'dzam bu'i chu bo mchog gi sku// gnyis su med par sbyor bar gnas// klu ni rang gi chung mar bcas// chu lha'ang chung mar bcas pa dang // chu lha'i lus ni dkar po can// bka'
162a7(rgyud): drin dag ni slong bar byed// snying khar ye shes 'khor lo dag/ de mdog phyag dang zhal yang skyed// de yi snying khar hUM rI hUM dgod cing // lus ngag yid kyang de bzhin te// klu yi rang snying de nyid
162b1(rgyud): un tshun rnam par dag // gsang sngags rgyal la chags// ma tha tshig smrar bzlas brjod pa// rgyu ba'i 'jam sas rgya mtsho sa// yon pa'am tha mi rjod ni/ rlu
162b2(rgyud): ltesteng ka rnams su ni// zo can khro bo'i bzlas pa bya// yang naklu yi gnas su ro// sgom pa bzlas pa dag la 'jug/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka d+hu dz+nyA nA ga bar ShA ba ya d+hu DA ki ni dz+wal sha ba re drungs
162b3(rgyud): swA hA// 'di dag bsgoms te khri tsam bzla// dus bzhi dag tu steng du'o// zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang // sa rnams kun tu char 'bab 'gyur// dam tshig sbyin sreg mchod dus su/
162b4(rgyud): glu dang gar ni nyer ldan pas// 'o ma dag ni bza' zhing btung // rnal 'byor pas ni klu brgyad bzla// 'o ma'i khrus kyi cho ga yis// 'o mas sbyin sreg sreg blugs bya// 'o ma'i
162b5(rgyud): shing gi bud shing bya// 'o ma'i shing gi yam shing dang // 'o mar bcas pas sbyin sreg bya// bum pa 'o mas yongs su dgang // me sogs mtshams dang phyogs rnams su//
162b6(rgyud): 'o mar bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin// oM aM I nan+ta ya hUM nA hUM swA hA/ oM bau bA su kai hUM rA hUM swAhA/ oM taM tak+Sha ka d+hu rI hUM swA hA/ oM paM pad+ma d+hu nAM hUM sAhA/ oM maM ma hA pad+ma
162b7(rgyud): hUM rA hUM swA hA/ oM shaM shaM kha pA la hUM rA hUM swA hA/ oM ka~M karko Ta hUM nAM hUM swA hA/ oM oM A nan+ta tap+ta hUM rAM hUM swA hA/ oM hUM ba~M ba ru NA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye nA gaM baR+ShA pa ya hUM rAM hUM swA hA/
163a1(rgyud): 'di bzlas khro ba dang bcas pa// kun gyi bzlas pa khri tsam bya// 'o ma 'bras rnying zas su bza'// dbang po thul cing yongs mi smra// bri gzugs spangs
163a2(rgyud): pa'i mngon sum du// khri tsam bzlas na mngon du 'gyur// mngon sum du ni dngos grub cing // smras pa tsam gyis char 'bebs te// 'di la the tshom ma byed cig/ dngul gyi snod kyi nang
163a3(rgyud): du ni yungs kar dang ni chu blugs la// de la nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du yongs su bzlas te/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs la dri chu dang 'o ma bsres pas khrus byas te/ chu'i bram gyi
163a4(rgyud): sa sbrus pa las klu'i gzugs byas la nub tu mgo bstan te/ mgo bo dgu la chus dbang bskur te/ de nas chu bo'i nang du gzhug go// de ma thag tu lhas char 'bebs shing / 'dzam bu'i
163a5(rgyud): gling du char 'bebs 'gyur// sa rnams 'bru yis gang 'gyur zhing // nags tshal rnams ni 'phel bar byed// sems can thams cad bde reg nas// phan tshun khro ba'i gzugs can ni//
163a6(rgyud): bdag bsgoms rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas// gang gi snying kha kho nar ni// he ru rdo rje bsgoms pa yis// char pa yang ni 'bab par 'gyur// ri'i steng du 'dzegs te rtse gsum pa la yongs su/
163a7(rgyud): bzlas na ser ba gcod par 'gyur ro// cang te'u la yongs su bzlas ni ma mched pa'i me rengs par 'gyur ro// zhags pa la yongs su bzlas na 'gugs par byed do// thod pa la yongs su
163b1(rgyud): bzlas na khrag 'bugs par byed do// dgra sta la yongs su bzlas na gsod par byed do// kha T+wAM ga la yongs su bzlas na zhi bar byed do// gri bug la yongs su bzlas na 'jig rten gsum du d+hU ba
163b2(rgyud): gsod par byed do// mgo bo la yongs su bzlas na 'chi ba slong bar byed do// rdo rje gsor zhing yongs su bzlas na sa 'og gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dril bu la yongs su bzlas na mi dga' ba yong
163b3(rgyud): su 'gugs par byed do// glang po che'i pags pa la yongs su bzlas te bting na bar snang la 'phur bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad stong phrag brgyar 'gro zhing slar ldog go// phyag rgya drug la yongs
163b4(rgyud): su bzlas na pha rol gyi mdun du mi snang bar 'gyur ro// sa steng du ni kun spyod cing // ci bde bar ni gnas par 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las char dbab
163b5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba mchog ni mdor bsdus nas// skad cig gis ni bdag sgom pa/
163b6(rgyud): he ru ka dpal gzugs su bya// sngo zhing drag po rnam bsgyur ba// drag po spyan gsum zhal drug mchog/ zla ba phyed pa ral pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rje dbu mchog la// zod
163b7(rgyud): pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'phreng bas dbu rgyan can// sku lo mgo bo'i do shal can// phyag rgya drug gis rnam par brgyad// stag gi pags pa gos sum nabs/
164a1(rgyud): phag mo yis ni sku la brgyan// zhabs gcig pa ni bzhengs pa ste// g.yas pa ser la dud pa'i mdog/ g.yon pa dmar la ljang khu'o// steng gi zhal ni/
164a2(rgyud): rta gdong ste// dkar zhing sbyin mdog drag cing 'jigs// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo'i chu ni 'chir ba ste// rgyal ba'i pags pa gos su mnabs// mkha' 'gro ma
164a3(rgyud): yi rigs 'dzin cing // thod pa dang ri kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje mtshon gyis brgyan pa ste// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// cang te'u dang ni mgo bo 'dzin// gri gug zhags/
164a4(rgyud): pa de bzhin te// phyag ni bcu gnyis dag tu bshad// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // zhabs gcig tu ni rnam par sgom// glang po'i gdong dang byi'u'i gdong // seng ge'i gdong
164a5(rgyud): yang de bzhin te// dang po khyi yi gdong yin te// gnyis pa 'ug pa'i gdong yang yin// gsum pa phag gi gdong yin te// bzhi pa khra yi gdong yin no// gnas kyi dbyibs ni chos bdag/
164a6(rgyud): nyid sna tshogs gzugs ni chen po 'dzin// mtha' yas rnam rgyal grags pa ste// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad pa// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sku lus 'chang // de bzhin sgom zhing rnam
164a7(rgyud): sgom ste// sna tshogs gzugs can rin chen bzhin// bdag nyid chen po rnam par rol// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa
164b1(rgyud): lnga ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang ba shad b+hu ba// phag mo'i mchog ni sgrub pa ste// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid rtsom ning rnam par gros/
164b2(rgyud): rgyu ni nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi// sku lus sin dur 'dra mi g.yo// me tog ban du ka lta bu// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// rgyun rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sems dpa'
164b3(rgyud): skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// dbu skra mdzes par 'khril ba ste// thabs kyi zhal mchu rnam 'chir zhing // mda' dang
164b4(rgyud): gzhu ni 'dzin pa ste// rna ba'i mthar zug 'gengs par byed// zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// lcags kyu mchog gis 'gugs pa ste// pad+ma dmar mo'i dbus bzhugs shing // 'dod pa thams
164b5(rgyud): cad rab tu stsol// yang na phyag ni bcu gnyis pa// zhal drug lha mo'i sku lus 'byung // steng gi zhal ni phag rgod gdong // drag po gzi brjid 'jigs pa'i gzi// shar gyi 'dab la rdo
164b6(rgyud): rje gsang ba'i mchog/ g.yon pa'i phyogs su rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ nub kyi phyogs su rdo rje gzi brjid mchog/ lho yi phyogs su rdo rje rin chen mchog/ me yi phyogs su rdo rje ye shes
164b7(rgyud): mchog/ bden thal phyogs su rdo rje rig mchog ma// rlung gi phyogs su rdo rje grub mchog sa// dbang ldan phyogs su rdo rje thal mchog sa// sgo la rdo rje 'bar mchog ma// rdo rje
165a1(rgyud): gzi brjid mchog ma ste// rdo rje khro bo mche ma dang // rdo rje mche ba mchog/ lha mo de dag thams cad kyang // dmar ba'i mdog can zhal gsum pa// phyag drug pa
165a2(rgyud): la spyan gsum pa// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs// dbu skra dag ni grol ba ste// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam brgyan cing // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rang gi lus kyis thabs
165a3(rgyud): la 'khril// zhags pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// grwa bzhi dag tu mda' gzhu dag/ yongs su 'gengs pa gnas par bzhag/ sgo ru g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis
165a4(rgyud): bzhugs// gcer bu rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje gsor zhing sdigs mdzub dang // zhags pa dang ni yang dag ldan// gzhan yang phan
165a5(rgyud): tshun dag tu yang // ji ltar 'khor la sogs phyag 'tshal// de snying ye shes lha mo ni// sku gsung thugs dang bcas par sgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// chos kyi ron
165a6(rgyud): mnyam par thim// ye shes bzlas pa spros nas ni// cho ga'i rim pas yang dag bsdu// dam tshig mchog gi bzlas pa yis// zla ba'i de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// oM shrI badz+ra bA rA hi/
165a7(rgyud): A baM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra gu h+ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra sa ma ya ut+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra te dzet+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra rat+not+ta me huM hUM phaT swA hA/
165b1(rgyud): oM shrI badz+ra dz+nyA not+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra bid+yA ud+d+ha me tsu hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra sid+d+hot+ta me huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra b+has+phot+ta me tsu hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra dz+wa lod+d+ha me dz+wa hu hUM paH
165b2(rgyud): swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra a mr-i tot+ta me tsU chu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI badz+ra kro d+hot+ta me ba~M huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI badz+ra deSh+Tot+ta me hoHhuM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis// bsgom pa dang ni bzlas
165b3(rgyud): pa bya bsdu dang spro ba byas nas ni// chos rnams kun dang chos can ni// rang gi lha yi sbyor bas dag/ sems can thams cad rab tu brtag/ rnal 'byor gnas ni chos yin te// gsang
165b4(rgyud): ba gsum la rab tu gzhug/ gsang gsum gnas ni chos yin te// chos kyang de bzhin de lta bu// bdag med chos ni chos yin te// chos las chos ni yod ma yin// mngon par brjod/
165b5(rgyud): ba'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba gsum gyi dam tshig gi mchog ces bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor/
165b6(rgyud): ma drug cho ga'i rim// pad+ma 'dab lnga bris nas ni// lte ba ge sar khyab par ni// de yi dbus su phag mo ni// dmar zhing sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug
165b7(rgyud): mdzes// spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ skyil krung phyed pa gar dang bcas// phyag rgya drug gis
166a1(rgyud): sku brgyan cing // mgo bo'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ste// gdug pa'i bdud ni thams cad dang // dus mtshan la srub byas pa la// nabs kyis kyang ni mnan par bzhugs/
166a2(rgyud): dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par brgyan// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// zhags pa lcags kyu phyag na bsnams// mgo bo dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dngos grub tham
166a3(rgyud): cad rab tu stsol// snying khar ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs su sbyor las byung // shar phyogs lha mo ya mi ni// g.yon du bskor nas rnam par dgod// rmongs byed ma dang
166a4(rgyud): skyod byed ma// skrag byed ma dang tsan+ti ka/ spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang // ljang khu dud pa'i mdog can te// zod pa dang /
166a5(rgyud): ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog/ mgo bo'i 'phreng bas
166a6(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'chang // thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba ste// gnyis med sbyor bas mnyam par ldan// rdo rje sems sogs mchog de nyid// phag mo dang ni
166a7(rgyud): rdo rje sems// ya mi ni dang rnam snang mdzad// rmongs byed ma dang pad+ma'i gar// skyong byed ma dang khrag 'thung ste// skrag byed rdo rje nyi ma dang // tsaN+Di ka dang rta mchog ste// rdo rje sems
166b1(rgyud): spu dkar po ste// rnam par snang mdzad ser po yin// pad+ma gar dbang dmar po ste// he ru gdapal sngon po yin// rdo rje nyi ma dmar po ste/ d+ha mchog dag ni ldang bu'o// yang nas sor/
166b2(rgyud): bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' zhal gsum pa// phyag drug spyan ni gsum pa ste// phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// rdo rje dril bu thod kha T+wAM// ral gri cang te'u mgo bo 'chang //
166b3(rgyud): na ra'i pags mnabs gar dang bcas// rnam snang la sogs dpa' bo kun// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM dang // cang te'u rdol bus mtshan pa'i mchog
166b4(rgyud): yang na thams cad phyag bcu gnyis// zhal gdong drug par bsgom par bya// de dag gsang sngags 'di yin te// oM shrI oM ba bi huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrA hAM yo ya huM hUM phaT swAhA
166b5(rgyud): oM shrI hU~M mo maM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM shrI hreM hriM saM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI hUM hUM saM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM shrI phaT phaT tsa huM hUM phaT swAhA/ de dag ni rnal 'byor ma drug gi gsang sngags so//
166b6(rgyud): oM heHbaM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na maHhi b+hu hUM phaT swA hA/ oM swa ha hu hri huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bo ShaT he hi huM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM ho tra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM phaT haM hUM hu hUM phaT swAH/
166b7(rgyud): 'di ni dpa' bo drug gi sngags// bzlas pa dang ni bsgoms tsam gyis// 'khor lo drug ni mchog grub cing // 'khor lo sgyur ba thob pa ste// 'khor lo sgyur drug rgyal por 'gyur//
167a1(rgyud): mi 'pham rgyal ba yang dag rdzogs// stobs chen rtsal mchog rnyed pa yin// phyag mtshan drug la rtag mchod cing // cho ga bzhin du mngon bsngags na// de ni myur du
167a2(rgyud): grub nas ni// rnal 'byor rgyal po mchog kyang thob// mi snang la sogs grub nas ni// khams gsum dag tu rnam par dpyod// 'gro ba drug gi sems can grol// bsgoms pas
167a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin dang mtshungs// yang na 'khor lo zung drug la// bde ba chen po rnam snang mdzad// 'jam pa'i rdo rje 'chang rgyal po// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag po ni// gur kum gyi ni
167a4(rgyud): mdog lta bu// gzi mdangs 'bar ba'i 'od can te// phyag rgya che dang yang dag ldan// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang ngo bo// rdo rje dril bu dang ldan pa'i// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i
167a5(rgyud): phyag gis 'khyud// ral gri po ti kha T+wAM ga/ thod pa lcags kyu zhags pa dang // ut+pa la dang cang te'u// gur kum mdog dang sngo ba dang // dmar dang ljang khu steng zhal dkar// chos/
167a6(rgyud): kyi dbyings ni dag pa che// sems can khams ni rab grol byed// shar sogs g.yon skor dgod pa ni// rta mchog rtsa ba'i ka dang bcas// de dag de ru dgod byas pas// 'jam pa'i
167a7(rgyud): rdo rje rang nyid grug/ da ka ra dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo dang dmar dang dka ra sngo ljang // yan lag drug tu dpa' bo dag/ mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig bcas// rdo rje sems dang
167b1(rgyud): pag mo dang // rnam snang mdzad dang la mi ni// pad+ma gar dbang rmongs byed bcas// khrag 'thung dang ni skyod byed pa// rdo rje nyi ma skrag byed ma// ljang dang dud pa'i mdog can te// de lha'i sku
167b2(rgyud): mdog rnam par sgom// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa'o// lha mo rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o// zod pa dang ni gri gug 'dzin// dpa' bo thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ rang gi phyag mtshan gnyis med sbyor/
167b3(rgyud): dril bu lhan cig yang dag ldan// cang te'u ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu
167b4(rgyud): rgyan can// mgo bo'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// thams cad yi dgas stong du bzhugs// dbus su 'jigs byed dus mtshan dag/ lha mo byin pa gnyis kyis 'khril// skra grol ba la phyogs
167b5(rgyud): gos can// snying khar ye shes dam tshig ni// sku gsung thugs dang rnam par sbyar// go cha gnyis par yang dag sbyar// gnas kyi 'khor lo bsgoms nas ni// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma
167b6(rgyud): rnams dgod// gsang ba gsum ni snying khar gnas// khwa gdong la sogs mkha' 'gro ma// phyi rol sgo ru rnam par dgod// zur du gshin rje sreg la sogs// thams cad gcer bu rnam
167b7(rgyud): par sgom// sngar bshad mdog dang phyag mtshan te// yi dgas gdan la yang dag bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// drag po sgra ni grol ba ste// thams cad thod pa'i
168a1(rgyud): 'phreng bcan// rang gi phyi dang nang du yang // pha rol phyin drug rnam par dag/ sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// spro zhing bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i 'khor ma/
168a2(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma bzlas na// sgom zhing rab tu bsgom par bya// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs spros nas// 'gro ba gsum po rdzogs par bya// nang gi bdag nyid bsgoms
168a3(rgyud): pa yis// 'khor lo gsum gsang bsgoms nas bzlas// de nyid gsung dang sngags lhan cog/ dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro ma// huM hUM phaT ni mtha' ru ste// 'khor lo gsum gyi bzlas pa bya//
168a4(rgyud): rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// dam tshig can gyis de bzlas bya// oM shrI many+dzu badz+ra AHhuM maM huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha badz+ra satwa huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM baM badz+ra bA ra hi huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM na maHhi badz+ra bai ro
168a5(rgyud): tsan huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM ha yoM ya mi na huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM swA hA hu pad+ma nerte shwa ra huM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM dr-I moM mo ti na huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bau ShaT he he ru ru kaM huM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM hreM hri sany+tsa la ni tsuhUM
168a6(rgyud): pan+ya swAhA/ ma hUM hUM ho badz+ra sUr+dz+dza hu~M sU phaT swA hA/ oM d+hu sa trA sa ni tsu hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM phaT ha~M pa ra mA shwa n+ya hUM phaT swAhA/ oM phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka hu hU phaT swAhA/ oM kA kA s+ye hu~M hUM phaT+Ta swAhA/
168a7(rgyud): oM su lU kA s+ye hu~M hUM phaT/ oM shA nA s+ye hu~M hU~M phaT/ oM sU ka rA s+ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dA b+hI ye huM hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dU tI me hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM ya ma dodz+dza NI ma tsu hUM phaT/ oM ya ma mtha nI maM/
168b1(rgyud): hUM hUM phaT/ g.yon dang g.yas kyi lag gnyis su// go cha gnyis po bkod nas ni// gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa ru// las rnams thams cad byed pa yin// the tshom med par las byas na/
168b2(rgyud): nges par dngos grub gzhan du min// yang na mgon po sa bcu'i dbang // pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab drug pa ste//
168b3(rgyud): thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang // ye shes sgo skyong rnam dag pa'o// rab tu dga' dang dri ma med// 'od byed pa dang 'od 'phro can// sbyangs dka' ba dang mngon du gyur// ring du song dang mi
168b4(rgyud): g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros chos kyi sprin// 'di yis rnam par dag pa sgom// gshin rje sreg sogs bzhi po ni// 'phags pa'i bden par rnam par sgom// sdug bsngal dang ni kun 'byung
168b5(rgyud): dang / 'gog pa dang ni lam rnams te// bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpal// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnam dag ste// ye shes rang gi ngo bo yin// 'di ltar rnam par dag par sgom//
168b6(rgyud): gnyis su med par sbyor ba 'am// gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba ste// rnal 'byor stobs kyis gsang ba mchog/ sgrub pas rjes su bstan pa dang // ji bzhin bdag po'i
168b7(rgyud): dbye ba dang // bla ma'i rim pa legs par brlabs// 'di ltar cho ga gnyis med pa// sbyor ba'i dam tshig mchog yin te// dngos grub kun gyi thabs kyi rgyu// rnal 'byor ma thugs
169a1(rgyud): gsang ba che// las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu ster// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gnyis su med pa'i go cha'i sbyor ba bskyed pa'i sgom pa'i le'u
169a2(rgyud): ste sum cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// brda ni mchog tu gsang ba ste// brda ni yongs su mi shes par// sbyor ba'i dngos grub mi 'grub ste//
169a3(rgyud): 'di ni nges par shes pa na// dngos grub 'grub par the tsom med// dA zhes bya ba skyes bur bshad// ngi zhes bya ba bud med yin// pu zhes bya ba gnod pa yin// su zhes bya ba za ba nyid// ma zhes/
169a4(rgyud): bya ba ma ru bshad// ya zhes bya ba chung ma nyid// b+hi zhes bya ba sring mo yin// b+hi zhes bya ba mdza' mor bshad// lu zhes bya ba bu mo yin// sri zhes bya ba khrag tu bshad// so ni zhi ba'i btung
169a5(rgyud): ba yin// pe zhes bya ba zug pa ste// pi zhes bya ba de bzhin sha/ ba zhes bya ba za ba yin// b+hu zhes bya ba 'dres pa yin// pa zhes bya ba dur khrod yin// du zhes bya ba ro yin no// nI zhes
169a6(rgyud): bya ba rnal 'byor ma// gA zhes bya ba lA ma min// tri zhes bya ba gzugs can ma// ku zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro ma// ha ni khaN+Da ro nyid ma// dza zhes bya ba byin pa gnyis// ba zhes bya ba
169a7(rgyud): gsong por swa// swa zhes bya ba legs 'ongs yin// mi zhes bya ba nya yin la// byo zhes bya ba bza' ba min// phyo zhes bya ba btung ba min// ga na~M bgrod dang bgrod min yin// ka zhes
169b1(rgyud): bya ba 'dod pa yin// sa zhes bya ba gzhan du 'gro// ra zhes bya ba khyo med mo// du zhes bya ba spyod ngan mo// su zhes bya ba skal bzang po// na zhes bya ba skal ngan ma// sa zhes bya ba dam tshig can/
169b2(rgyud): a nes bya ba dam tshig med// i zhes bya ba 'ongs pa yin// mnas bya ba ma 'ongs yod// so zhes bya ba chags pa yin// 'di dag yi ge'i brda yin te// dbang bskur dus su rnal 'byor
169b3(rgyud): pas bza' dang bza' med sbyin par bya// dbang bskur ba ni mchog yin te// dam tshig mchog no shes pa dang // dam tshig can gyi dam tshig duH// dam tshig 'khor lo 'dus pa dang /
169b4(rgyud): dad pa rnams la sbyin par bya// ma dad pa la sbyin mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ brda'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan/
169b5(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// rnal 'byor ma yi mtshan nyid ni// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// sgrub pa po yis dngos grub thob// bud med pad rtsa ltar dkar zhing // pad+ma'i 'dab ltar dkyus
169b6(rgyud): ring mig/ rtag tu gos ni dkar la dga'// tsan dan gsar pa'i dri dang ldan// bde gshegs 'dus pa nyid la dga'// de rigs las byung shes par bya// bud gang btso ma'i gser
169b7(rgyud): 'dra zhing // dmar dang ser ba'i gos la dga'// dzA ti tsam pa'i dri dang ldan// de yang bzang po'i rjes 'gror 'gyur// thams cad ut+pal ltar sngo bsangs// dri dang gos
170a1(rgyud): ni sngo la dga'// ut+pal sngon po'i dri yod pa// de ni dpa' bo bzang rjes 'gro// bud med pad dkar 'dra mdog gang // rtag tu pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i dri// de yang de bzhin/
170a2(rgyud): dpa' mo'i blo// dbar zhing ser skya'i bud med gang // gzugs bzang gos ni dmar ba dang // ma la ki dang ut+pal dri// de ni rdo rje'i rigs byung yin// ser zhing ltung ba'i bud med
170a3(rgyud): gang dgos ni dkar la dga' ba dang // mgo la me tog dri dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs rigs rjes 'gro yin// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// de mdog can gyi gos 'chang zhing //
170a4(rgyud): rtag tu ga pu ra dri dang ldar// rnam snang rigs kyi rjes 'gro zhing // rnal 'byor ma yi rigs rnams ni// de ltar bdun po ngas bshad pa// g.yon pa'i kun spyod la rtag dga'// rang gi
170a5(rgyud): mdog gis rigs drug ldar// rigs kyi rig pa'i yi ge yang // kha dog drug tu 'gyur ba yin// rang gi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang // rang rig las byung tshig tu smra// g.yon las 'gro ba'i bud
170a6(rgyud): med gang // rnal 'byor pa la g.yon la brtag/ lag pa g.yon gyis mtshon pa dang // g.yor ras lta bas rnam par blta// lha mo rnams dang gang smra ba// de ni dam tshig ldan par bshad//
170a7(rgyud): bud med gang byas de nyan cing // rigs kyi sa bon rab tu smra// rigs kyi bya ba mi spong ste// rang gi bstan bshad mi 'dor la// rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// de ni dam tshig ldan
170b1(rgyud): bar bshad// phyag 'tshal ba ni gang 'ching ba// g.yon pa'i lus kyi rtag tu 'dud// lha mo rnams dang kur smra ba// de ni nges par bde bar 'gro// mthe bong g.yon pas sa la ni// rkang /
170b2(rgyud): pas ri mo 'dri byed cing // mgo ni sprug par byed pa dang // zur gyis blta zhing lag pa ston// sgrub pa po la khyad par du// de yis rang rig dran pa dang // 'khur ba 'am ko k+ko dag dang ni/
170b3(rgyud): sna dag tu ni thal mo ston// zur gyis blta zhing lan cig bsngags// zlos shing rigs la rnam par blta// bden par 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor ma// nges par dam tshig can yin no// de nas
170b4(rgyud): rnyed dka' rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// bdud rtsi lnga rnams yang dag 'byung // ya mi ni dang skrag byed ma// 'dod ldan phag mo 'jigs gzugs ma// kun tu spyod pa ba
170b5(rgyud): su ra rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bdun// mdor bsdus rang mtshan bshad pa yin// gzugs can ma dang tsum pa ki/ lA ma yongs gyur byis bcas mo// mi ldog e hi ka lha mo// mkha'
170b6(rgyud): 'gro ma ni bdun du bshad// mngon par zhen pas blta ba dang // smin ma 'degs par gar byed cing // sngon bzhin gzugs ni sdud byed la// phyis ni 'jigs par byed pa dag/ gzugs
170b7(rgyud): can ma ni yin par bshad// gnyis med dpa' bos bsnyen par bya// sdug pa'am yang na mi sdug pa// byis pa 'khyud cing tsum pa na// de ni tsum pa kar shes bya// mkha' 'gro mchog
171a1(rgyud): kyang de nyid yin// zas mi lta bar zur du blta// khro gnyer dang ni gdong dag dang // smin ma bsgyur zhing sdigs mdzub dang // 'di ni gzhan yang dbugs mi 'byin/
171a2(rgyud): 'jigs par byed pa gang yin pa// de ni lA ma yin par bstan// phag dang dred dang byi la dang // ce spyang ri dgas rta dgas dang // thams cad der ni 'jigs byed pa// yongs su gyur par de
171a3(rgyud): bshad de// shin tu dga' bas dgod pa dang // song nas slar yang mi ldog la// rjes su rigs pas gsal bar dgod// dum skyes mar ni de bshad do// yid ni kun tu skyo ba dang // rkang pa
171a4(rgyud): lag pas bong ba 'am// gos mtha' ma yang na shing dag gis// des reg pa ni 'tsho mi 'gyur// mi ldog par ni shes bya ste// sgrub min par ni de bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma yi rigs phyag
171a5(rgyud): rgya dpa' bos bsnyen cing mtshan ma blta// thod pa dgra sta mche ba dang // ral gri kun tu skrag byed yin// rdo rje dang ni dung nyid dang // rigs kyi phyag rgya yin par bshad// mngon par

171b1(rgyud): zhi ba dang // zhen pas blta ba'i rjes 'gro ba// bud med gang gi sen mo dmar// mig ni kun tu zhen pa dang // khyim du pad+ma 'dri ba ni// pad+ma gar dbang rigs 'byung yin// smin pa
171b2(rgyud): dbus na rtse gsum yod// lus ni sngo bsangs smra ba dang // rtag tu rdo rje rigs bsgob pa// gang gi khyim du rdo rje 'dri// rtag par mchod pa byed pa yi// mkha' 'gro ma de dpal ldan mi
171b3(rgyud): he ru ka yi rigs byung yin// gang gi dpral bar rtse gsum ni// mdung zung dag ni snang 'gyur zhing // mig dmar mdog ni dmar ser dang // de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dper// ra skyes khyim bya

171b5(rgyud): 'khor lo gang gi dpral ba 'am// lag par yang ni snang 'gyur ba// sprin sngon dag dang 'dra ba ni// rtag tu dpral bar 'chang byed pa// skal ba chen po kun tshogs shing // mchog

171b7(rgyud): sman gnag 'dra zhing // so ni dkar zhing mtho ba dang // rtag tu gdug par gyur pa dang // sems stobs ldan par gyur pa dang // rtag tu khrus la dga' ba dang // mang du smra bar mi
172a1(rgyud): byed cing // khyim du rdo rje 'dri ba dang // rtag tu dge bas mchod byed pa// rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba// stong phrag bcu dang lnga pa yin// ser zhing gser gyi mdog

172b1(rgyud): yang dag pashad pa yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud za ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma'i mtshan nyid kyi le'u sde bani bcu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang ba shad b+ha ga/

172b6(rgyud): bzang dpal yon tan// ser zhing tsam pa lta bur snang // shin tu ring min thung ba'ang min// sna tshogs pa yi gos la dga'// dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing // mtshams kyi
172b7(rgyud): gyen du bltas pa nas// rgod cing dga' ba nyid dag dang // lam ni rnam par gnon cing gnas// g.yul du mchi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'// de lta'i rab dregs

173a2(rgyud): lan ni yin par bshad// bcu bzhi dang ni tshis brgyad ni// de yi dus tshogs yin par bshad// khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang // bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug lAm
173a3(rgyud): yi/ mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gang gi mkhur tshes dag tu ni// khung bur snang ba gnas gyur cing // de bzhin rtag tu dmar zhing ser// mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang // sgra ni de bzhin

173b1(rgyud): yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te// de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dri// shrI he ru ka lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa de dag yin// lus kun la ni ba

174a1(rgyud): las ni 'ongs zhes pa'o// gang zhig khar ni sor mo 'dzud// zos zin zhes ni smra ba yin// gang zhig lce ni bskyod pa dag/ za'o zhes ni smra ba yin// gang

176b1(rgyud): rlo ni shes pa'o// na ha ni sprin no// d+hu pa ni bdug pa'o// sa nu ni ri bo'o// sa ri ta ni chu bo'o// a gu li ni yan lag go// ba da na ni gdong ngo // dza ti ki ni l+ye'o//

177a2(rgyud): 'phel byed pa// rtag par dngos grub rnams kyi rgyu// dam tshig rnams kyang skyong ba'o// lha mo gzhan dag kun sbyor ba'i// 'dod la rmongs par gyur pa dang // gnyis su med dang thogs
177a3(rgyud): med dang // dam tshig spyad par spyad pa dang // bud med dbang phyug shin tu sbyor// tshangs par spyod pa de bzhin bzhi// khro med rgyun gyi kun tu spyod// 'di brgyad dam tshig kun spyod yin//
177a4(rgyud): bsgrub pa la ni gnas pa yi// sgrub pa po yos rtag shes bya// rgyud kun gyi ni thun mong ste// rgyu med pa ni gzhom mi bya// dad pa nyid kyis blang bya yi// mig dang lag pas ma yin no//
177a5(rgyud): gsong ba 'di ni mi ldan cing // rab tu 'bad de sra bar bya// blo ldan mthe'u chung bskyod par ni// pho nya mo rnams yang dag gnas// ngag dang ma dag 'dres pa ste// sgrub pa po ni gsum du
177a6(rgyud): gnas// mnyes byed rnam par dag pa dang // gsal byed yon tan ldan pa'i ma'o// yul yul du ni dka' thub can// pho nya'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma brtag/ pho nya ral gri so 'dra zhing /
177a7(rgyud): dag byed bsod nams 'phel byed yid// de bzhin po nya legs 'dres pas// sgrub pa po las dngos grub thob// bzlas mchod pasam gtan med par yang // myur ba nyid du 'grub par/
177b1(rgyud): 'gyur// sngags dang phyag rgya sgrub pa pos// mchod pa nyid la rab tu 'jug/ 'di las gzhan pa'i mchod med de// de ltar bstan bcos nges pa yin// pho nya'i lam la dga' ba dang /
177b2(rgyud): sgrub pa po ni dngos grub brtson// rig sngags phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// zas la rtag tu spyad par bya// sgrub po yi ni legs pa ru// mnyam par gzhag pa'i rigs rnams ni// kun la nye bar
177b3(rgyud): spyad bya zhing // bza' min par ni mi brtag go/ 'di nyid du ni de dbyer med// pho nya mo yi sgrub po gnyis// dngos grub cho ga la spyod tshe// pho nya gcig po kho na yin// byang chub phyogs kyi dngos
177b4(rgyud): grub ni// sgrub pa dag dang nye ba dang // bla ma brgyud rim gyis thob pa'i// dbang bskur bas ni sngags legs ldan// pho nya rnams su yang dag bshad// phyag rgya legs sbyor ngang tshul
177b5(rgyud): dang / chags med gtong dang tshul khrims dang // ye shes chu skyes yang dag rdzogs// sems kyi bdag nyid nang par langs// lus kyi bya ba kun byas te// lus la shin tu mtshon cha ni//
