177b6(rgyud): lus la gnas par kun tu spyad// dag byed byas pa'i lus kyis ni// rtag tu sngags ni brjod par bya// rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan cing // mtshon cha rnams kyi bsgom mi bya//
177b7(rgyud): dam tshig can la khro mi bya// mngon par brtson las 'da' mi bya// de dang lhan cig bde bar bya// bdag gi don dang gzhan don du// dam tshig spyod pa nyid du bya// 'di la lhar
178a1(rgyud): cig longs spyod bya// mtshan mo rtag par nam mkha'i gos// gnag dang dmar bar rtag 'gyur bya// srog chags yan lag las byung gyon// bde ba 'dod pas bde thob/
178a2(rgyud): 'gyur// mchod phyir thogs ni yongs spangs gtsang // shrI he ru kas byin brlabs pas// phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// dus kun tu ni yang dag gnas// rigs dang rigs min ngor
178a3(rgyud): mi blta// spyi gtsug la sogs bcing ba spang // pho nya gtsang sbra dang po yin// gnyis pa sbyor ba yin par 'dod// zas gcig tu ni za ba nyid// gtsang sbra gsum pa yin par bshad//
178a4(rgyud): gtsang sbra 'di dag rab sbyangs pas// gtsang ma'i dag pa'i rim thob na// dngos grub gang la 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus las gang gsungs dang // de bzhin bde mchog las gang gsum/
178a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i rgyud las yang dag bshad// de bzhin dpal mchog dang po dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed nyid las gsungs// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sogs pa 'grub// de 'dir bsam
178a6(rgyud): gtan tsam gyis ni// sngags pas skad cig gis 'grub 'gyur// rnal 'byor lam la dga' bas kyang // gtsang sbra 'di ni yang dag spyad// bsod nams gtsang sbra las byung
178a7(rgyud): gang / sgrub pa'i yon tan rgya chen po// stong phrag gcig pa'i zhal min par// kha cig gis ni brjod mi nus// dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che// rnam dag mtshan nyid kun
178b1(rgyud): sgrub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams chu 'thung ba// dag byed sdig pa 'jigs byed yin// reg pa dang ni smras pas kyang // sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // lus ngag skyon ni med pa yi//
178b2(rgyud): gang zhig spyod pa byed pa yi// mi mchog sdig pa thams cad ni// rnam dag bdag nyid bde gshegs kyi// sa rnams kyang ni thob par 'gyur// skye zhing skye bar de bzhin gshegs//
178b3(rgyud): rigs 'gyur chos ldan rgyal por 'gyur// de ltar rtag tu mchod byas nas// dad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin// de nas mchod pa rnam dag pas// mya ngan 'das las byung dpa' bo// de bzhin /
178b4(rgyud): bdag nyid mchod pa dang // sangs rgyas kun tshogs sras bcas dang // dpa' bo kun dang rnal 'byor ma// brtan pa dag dang g.yo ba dang // spun gyi mchod pa'i dus 'dzin pa// zla ba'i
178b5(rgyud): dus la gnas pa yi// spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu// bde dang sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba// sngags dang de bzhin phyag rgya dang // ye shes de ni bstan mi bya// dag byed zas la spyod pa mi// /
178b6(rgyud): rtag tu dam tshig spyod byas 'gyur// gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya// man ngag rnam par nyams mi bya// dam tshig gnas la ci rigs par// man ngag rnams kyang sbyin par bya//
178b7(rgyud): pho nya ma gtogs gzhan dag la// 'dod pa rmongs par 'gro mi byed// rtag tu pho nya chags bral ba// mi 'da' yis longs spyod bya// skye gnas dman la mi gnas pa// bsnyen
179a1(rgyud): bkur nyid ni bya ba min// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma pho nya mo nyid gnas// 'khor lo 'am de bzhin grub pa la// dka' ba nges par zad par 'gyur/
179a2(rgyud): mchog dang tha ma lhan cig 'gugs// de ltar rdzas ni rnam nges yin// rnal 'byor pa rtag g.yon nas spyod// rkang pa g.yon pa sngon du 'dor// lag pa g.yon pa yongs su bsgyur//
179a3(rgyud): g.yon gyi phyed ni rab mchod byed// lus ni g.yon ni rnam par gnon// g.yon pa yis ni tshim dang za// brtul zhugs ma nyams brtul zhugs rdzogs// sgrub pa po ni dam tshig brtson// dam
179a4(rgyud): tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // lhan cig zas la spyod par byed// rigs lnga la ni kun spyod pa'i// rigs ni rnam pa bzhi ru bsgrags// rigs gcig la ni kun spyod pa'i// rnal 'byor sgrub/
179a5(rgyud): la rab tu mchod// ba lang sha dang rta sha dang // khyi sha dag dang sna tshogs pas// dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas na ni// sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par 'jig/ de bzhin dpa' bo rnams kyi zas//
179a6(rgyud): sngags pas phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// shrI he ru ka'i sprul pa yi// nyer spyod bstan bcos kun la brtag/ rtag tu de dag gzung zhing srung // las rnams dag ni thams cad la/ ba gegs/
179a7(rgyud): med ji bzhin 'grub 'gyur bar// 'di ni gzhan dag 'gyur ma yin// 'di ni pho nya mchog bzang po// brtson nang lhan cig ldan pa yin// ma chags dga' ba'i longs spyod rdzogs//
179b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor rdzas kyi rnam dbye nyid// bla ma'i man ngag la dga' zhing // de yi don ni mchog mtshungs pa'o// spun dang yang na pha dang ni// bdag po nyid du skad cig mthong // lce sbom mig ni/
179b2(rgyud): dmar ser la// rtsub cing spun ni dbar ser yin// dngos grub kun byi thun mong du// bzlas dang brtul zhugs la rtag dga'// dran pa dang ni yang dge ldan// pho nya la sogs gnas
179b3(rgyud): dang bcas// mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras rab ster// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa'i// rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i
179b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum// rnal 'byor 'bras bu rab ster ba// gsang sngags 'di las byung ba yin// sngags dang phyag rgyar yang dag ldan// phyag rgya dang bral gsang sngags ni// lus
179b5(rgyud): can rnams la byin mi rlob// ji srid 'gro ba'i bya ba dag/ shin tu sbyor bas rtogs par bya// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa// rnal 'byor pa la gang zhig sdang // khyi yi skye gnas
179b6(rgyud): brgyar skye ste// sme sha can du skye bar 'gyur// dper na la la mar 'dod pas// 'bad pas chu ni bsrubs gyur kyang // mar gsar 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi// lus nyon mongs pa kho nor zad//
179b7(rgyud): 'dzin tsong mchod par byed pa ni// 'tsho ba'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pa'i// rnal 'byor gzhan la rten pa ni// gzhan du de bzhin don med 'gyur// rnal 'byor cha mchog dpa' bo ni// yul phyogs gang //
180a1(rgyud): na gnas gyur pa// rigs ngan kla klo yin na yang // yul de yongs su brtags pa yin// sems can rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur// de rung ni rtag tu gnas// mngon
180a2(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ pho nya'i grangs kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po mchog
180a3(rgyud): dpa' bo rnams kyi khyad par ni// gang zhig dran pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po g.yo byed cing // rjes su dran pa tsam gyis ni// yang dag dngos grub rim gyis ster// oM
180a4(rgyud): sarba bud+d+ha DA ki nI yai badz+ra wAN+Da nI ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che// las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sngags chen bklags pas grub pa ste/
180a5(rgyud): 'dod pa thams cad grub pa yin// mkha' 'gro ma dang rnal 'byor ma// du ma skyes ma dang lA ma'ang de// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni gsang sngags che// las
180a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub// gsang sngags kun gyi gsang sngags gtso// thod pa'i dum bu la sogs pa// dpa' bo kun gyi snying po
180a7(rgyud): mchog/ gsang sngags de dag mchog dam pa// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// bla ma las kyang bla ma ste// dpa' bo'i sdom pa mchog yin no// 'di ni kun gyi gsang
180b1(rgyud): sngags te// 'di ni sngags su grags pa yin// sa 'og dang ni mtho ris dang // ji ltar mtshams kyang de bzhin te// gang yang ji bzhin las rnams kyis// 'jig rten gsum
180b2(rgyud): po grub pa yin// de yis thams cad grub nas ni// gsang sngags mchog ni bla med pas// 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// gang gis bla na med pa dag/ sgrub pa pos ni thams
180b3(rgyud): cad 'grub// mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo kun// mdor bsdus rgyas par ma yin no// ri bo mdzes par bris nas ni// sna tshogs me tog 'bras bur ldan// de yi steng du dkyil 'khor sgom//
180b4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // rnal 'byor ma dang dum skyes ma// dpa' bo dang ni dpa' mo nyid// ha ha he he zhes bzhad pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo'i rigs// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i
180b5(rgyud): sdom sngar bshad dpa' bo dpa' bo'i mchog/ dpa' bo'i mchog ni thams cad nyid// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dpa' bo rnams// de yis 'gro ba grangs med khyab// dpa' bo dang ni mkha' 'gro
180b6(rgyud): nyid/ rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang de bzhin te// 'khor lo'i gnas su rnam par blta// las rnams thams cad 'grub byed cing // 'khor lor bzhugs la rtag tu
180b7(rgyud): mchod// legs par mnyam gzhag 'dod pa 'grub// sngar bshad cho ga bzhin bzlas shing // mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// bsams pas 'khor lo chen po yi// dngos
181a1(rgyud): grub kyang ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas bye bas gsungs pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma ni re re la// 'khor gyi grangs kyang bye ba ste// rnal 'byor ma dang lA ma dang /
181a2(rgyud): dum skyes ma ni khyad par du// dngos grub thams cad byed pa dge/ mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ mkha' 'gro ma dang dpa' bo'i las kyi rim pa sgrub pa rnal 'byor ma dang
181a3(rgyud): dpa' bo gnyis su med pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sku gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni// dung chen dag ni khon
181a4(rgyud): las mkhas pas gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// yan lag dang ni nying lag mchog/ mos pa'i yid ni sngon 'gro ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni gzung zhing
181a5(rgyud): sgrub/ 'dri chen chu dang rak+ta dang // shru krar bcas pas mchod par byed// nar dpa' chen bdug spos ni// dpa' bo'i las kyi sgrub pa ste// bla ma yi ni go 'phang 'grub// de nas bdag nyid
181a6(rgyud): mchod byas te// 'dod pa thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // rgyal po'i bu med rnyed par 'gyur// ji lta'i las kyi rjes 'brangs nas// lag pa'i mchod pa rab tu bya// pags chen mo bris
181a7(rgyud): nas ni// sgrub pa po yis mnyam bzhag na// zhag bdun gyis ni 'grub 'gyur te// the tsom med par rnam par spyod// rnal 'byor ma dang bla ma mchod// mkha' 'gro'i gnas su de bzhin
181b1(rgyud): skye des ni bde ba rnyed nas kyang // las ni rtag tu byed par 'gyur// rtag tu bla ma mchod nas ni// de yi dngos grub myur du 'grug/ mkha' 'gro ma ni sgrub pa yis// glang po'i lpags la
181b2(rgyud): sku gzugs bri// rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub pa yis// ba lang lpags la ri mo bri// mkha' spyod dag ni sgrub pa yis// rta yi pags la ri mo bri// sa la spyod pa'i grub pa yis// ma he'i pags
181b3(rgyud): le ri mo ze// sa 'og spyod pa'i sgrub bo yis// phag gi pags la ri mo bri// gnod sbyin mo ni sgrub pa yis// shing spang leb la sku gzugs bri// lha yi bu mo sgrub pa yis// tsam pa'i
181b4(rgyud): spang leb sku gzugs bri// klu mi sgrub pa dag gis ni// klu shing sprang le ba ri mo bri// mi ni sgrub par 'dod pa yis// dur khrod gos la sku gzugs bri// pha rol blta ba'i sgrub pa dag
181b5(rgyud): bong bu'i pags la sku gzugs bri// nor rnams sgrub par 'dod pa yis// byi ba'i pags la sku gzugs bri// chang ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// spre'u'i pags la sku gzugs bri// khrag
181b6(rgyud): ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thod pa la ni sku gzugs bri// sa bon 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// phug ron lpags la sku gzugs bri// lha ni 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thang shing spang
181b7(rgyud): leb sku gzugs bri// grong khyer 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// ce spyang lpags la sku gzugs bri// zhi ba'i las la bram ze'o// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri// des na zhi bar gyur pa yin//
182a1(rgyud): rgyas par rgyal rigs mo yi ni// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri// dbang la rje'u rigs mo yi ni// zla mtshan byung dus gos la bri// mngon spyod la ni dmangs rigs kyi/
182a2(rgyud): mtshan byung dus gos la zi// brgyal bar bya ba dag la ni// rgyal mtshan gos la ri mo bri// rengs par bya ba rdo leb ste// dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i pags// dgug pa la ni seng ge'o// las kun la ni
182a3(rgyud): bya yi pags// yang na lcags ni kho na'o// gzhan du sna tshogs las rnams ni// dran pa tsam gyis nges par 'grub// bgegs rnams med par bya ba'i phyir// ri bong pags pa dag la bri//
182a4(rgyud): bgegs ni ldang bar byed pa la// shi ba'i pags pa rnams la bri// gser dang dngul la sogs pa la// zangs dang shel dang zang shing dang // rdo rje las ni bya ba ste// dngos grub mchog ni
182a5(rgyud): khyad par yin// tsan dan dang ni zang shing dang // tsan dan dmar po tsam pa ka/ a sho ka ni grub pa'o// shrI bri kA nor sbyin 'gyur// arga gur dang stargarka shing // 'o ma shing gi bye brag dang //
182a6(rgyud): stag pa'i shing la sogs pa rnams// grub pa yi ni dngos grub 'gyur// sbal pa'i rus pa las byas dang // klu shing dag gi bye brag dang // rus sbal rus pa glang po'i so// khyad par
182a7(rgyud): du ni char yang 'bebs// bram ze'i rus bzhi pa ste// glang po'i rus pa rgyas pa yin// dbang la rta yi rus pa ste// gsad pa la ni ma he'i rus// dgar ba la ni rnga mo'i rus// sdang la
182b1(rgyud): rta dang ma he'o// rengs par bya la khyi yi rus// dgug pa la ni seng ge'i rus// sa yi 'og tu 'gro ba la// phag gi rus pa dag la bya// sa dkar dag las byas pa ni// rtag tu zhi bar
182b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// rgyas pa la ni ser ba yin// dbang la dmar po'i sa yin la// gsod pa la ni sa nag ste// 'di ni mdor bsdus cho ga'o// dri chen chu dang zhag dang khrag/ mig sman chen po de
182b3(rgyud): bzhin te// mi yi rus pa brdar ba yi// mdog tu lhan cig sbyar nas kyang // rang byung me tog sa bon dang // rigs ngan dang ni bram ze dang // gdol pa ma dang g.yung mo dang // khrus mkhan ma
182b4(rgyud): dang gar mkhan ma// ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo yi ni bye brag gi/ 'di dag drung du blangs nas su// shu kra rak+ta'i khyad par dag/ sna tshogs 'di dag bsres nas kyang // cho ga bzhin
182b5(rgyud): du sku gzugs bri// grog mkhar gyi ni sa dag la// shi ba'i sgra dang rus pa yi// pir gyis dam pa bri bar bya// thig sdud shi ba'i skud pa yis// sku gzugs thig skud mchog yin no// yi
182b6(rgyud): dgas 'phreng sogs bsnyen nas ni// bsas kyang ni mar me bya// dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dang // rkang gis lha bshos bya ba ste// dri chen rdo rje chu yi dri// thod pa dag gi bum pa ste/
182b7(rgyud): arga'i snod ni thod pa'o// an rus pa'i rgyur+Na ste// 'bad pas skyes bu dbul 'byin no// ji ltar nus pa dag tu spyad// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// thabs dang shes rab ldan par ni/
183a1(rgyud): sku gzugs yang ni ri mo 'am// gzhan yang mkhas pas cho ga bya// ji lta'i las kyi rjes mthun par// de lta'i gos kyi rjes 'chang zhing // gcer bu sgra ni grol ba dang /
183a2(rgyud): gzugs mdog dag ni bsgyur nas kyang // gtso bo dang ni rnal 'byor pa// slob dpon yang ni de bzhin te// phyag rgya'i rigs par gnas nas su// dri chen chu dang dpa' bo bza'// mnyam par gzhan
183a3(rgyud): nas bzlas pa bya// rnam pa du ma bye brag gi/ glu dang gar ni rnam pa dang // bza' btung mchog ni spyad par bya// de dag rdzogs kyi bar bya ste// de 'di cho ga'i rim pa'o// rab tu gnas pa'i dus dag
183a4(rgyud): tunyis 'gyur tshegs kyis spel ba ste// gdu bu dang ni kang ka dang // dpung rgyan gos kyi bye brag dang // sor gdub dang ni mchod phyir thogs// rkang rgyan dang ni thod pa dang // gdugs dang rnga yab de
183a5(rgyud): bzhin te// sna tshogs skyes bu sbyin zhing dbul// sna tshogs dpa' bo mchog dam pa// myos byed btung ba'i bye brag rnams// dam tshig cho ga mchog rnams dang // sna tshogs ro dang bcud rnams
183a6(rgyud): dang sna tshogs me tog mchog rnams dang // lha mo mchog gi lus rnams dang // rol mo sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // slob dpon phyag rgyar sbyor ba dang // slob ma'i tshogs kyi khyad par rnams//
183a7(rgyud): bza' ba'i mchod pa dag gis mchod// bdug pa'i dri mchog rnams dang ni// sna tshogs rgyal ba'i bdug pa dang // khyad par du ni mar me'i 'phreng // gdugs dang za re de bzhin te// me long dang ni/
183b1(rgyud): rnga yab dang // dra ba dang ni dra phyed dang // chun po dag gis rnam par brgyan// bum pa ras dang ldan pa dag/ ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// rin chen lnga dang sman dang ni// dri yi bye brag dag gis
183b2(rgyud): ni arga'i snod ni khyad par du// tsu ta pa la ba lnga dang // aM bu dzaM bu ka dam pa// bi pa bI dza pu ras dgang // ba la mo ta kri tan dza// ke dri ka ri kang ldan pa// e ka bI ra sa ha de// sman rnams kun/
183b3(rgyud): ces bya ba la// lnga po de dag shes bya ste// mkhas pas bum par gzhug par bya// gser dang dzA ti pha la dang // gla gor zho sha de bzhin no// gser gyi mchod phyir thogs dang ni// phyag rgya drug gis
183b4(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// sgrub pa po kun gcer bu yis// bkra shis glu yi glu len cing // rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni// dad pa'i blo ni sngon 'gro bas// dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du// sna
183b5(rgyud): tshogs rgya che'i mchod par bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ras ris la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas
183b6(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// mngon mtho he ru ka zhes bya// dkyil 'khor snying pos bsdus pa yin// shin tu mnyam gzhag sgrub pa pos// dam tshig
183b7(rgyud): rtag tu bskyang bar bya// dam tshig nyams pas dkyil 'khor du// dbang bskur dngos grub 'thob mi 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mtshal dang ga pur bcas// dmar dang tsan dan sbyor ba ni//
184a1(rgyud): tshogs kyi nang du zhugs pa ni// thams cad bcud kyis len du gnas// thams cad rdo rje'i mtshan ma 'dzin// sbom po mtha' ltag rtse sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rim
184a2(rgyud): pas rtag tu spyad// zhi ba'i btung bas bzhin myangs na// dngos grub rtag tu thob par 'gyur// 'di ni mi 'chi bcu phyed 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad 'jug pa yin// mchod bzhi de bzhin /
184a3(rgyud): dpa' bo ni// dbang gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa yin// snyoms par 'jug pa'i de nyid 'dzin// mngon du bsnyen pa bya ba ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzla// 'khor lo'i gsang sngags
184a4(rgyud): 'bum bzlas shing // rang gi lha'i yang 'bum du bzla// gzhan ni khri ru bzla bar bya// bka' bzhin 'khor lo br-i bya zhing // mdangs ldan mi mchog dag gis ni// dkyil 'khor bri zhing dgod
184a5(rgyud): par bya// sngar bshad gnas ni gang yin pa// der ni dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sa ni yongs su sbyang bar bya// brdung zhing legs par brdungs nas su// mnyam zhing zung rngu rnam par spang //
184a6(rgyud): sa la ma lhung lci ba yis// dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byug/ dur khrod thal bar ldan pa dang // mi 'tsho bcu phyed bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor sa ni nyer byugs te// der ni dkyil
184a7(rgyud): 'khor yang dag brtsam// dur khrod du ni kun spyod cing // ro bsregs sol ba'i phye ma dang // dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa yi// slob dpon legs par mnyam gzhag ste// dkyil
184b1(rgyud): 'khor bzang po bri bar bya// slob dpon mtshan nyid thams cad ldan// mtshan ma ngan pa kun spangs shing // yang dag shes shing rgyud shes pa// dpal ldan khrag 'thung gsang sngags
184b2(rgyud): shes ra khro med gtsang zhing mkhas pa dang // sbyor shes ye shes pha rol 'gro// thod pas spyi bor rgyan byas shing // yan lag thal bas byugs pa dang // gug kyang dag gis lus brgyan
184b3(rgyud): cing // rus 'phreng rus par yang dag gnas// du ma gcig spyi bor rgyun pa dang // rus pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga ni lag na gnas// bdag nyid shrI he ru kar ni// byas/
184b4(rgyud): nas de yi 'og tu ni// dpal ldan he ru ka dran bya// 'khor lo 'di yi snying khar dgod// de ltar bdag nyid go bgos nas// ra ba rnams ni phyogs su dgod// 'og tu'ang mtshon cha dgod
184b5(rgyud): par bya// 'khor lo'i bdag nyid bkod ras ni// steng du mda' yi dra ba dang // bdag nyid mtshon cha'i dra ba bya// de ltar go bgos sum cu ni// rtsa gsum pas kyang gzhig mi nus/
184b6(rgyud): de ltar bdag nyid rab bsrungs shing // sngags dang phyag rgyas rnam brgyan nas// dngos grub thams cad rab stor ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// de nas sems med zad
184b7(rgyud): su la ru d+hi ra ni chen pos brlan// dpal ldan khrag 'thung grong mchog gi/ dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa thig gdab bya// khru bzhi pa la khru brgyad pa// sgo bzhi kun nas zur bzhi
185a1(rgyud): pa/ sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam spyod cing // mkha' 'gro dra ba bde mchog bzlas// de yi dbus su bzhag pa ni// 'dab chags lte ba 'bar dang bcas// ge sar
185a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan pa yi// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// lte bar bkod bya dpa' bo ni// 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs can la// mdangs dang ldan zhing rab tu 'bar// ha ha zhes byar sgra cher
185a3(rgyud): bzhad// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan dang ldan// bzang po spyan gsum zhal bzhi mnga'// glang po'i pags pa rnam par bgos// smin ma bzang po rdo rje 'byes// phyag na kha T+wAM ga bsnams shing //
185a4(rgyud): brgya phyed 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de mdun gnas pa'i lha mo ni// rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba// rab 'jigs 'jigs byed che la phyogs// spyan gsum drag po'i gzugs can bya// ka pA
185a5(rgyud): la ni an+d+ras bkang // kha nas ru d+hi ra 'dzag cing // lha dang lha min mir bcas dang // phyogs kun tu ni sdigs mdzub cing // mkha' 'gro mno nyi shu ba ni// phag mo yi ni rigs las byung /
185a6(rgyud): phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams rnams ni// 'khor lo'i lte bar mchod par bya// de bzhin 'dir ni dpa' bo yang // 'khor lor yang dag gnas pa mchod// sgrub po gal te dngos grub 'dod//
185a7(rgyud): gnyis med dpa' bo mchod par bya// de nas bum pa bya ba ni// rtsa ba nag po la sogs med// mu tig gser dang rin chen dang // byu ru dngul dang zangs ma ste// bza' ba kun gyis legs
185b1(rgyud): bkang ba'i// snod ni steng du gnag par bya// mgrin pa srad bus dkri ba dang // kha ni 'dab mas brgyan par bya// gos zung gis ni legs dkris pa// brgyad ni sgo ru rnam par dgod// gos
185b2(rgyud): zung gis ni dkris pa yi// bum pa dgu pa dbus su gzhag/ gser ram dngul lam rin chen nam// mu tig rnams ni mdzes par bya// dkyil 'khor kun tu rin chen dang // gser rnams
185b3(rgyud): kyis ni mdzes par spyad// grong mchog yid 'ong mchod nas ni// grub pa nyid du the tsom med// bdag nyid kyi ni gdong lus kun// dri yi chu yis legs par bsad// gal te dngos grub
185b4(rgyud): mchog 'dod na// mar me brgya ni dbul bar bya// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// yid kyis thams cad steng du dgod// sa stengs mkha' 'gro ma gang yin// dkyil 'khor
185b5(rgyud): kun tu dgod par bya// gang yang sa 'og rnams su dgod// ma mo thams cad phyogs dang ni// phyogs mtshams rnams su dgod par bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dri dang me
185b6(rgyud): tog bdug spos dang // mar me brgya yang dbul bya zhing // dpal ldan khrag 'thung dkyil 'khor gnas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// rgyal mtshan dmar dang de bzhin ser// dkar dang
185b7(rgyud): gnag dang ser skya dang // de bzhin gos ni sna tshogs dang // me tog 'phreng ba du ma dang // bla re dag dang dar bcas pa'i// mda' ni shin tu mdzes pa dang // de bzhin bza' bca' btung
186a1(rgyud): ba yis// rab mnyam bzhag ste mchod par bya// de nas sgrub pos dngos grub kyis// dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya// grub 'dod shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// ci
186a2(rgyud): nus par ni bla ma mchod// dril dpyangs me tog spros kyis brgyan// shin tu sgra snyan dril bu dkrol// sgrub pa po yis rnga brdungs shing // ha ha zhes ni brjod pa'ang bya// de ltar cho ga bzhin dkyil/
186a3(rgyud): 'khor// 'dod pa kun ldan mchod nas ni// de yi bu sdug gdong la ni// dar gyis legs par bkab nas su// me tog gis bkang thal mo dag/ pad+mas gtor nas bskor ba ni// g.yon
186a4(rgyud): phyogs bskor nas phyag byas te// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra yang brjod// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// dngos grub sras po gzhag par bya// thal mo me tog gtor nas ni// gang du babs
186a5(rgyud): pa'i bsam pa ni// bskor ba dag kyang byas nas su// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// sgrub pa po yis byas nas gzhug/ de nas yon thogs grong khyer du// g.yas pa'i phyogs su
186a6(rgyud): brten nas ni// snyim pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor dor// dkyil 'khor gang du me tog babs// de yi rigs ni bstan par bya// de nas slob dpon legs par ni// rab mnyam bzhag ste phyag rgya
186a7(rgyud): mchod// de nas slob ma gnyis pa la// mtshal chen lan gsum bzlas pa yis// de la thig le bya ba yin// de nas slob ma'i gdong phye la// dkyil 'khor dag ni bstan par bya// gang gi
186b1(rgyud): lha yi gnas gang yin// der de yang dag bstan par bya// slob dpon dang ni lhan cig tu// rab tu btud pa byas nas ni// g.yon nas brtsams pa'i rim pa yis// de nas bskor ba rab tu bya/
186b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang ni bla ma la// ji bzhin cho gas phyag bya'o// de nas bla ma dag la yon// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dbul// gser ni brgya stong dbul ba dang // rin chen rnam pa sna
186b3(rgyud): tshegs dang // ras ni zung gyur brgya nyid dang // glang po rta 'am yul 'khor ram// rna rgyan dang ni gdu bu dang // mgul gdub sor gdub dam pa dang // gser las byas pa'i mchod phyir thogs//
186b4(rgyud): chung ma bzang dang bu mo nyid// bran pho bran mo sring mo rnams// phyag byas nas ni dbul bar bya// deng nas brtsams te bran du ni// khyod la bdag ni dbul lags zhes// blo ldan kun nas dang
186b5(rgyud): ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bya// de ltar nges par bya ba ni// sgrub pa po yis rab nges byas// de nas de la mkha' 'gro ma// rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par
186b6(rgyud): 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma dang lA ma dang // dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma// sgrub po mkha' 'gro ma lhan cig/ de dang rnam sbyor 'gro ba kun// sgrub pa po ni de dag gi ci
186b7(rgyud): bgyi byed par the tsom med// rnal 'byor 'di ni thub 'gyur na// 'jig rten gsum du mi rdzogs shing // mi snang drug dang gnas mkha' rgyu// rkang mgyogs de bzhin bcud kyis len/
187a1(rgyud): sgrub pa po ni 'dod tsam gyis// rtag par rgyun du skyed par 'gyur// gzugs ni dum byed pa dang // nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi khyad par bya/
187a2(rgyud): nges gnon 'gro ba thams cad kyang // lan cig bltas pa'i sbyor ba yis// skad cig gis ni sbyor nyid skyed// sngags pas dkyil 'khor ma mthong bar// gang zhig rnal 'byor pa nyid 'dod//
187a3(rgyud): mkha' la khu tshur gyis rdeg dang // smig rgyu'i chu ni 'thungs dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab dang // sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin// gang zhig rtag tu 'dod gyur pa// de ni lha mi zil
187a4(rgyud): gnon 'gro// de nyid bsdus par gyur pa 'am// gsang ba'am rdo rje 'jigs byed las// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi rgyal po 'di// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bshad dang ma bshad gang ci'ang
187a5(rgyud): rung / de kun dpal ldan khrag 'thung gnas// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// / de nas
187a6(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sbyor ba'i mtshams dang yang dag ldan// chu med pa ni mtshams yin te// gos pa med cing chags spangs pa// mtshams ni 'byung po thams cad pa// de ni sems
187a7(rgyud): can thams cad de// mtshams ni srid pa dag pa ste// dbyangs skyong he ru ka nyid yin// rnal 'byor pa yis bsgoms shing bza// gcig cing 'byung bar snang ba ste// dung dang kun da'i
187b1(rgyud): mdog kyang 'dzin// rgyan rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan pa ste// zhal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// spyan gsum pa la thugs rje'i nyams// snga grol
187b2(rgyud): dpral bar zod pa ste// spyi gtsug tu ni zla ba'o// he ru ka dpal yang dag ldan// mtshams rnams grub pa'i mchog dam pa// thun bzhi ru ni bya ba'o// dga' ba bzhi po dga' ba dang /
187b3(rgyud): lte ba'i snying pad nu ma'i dbus// lce yi rtsa dang mgo steng du// dga' ba dang ni mchog dga' nyid// dam par dga' dang lhan cig skyes// dang po 'dab ma drug cu bzhi// gnyis pa brgyad pa
187b4(rgyud): mchog yin te// gsum pa 'dab ma bcu drug pa// bzhi pa sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dab// phag mo'i lte ba'i rtsar gnas pa// lhan cig skyes dga' khrag 'thung mchog/ sbyor ba'i dus kyi mtshams
187b5(rgyud): su ni// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom bya// sdug bsngal sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// kun 'byung chos kyi 'khor lo yin// 'gog pa longs spyod 'khor lo ste// lam ni bde ba chen
187b6(rgyud): po yin// de ltar mtshams su byin brlabs nas// rnal 'byor nges pa byas pa ste// dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // spyan gsum thugs rje stong pa'i nyams// rnam thar gsum dang sku gsum
187b7(rgyud): gyis/ yongs su dag par rim par sbyor// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// thod pa dang mi ba T+wAM 'dzin// mgo bo gr-i gug phyag na bsnams// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du bzhugs/
188a1(rgyud): zla ba yi dgas pa dbus su// skra grol phyogs kyi gos can yin// dges pa'i nyams kyis mos pa ste// dus dag tu ni mtshams bsgoms na// sdom pa mchog ni
188a2(rgyud): grub pa yin// dri chen rdo rje chu dang ni// rin chen snang ba mtha' yas dang // don yod grub pa'ang de bzhin te// de dag rtag tu bsres nas su// rnal 'byor rtag tu mtshams la 'dod// gsang sngags/
188a3(rgyud): 'di dag rtag tu yang // he ru ka ni dbyangs skyong mchog/ oM shrI he ru kA ya bi d+ya ma he bad+yA rA dza ya d+hIHma he taM no bI rA pra dza da ya AH/ rtag tu mtshams ni rnams bsgoms na// dbyangs skyong mchog
188a4(rgyud): gi bzlas pa bya// dbyangs skyong ming ni rig byed de// las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ dus min 'chi bar mi 'gyur zhing // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang yang grub// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi//
188a5(rgyud): don ni sngags pas rtag tu spro// dngos grub 'di ni rab tu 'grub// de ma thag tu grub chen bcas// 'jig rten gsum po grub pa yin// sgrub po'i dbang pos rnams bsgoms te// khrag 'thung /
188a6(rgyud): cho ga bzhin shes nas// zhag gsum brtul zhugs la gnas na// lha yi gnas su 'gro ba yin// lha yi ye shes thob nas ni// lha yi lus kyi mchog kyang 'dzin// ngag rnams
188a7(rgyud): kun la dbang thob cing // thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas su// rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas lha yis bsten pa ste// srid par sangs rgyas rol par mdzad/
188b1(rgyud): nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du yang // phyag rgya lhan cig 'byung ba spyad// mthong nas sring mo yang dag sgrub// zhag gsum bar du mchod byas nas// rdo rje he ru ka dpal lha// thams cad
188b2(rgyud): kyang ni 'byen par 'gyur// pus mo sa la btsugs nas ni// de yis phyag ni byas nas kyang // sgrub pos rtag tu mchod par bya// sgrub pos 'dod la dga' bus ni// mod la dpa' bos
188b3(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen// gtso bo thams cad 'dzin pa ste// khams gsum kun tu rnam spyod cing // sgrub pa po ni mchog tu 'gyur// 'di ni dpa' chen dpa' bo ste// gnyis pa thams
188b4(rgyud): cad rnam par spangs// de ni rnam par shes tsam gyis// sa gzhi ska rags kyis bskor ba// lha dang lha min mi rnams kyang // sgrub pa po ni de nyid kyi// mod la dbang du gyur pa yin//
188b5(rgyud): mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ dbyangs skyong gi mtshams kyi le'u ste lnga bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// yi ge bdun pa sgom pa ste/
188b6(rgyud): yi ge hUM las yang dag 'byung // rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che// phyag drug zhal gsum spyan gsum pa// mtshan rnams thams cad kyis mtshan cing // dpe byad bzang po brgyad tsur ldan/
188b7(rgyud): A li kA li las byung gtso// phag mo dang ni mnyam par ldan// stong zhing thugs rjes khyab pa ste// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// na ra'i pags pa gos su mnabs// thod pa
189a1(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // g.yas pa'i phyag na mdung rtse gsum// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyun can// sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa
189a2(rgyud): 'chang // zla ba phyed pa'i spyi gtsug gtsang // phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa dag/ g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// sna tshogs pad+ma nyid la
189a3(rgyud): bzhugs// 'khor lo drug gi dbus su bzhugs// rnal 'byor ma drug mnyam par sbyang // myur du dngos grub stsol ba yin// dang po khrag 'thung lha mo ste// gnyis pa rdo rje 'jigs
189a4(rgyud): byed ma// gsum pa drag gtum ma yin te// bzhi pa rdo rje nyi ma mo// lnga pa rdo rje drag mo ste// drug pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// g.yon gyi phyogs nas dgod par bya// lha mo de dag cher
189a5(rgyud): gtum zhing // spyan gsum dbu skra grol ba ste// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa yin// thams cad yi dgas nyi steng bzhugs// sngo zhing ser la ldang ba dang // dmar dang dud /
189a6(rgyud): de bzhin dkar// cang te'u dang dril bu 'dzin// thams cad na ra'i pags pa 'dzin// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// g.yas brkyang g.yon brkyang tshul gyis bzhugs// yi ge
189a7(rgyud): drug las yang dag byung // lha mo gzigs pa mtshan pa yin// ji ltar mgon po'i mdog bzhin du// phag mo yang ni de bzhin te// phyag rgya phyag mtshan de bzhin no//
189b1(rgyud): dang ser dang ldang ba dang // stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// lha mo'i byin par mnyam par 'khril// mchog tu dga' bar rnam par mos// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/
189b2(rgyud): yi ge de las mkha' 'gro ma// yan lag drug pa rnam par sgom// bdun pa dbus su dgod pa ni// yi ge hUM las he ru ka/ dbus su dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste bcom
189b3(rgyud): ldan 'das dpal he ru ka'o// chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje he ru ka ma'o// brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o//
189b4(rgyud): dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni drag gtum ma'o// shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje nyi ma ma'o// ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje drag mo'o//
189b5(rgyud): btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste/ byang chub yan lag 'di bdun sgom// ji lta'i rim pas sbyor zhing sgom// gsang sngags gzhal med pa bzlas shing //
189b6(rgyud): khro bo kun gyi gnas mchog ste// bsod nams chung ba'i sgrub pos kyang // zla phyed nang du dngos grub ste// rtag tu zhag re bsgoms pa ni// zhag bdun gyis ni the tsom med// dpyid
189b7(rgyud): zla tha chung nyal ni// sring mo bu mo tsha mo dang // shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// nyin mtshan bzlas shing bsgom byas pas// tho rangs dpal khrag 'thung mnyam 'gyur// mngon
190a1(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ nye ba'i snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// gzhan yang snying po bshad/
190a2(rgyud): bya ba sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// hUM gi yi ge las byung ba// bde ba chen po de las byung // sngo zhing dkar la drag po ste// zhal brgyad pa la shin tu 'jigs// spyan gsum pa
190a3(rgyud): la phyag bcu drug/ mgo yi 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// zla ba phyed pa'i ral pa 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// phyag rgya drug gis sku la
190a4(rgyud): brgyan// 'jigs byed chen po'i 'jigs pa ni// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon// dus mtshan shin tu 'jigs pa yang // g.yon bskum pa yi zhabs kyis gnon// rdo rje dril
190a5(rgyud): bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsha 'chir// tshangs lpags bshus nas rgyan du 'dzin// mdung rtse gsum dang dgra sta dang // kha T+wAM tsang te'u gri gug mchog/ brgyad pa la ni
190a6(rgyud): lcags kyu thogs// g.yas pa'i phyag rnams de bzhin no// zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mgo bo zhags pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ zo ba sdigs mdzub dam pa ste// shrI yi ye shes yang dag
190a7(rgyud): rdzogs// phang du phag mo'i gzugs yin te// drag cing dmar la dkar ba yin// byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// skra grol ba la spyan gsum pa// thod pa'i 'phreng
190b1(rgyud): bas rnam par brgyan// de yi zhal dang phyag tu gnas// dum bu'i rgyun gyi ska rags can// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// phyogs kyis gos can chags pas gzugs// rked
190b2(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor rgya yang che// sngo zhing dkar la de bzhin dmar// ser zhing ljang la dud kha ste// du ba thal ba sprin gyi mdog/ de 'dra'i zhal dang gzugs su gnas// lha mo mda' dang
190b3(rgyud): gzhu 'dzin cing // tshangs pa'i pags pa rnam par spangs// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su bzhugs// 'khor lo brgyad pa'i dbus bzhugs par// byi yi dkyil
190b4(rgyud): 'khor rnam par sgom// pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni nges par dgod// oM ni shar gyi 'dab ma la// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod// ba ni byang gi 'dab
190b5(rgyud): la ste// rta gdong mkha' 'gro ma yang dgod// dz+ra ni rdo rje drag mo ste// mkha' 'gro nub tu dgod par bya// he ru lho phyogs 'dab la dgod// gser gyi mdog can mkha' 'gro ma/
190b6(rgyud): ser dang sngo bsangs dkar dang dmar// zhal gsum rnam bsgyur drag po ste// phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// ro yi steng du bzhugs pa ste// g.yas brkyang ba yis bdud bzhi 'joms//
190b7(rgyud): thod pa'i 'phreng ba drag po ste// pad+ma sbom po'i 'dab ma la// chags pa can gyi gzugs shing bzhes// thugs rje'i nyams kyis bde ba yin// mda' dang gzhu yang 'chang ba ste/
191a1(rgyud): zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin pa'i mchog/ thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM bsnams// cang te'u ni sgra yang sgrog/ ser dang ljang khu sngo ba dang // sngo bsangs dmar dang dkar
191a2(rgyud): ba dang // dkar dang ljang khu sngo ba dang // dmar dang sngo dang ldang ba ste// 'di ltar mdog ni khyad par gyis// dam tshig mchog ni bsgom par bya// mtshams bzhi ru ni bum pa dag
191a3(rgyud): byang chub sems kyis gang bar gzhag/ shar gyi phyogs su he yan te// ming ni he li ka zhes bya// byang gi phyogs su ru yin te// mkha' 'gro ma ni ru tsa ki/ nub kyi phyogs su
191a4(rgyud): ru yin te// ru tsa ka ma li zhes bya// lho yi phyogs su kaM yin te// keng rus ma zhes grags pa yin// me yi phyogs su hUM mdzad ma// bden bral phyogs su phaT mdzad ma/
191a5(rgyud): rlung gi phyogs su Da ma ri// dbang ldan ki li ki la ste// de brgyad lha mo chen mo ste// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ji ltar zhal dang gzugs bzhin du// de bzhin 'dir
191a6(rgyud): yang 'gyur ba yin// zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug dang // spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyogs kyi gos can g.yas brkyang bzhugs// zod pa'i
191a7(rgyud): 'phreng ba'i rgyan can te// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag ldan// drag cing gtum lo rab 'jigs pa'o// thams cad ri yi steng bzugs
191b1(rgyud): sgom/ spyan gsum pa la chags pas myos// dbang ldan zur la ut+pal sngon po zhes bya ba// rlung gi phyogs la dra ba'i mchog ces bya ba ste// bden bral phyogs la gsus pa 'phyang /
191b2(rgyud): ma zhes bya ba// me yi phyogs la sha ba ri zhes bya ba ste// ser dang sngo bsangs sngo ba dang // dmar ser dang ni bzhi pa ste// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// gri gug cang te'u mchog yin te/
191b3(rgyud): bzhi pa rdo rje mdung yin no// phyogs kyi gos can chags pas rol// bzang mo lto ba 'phyang ma ste// skye gnas ring la rgya yang che// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur zhing drag/ skra grol ba la rab
191b4(rgyud): tu 'jigs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spyad pa'o// shar sgor baM las gtum ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / lho'i sgor raM las rol gtum mo
191b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / nub kyi sgor sa las 'bar ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod do// byang gi sgor ha las 'phreng ba rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro
191b6(rgyud): ma ste sngo dang dkar ser nyid yin te// lcags kyu dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga bsnams te// gri gug mgo bo sdigs mdzub dang // dkar dang sngo dang ldang ba dang // zhags
191b7(rgyud): pa dang ni cang te'u 'dzin// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // sdigs mdzub gri gug mgo bo 'dzin// dmar dang sngo dang ljang khu ste// lcags sgrog cang te'u gri gug dang // zod pa
192a1(rgyud): kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mgo bo dang ni sngags mdzub mchog/ ljang dang dkar po 'dres pa dang // ser dang dmar ba'i zhal mchog yin// dril bu cang te'u gri gug
192a2(rgyud): dang kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa dang // mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub phyag/ skra grol ba la gdug pa che// spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal// zhal gdangs ljags ni bskyod pa ste/
192a3(rgyud): g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum tshul gyis bzhugs// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// ro dang pad+ma'i nyi dbus bzhugs// mgo ba'i 'phreng bas rnam
192a4(rgyud): par brgyan// thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // mgo bo'i do shal rnams kyis brgyan// mi bskyod pa yi cod pan 'ching // rnam bsgyur spyan ni g.yo ba ste// yi ge nyi shu gnyis las
192a5(rgyud): byung / snying khar mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni gsang sngags thams cad kyi// yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis mchog/ oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru ka~M hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba raM huM hUM phaT swA hA/
192a6(rgyud): yi ge re re dgod pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying de bzhin// hUM shrI lha dang lha mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o// dbus su rnam dag bcom ldan 'das// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom
192a7(rgyud): par bya// rnam par thar brgyad sgo sna tshogs// gzugs su lta ba stong pa ste// nang gzugs med par phyi rol gzugs su lta ba'ang stong pa yin// sdug dang mi sdug mthong bar byed pa lta
192b1(rgyud): ba'ang stong pa yin// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa ste// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag tu lta ba'ang stong pa yin// ci yang med pa'i skye mched dag tu/
192b2(rgyud): lta ba'ang stong pa yin// 'du shes med cing 'du shes med min skye mched rnams kyang stong pa'o// 'du shes dang ni tshor ba'ang 'gog par lta ba stong pa yin// phyag bcu drug pa'ang stong pa
192b3(rgyud): ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa
192b4(rgyud): nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa
192b5(rgyud): nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/
192b6(rgyud): ltar bcom ldan 'das bzhin du// phag mo yang ni de bzhin te// gnyis med gzugs can bcom ldan 'das// he ru ka dpal rnam par shes// phag mo nam mkha' lta bu'o//
192b7(rgyud): lha mo bzhi yis rnam dag pa// gsal byed mkha' 'gro ma nyid ni// don yang so so yang dag rig/ rta gdong ma gang yin pa'o// chos rnams so so yang dag rig/ rdo rje drag mo
193a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma// nges tshig so so yang dag rig/ gser mdog can gyi mkha' 'gro ma// spobs pa so so yang dag rig/ lha mo de dag 'dab ma'i dbus// rton pa/
193a2(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi po ni// he li ka ni don la rton pa ste// ru tsa ki ni tshig 'bru rton pa yin// ru tsa ka me le ni ye shes rton// keng rus ma ni rnam shes rton pa yin// shar dang byang dang nub dang ni//
193a3(rgyud): lho phyogs kyi ni 'khor lo la// chos kyi mdo ni bzhi po dgod// hUM ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o// phaT ni 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o// ba ma ri ni chos thams cad bdag med/
193a4(rgyud): pa'o// ki li ki li ni chos thams cad zhi ba'o// me dang bden bral rlung dang ni// dbang ldan 'khor lo de dag kun// lha mo yis ni rnam par dag/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po'i chos thams cad
193a5(rgyud): rtog pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni ut+pal sngon po ma'o// chos thams cad ston pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni dran pa'i mchog go/ nges par 'byung ba'i lam la 'jug pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni gsus pa
193a6(rgyud): 'phyang ma'o// zag pa zad pa shes pa la 'jigs pa med pa ni sa ba ri ma'o// mtshams su dkyil 'khor lha mo ni// 'di yis zur bzhi rnam par dag/ sgo bzhi dag tu lha mo ni// gtum byed
193a7(rgyud): ma ste dad pa'i dbang po'o// rol gtum ma ni brtson 'grus kyi dbang po'o// 'bar mchog ma ni dran pa'i dbang po'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po'o// dpe byad
193b1(rgyud): bzang po brgyad cu ni bcom ldan 'das dpal khrag 'thung rdo rje'o// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni// 'phags pa shes rab bcom ldan ma// rdo rje phag mo nyid yin no// mngon par
193b2(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ yi ge nyi shu rtsa gnyis kyi snying po bsgoms pas bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba/
193b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag ni rnam dag pa// 'byung ba kun gyi spyan yin te// rnam par snang mdzad thig tu grags// b+ha gas khyab pa'i rim pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig tu shes/
193b4(rgyud): dus ni sna tshogs rigs su shes// mchod pa sna tshogs cho ga bzhin// pul+lI ra ma pad+ma'o// dzA lan+d+ha ra thugs 'khor lo// oM r+yan gsung gi 'khor lo ste// ar bu da ni sku'i 'khor lo//
193b5(rgyud): gau dA ba ri zur bzhi'o// rA me shwa ra me phyogs so// de bi ko Ta bden bral yin// mA la ba ni rlung gi zur// dbang ldan kA ma rU ba ste// grwa bzhi rnam par dag pa ni// 'di la the tsom med
193b6(rgyud): pa yin// o dre dag ni shar gyi sgo'o// tri sha ku ne lho phyogs sgo// ko sa la ni nub kyi sgo'o// ka ling ka ni byang sgo ste/ shar gyi rta babs laM pA ka/ kAny+tsi lho yi rta babs yin//
193b7(rgyud): ma la ya nub phyogs so// pre ta pu ri byang yin te// gr-i ha de balha snam bu// sau rabA ni rin chen sa// su bar+Na dI pa dra ba phyed// na ga ra ni rnga yab dang // zil bu rgyal mtshan pa dan no//
194a1(rgyud): sin d+ha rdo rje thig zlum po// ma ru ta ni sgo khyud do// ku lu ta ni rdo rje dang // rin po che dang dkyil 'khor gyi// thig ni bla na med pa yin// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
194a2(rgyud): pa/ rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba rnga phyed kyis brgyan cing // dar dang 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// zur gyi cha ni thams cad dang // sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su//
194a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen gyis brgyan cing // sku yi 'khor lo'i sku nyid ni// don yod grub pa rnam par spyod// gsung gi 'khor lo 'od dpag med// thugs kyi 'khor lo mi bskyod pa// pad+ma'i
194a4(rgyud): dbus ni rin chen 'dzin// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshul can ni// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par sgom// tshor ba sku yi 'khor lo ste// 'du shes gsung gi 'khor lo yin// thugs kyi
194a5(rgyud): 'khor lo 'du byed de// rnam shes pad+ma gdon mi za// ri mo lnga pa mchog gyur pa// de yis rnam dag rang bzhin can// sa dang ri mo thams cad kun// dpa' bos yongs su dag par
194a6(rgyud): sgom/ ri mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa// de dag dpa' bos rnam par dag/ 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma yis dag/ lte bar phag mo'i sa bon kA// he ru ka dpal mchog yin no// 'dab ma
194a7(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yis dag/ dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog dag ni// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ dkyil 'khor snying po mdor bsdus na// dkyil 'khor dang po yi ge ste/
194b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis pa phyag mtshan yin// gsum pa lag pa'i phyag rgyar bshad// bzhi pa gzugs su gyur pa ste// lnga pa me tog mchod pa yin// drug pa tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
194b2(rgyud): nyid dbus ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// pad+ma'i lte ba dang bcas pa// thugs kyi 'khor lo dri ma med// gsung gi 'khor lo 'od byed pa// sku yi 'khor lo 'od 'phro ba// zur
194b3(rgyud): bzhi pa ni sbyang dka' ba// ring du song ba sgo bzhi yin// zur gyi cha ni mi g.yo ba// legs pa'i blo gros rdo rje'i thig/ chos kyi sprin ni rta babs yin// 'di lta'i dkyil 'khor bris
194b4(rgyud): nas ni// rtag tu sgom zhing mchod par bya// dngos grub rgya cher thob par 'gyur// sdom pa'i 'khor lo sdom pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchog gi de nyid ni// he ru ka dpal ye shes
194b5(rgyud): mchog b+ha ga'i pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor no// phag mo'i sku lus mchog gyur pa// de ni dkyil 'khor 'dus pa ste// dkyil 'khor bde chen mchog yin no// dkyil 'khor dpa' bo
194b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma// gnyis med kha sbyor dkyil 'khor yin// bdag gi de nyid ting 'dzin yin// lha yi de nyid de bzhin te// sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya yin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i
194b7(rgyud): mchog/ yan lag kun bsgoms las 'das shing // rtog dang rnam rtog rnam par spangs// phyi mo'i thig le las 'das shing // de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// chos rnams thams
195a1(rgyud): cad brtag tu med// chos dang chos min rnam par spyod// de lnga'i dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni// rnam dag nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa// chags dang chags med chags
195a2(rgyud): par mnyam// pad+ma rA ga chu mnyam byung // rang sems chags pa dmar po'i mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// yid ni khams rnams thams cad de// gzugs dang gzung/
195a3(rgyud): med dri ma med// bskul zhing sad pa yid yin te// sems ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// dkyil 'khor b+ha ga yin par bshad// dkyil
195a4(rgyud): 'khor byang chub sems yin te// rgya ba dang ni mi rgyug// sa 'ogs stangs blar khyab// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las dkyil 'khor gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga
195a5(rgyud): bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// sems can kun la phan stsol ba// A li kA li las byung ba// chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer mchog/
195a6(rgyud): dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa// dar dang 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// zhal bzhi pa la rnam par 'gyur// de la lte ba'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs 'khor lo lte
195a7(rgyud): bar bcas// zugs kyi 'khor lo brgyad pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus dag tu// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// sna tshogs rdo rjes
195b1(rgyud): rnam 'dres pa// lha yi bzhugs gnas nyi shu pa// lte ba'i dbus su bstan pa ste// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// hU las he ru kar byas te// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad
195b2(rgyud): pa spyan gsum sku lus dkar po ste// rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pas// phag mo yi ni ku tsha'ang 'chir// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// phyag rgya drug gis sku la brgyan//
195b3(rgyud): gdug pa kun gyi klad pa la// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ brgyal zhing rnam par myos pa yi// klad pa la ni zhabs kyis mnan//
195b4(rgyud): gcer bu'o dod 'bod pa mnan// rgyal ba'i pags pa steng du ste// lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin pa dang // gzhan yang cang te'u de bzhin te// thod pa kha T+wAM ga yang 'dzin//
195b5(rgyud): gzhan du yang ni mgo bo 'chang // sna tshogs rdo rjes dbu la mnan// zla ba phyed pa dbu la 'tshang // zod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// mi bskyod pa yis spyi gtsug brgyan//
195b6(rgyud): tshangs pa'i do shal 'dzin pa ste// bdag gi khro bo bdun spros nas// ji ltar bcom ldan mdog bzhin du// phag mo mchog dang de bzhin te// sku lus nag po dmar ba'i mdangs/
195b7(rgyud): gzi byin mdangs kyis mdzes pa ste// gri gug thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu cang te'u mdung dang ni// lcags kyu zhags pa de bzhin no// lha mo phyag ni brgyad pa ste// dkar
196a1(rgyud): zhing sngo la ldang ba'o// steng gi zhal ni dmar po mdzes// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gdong ni// ser zhing ldang ba'i gzugs can te// gzhan du bdag po ji bzhin
196a2(rgyud): du 'phag mo yang ni de bzhin gyur// gcer bu skra ni grol ba ste// mnyams dum bu'i ska rags can// pad+ma bzhi la mkha' 'gro ma// zur la bum pa thod pa ste// thugs kyi 'khor lo sngar bshad/
196a3(rgyud): pa'o// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// gsung dang sku yi 'khor lo gnyis// shar dang byang nub lho ru'o// sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// khwa gdong la sogs thams cad do// zur la
196a4(rgyud): gshin rje sreg la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i khyad par ni// rdo rje snying pos bshad pa ste// kha cig rnal 'byor ma ru 'dod// bla ma'i gnas kyi rjes rim pa// sngar bshad sna tshogs
196a5(rgyud): rigs rnams ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bsgom par bya// gzhan yang zhal dang mdog rnams ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdog bzhin dang // phyag mtshan phyag rgyar sngar bshad bzhin/
196a6(rgyud): gnas sogs rim pa de ltar dgod// sngar bshad pa yi cho ga bzhin// gsang sngags ji bzhin rim par dgod// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag don// sgom pa mchog ni bsgom par bya//
196a7(rgyud): A li kA li nang byung ba// bsgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// chos dbyings grong khyer rnam dag par// sems can khams ni rab tu 'jug/ rnal 'byor 'di ni gsang ba ste/
196b1(rgyud): su la yang ni bstan mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ chos kyi dbyings kyi grong khyer sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan
196b2(rgyud): yang bshad bya ba// b+ha ga pad+ma sgom pa ni// rdo rje snying pos zhus pa las// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yang dag gsang ba nges gsang ba// A li kA li zur gsum gnas/
196b3(rgyud): pad+ma 'dab gsum rnam par sgom// rdo rje phag mo he ru ka/ lte ba la ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje mkha' 'gro lA ma dang // gsum pa dum skyes ma nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ni dmar la sngo//
196b4(rgyud): phag mo yang ni dmar sngo ste// mkha' 'gro sngo la ser ba dang // lA ma ljang la ser ba ste// dum skyes ma ni dmar la ser// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// bcom ldan mgon po
196b5(rgyud): zhal bzhi pa// zhabs bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu rdo rjes legs par mtshon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa ste/
196b6(rgyud): zhi ba zla ba phyed pa 'chang // mi 'khrugs pa ni spyi gtsug 'ching // rtag par gsang ba'i gos mnabs shing // thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phag mo'i zhal mtshan de yin
196b7(rgyud): te byin pa gnyis kyis legs 'khyud cing // gcer bu dbu skra grol ba la// spyan gsum pa la legs chags 'khril// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan gnyis// zhabs
197a1(rgyud): kyis rnam par gnon pa ste/ g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pas bzhugs// sku lus phyag rgya drug 'dzin cing // mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa dang / thugs
197a2(rgyud): rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// g.yas pa dkar zhing g.yon ljang khu// steng ni sngo skya sku lus dkar// gzugs can ma ni b+ha gar brtag/ A li kA li b+ha ga'i mchog/ gzhan
197a3(rgyud): yang zur gsum dbus dag tu// pad+ma'i 'khor lo rnam par sgom// thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma dag tu brtag/ dbus su he ru ka phag mo// 'dab mar
197a4(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma sogs dgod// zur du thod pa dkar po dag/ thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' la spyod// shar gyi zur la sku 'khor la// rlung gi zur gyi 'khor lo la// khwa gdong la sogs
197a5(rgyud): rnam brgyad do// gsung gi 'khor lo bden bral zur// 'khor lo bzhi po zur gsum la// shar ni sku yi mkha' 'gro ste// rlung phyogs gshin rje'i mkha' 'gro'o// bden bral
197a6(rgyud): gsung gi mkha' 'gro ste// dbus su rdo rje he ru ka/ sngo zhing dkar po dud kha dang // sngo zhing dmar ba bzhi po yin// rang gi phyag mtshan mnyam par ldan// gzhan du rang bdag mdog
197a7(rgyud): bzhin du// dpa' bo 'khor lo mdog de bzhin// thugs kyi 'khor lo mkha' 'gro ma// dmar ba'i mdog can rnam par bsam// dpa' bo'i mdog ni nag po la// gnyis med
197b1(rgyud): 'khyud pa'i sbyor ba'o// su li 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dag / sku lus dkar po rnam par bsam// mkha' 'gro ma ni ser po mdog/ dpa' bo gnyis ni rab tu sbyor/ kha gdong gshin rje
197b2(rgyud): brtan la sogs// gzugs gnyis byed ni bud med nyid// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig tu// dgyes shing chags pas rnam par myos// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo dmar// mkha'
197b3(rgyud): 'gro ma ni ljang khu'o// sngar bshad rim pa'i mtshan ma rnams// de yang rigs kyi dbye bas so// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// mgo bo'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan/
197b4(rgyud): thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // phyag rgya drug gis bdag po dgod// thams cad rang rig cod pan can// ji lta ba yi rim pas sgom// mkha' 'gro'i dus kyi sbyor ba yis/
197b5(rgyud): ji lta'i rjes su rnams bsgoms nas// go cha'i gsang sngags dgod par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rim pa dag/ sngar bshad cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// dpa' bo'i yan lag rim pa
197b6(rgyud): sgom/ gsang zhing sba ba'i zhi gnas ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi bde 'khor lo// rtag tu mnyam par gzhag nas su// sbyor ba'i mchog ni rtag tu sgom// 'di ni su la'ang mi bstan te//
197b7(rgyud): de nyid su la'ang brjod mi bya// dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dag/ rtag tu bsgobs na dngos grub 'gyur// dam tshig rtag tu bsrung bya zhing // bza' dang bca' ba'ang spyad par
198a1(rgyud): byang 'gro zhing 'gro zhing dus kun tu// 'char nub dag tu rnam par sbyang // gang zhig ye shes 'di nyan pa// sngags pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// mngon par
198a2(rgyud): brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba sbyor ba'i sgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i ye shes mchog
198a3(rgyud): gyur pa// rig sngags gsang sngags rgya che ba'i// sgom pa bdag gis bshad pa yin// log pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// gang la'ang khyod kyis bshad mi bya// bla ma'i rim
198a4(rgyud): las ji ltar bstan// gang gis myur du shes 'gyur ba// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// sgyu 'phrul ye shes kyis bskul zhing // dad pa yang dag bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor spyod tshul
198a5(rgyud): gnas pa yin// zhugs shing glen la sdig ngan can// byas pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// sems can yongs su ma smin dang // phyi rol bstan bcos kyis 'chal pa// de dag/
198a6(rgyud): kun gyis mi shes te// mi shes mun pas khebs pa dang // khengs pa la ni rtag par dga'// nga rgyal la sogs gdug sems ldan// de kun gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi// spyod
198a7(rgyud): yul gsang ba mi shes so// he ru ka dpal yang dag 'jug/ slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// myur du dngos grub skyed byed de// 'phral du yid ches byed pa yin// sna
198b1(rgyud): tshogs sdom pa shes pa yin// cho ga'i bya ba bstan par bya// srid pa gsum po ma lus ni// de ni kun mkhyen bstan pa shes// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // zos pa dang ni
198b2(rgyud): dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur ba// de ltar de ni the tshom med// lha rnams bzlog ste bkod pa dang // sngags kyi dbye ba bzlog pa dang // dkyil 'khor kun yang
198b3(rgyud): bzlog pa dang // so so bsgom pa'ang mi bya ste// bzlog pa'i yi ge btus nas ni// sgom pa gsang ba bzlog pa ste// snying po thams cad sgrub pa yin// rtog pa thams cad
198b4(rgyud): bsdus pa dang // rgyud rnams kun gyi spyi yi ni// sems ni yongs su smin pa dag/ 'dir ni sbyor sogs sngags rnams kyi// dam tshig de ltar bstan pa yin// bde gshegs
198b5(rgyud): dbugs 'byin gsungs pa yin// dag pa'i lus ni skyon med pa// bsod nams chung ba'i sngags pas kyang // nga dga' bas ni rnyed par 'gyur// des na srung med bza' ba med//
198b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor bdag po med// bzlas dang brtul zhugs sbyin sreg med// mdor na sems bsdus tshul can yin// bzung byas rnam shes ye shes ni// bla mas bstan/
198b7(rgyud): las brtson las te// phyi rol gyi ni bstan bcos la// lam de shin tu ring ba nyid// rnal 'byor pa rnams thabs kyis ni// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la brtson pa// ston pa'i
199a1(rgyud): mtshan nyid bstan pa dang // dpa' bo'i de nyid bstan pa yin// skad cig rnam par rnal 'byor bdag/ skad cig rnam par phyag rgyar ldan// kun nas thams cad
199a2(rgyud): skad cig ste// skad cig gis ni gsang sngags brjod// pus mo sa la btsugs nas su// bdag nyid kyis ni gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan lha mos zhus pa ni// go 'phang rgya che gnyis
199a3(rgyud): med pa// 'di ni 'byung po kun la gnas// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rol// rdo rje snying pos gsungs pa ni// ci rigs bshad kyis legs par nyon// brtags pa'i yid kyis gzung bar bgyi// thams/
199a4(rgyud): cad bdag nyid rtag bzhugs par// gang zhig sngar ni bshad pa nyid// dkyil 'khor lus ni yin par bshad// de ni sgo dgu dag tu 'gyur// de la lte ba'i 'khor lo che// thams cad
199a5(rgyud): mkhyen pa zhes byar bshad// rdo rje can ni der zhugs pa// cha med cha ni rnam spangs pa// lus can rnams kyi nang na rol// lus las 'das shing gos pa med// la lar
199a6(rgyud): gzugs can dag tu bzhugs// la lar sna dang ngag dag dang // la lar rna bar sgra dag dang // la lar dri chen rdo rje chu// la lar tsher bar bcas pa'i sems// la lar skom
199a7(rgyud): dngal lar bkres// la lar khro dang la lar zhi// la lar bde la rnam par gzigs// la lar bud med 'dod chags te// la lar gsod dang 'joms pa ste// la lar rol mo
199b1(rgyud): rdung bar mdzad// la lar me tog 'bras bur gnas// la lar rol cing spyod par 'gyur// la lar srog tu rnam par gnas// la lar sa dang chu dang me// la lar 'byung ba chen po lnga/
199b2(rgyud): la lar rigs kyi bye brag gis// bram ze dang ni gdol pa dag/ la lar ma dang sring mo ru// la lar chung ma bu mo ru// la lar tshangs dang dbang ldan dang // khyab 'jug dang ni nyi ma nyid/
199b3(rgyud): la lar zla ba skar mar bcas// la lar nyin dang mtshan mor gyur// la lar khams gsum pa rnams kun// byed pa po dang mi zad rgyal// la lar zhi ba'i dbang gis zhum// mi gsal
199b4(rgyud): stong pa'i rdo rje can// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar pha rol bdud las rgyal// la lar byis pa'i rang bzhin nyid// la lar rgas shing 'khogs pa'o// la lar nang
199b5(rgyud): chen gyis zin pa// la lar rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// la lar sngo dang le brgan dang // la lar dkar dang ser ba'o// la lar sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// la lar sgrol ma gos dkar mo// la lar
199b6(rgyud): spyan dang mA ma kI// la lar dkar bzlog zhi ba mo// la lar 'dab chags mkha' lding dang // nam mkha' dang ni mkha' 'gro nyid// la lar klu dang sbrul chen po// la lar smad 'tshong
199b7(rgyud): spre'u dang ni// la lar rmi lam mthong ba dang // la lar gnyid kyis log pa nas/ la lar rlung dang mkhris pa dang // la lar khrag dang pags par 'gyur// la lar mya ngan dra
200a1(rgyud): ba dang // la lar sreg pa'i me dag yin// la lar mtho ris skye ba ste// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di lta bu// thams cad bdag nyid bzugs 'di la// lha gang mni rnam/
200a2(rgyud): spangs pa'i// de yi sgyu ma'i sna tshogs 'di'o// rtag pa min pa rdo rje can// gzugs med par ni b+ha ga'i nang // lte ba'i nang na pad+ma che// bcu drug thig gis thig gdab par// yi ge dang yang
200a3(rgyud): mnyam sbyor bas// kha sbyar bya ba byas pa yin// de dbus rtag tu gsang ba che// 'byin dang sdud par byed pa'o// de nyid rang nyid rdo rje can// gcig pu rang byung che ba'i lha// de ni sangs rgyas
200a4(rgyud): kun dngos zhes// mtshan ni rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu zhugs// thams cad mkhyen pas 'di bshad pa'am// mi 'gyur
200a5(rgyud): ba yi lam bshad pa// sgra ni nyag ma brgya yi cha// mchog gi gzugs can bsam pa ste// stong pa ma yin dmigs su med// yi ge med cing stong pa'ang med// gos pa med cing sa bon med//
200a6(rgyud): gzugs med mtshan ma'ang med pa ste// rnam shes rang gi dngos po ni// rnam shes ye shes dag tu bzung // thams cad gsal byed sgron ma ni// dang po'i mtshan ma dag tu blta//
200a7(rgyud): gsal byed glog gi cha tsam ste// mtshan ma gnyis pa dag tu brtag/ dkar po'i 'od kyi tshul can ni// phyogs bcu dag tu blta byas te// nyon mongs 'byin pa gsang ba yin// rnal
200b1(rgyud): 'byor pa yis rnam par brtag/ 'dod pa'i lha yi longs spyod ni// bzhi pa rnam shes dag tu bstan// gzugs dang reg sogs lha mo ni// phyogs kyi ye shes lnga po yin// drug pa gzugs
200b2(rgyud): med ye shes te// bdun pa dag ni chos kyi dbyings// brgyad par rang nyid 'dod bzhin du// sangs rgyas 'bras bu dag yin no// sbas pa lta dang lag pa dang // 'khyud dang gnyis gnyis la
200b3(rgyud): sogs pa// de bzhin gshegs pas dbugs 'byin gsungs// dgu pa bla ma bla ma ste// thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin// rnam pa gzhan dag rtswa dang 'dra// de nyid srog chags
200b4(rgyud): rnams kyi srog/ de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin// de nyid thams cad khyab byed de// lus kun la ni rnam par gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas ye shes te// he ru ka dpal yin par bshad//
200b5(rgyud): skyes pa ma ning la sogs nyid// phra ba'i snying po'ang 'dzin pa yin// ye shes dag tu 'byung de la// gang zhig sa la gnas rnams dang // bstan bcos dag ni ma lus dang // rig
200b6(rgyud): byed grub mthar gnas pa rnams// 'jig rten 'di dag gzhan dag tu// de med par ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rig byed grub pa'i mtha' rnams la// 'di ni snying po rab tu bshad// 'dug dang /
200b7(rgyud): ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug pa rdzogs pa nyid dag dang // byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang // ting 'dzin mchod pa bsdus pa yin// de nas cho ga ming gzhan pa// thabs dang /
201a1(rgyud): shes rab gnyis med pa// de nyid du ni kun skyes pa// 'byin dang sdud pa byed pa yin// a sA/ s+ya skaM/ u s+dza/ d+hA/ rbA/ e ye/ sa
201a2(rgyud): aM aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta dza Da b+ha Na/ ta tha da d+hA na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha k+ShaH/ au hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan lha de yin// mchog nyid lhag
201a3(rgyud): par gnas pa yid// lha kun gyi ni bskyed pa dang // bsgrub byas de bzhin shes byas nas// don dam mchog kyang de bzhin te// brgyad cu rtsa bzhi theg pa ste// sngags kyi spyod pa la gnas
201a4(rgyud): na/ des ni 'di ni nges rgyal te// thams cad shes rab thabs kyis 'gro// thog mar gsang sngags brjod par bya// dge dang mi dge gang yin pa// de ni lha tshogs rgyun yin to// sku rag
201a5(rgyud): gnas rnams thams cad yin// rtag tu 'di ni 'dzin byed pa// chos rnams thams cad rtogs pa yin// A li kA li mdun bsams nas// rnal 'byor chen po ngal sos te// bsam gyis
201a6(rgyud): mi khyab sems nyid de// sems kyang brtag par mi bya'o// sems de nyid kyang mi bsam ste// des ni 'dzin par thob par 'gyur// gang gis rgyud kun las gsang ba// khyod la yang ni
201a7(rgyud): bshad pa yin// 'di ni 'bad pas sba bya ste// gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i sdom// rnal 'byor ma sogs thams cad dang // dpa' bo'i yan lag thams cad kyi// rnal
201b1(rgyud): 'byor pa yis 'bras bu 'thob/ srid pa'i nang nas 'byung ba yin// bla ma'i rgyud kyi thabs la ni// bsnyen bkur med pa la mi bshad// gal te bshad na sdug bsngal zhing // sdug
201b2(rgyud): bsngal gyis ni sems kyang 'khor// sems ni rnam 'khor rnal 'byor pa// mya ngan 'das pa mi mthong ngo // ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang // kun smra bstan pa'i gtam yang/
201b3(rgyud): rjod par byed// lam yang ma bshad 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor lam ngan de dang 'dra bar bshad// he ru ka dpal sku'i yan lag/ sku kun brtan g.yo bdag nyid can/
201b4(rgyud): gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye nas dri ma med// zhing ri 'od byed shes par bya// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba// bdun pa mngon du gyur pa nyid// nye ba'i bdun pa sbyang dka'
201b5(rgyud): ba 'dus pa ring du song ba yin// nye ba'i 'dus pa mi g.yo ba// dur khrod legs pa'i blo gros nyid// nye ba'i dur khrod chos kyi sprin// shrI he ru ka'i gzhung spyod pa// 'di ni nang gi
201b6(rgyud): bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu sa rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma ni brda yi skad// mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og tu// dpa' bo'i yan lag brtan g.yo'i bdag/ thogs med dus su gang
201b7(rgyud): bstan pa// phyi nang bdag nyid can du gnas// dpal ldan khrag 'thung rgyal po che// 'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug gtso// kun tu phyag dang zhabs ldan zhing // kun tu mig dang mgo bo'i
202a1(rgyud): zhal// kun tu zos ldan 'jig rten na// thams cad g.yogs te rnam par bzhugs// de nas dngos grub bsgrub bya ba// bsam gtan ldan pa'i sems kyis te//
202a2(rgyud): sgrub pa po la phan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i de nyid gsungs pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// man ngag shin tu rnyed dka' ste// dpa' bo'i brda yi skad du ni// nga yis rgyud
202a3(rgyud): du sbas pa yin// gos ni phyag rgya lnga la sogs// shes rab yan lag phur bu dra// A li kA li zhes brjod pa// rgyu la sogs stong sngon 'gro yin// 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa
202a4(rgyud): nas/ ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan nyid// bdud rtsi tshom byed mya ngan 'das// lag pa'i mchod pas dbang bskur ba// go cha chen pos yang dag srung // sngags rnams kun gyis mchod/
202a5(rgyud): pa yin// de ltar de nyid bcu bzhi ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad pa yin// mi mchog gang zhig kun spyod pa// sdig pa thams cad rnam dag bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob cing //
202a6(rgyud): skye dang dga' bar bde gshegs kyi// rigs skyes rgyal po chos ldan 'gyur// de ltar cho ga ldan byas na// dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// zla ba nya la sa steng du// 'di ltar rnal
202a7(rgyud): 'byor pas bsgoms na// de yi bsod nams gyur pa yin// rtse klu ma la sogs pa kun// de la bsod nams gang gyur des// bdag gzhan yang dag sa shes ldan// bsam
202b1(rgyud): gtan sems pa tsam gyis sam// klog cing 'don dang bris pa yis// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur ba'am// yang na 'khor lo sgyur ba thob// rnal 'byor ma rnams 'pho ba'i tshe/
202b2(rgyud): dpal ldan khrag 'thung sogs mkha' 'gro// lag na me tog sna tshogs thogs// rgyal mtshan ba dan sna tshogs dang // rol mo'i sgra ni sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs glu yi mchod pas
202b3(rgyud): mchod// 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog 'di// mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnas su khyer// de 'dra'i dpal chen rnal 'byor pa// sa stengs su ni rnyed par dka'// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla
202b4(rgyud): ma'i bla ma las/ gsang ba'i yi ge bskyed cing sgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// cho ga'i rim bzhin sngags btu ba/
202b5(rgyud): gcig tu dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mkhas pas sa ni bsnyams nas su// bshang gci yis ni byug par bya// ma hA rak+Sha byugs nas kyang // bdag nyid he ru kar byas nas// rigs/
202b6(rgyud): ngan shan pa mo blangs nas// me tog la sogs gdab par bya// dpa' bo chen po'i bdug spos dbul// zhag la sogs pa'i mar me sbar// cang te'u dril bu brdung bar bya// glu
202b7(rgyud): dang gar gyis mchod par bya// lha yi rol mo'i bye brag dang // phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba// lus ni phyag rgya drug dang ldan// A li kA li mnyam byas te// sde tshan la ni thim par
203a1(rgyud): byu bzhi bzhi ru ni shes byas la// thub pa'i mchog gis rgyas par bya// der gnas dpa' bo btu bar bya// don 'dod thams cad grub byed pa// bzhi pa'i lnga pa
203a2(rgyud): gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lta ba dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // mthar gnas pa/
203a3(rgyud): yi bzhi pa dang // de nyid kyi ni gnyis pa dang // sum cu pa ni yang dag blang // nyi shu drug pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin brgya yi phyed phyed dang // de nas sum cu rtsa gsum dang // dang po'i/
203a4(rgyud): dang po nyid dag dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // dang po yi ni gsum pa nyid// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // lnga pa yi yang /
203a5(rgyud): bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // dang po yi ni dang po dang // de bzhin
203a6(rgyud): bcu gcig pa nyid dang // de bzhin mkhas pas bcu drug pa// gsum pa'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// bzhi pa'i gsum pa gang yin dang // ut+pa li ni
203a7(rgyud): gnyis pa nyid// dang po'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yang ngo // dang po yi ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // de bzhin sum/
203b1(rgyud): cu rtsa gcig blang // bco lnga pa ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa// uSh+ma yi ni/
203b2(rgyud): tha ma nyid// sum cu rtsa gnyis pa nyid dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // uSh+ma yi ni gsum pa dang // gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa//
203b3(rgyud): an+tas+tha yi dang po dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// an+tas+tha yi gnyis pa dang // de bzhin yang ni sum cu pa// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // uSh+ma yi ni dang po dang // de bzhin yi ge
203b4(rgyud): nyid dang // bzhi pa'i dang po gang yin dang // uSh+ma'i dang po gang yin dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// dang po'i gnyis pa gang yin dang // gsum pa'i dang po nyid dag dang //
203b5(rgyud): dang po'i gsum pa gang yin dang // bzhi pa'i bzhi pa gang yin dang // an+ta s+tha yi gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i yang ni lnga pa dang // yi ge bya ni de nas blang // dang po yi ni bzhi
203b6(rgyud): pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dag/ de nas brgyad pa nyid dag dang // bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // lnga pa yi yang lnga pa dang // nyi shu rtsa gsum pa yang blang //
203b7(rgyud): de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // slar yang nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug pa// nyi shu rtsa lnga yang dag blang // sum cu rtsa
204a1(rgyud): gsum nyid dag dang // bzhi pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // bzhi pa yin
204a2(rgyud): bzhi pa dang // dang po'i dang po nyid dag dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bdun pa// an+d+ras+thA yi bzhi pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa gcig pa// uSh+ma yi ni gnyis pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug
204a3(rgyud): pa thog ma yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // drug pa yi ni gnyis pa nyid// thog ma yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa
204a4(rgyud): dang gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // bdun pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // bzhi pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa
204a5(rgyud): dang lnga pa yi ni lnga pa la// bzhi pa yi ni gnas su bya// lnga pa yi ni thog ma la// steng du sbyar ning me dang bcas// uSh+mA yi ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi thog ma dang //
204a6(rgyud): bzhi pa yi ni thog ma la// gzi brjid can gyis gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi yang dang po ste// ka dang sha yi yi ge ni// thog ma dag ni blangs nas su//
204a7(rgyud): lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi dang po ste// de bzhin yang ni bsdus te blangs// drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni dang po dang // uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa blang //
204b1(rgyud): bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpas phye ba yin// uSh+man yi bzhi pa nyid// nyi ma yang ni gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa la// me yis 'og tu sbyar bar bya//
204b2(rgyud): gshegs su gsol dang yang dag ldan// lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu gnyis pa nyid// drug pa yi ni gnyis de bzhin// bcu gcig pa dang nyi shu gnyis//
204b3(rgyud): gsum pa'i dang po blangs nas ni// bzhi pa yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bdun pa'i bzhi pa blang bar bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig
204b4(rgyud): de blangs nas// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi yang thog ma dang // gnyis pa yi ni yi ge drug/ lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa la// k+Sha yi yi ge de bzhin no// nyi shu rtsa
204b5(rgyud): bzhi de blangs nas// slar yang bsdu ba bshad pa yin// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // uSh+man yi gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang //
204b6(rgyud): nyi mas slar yang gdab par bya// yi ge nyi shu btab nas ni// bcu drug pa yis stan du byas// 'og tu me yi gzi brjid can// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi
204b7(rgyud): gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yis dbye// bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang // gnyis pa
205a1(rgyud): yi yang gsum pa dang // nyi ma'i bu yis rnam par dbye// uSh+mAn yi bzhi pa dang // dang po pi ni gsum pa la// gzi brjid kyis ni gdan du byas// bdun pa yi ni bzhi
205a2(rgyud): pa dang // bco lnga pa yis gdan gnyis bya// uSh+ma na yi gsum pa nyid// lnga pa yi ni thog ma la// bcu drug pa yis gdan du byas// nyi shu rtsa gcig de yis blangs// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma
205a3(rgyud): dang nga mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum pa dang // dang po yi ni gsum
205a4(rgyud): pa dang // uSh+man yi gsum pa nyid// nyi shu rtsa gcig de bzhin te// nyi ma yi ni mnyam par mnan// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // gsum pa yi ni gsum
205a5(rgyud): pa la/ gzi brjid kyis ni gsal bar byas// mthar gnas pa yi thog mar shes// der yang bcu drug pa yis gdab// gnyis pa yi ni gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa drug
205a6(rgyud): pa dang po yi ni gnyis pa dang // thog mo yi yang dang po dang // bzhi pa yi yang gsum pa dang // thog ma yi yang dang po dang // gnyis pa yi yang dang po dang // de bzhin du ni bcu bzhi pa'o// /
205a7(rgyud): bcu bzhi uSh+ma bzhi pa dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun gdan du byas// ya sogs brgyad po'i sa bon dang // nyi ma yi ni gzi brjid can// gsum pa yi yang gsum pa dang // bco lnga pa yis
205b1(rgyud): gdan du byas// gnyis pa yi yang gsum pa dang // gsum pa yi yang lnga pa dang // ka sha'i yi ge sa bon te// nyi shu lnga pa gdan du byas// slar yang bsdu bar bya ba ste// sku ni legra/
205b2(rgyud): par rabatu ba ste// dbang chen gyis ni gdan du byas// uSh+ma yi ni bzhi pa dang // bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin sum cu gsum pa nyid// sum
205b3(rgyud): cu rtsa gsum de bzhin te// lnga pa'i bdag nyid kun bsdu ba'o// de nas kyang ni btu bya ba// gnyis pa yang ni de bzhin te// gnyis pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang //
205b4(rgyud): uSh+man yi gsum pa dang // de bzhin nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa// bdun pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi ni gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi yang bzhi pa dang // drug pa yi yang gsum pa dang //
205b5(rgyud): gnyis gnyis rkang pa bzhi pa ste// ka ra ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ k+Sho b+ha ya k+Sho b+ha ya/ dza~M dza~M/ 3/ pho pheM/ phaT phuT/ da ha daha/ pa tsa
205b6(rgyud): b+hak+Sha d+hak+Sha/ ba sa ru d+hi rAn+d+ha mA lA ba laM bi ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sap+ta pAM tA laM ga te/ b+hU dzaMg sarbaM bA/ tan+t+ra ya tadz+dza ya/ A kar+N+Na A kaD+D+h+ya/ tr-idz+r-i/ dz+hiSh+Ta/ Sh+Ta/ hAr+tha/ ts+lid+hA
205b7(rgyud): d+hun+su/ kai li ki li/ si laM saM l-i/ hi li hi li/ d+hi li d+hi li hUM hUM phaT/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang sngags te// bya ba thams cad sgrub byed pa'o// 'di las shin tu mchog gyur pa//
206a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum na yod min te// dpal ldan khrag 'thung sngags shes na// gzhan dag snying po med rtsar mtshungs// rtsa ba'i sngags su bshad pa yin// mngon
206a2(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyi yi ge btu ba'i rdo rgyus kyi cho ga'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bdun pa'o// / gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis// snying
206a3(rgyud): po'i yig bdun nye snying po// ya tshogs brgyad pa'i sa bon dang // de bzhin gug kyang bcu gnyis kyis// yi ge bar ma dor byas pa// yan lag drug ni he ru ka/ dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyar
206a4(rgyud): brda re'u mig drug tu bsgom pa ste// he ru ka li bdag por 'gyur// yi ge gcig tu yang dag gnas// oM na ma swA hA bau ShiT hUM hUM phaT dang yang dag ldan// sgrub pos snying por shes par bya//
206a5(rgyud): dang po snying kha nyid du ste// gnyis pa spyi bor shes par bya// gsum pa spyi gtsug dag tu sbyar// bzhi pa go char gyur pa yin// lnga pa mig tu gyur pa ste// drug pa mtshon cha zhes byar 'dod/
206a6(rgyud): de nas dbyangs yig bcu gsum nyid// yi ge gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gcig yang dag sbyar// yi ge drug pas brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi bzhi pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge bdun
206a7(rgyud): pa nyid kyang sbyar// dbyangs lag bcu gcig pa nyid de// sekhas pas yi ge brgyad par gyur// dbyangs mig gnas pa dang sbyar ba'o// yi ge dgu pas brgyan par bya// dbyangs kyi mi
206b1(rgyud): ge gnyis pa nyid// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa ni// yi ge nyi shu gcig pa gzung // mkhas pas yi ge bcu bzhi pa// yi ge nyi shu pa dang sbyar// dbyangs/
206b2(rgyud): kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dbyangs yig bco lngar yang dag ldan// yi ge bcu drug pa mdzes bya// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang ldan pa'i// yi ge bcu bdun pa ru
206b3(rgyud): 'dod// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa nyid dang ri// yi ge bco brgyad pa ru sbyar// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pa nyid// yi ge nyi shu gcig par sbyar// phyi mo'i lnga pa dang yang sbyar// yi ge nyi shu
206b4(rgyud): gsum par sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa nyid ni// yi ge nyi shu bzhi par sbyar// sde tshan dang po blangs nas ni// yi ge nyi shu lnga par sbyar// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan par/
206b5(rgyud): yi ge nyi shu rtsa drug 'gyur// yi ge nyi shu brgyad dag ni// yi ge bco lnga pa dang sbyar// gsum pa'i dang por yang dag ldan// 'og gi cha ni me dang bcas// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis
206b6(rgyud): par sbyar// yi ge nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// yi ge sum cu rtsa gcig par// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// yi ge sum cu gnyis pa yang // dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan par
206b7(rgyud): bya yi ge sum cu rtsa gsum pa// nyi mar yang dag ldan par bya// phyi mo'i bzhi pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum cu bzhir ldan pa'i// 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// phyi mo'i
207a1(rgyud): lnga pa nyid dag ni// sum cu bdun par yang dag ldan// mkha' 'gro ma rnams sgrub byed yin// sum cu brgyad pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang gyur/
207a2(rgyud): ba' lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa ni// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// me dang 'og tu bsgrub par bya// bzhi bcu gsum pa nyid dag ni// dbyangs yig
207a3(rgyud): lnga pa nyid dang sbyar// yi ge bzhi bcu lnga pa ni// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag kyang // bzhi bcu rtsa drug par ldan pa// dpa' bo thams cad rab mchod cing /
207a4(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa bdun pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'dod// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa// dbyangs yig lnga pa nyid dag gis// mdzes pa mchog
207a5(rgyud): ni yin par 'dod// lnga bcu rtsa gnyis pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang sbyar ba// lha rnams thams cad 'grub byed pa// 'di nyid yin par the tsom med// de bzhin lnga bcu rtsa gsum
207a6(rgyud): pa'ang // dbyangs yig bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// yi ge rnams las 'di mchog ste// dgra rnams nges par gsod byed yin// sde tshan bzhi las de nyid do// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa drug pa/
207a7(rgyud): dbyangs yig drug pa dag dang sbyar// an+ta s+tha yi bzhi pa dang // dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba // de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// yi ge lnga
207b1(rgyud): bcu rtsa dgur 'gyur// yi ge drug cu rtsa gcig nyid// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// 'di nyid mchog ni yin par bshad// de bzhin drug cu rtsa gnyis pa// dbyangs yig gnyis/
207b2(rgyud): bar sbyar ba ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi mchog tu 'dod// yi ge drug cu rtsa gsum nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig dag dang ldan// mdzes pa'i yi ge kun mchog yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi pa
207b3(rgyud): nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpas phye ba dag/ dbyangs yig gnyis par yang dag ldan// grub sbyin thar pa chen po'o// yi ge drug cu rtsa lnga pa// me la gnas par yang dag ldan// dbyangs
207b4(rgyud): yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// dngos grub kun sbyin bde gshegs gsungs// yi ge drug cu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig gsum pa dang sbyar ba// bya ba kun las grub sbyin par// de ltar/
