207b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// yi ge drug cu rtsa bdun pa// yi ge gnyis pa yang dag ldar// rnal 'byor ma yi dgos pa kun// 'di nyid byed par the tsom med// drug cu brgyad
207b6(rgyud): pa nyid dag las// der ni yi ge ba sbyar ba// 'og gi char ni brtag par bya// yi ge bdun cu rtsa gcig pa// yi ge gnyis par yang dag sbyar// yi ge kun la mdzes pa ni// 'di nyid yin
207b7(rgyud): par the tsom med// sum cu rtsa bzhi pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar ba dag/ gdod nas grub pa yin par ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs// yi ge bdun cu lnga pa
208a1(rgyud): nyid ma mo'i drug pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog yin te// dge ba kun las dam pa yin// bdun cu rtsa drug pa nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan
208a2(rgyud): zhing / 'og tu me dang ldan pa las// gzhan dag mdzes pa yod ma yin// yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun pa// der ni de dang sbyar bar bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi mdzes par 'dod// bdun cu rtsa brgyad pa
208a3(rgyud): nyid ni// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dag dang sbyar// rgyu yi mchog ni yin par 'dod// yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gcig pa// bzhi pa'i mtha' yis khyad par dbye// gdod nas grub byed 'di yin te/
208a4(rgyud): dngos grub kun la 'jug byed pa'o// yi ge brgyad cu rtsa gnyis pa// de bzhin dbyangs yig gnyis par sbyar// phyi mo yi ni lnga pa la// de bzhin yi ge brgyad cu brgyad// ma mo yi ni lnga pa dang //
208a5(rgyud): brgyud cu dgu pa de bzhin te// ma mo lta pa grangs byas te// de bzhin yi ge dgu bcu pa// ma mo'i lnga pa blangs byas te// yi ge dgu bcu gcig par sbyor// ma mo yi ni gnyis pa dang /
208a6(rgyud): yi ge dgu bcu rtsa drug pa// dbyangs yig gnyis par ldan pa yi// yi ge dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa// gdug pa thams cad skrag byed pa// ma mo kun gyi bde ba'i gnas// dbyangs kyi yi
208a7(rgyud): ge bcu gsum pa// yi ge gnyis pa dag dang ldan// ma mo bcu gsum pa nyid ni// yi ge lnga pa dag dang sbyar// gdug pa thams cad 'khrug byed de/ mkha' 'gro mo yi bde
208b1(rgyud): ba'i gnas// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa yis ni// yi ge brgyad pa dag dang sbyar// bco lnga pa yis rab tu sbyar// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa nyid ni// yi ge dgu pa dag dang sbyar/
208b2(rgyud): steng du thig le yang dag gnas// yi ge dag ni sgrub pa ste// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par yin// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ge bcu gnyis pa dang sbyar// steng du bon dus
208b3(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu gcig pa// yi ge bcu gsum pa dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyad// 'byung po kun ni skrag byed cing // sgrub pa pos ni dga' ba
208b4(rgyud): yin/ dbyangs kyi yi ge lnga pa las// yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis sbyar// dbyangs kyi gsum pa nyid dag ni// yi ge sum cu gsum dang sbyar// ma mo gnyis pa nyid dag dang // yi ge
208b5(rgyud): sum cu rtsa bzhir sbyar// dbyangs kyi gnyis pa dag dang ni/ yi ge sum cu drug dang sbyar// dang po yi ni gnyis pa dag/ yi ge sum cu bdun dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum
208b6(rgyud): pa ni yi ge bzhi bcu dang sbyar ba// ma mo bcu gcig pa nyid ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gcig dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bzhi bcu gnyis par sbyar//
208b7(rgyud): dbyangs kyi gsum pa dag dang ni// yi ge bzhi bcu bzhi dang sbyar// ma mo'i gnyis pa nyid dang yang // yi ge bzhi bcu brgyad par sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge/
209a1(rgyud): bzhi bcu dgu dang sbyar// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ phyi mo'i lnga pa nyid dang ni// yi ge lnga bcu lnga dang sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa// thig les kyang ri
209a2(rgyud): rnam par brgyan// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis par sbyar// yi ge lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa// thig les mgo la mnan par bya//
209a3(rgyud): dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa dag/ yi ge drug cu drug cu sbyar// phyi mo gnyis pa nyid kyang ni// yi ge drug cu bdun dang sbyar// gdug pa'i dngos grub kun 'grub cing // sgrub pa po la dpal
209a4(rgyud): yang stsol// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pa dang // yi ge bdun cu pa dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// phye mo yi ni bzhi pa yis// yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar/ bco lnga pa/
209a5(rgyud): ni rab blangs te// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi pa dang ni// yi ge bdun cu bzhi par sbyar// phyi mo bcu bzhi dag pa ni// yi ge bdun cu gsum dang sbyar// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar/
209a6(rgyud): dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pa ni// yi ge bdun cu bzhi dang sbyar// phyi mo'i yi ge gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun cu bdun dang sbyar// thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// phyi mo yi ni
209a7(rgyud): gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun cu brgyad dang sbyar// thig les gnyis kyi rnam par brgyan// phyi mo yi ni gnyis pa yang // yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar// ma mo'i bzhi pa nyid da
209b1(rgyud): ni yi ge brgyad cu pa dang sbyar// thig les mgo la mnan par bya// dbyangs yig bzhi pa dag kyang ni// yi ge bdun cu dgu dang sbyar// thig le sgra yis bskyed pa ste/
209b2(rgyud): thig les kyang ni rnam par brgyan// dbyangs kyi yi ge gsum pa dag/ yi ge bcu drug pa dang sbyar// 'og dang steng gi yi ge grangs// dgu bcu rtsa bdun bshad pa ste// 'di ni rtsa
209b3(rgyud): ba'i gsang sngags su// mkhas pa rnams kyis shes par bya// dngos grub kyi ni gnas yin zhing // mkha' 'gro'i snying ni 'joms pa na// dpal ldan khrag 'thung lha rigs rgyal/
209b4(rgyud): bklags pas grub pa don yod pa// oM ni dang por sbyar bar bya// hUM hUM phaT ni mthar sbyar ba// 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te// grub pa thams cad grub byed yin// de nas rang
209b5(rgyud): nyid bdag nyid kyi// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni rba ba yi// 'khor lo bde mchog yin par 'dod// oM shrI badz+ra he he ru ru kaM hUM hUM phaT/ DA ki nI dzA la
209b6(rgyud): shaM ba raM swA hA/ hA sA raM ba saM la dzA nI ki DA Ta pha hUM hUM kaM ru ru he he dz+wa ba shrI au/ rig pa'i rgyal po'i snying po ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// Ta pa hUM hUM ha ha hrIHoM/ yi ge baM dang yau dang
209b7(rgyud): ni yi ge mo dang tha nyid dang // hUM dang phaT ces bshad pa yin// oM ba badz+ra bA rA hi/ haM yau ya mi nI/ hriM moM mo ha ni/ hreM dzI saM tsa la nI/ tsU hUM sa twA sa naM/ phaT phaT tsaN+Di ka
210a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu bsgrags// re'u mig drug la rnam par sgom// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ go cha'i snying po bsgom pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu
210a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang lha mo yi// snying po bla med bshad par bya// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa nI ye hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ lha mo'i snying po'i sbyor ba ni// bcu gsu/
210a3(rgyud): pa ni bdag nyid dge/ pad+mo dbus su phag mo ste// 'dab ma la ni lha mo dgod// sgo bzhi dag gi phyogs su ni// lha mo'i snying po rnam par sgom// oM las byung ba'i rta gdong dang // rdo rje
210a4(rgyud): snying po gdug pa'i sgra// drag po yang ni g.yo ma dang // mi 'phro ma dang dri med ma// hUM mdzad ma dang ldan lha mo// sreg lugs ma dang phaT byed ma// rang byung ma dang bcu gnyis te/
210a5(rgyud): ha mdzad g.yas pa'i gtso bo yin// rdo rje phagu mo zhes b+ha ba// dngos grub thams cad sgrol mdzad pa// sngo dang ser dang dper ba dang // ljang khu steng zhal dkar po ste// spyan gsu
210a6(rgyud): pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa ste// g.yas brkyang bzhugs shing thod 'phreng can// gsus pa sbom zhing skra grol ba/ phyogs kyi gos can 'dzin pa ste/
210a7(rgyud): rang gi thabs dang sbyor bas gnas// 'jigs byed tsa mur+t+ti 'jigs mos// zhabs kyi 'og tu gnon pas bzhugs// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ mdung dang gri gug cang te'u dang // rdo rje/
210b1(rgyud): dril bu zhags pa dang // lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo bo dang // dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub dang // na ra'i pags pa steng du brkyang // ska rags dang ni dpung rgyan dang // phyag rgya lnga
210b2(rgyud): yis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thugs rje khro gnyer 'jigs pa ste// 'dab la lha mo thams cad dgod// ma mo dag ni brgyad pa ste// ser dang dmar dang ldang ba
210b3(rgyud): steng lho ni sngo ba'i mdog can te// me phyogs dmar la dud kha ste// sngo ba dang ni dkar ba dang // dbang ldan du ni dgod pa ste// spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba// phyag rgya lnga dang yang
210b4(rgyud): dag ldan// skyil krung phyed pas legs pas bzhugs// thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// phyogs kyi gos can bzhin rnam bsgyur// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs//
210b5(rgyud): thugs rje'i chags pas rnam par myos// rdo rje'i mchog ni gar mdzad cing // zod pa rak+ta sa bkang ba dang // dril bu cang te'u sgra yang sgrog/ lha rnams dga' bar byed pa yin/
210b6(rgyud): sgo rnams su ni sgo srungs te// dbang po'i steng du rnam par bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// spyan gsum pa la dbu sgra mdzes// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan
210b7(rgyud): can 'phreng ba'i rgyan gyis sdud pa ste// zod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje mgo bo phyag na bsnams// thams cad rnam bsgyur gsus pa 'phyang // thams cad mgo bo'i 'phreng bas
211a1(rgyud): brgyan// sngo dang ljang dang dkar po ste// ser zhing phyag bzhi mdog gnyis pa// gcer bu pad+ma'i rgya yang che// rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// thams cad rang thabs
211a2(rgyud): gnyis pa ste// bcu gsum pa ni rnam par sgom// snying po mchog ni sgom pa yin// 'dod pa thams cad rab tu stsol// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las go cha dang lha mo'i snying
211a3(rgyud): po bsgom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// shin tu rnyed dka' dgod pa ste// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// myur
211a4(rgyud): du dngos grub 'grub pa'o// sa yi cha ni mnyam yid 'ong // tsan dan gyis ni nye bar bsku// dri bzang dri ldan sa la ni// me tog sil ma gcal bkram zhim// spos kyi dri yis nyams dgar bya//
211a5(rgyud): bdag gi bya ba kun byas shing // phyogs bcing ba ni byas nas su// de nas rdza rnga'i bcing byas te// re'u mig bzhin dgu zlum la// yi ge'i phyi mo dgod par bya// der gnas pa las dpa'
211a6(rgyud): bo ni/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed btu// rim bzhin 'byung dang rim min sa// dbyangs dang yi ge grub pos so// thub pa de lta'i grangs 'gyur la// re'u mig sum cu gnyis pa blang //
211a7(rgyud): lnga pa yi ni khyad par bya// brgya phyed phyed pa yang dag blang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa yis phye// re'u mig sum cu drug pa blang // gsum pa yis ni khyad par dbye// de nas sum cu
211b1(rgyud): gnyis pa zang // lnga pa lis ni khyad par bya// de nas nyi shu lnga pa gzung // nyi shu bzhi pa dag dung sbyar/ sam+ba cu rtsa gsum yang dag blang // re'u mig bco lnga la yir ldan// lnga pa dag/
211b2(rgyud): dang yang dgra bcus// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung // bcu gcig pa yang de bzhin no// mdzes pa mchog ni yin par 'dod// re'u mig gi ni bcu dbu pa// me yi bu dang yang dag
211b3(rgyud): ldan/ re'u mig gsum par rnam par dbye// mtshan brgyad pa'i sa bon la// re'u mig sum cu drug pa dang // yang dag ldan pa'i yi ger 'gyur// slar yang yi ge de dag nyid/
211b4(rgyud): 'dod pa'i don kun grub byed yin// de nas rang byung blangs nas su// re'u mig la ni lnga par sbyar// spyi bor thig le dag dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung // bcu gcig/
211b5(rgyud): pa yang de bzhin no// don kun grub byed ces bya ba'i// tshig ni gnyis pa yin par bshad// re'u mig bcu dgu pa nyid la// nyi shu rtsa bdun pa yis phye// gsum pa dag
211b6(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// sum cu gsum pa legs blangs te// re'u mig ni gnyis par sbyar// nyi shu pa dang yang dag ldan// mdzes pa'i mchog ni yin par 'dod// de bzhin nyi
211b7(rgyud): gu gcig pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa yin// lan gnyis bzlas pa'i tshig tu ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag ste btu// de nas go rims bzlog pas gzung /
212a1(rgyud): re'u mig las ni dang po nyid// bzhi pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// de bzhin bco lnga pa dang sbyar// de nas nyi shu gnyis pa gzung // bcu gcig pa yang de
212a2(rgyud): bzhin no// chos don 'dod dang thar pa yi// tshig ni gsum pa yin par bshad// re'u mig gnyis pa'i sa bon dang // re'u mig sum cu drug pa nyid// de bzhin nyi shu drug pa dang //
212a3(rgyud): sum cu gsum pa yang dag blang // re'u mig bcu gsum pa yir ldan// re'u mig las ni bcu pa nyid// go rims bzlog pa sgrub pos zang // re'u mig las ni bcu dgu pa/
212a4(rgyud): re'u mig nyi shu gsum pa la// gnyis pa dag ni yang dag ldan// steng du thig les brgyan par bya// de nas chu yis sa bon gzung // brgyad pa yang ni de bzhin te// me yi bu yis khyad
212a5(rgyud): par dbye// yi ge hUM phaT mtha' ru sbyar// 'di ni khams gsum rgyal zhes bya// sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam brgyan pa'o// oM ni sku la gsal byed yin// hUM dang phaT ni mtha' ru/
212a6(rgyud): sbyar/ rig rgyal 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags// 'di ni ma byung 'byung mi 'gyur// de nyid bsdus dang dpal mchog dang // bde mchog rdo rje 'jigs byed du// khro bo bzhi dang yang
212a7(rgyud): dag ldan// sku brgyad dang ni bcas pa ru// dkyil 'khor srung ba'i don du ni// gdug pa kun la khyad par du// 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis kyang // brtag mi dgos par 'chi bar
212b1(rgyud): 'gyur// sha chen dag gis thams cad kun// rdo rje yang ni med par bshad// rnal 'byor thun mong brjod pa ni// dngos grub kun gyis 'bras bskyed pa'o// oM su b+ha ni su b+ha du d+hu
212b2(rgyud): phaT oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga b+hI badz+ra huM hUM phaT/ 'di ni gdug pa thams cad du// 'jigs byed mi bzad par bshad do//
212b3(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams kyi sa yi mchog/ pad+ma'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// phyag ni bcu drug yang dag ldan// zhal brgyad
212b4(rgyud): pa la bzhin rnam bsgyur// zhal gyi mche ba rnam par gtsigs// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// thams cad kun gyi rnam par sdud// rdo rjes
212b5(rgyud): mtshan pa'i phyag rgya drug/ sku lus drug po thugs rje'i nyams// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// dbang ldan gyi ni thod pa gnon// u ma mchog gi ku tsa gnon// khros pa'i
212b6(rgyud): spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// sku la mgo yi do shal can// mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dbu la bcings// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// 'jig rten gsum rgyal de bzhin te/
212b7(rgyud): lcags kyu sdigs mdzub 'ching ba ste// dpral ba'i steng du yang dag gnas// thugs ka dpral ba phyag rgya ste/ bgegs ni rnam par gnon pa yin// zod pa dang ni kha
213a1(rgyud): nAM 'dzin// ral gri lcags kyu 'chang ba ste// mdung dang mgo bo cang te'u dang // na ra'i pags pa'i steng du ste// phyag ni bcu drug de bzhin no// stag gi pags pa
213a2(rgyud): gos su mnabs// rang rig gnyis med bde ba'i sku// sngo dang dkar dang ser ba dang // dmar po de bzhin g.yon pa mdzes// dkar dang sngo dang ser ba dang // steng gi zhal ni dmar po ste//
213a3(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la dmar ba'i spyan// khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// las rnams thams cad byed pa dge/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje rdo rje sngon// bskyod pa'i rdo rje nyid dang ni// mi g.yo ba yi
213a4(rgyud): rdo rje ste// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ba dang // dud kha ngur sdig bsres pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal/ zod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// g.yas brkyang ba yi
213a5(rgyud): zhabs kyis ni// bdud bzhi po ni rnam par gnon// na ra'i rus pas sku brgyan cing // sna tshogs khro bo'i rigs kyang 'phro// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// rdo rje sdigs mdzub brkyang ba/
213a6(rgyud): ste rang gi rig dang gnyis med 'khyud// khro bo'i lta ba gzigs mdzad cing // dril bu phyag mtshan yang dag ldan// 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya 'ching ba ste// 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag
213a7(rgyud): rgya yis// khro bo thams cad bcings pa yin// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// spyan gsum mi bzad 'jigs pa ste// tho ba dbyug to mda' dang ni// ral gri dril bu de
213b1(rgyud): bzhin te// yang na rdo rje dril bu dang // thams cad khro bo'i rigs rjes 'gro// 'khyud pa'i phyag kyang de bzhin te// nal gsum pa la phyag drug pa// thams cad spyan gsum dngos grub
213b2(rgyud): mchog/ sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor dngos grub mchog dam pa// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam par dag/ yi ge'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha huM
213b3(rgyud): hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA badz+ra hu hUM phaT/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma mthong nas// thams cad bskyed par
213b4(rgyud): rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor chen po sbyor ba ste// kha sbyar lnga yi ngo bo nyid// rnal 'byor pa yi dkyil 'khor yin// snying po mchog gi sgom pa yin// de bzhin khyi dang phag gi
213b5(rgyud): sha bzangs kyi gtsug pud can de bzhin// mngon spyod kyi ni bya ba la// bza' dang sbyin sreg gtor ma bya// ma lus lus pa med grub cing // rgyal srid thams cad rab grub
213b6(rgyud): 'gyur// dung dang nya phyis mu tig ste// gsum char rgyu las byung yin na// chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi// thod pa la ni su zhig smod// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// zla ba phyed
213b7(rgyud): pas rgyan du byas// dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang yin par bshad// khrag 'thung rdo rje can rnam pa// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ srung ba zhal bzhi par byin gyis brlabs pa
214a1(rgyud): khro bo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rdo rgyus kyis bris pa rdo rje hUM mdzad bskyed pa'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sde tshan brgya
214a2(rgyud): ni rnam sgom pa// mkha' dbyings pad+ma'i dbus gnas par// khrag 'thung rdo rje rnam par sgom// zhal lnga pa la phyag bcu pa// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs
214a3(rgyud): kyis bzhugs// zhal rnam bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa ste// mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// drag po zla ba phyed pa 'dzin// sna tshogs rdo rjes
214a4(rgyud): dbu la mnan// ral pa'i cod pan 'ching ba ste// phyag rgya drug gi mtshan gyis brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su ma na bas// rig pa gnyis med bde ba'i nyams// sku la thod
214a5(rgyud): rlon do shal can// thugs rje'i nyams kyis khyab par mos// dkar dang sngo dang sprin gyi gzugs// sku ni sgeg cing ldem bag can// g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal dag ni// ser dang
214a6(rgyud): dmar dang ldang ba dang // dud pa yi ni mdog can no// rdo rje dril bus mnyam ldan pas// rang gi rig dang yang dag 'khril// tshangs pa bshus nas mnabs par mdzad// rgyab tu nges
214a7(rgyud): par 'dzin pa yin// zod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // mdung dang cang te'u gri gug dang // thod pa dag ni 'dzin pa ste// bcom ldan pa hUM nges 'byung ba// 'jigs byed rang gi rlung mar
214b1(rgyud): bcas// zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan par sbyar// shar 'dab lha mor dgod pa ste// ji srid lho phyogs de bzhin te// me la sogs pa'ang dgod par bya// de srid dbang ldan sogs de bzhin//
214b2(rgyud): a yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// ka yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// tsa yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// Ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dag ste// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // sngo ba'i mdog can lho phyogs
214b3(rgyud): so/ dmar dang dud kha ljang khu dang // ser po dbang ldan yang dag gnas// ta yi mkha' 'gro ma dang ni// pa yi mkha' 'gro ma de bzhin// de nas ya yi mkha' 'gro ma// sha yi mkha'
214b4(rgyud): 'gro ma brgyad pa// de dag kun ni spyan gsum ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po yi// rkang pa g.yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon// rnam bsgyur mche
214b5(rgyud): ba rnam gtsigs zhal// phyogs kyi gos mchog 'dzin pa ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// skra grol thugs rje khro bo bzhin// drag po yul 'khrug byed pa ste// 'dod pa'i don kun
214b6(rgyud): grub byed yin// 'gro ba thams cad smoran byed de// thams cad ci 'dod rdzogs pa yin// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan pa// sde tshan mkha' 'gro bde ba ste/
214b7(rgyud): 'di dag rnal 'byor ma yis sgom// yang na phag mo dgod bya ste// bdag mo yang ni gzhag par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag po ste// mkhas pas kyang ni bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs/
215a1(rgyud): su sbyor ba dag/ sa 'og sa steng rab tu 'khrug/ oM a ka tsaT ta pa ya sha hu hUM phaT swAhA/ brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba'i bdag/ ma lus ji srid 'di yis 'grug
215a2(rgyud): sde tshan mkha' 'gro dam pa mchog/ b+ha ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// a sha/ kA kaM/ tsarma tsa/ nr-i ta pa ka/ ta ba sa ta tha/ pa ba na dza laM ma b+ha ha tsa/ sha ra b+ha tsa ta tha/ sbrang rtsi mar
215a3(rgyud): dang bcas pa ni// rtag tu dus su 'di brgyad bza'// rgas dang nad dang 'chi med par// skye ba 'di la dngos grub 'gyur// chang gi btung ba dang bcas pa// zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur//
215a4(rgyud): de rnyed na yang sA lus bya// skye ba bdun pa'i nang gnas shing // phyugs ni zas sa rta spyad na// skad cig gis ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod
215a5(rgyud): po'i rgyud tha ma'i bla ma mos/ sde can gyi sbyor ba'i le'u rtswa drug cu rgya gcig pa'o// de nas gzhan phreng ba shid bya ba// rnal 'byor mchog gi gang ga/ dpa' bo dang
215a6(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor ma// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor sngar bshad do// mkha' 'gro ma sogs mkha' 'gro ni// ga ra da wa yi gzugs su bya// phag mo'i gzugs ni de nyid kyang // zhal ni ga ra da wa
215a7(rgyud): ru bya// sngar bshad gnas dang phyag mtshan dang // zhal ni gzhan yang rtogs par bya// sngar bshad mtshan ma'i rim pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni lag mdung thogs// thugs kyi 'khor lo
215b1(rgyud): thams cad kun// mkha' lding gdong ni 'jigs pa can// gsung gi 'khor lo rma bya'i gdong // sku yi 'khor lo seng ge'i gdong // khyi dang phag dang 'ug pa dang // khwa yi zhal gdong de bzhin/
215b2(rgyud): te/ zu ra la ga shin rje sreg sogs kun// ma he'i ri dgas zhal gdong yin// dkyil 'khor ma lus can rnams kyang // spyan gsum mig ni shin tu dmar/ 'di ni rnal 'byor mchog
215b3(rgyud): dam pa// sdug bsngal thams cad zad par byed// rnal 'byor blo gros dngos grub dag/ rnal 'byor mchog ni ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje theg pa'i man ngag dang // ngag gi dngos grub
215b4(rgyud): rab tu ster// ma thos pa yi chos bstan pas// sems can rnams ni srid las grol// bla na med pa nyid bstan pas// mi snang la sogs dngos grub 'gyur// su yang rung bas 'jig
215b5(rgyud): rten gsum// de kun de ma thag tu mthong // sngar bshad dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i// gsang sngags rnams kyang de bzhin te// mkha' 'gro ma mo de bzhin no// sngar bshad sngags kyi
215b6(rgyud): bdag po rnams// bzlas na dngos grub rab ster cing // rtag tu dngos grub thams cad 'thob// rnal 'byor nye snying bzlas na ni// gar da'i dngos grub mkha' la 'gro// brtul zhugs
215b7(rgyud): med pa'ang brtul zhugs 'thob// mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur// dbul po'ang nor gyi bdag por 'gyur// nad yod pa yang med par 'gyur// long ba yis kyang
216a1(rgyud): mthong bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga thob 'gyur// bong bu'i sha dang rta sha dang // khyi dang ba lang glang po mi// rnga mo ce spyang de bzhin te// brgyad po'ang mnyam
216a2(rgyud): pa mchog yin no// rnal 'byor bdag gis de brgyad bza'// dri chen chu dang sbrang rtsi mar// bsam gtan bsgoms te bza' byas nas// yang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// gzugs/
216a3(rgyud): yongs bsgyur ba'i dngos grub cing // rang gi gzugs su'ang 'gyur ba yin// rnal 'byor gang dang gar gnas par// bza' ba yang ni bza' bar bshad// 'gro dang mi 'gro de bzhin//
216a4(rgyud): te/ rabatung zhing btung zhing dngos grub 'gyur// mchog 'di yang ni gsang ba ste// su la yang ni brjod mi bya// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ ji ltar 'dod pa'i bong
216a5(rgyud): bu'i mdzad pa dngos grub kyi rgyu sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// mkha' 'gro lnga yi rnam sgom pa// rigs las
216a6(rgyud): brgyad pa'i cho ga yi// gdan dang phyag mtshan sa bon te// 'di ni sa bon mchog gyur pa'o// nga nya Na na ma zhes pa// 'di ni sa bon mchog grub pa// nga ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// nya ni
216a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yin// Na ni rin chen mkha' 'gro ste// na ni pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sna tshogs mkha' 'gro ste// mkha' 'gro lnga ni mchog yin te// zhe sdang gti
216b1(rgyud): mug nga rgyal dang // chags dang phrag dog de bzhin te// rigs ni lnga po 'di dag gis// 'dod las grol ba'i 'bras bu stsol// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // pad+ma rA la khri lnga pa yin// sdong/
216b2(rgyud): dkar ba nyid dang ni// ser dang dmar po ljang khu dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgya byang chub mchog/ rin chen phyag rgya'ang de bzhin te// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bzhi pa ste// ral gri'i phyag rgya lnga pa yin/
216b3(rgyud): glang po seng ge rta dang ni// rma bya mkha' lding de bzhin te// khyab 'jug tshangs pa nyi ma dang // dbang phyug che dbang po yang de// rang rigs yan lag dang bcas pa// gnyis med bde bas//
216b4(rgyud): yang dag gnas// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du yang ni de bzhin 'dir// dpa' bo'i 'khor dang bcas par dgod// lnga po yang dag lnga sangs rgyas// lnga po bdag nyid lnga yin no//
216b5(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor shar du'o// lho dang rub dang de bzhin te// byang na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro// yang na dbus su zla ba ste// shar du yang ni
216b6(rgyud): nyi ma'i gdan// de dag dpa' bor gyur pa ste// 'di lta ste/ rdo rje thod pa dang / rdo rje mkha' mnyam dang / rdo rje snying po dang / rdo rje sra ba dang / bzhi po de dag ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil
216b7(rgyud): 'khor te/ glang po che'i gdan khri bya'o// rdo rje zla ba dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje sgra dang / de dag ni sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/
217a1(rgyud): seng ge'i gdan khri'o// 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje sprin dang / rdo rje Ta ha ra dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / de dag ni rin chen mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/
217a2(rgyud): rta'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje me dpal dang / rdo rje 'joms pa dang / rdo rje sreg byed dang / rdo rje dril bral dang / de dag ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor te/ rma bya'i gdan khri'o// rdo rje ba dar dang /
217a3(rgyud): rdo rje glu dang / rdo rje dpa' bo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / de dag ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor te/ mkha' lding gi gdan khri'o// dpa' bo de dag kyang rang gi rigs dang /
217a4(rgyud): thod pa'i 'phreng ba can/ spyan gsum pa/ rang gi shes rab dang 'khyud pa/ rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yi dgas kyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o// mche ba rnam par gtsigs shing rnam par
217a5(rgyud): 'byur ba stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs pa/ zhal gcig pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ thod pa dang kha T+wAM 'dzin pa/ cang te'u sgra hUM dang bcas pa/ mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i do shal gyis
217a6(rgyud): brgyad pa phyag rgya lnga 'drang ba/ rang gi rigs kyi dbu rgyan can/ ral paM dang zla ba 'dzin pa'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar po/ byang ljang khu/ nub dmar po/ lho ser po/
217a7(rgyud): las kyi mkha' 'gro'i shar ser po/ byang sngon po/ nub dkar po/ lho dmar po/ pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro'i shar dkar ba/ byang ljang khu/ nub sngon po/ lho ser po/ rin chen mkha'
217b1(rgyud): 'gro'i shar ljang khu/ byang ser po/ nub dkar po/ lho sngon po/ sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i shar sngon po/ byang ljang khu/ rub dmar po/ lho ser po/ 'di dag ji lta'i rim pa yis/
217b2(rgyud): rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang // pad+ma rin chen 'phreng ba yi// chas ni yongs su bskor bar bya// grwa bzhir ma mo bzhi sgom ste// ma mo rmongs byed ma dang ni// ma mo zhe sdang nyid yin te// chags
217b3(rgyud): pa yi ni ma mo dang // phrag dog ma mo de bzhin te// me yi phyogs la sogs par dgod// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ldang // skra grol ma la bzhin rnam bsgyur// spyan gsum pa la gcer//
217b4(rgyud): bu ste/ phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa yin// phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa// yi dgas gdan la rnam par bzhugs// dbang chen me dang chu dang ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dag tu gnas/
217b5(rgyud): rigs kyi gdar la bzhugs pa yin// 'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma dang // ral gri thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug kyang ni phyag na 'chang // ma ning las byung lha mo sgom// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba can/
217b6(rgyud): skyil mo krung ni byed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje srung ba dang / rdo rje 'gying ba dang / rdo rje rta gdong dang / rdo rje dred gdong dang / rdo rje bde mchog dang / rdo rje dam tshig dang / rdo rje
217b7(rgyud): rta mchog ste// khro bo'i rgyal po de dag ni// sgo rnams dang ni mtshams su ste// sngo dang ljang dang dmar ser po// dmar dang sngo dang dud kha dkar// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sdog dang /
218a1(rgyud): dril bu zod pa kha nA ga/ cang te'u yang ni de bzhin te// thod pa dbyug to mdung dang ni// dgra sta thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ mgo bo phyag na bsnams pa'o// zhal gcig pa la
218a2(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa// dbu sgra dmar ser gyen du mardzus// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa ste// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs// thod pa yi ni 'phreng ba 'chang // mgo bo'i do shal rnam par brgyan/
218a3(rgyud): nyi ma pad+ma'i steng du ni// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// phyogs skyong brgyad kyi khri la bzhugs// mche ba rnam gtsigs rnam bsgyur zhal// spyan gsum rang rigs cod
218a4(rgyud): pan can// rang gi rig dang gnyis med sbyor// snying rje yi ni nyams can te// phyi rol rdo rje yi dgas kyis// yongs su bskor bar bsgom par bya// thog mar gsal byed ming dang
218a5(rgyud): mtha' ru phaT dang sbyar bar bya// sngar bshad cho ga'i bsrung ba bya// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // lus ngag yid la bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gro zhal drug phyag bcu gnyis//
218a6(rgyud): rang gi mtshan ma dril bu yis// gnyis su med par mnyam par ldan// mdung dang lcags kyu thod pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang mgo bo dang // cang te'u dang ni gri gug dang // na ra'i pags pa
218a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa yin// sngo dang ser dang dmar ljang khu// dud kha dang ni dkar ba dang // dkar dang sngo dang ser dmar dang // ljang dang thal ba'i mdog lta bu'o// ser dang sngo dang dkar ba dang /
218b1(rgyud): dmar dang ljang khu pad+ma'i mdog/ dmar dang dkar dang sngon po dang // ser dang ljang dang nam mkha'i mdog/ ljang dang dkar dang dmar ba dang // sngo dang ser dang dkar ba'i mdog de dag
218b2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro lnga yi ni// zhal mdog gi ni khyad par yin// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgom// 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags ming dang bcas// mkhas pas zur bzhi mtshams
218b3(rgyud): nas so// mthar ni huM hUM phaT dang sbyar// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra DA ka hUM DA ki nI dz+wa la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bud+d+ha DA ka bruM b+hA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/
218b4(rgyud): oM ma hA su kha rat+na DA ka trA DA ki nI dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha pad+ma DA ka hrIHDA ki nA~M dzA la shaM ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su kha bi shra DA ka kha~M DA ki nI dzA la sha
218b5(rgyud): ba ra AHhUM phaT swA hA/ de dag ni mkha' 'gro lnga'i snying po'i gsang sngags te/ 'di ni ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa yin no// oM badz+ra DA ka daM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM bud+d+ha DA ka nyaM hUM phaT
218b6(rgyud): oM rat+na DA ka NaM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma DA ka naM hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa DA ka maM hUM phaT/ ye shes dam tshig ro gcig pa// mkhas pas bsgom par byas nas su// dam tshig gis ni legs dpang
218b7(rgyud): bskur// sna tshogs mchod pa rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang // go 'phang dran nas dbang yang bskur// sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa'i mchog/ de bzhin
219a1(rgyud): 'khyud dang tsum pa na// b+ha ga'i ling ga'i sbyor ba dag/ ye shes rnam smin dpa' ba'i mchog/ shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya drug/ rnam par balnga zhing nges par brtag
219a2(rgyud): dga' ba dang po shes rab ste// mchog tu dga' ba mnyam par sbyor// bde bar dga' bar grub pa che// lhan cig skyes dga' bla med yin// sbyor ba dang ni shin tu sbyor// sbyor ba che dang ye
219a3(rgyud): shes sbyor// de dag cho ga'i rim pa'o// thig le'i gzhung gi sbyor shes na// phra ba'i sbyor bas blta bar bya// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// chos kyi dbyings kyi go 'phang thob//
219a4(rgyud): cho ga nges par bsgrubs nas ni// myur du rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// 'di ni nges pa kho na'o// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba'i ye shes kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa/
219a5(rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thugs kyi snying po mchog gyur pa// mkha' dbyings rdo rje'i dbugs gnas par// ye shes zla ba rnam par sgom/
219a6(rgyud): a yi yi ge las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// kha ba kun da'i mdog lta bu// dag pa'i shel dang mtshungs pa'o// zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste// spyan gsum pa la thugs
219a7(rgyud): rje'i nyams// sna tshogs pad+ma'i zla dbus bzhugs// stong pa'i ye shes las byung ba// zla ba phyed pa ral par 'ching // thod pa yi ni dbu rgyan can// rgyan rnams thams cad
219b1(rgyud): yang dag rdzogs// rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rang gi lus dang sbyor bar gnas// snying rje chags dang mngon gyur pa// dkar zhing sngo la dmar ba'i zhal// rnam pa gsum gyi rang /
219b2(rgyud): bzhin can// rdo rje dril bu mnyam par ldan// lha mo mchu ni rnam 'tshir te// rdo rje mdung dang thod pa dang // khA T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin// yi ge A dang nyi dbus bzhugs// rdo rje sem
219b3(rgyud): dpa' rnam par sgom// oM las rdo rje zla ba ste// I las rdo rje sgyu 'phrul lo// e las chos kyi rdo rje ste// aM las sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul ma// lha mo bzhi po de dag ni// de yi zhal
219b4(rgyud): mdog 'dzin pa'o// skra grol ba la mig po che// snying rje chags pas rnam par myos// rang gi thabs dang lhan cig bcas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sna tshogs yi
219b5(rgyud): dgas steng du sgom// gtso bo shes rab skyil mo krung // thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dril bus mnyam par ldan// mdung dang gri gug
219b6(rgyud): phyag na bsnams// thod pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin cing // dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol// ji ltar dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor bzhin// de yi mdog dang phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mo bzhi yi kha sbyar/
219b7(rgyud): gsang // snying po sbyor ba mchog yin no// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa nas// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// gsang ba kun gyi mchog de nyid// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying
220a1(rgyud): bo mchog/ gsang ba'i ye shes dam tshig ste// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yin// u ni snying khar sgom pa ste// U ni mgo bor de bzhin no// oM ni spyi gtsug dag tu/
220a2(rgyud): ste oM ni mig tu dgod par bya// aM ni go char dgod pa ste// aHni mtshon du rnam par dgod// sku gsung thugs su sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid kyang ni sgom par gnas// ye shes dam
220a3(rgyud): tshig sbyor ba yis// bla med mchog dang dbang yang bskur// mnyam pa'i dam tshig sbyor ba yis// chos kyang de bzhin mnyam pa yin// dngos po kun ni ro gcig ste// gnyis su med pa'i
220a4(rgyud): mchog grub pa// dam tshig thun mtshams bzhin du ste// dus bzhi dag tu rnam par sgom// kha sbyor ba ni yi sbyor ba ni// thun bzhi la ni rnam par bsam// snying rjes kun la 'gro bya zhing /
220a5(rgyud): cha med par ni rnam par sgom// thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' ste// shes rab cha med rjes su 'gro// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sbyor// bdag nyid rdo rje drag po yin// bgrang du med
220a6(rgyud): pa'i rus pa yin// yi ge bzlas pa yin par bshad// bzlas pa ye shes sgom pa ste// sprul pa drug ni spro ba'o// de bas dam tshig bzlas pa yin// cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya// /
220a7(rgyud): u o o u/ A aH/ oM AH/ a AHi I/ u U/ e ai/ oM oM/ oM aHhUM swAhA/ dung chen 'phreng ba blangs nas ni// rtag tu gsang sngags rgyal po badz+ra/
220b1(rgyud): dag byed bsod nams chen po ste// dge zhing nyes pa 'joms pa yin// sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms byed cing // dge ba kun gyi 'bras bu ste// gsang sngags kun gyi ston pa ste//
220b2(rgyud): rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs su// mkha' 'gro ma yi snying po yi// dgyes pa'i bde ba las byung ba// lha mo bzhi po dga' ba ste// rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog tu bde// rigs
220b3(rgyud): kyi bde ba bcom ldan 'das// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' yin// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla mo'i bla ma las/ lha mo bzhi'i gsang ba kha sbyor gyi li'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
220b4(rgyud): de nas sbyor ba'i mchog bshad pa// gdug pa thams cad za byed pa// ma rungs phyi dang nang 'joms pa// nam mkha' stong pa lta bu las// yi ge kA las
220b5(rgyud): mngon byung zhing // mkha' 'gro'i dra ba bde mchog ni// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum pa la 'jigs pa'i zhal// g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs pa
220b6(rgyud): la/ ma rungs bdud kyi dgra gnon cing // phyag rgya chen po mnyam ldan pas// thod pa dril bus yang dag 'khyud// thod pa'i dum bus yid 'ong ba'i// rdo rje mchog
220b7(rgyud): gis rnam par mtshan// ye shes bdud rtsis yongs gang ba// lag pa g.yas par gzhag nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi sku lus la// phyag rgya drug gis sku yang brgyan//
221a1(rgyud): zhal gdong mche ba rnam gtsigs shing // spyi gtsug thod pas rgyan du byas// sna tshogs rdo rjes spyi bor mtshan// zla ba phyed pa ral par 'chang // rdo rje
221a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i dbu rgyan can// rdo rje 'jigs byed sgom pa yin// dgos pa rnam par spangs shing yongs su dag pa'i blos// rnam par rtog pa'i dri mas khyad par med par byed// byams
221a3(rgyud): dang snying rje'i rgyan gyis lus la rgyan du byas// 'dzem med bde ba'i rnal 'byor legs par bslabs pa'i bdag/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i dud 'gro'i dur khrod chen po ni// ro langs
221a4(rgyud): srin po sna tshogs sgra rnams sgrog par byed// pheM gyi sgra byed pa yi 'jigs pas khyad par byed// gzhan yang sgrub po rnal 'byor 'thun pa'i yul du sgrub// yang na zhal ni bzhi pa dang //
221a5(rgyud): 'di la phyag brgyad rnam par sgrom// dkar dang sngo dang dmar ser po// zhal dag bsgyur zhing 'jigs pa mdzad// mdung dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ tsang te'u mgo bo gri gug thogs//
221a6(rgyud): sna tshogs phyag la bskyod pa'i ljags// hA hA hI hI hUM hUM phaT/ phaT ces bya ba'i sgra sgrog cing // dpa' bo gcig pu 'jigs mdzad pas// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul
221a7(rgyud): mdzad cing // sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// khro bo'i sprin ni mkhas pas spro// bsam gtan dga' ba sgrub pa'i phyir// khro bo yi ni sku ru sgrub// dam tshig bza' zhing bzlas
221b1(rgyud): pa bya/ dam tshig kha sbyar byas nas bza// mnyam par gnas shing bzlas nas su// chos rnams ma lus bsgom par bya// oM ak+Sha hU phaT/ srid gsum sdig pa zang byed cing
221b2(rgyud): mtshams med lnga yang zad byed par// sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed cing // srid pa dag kyang sbyong bar byed// sbyor ba yi ni mchog dam pa// bklags tsam gyis ni nges par 'grub/
221b3(rgyud): gdug cing gnod byed sems can dang // ma rungs las la chags pa dang // log par lta dang bcas pa las// 'di dag nges par bza' bar bya// sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan rnams spro/
221b4(rgyud): khams gsum dag ni grol bar byed// sngags pas sngags kyi mchog de ni// ming dang bcas pas lhan cig bzla// oM phaT che ge mo b+hak+Sha ya phaT/ k+Sha hUM phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo'i/
221b5(rgyud): sems kyis ni// mAM sa bza' zhing gcer bu dang // skra grol rol mnan pa dang // zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gis 'dzin// gsang sngags cho ga bzhin du ni// khri phrag
221b6(rgyud): stong du bzla zhing sgom// rnal 'byor cho ga bzhin du ni// khams gsum po dag gsod par 'gyur// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'khor bcas pas// bza' bar yang ni rnam par bsam//
221b7(rgyud): bdag nyid rdo rje khab thogs pa'i// khro bo snying du gzhug par bya// snying dang rgyu ma rkang dang rus// sha dang khrag rnams 'dral byed cing // mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa dang /
222a1(rgyud): gdug pa can rnams bza' bar bya// mkha' 'gro lte bar bzhugs nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma dang lhan cig sbyor// rdo rje blo ldan rab sbyor bas// zhag
222a2(rgyud): bdun gyis ni phebs par 'gyur// bsam gtan byas pa tsam gyis ni// gdug pa bdag gis zos par 'gyur// nyi ma phyed dang mtshan phyed dang // las 'di dag la 'jug par bya//
222a3(rgyud): gcer bu skra grol byas pa yis// gshin rje'i phyogs su kha bltas te// khyim bya'i stan gyi sbyor ba yis// me yi gsang sngags bzla bar bya// hUM phaT re ra ra/ mtshams med
222a4(rgyud): pa 'di zhes bya ba// ra ra raM hUM phaT/ ji bzhin bzlas pa byas tsam gyis// nyin zhag bcu pa dag gis ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mngon sum pa'ang // 'chi bar yang ni the tsom med//
222a5(rgyud): gal te sdig can slar log na// 'di la zhi ba'i las rnams bya// gsang sngags bzlas pa cher byas nas// 'dis kyang zhi bar 'gyur ba yin// oM swAhA a A baM a mu ka pA ba
222a6(rgyud): bI ra to b+ha bi Sh+ya na ti ta sa s+yai shAn+tiM b+ha ban+d+ha/ baM aM a oM swA hA/ 'o ma btung zhing gos dkar byon// zhi ba'i sems kyis stong nyid gnas// dkar po'i dri yis lus byug go/
222a7(rgyud): bya rog khyi dang byi la dang // na ku la yi sha rnams bza'// thams cad rab tu gnas gyur te// 'di la yid gnyis dpyod pa med// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las//
222b1(rgyud): khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i bdag po kha sbyar gnon pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad b+hA ba/ srid pa'i nang na skye ba bdun/
222b2(rgyud): sna tshogs pa shu'i dam tshig ni// lha yi gzugs can yid 'phrog pa// lha yi gzugs can gzi brjid dpal// pa shu'i nang na rgyal po yin// skal bzang yid 'ong bde
222b3(rgyud): bar 'gro// skra yi myu gu de bzhin ring // mig ni dkyus ring mig kyang dmar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i gzugs// de yi lus la rdul rab 'byung // lus las lha yi//
222b4(rgyud): dri 'byung zhing // kha yi dbugs ni ga pur dri// ldan pas sbrang ma rtag tu 'khor// gcin dang phyi sa gla rtsi'i dri// tshig ni 'jam par 'gyur ba dang // lag pa dang ni rkang pa/
222b5(rgyud): 'jam// ut+pa la yi dri dang ldan// swa dkar gnyer ma las rnam grol// lus kyang sdum zhing mnyan pa dang // snying dang thod pa lte ba ste// des na ro tsan ru 'gyur// grib
222b6(rgyud): mdun ngang ba'i 'gros su 'gro// snying rje'i bsam pa can yin te// dkon mchog gsum la rtag tu dang // sbyin dang tshul khrims dag dang ldan// 'di 'dra rnal 'byor pas rtogs
222b7(rgyud): na mi gsod pa yis tshig mi 'gyur// srog chags sna tshogs gdug pa dag/ gang yang rung ba za mi nus// de ni mtshan mo mi mthong ste// mi snang ba yi dbang phyug mchog
223a1(rgyud): 'di 'dra sngags pas rtogs nas ni// bdag gis blangs te sbyin pa spyad// dri chen chu dang byang chub sems// mkhas pas blangs te ril bu bya// lcags gsum
223a2(rgyud): gyis ni rnam dkris te// blo dang ldan pas bsgrub par bya// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyar nas// nye ba'i snying po lan 'bum bzlas// de 'di lag tu byin nas ni// sbyin pa 'di las bdag/
223a3(rgyud): la byin// de 'di de ma thag tu yang // mi bskyod pa yi bya ba rnyed// 'di ni dben par khyer nas su// mnyam par bzhag ste bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang las rnams rab bshad bya/
223a4(rgyud): dngos grub bsgrub pa'i mchog dam pa// de yi spyi bo'i sgo bcad nas// gzhan yang dud 'gro'i spu dang ni// de bsres ze gur byas nas su// gang gi mgul du bcings byas pas/
223a5(rgyud): de 'dra ba yi gzugs su 'gyur// sna tshogs gzugs kyang byed pa yin// de yi pags pa blangs nas ni// de la he ru ka dpal bri// mngon sum khro bo'i dngos grub ni// he ru ka
223a6(rgyud): dpal byed pa yin// rkang lag pags pa blangs nas ni// 'byung ba'i sgra dang bcas bsres nas// phyi ma'i ril bur byas nas su// mngon par bsngags te cho ga bya// mkhas
223a7(rgyud): pas rgyal gyi nyi ma la// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// lag pa g.yon pas de blangs te// mthe bong smos pa'i khu tshur gyis// khu tshur de ni mgo bzhag na/
223b1(rgyud): de ma thag tu rkun ma rengs// rang gi lag gis dpung gnyis blangs// rang sgra zhags pa blangs nas thogs// g.yas pa lcags kyu thogs nas ni// the gu lnga yis rnam par dkri/ phyogs
223b2(rgyud): gar nor gyis gang ba yi// de yi phyogs mthong blang bar bya// khyim du bkod cing steng 'dug nas// sngags bzlas nas ni mkha' la spyod// oM dz+wa la paM a paM hUM ho pa ra ha raM to//
223b3(rgyud): khe tsa ri dza hri swAhA/ nor dang 'bru dang de bzhin gos// yid la gang 'dod ci yang rung // de dag thams cad myur du 'bugs// khyim na gong bar yongs su mthong // mAM sa dag ni zos nas
223b4(rgyud): su lha yi lus su gyur pa yin// rnal 'byor rdo rje'i lus gyur te// des ni shi ba dbang du 'gyur// chu ba cho ga bzhin blangs nas// skra dang bsres nas de bsgril te// the gu ro//
223b5(rgyud): bzhin du ni// bsgril nas zhags pa dag tu bya// g.yas brkyang gnas shing khro gnas par// gang gi ming gi bzlas brjod kyis// zhags pa btab nas de ma thag/ lha mo
223b6(rgyud): 'gugs shing de mdun gnas// de yi rus pa'i phye ma yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 'di la dkyil 'khor dngos grub ni// ci 'dod pa ni de la gnas// /
223b7(rgyud): gzhan yang rgyun du byis pa dang // rdo rje mtshan gyis mdzes par bya// chu ba dag gis mchod phyir thogs// de ru brdar ba'i tsan dan gyis// byug pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin
224a1(rgyud): pa ni/ mkha' la spyod par 'gyur ba yin// sgrub pa til mar chen po yi// mig sman nges par byas nas ni// grib ma yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor zhag
224a2(rgyud): gis bskus na ni// mtshan mo'ang nyin par lta bur 'gyur// rnal 'byor rkang dang zos nas ni// tshim par 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// ji srid gnas par mi bkres shing // yid gzhungs
224a3(rgyud): dran pa 'phel bar 'gyur// rnal 'byor sngon gyi skye ba dran// rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur ba yin// rgyu ma phye mar byas nas su// mkhas pas grib ma la yang skam// gang gi mgo la
224a4(rgyud): bzhag pa na// de ma thag tu dbang du 'gugs// sngags pas glo ba zos na ni// de ma thag tu nad med 'gyur// rkang pa blangs nas sa bsnun na// char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs par byed//
224a5(rgyud): blo ldan gsang ba blangs nas skam// tsan dan dmar po dang bsres nas// de ni phye mar byas nas su/ bud med gang la byin na ni// 'dod pas gdungs pa'i bud med gang //
224a6(rgyud): dbang du gyur te mngag gzhug byed// pus mo'i rus pa kI la ya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad tsam zhig/ gang gi ming bcas sbas pa yis// de yi rigs rgyud med par 'gyur//
224a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor dzi hA zos na ni// ngag gi dngos grub dag tu 'gyur// rnal 'byor thaMd zos na ni// sems ni thub pa nyid du 'gyur// so yi rgyal po bzhi po dag/ steng 'og dag ni
224b1(rgyud): blangs nas kyang // bung ba yi ni gshog pa dang // tshub ma'i 'dab ma rdul dang ni// rdul 'dis bsgrub pa byas na ni// rgyu ba dang ni mi rgyu rmongs// rtsa rnams phye mar byas pa yis//
224b2(rgyud): bud med thams cad bskam par 'gyur// rang byung me tog ro tsa na// a lag ta dang gur kum gyis// thig le sngags pas sbyar na ni// 'khor los sgyur ba'ang dbang du 'gyur// rnal
224b3(rgyud): 'byor mig 'bras che ba yis// pha rol sde ni 'byed par 'gyur// nu ma zos pa tsam gyis ni// de ma thag tu 'o ma 'gugs// rnal 'byor mtshan ni zos tsam gyis// bud med sa bon
224b4(rgyud): mod la 'gugs// rnal 'byor so dang sen mo phyes// gang gis gang gi mgo la gtor// grub pa brgyad po 'grub pa yin// pha dang bu ni yin na yang // rnam par sdang bar
224b5(rgyud): byas par 'gyur// mchu phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// kha ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// sna phyer byas pa'i sbyor ba yis// dbugs ni gnon par 'gyur ba yin// rna ba'i
224b6(rgyud): sbyor bas 'on par 'gyur// mgo bo'i pags pas mngon btags te// kha yi drung du mngon bzlas na// lha rnams kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur// zod pa yi ni sbyor ba yis//
224b7(rgyud): rak+ta 'gugs par byed pa yin// thod pa kha ni sgrub pa yis// gnod par bya ba kho na yin// in+d+ra ba ru ro tsa na/ de gnyis gcig tu bsres byas nas// gang la thig
225a1(rgyud): le gcig gyur na// dbang po'i gnas ni mthong bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang myang spras dag/ lhan cig tu ni byug pa yis// thub pa med pa'i stobs 'gyur te/
225a2(rgyud): pha rol dag ni gnon par 'gyur// pu tran dz+wa li ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas// bud med gang la phyes gtor na// de ni 'dod pas myos gyur nas// ji srid 'tshe ba'i bar
225a3(rgyud): du gnas// ro tsa na dang pu tras gnyis// lhan cig tu ni bskus pa yis// 'byung po kun dang 'byung mo rnams// ci bgyi zhes ni smra bzhin du// de yi drung du 'khod par 'gyur//
225a4(rgyud): ci 'dod pa dag ster bar 'gyur// ro tsa na dang dzaM ban to// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas te// shi ba'i mig dang mig sman sbyar// bskal par gnas kyi bar du ni// 'tsho bar yang ni
225a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin// chu srin lag ni ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni phyer byas nas// nA ga ma do lhan cig tu// dril bu dag tu byas nas kyang // rdo rje gzi brjid dang bsres nas// mig
225a6(rgyud): gi sman ni byas gyur na// nor skyong gi ni glang po yang // mngon sum du ni gnas nas kyang // de la bdag gis zhon na no// glang chen 'khor ni mang po dang // gzhan gyis mi thub par
225a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// pha rol sde ni 'joms byed cing // gzhan gyi yul la dbang byed pa'i// ci 'dod pa ni ster bar 'gyur// 'bram ma daN+Di ro tsa na// lhan cig tu ni sbyor ba yis// rig byed rgod
225b1(rgyud): pa med par 'gyur// rma bya'i mkhris pa'i ro tsa na// ri bong khrag dang lhan cig tu// ril bu dag tu bsgrub byas nas// rma bya'i mjug mas bcings na ni// bung ba bzhin du 'phur 'gyur te//
225b2(rgyud): lha rnams 'gugs pa'i dngos grub cing // rig pa 'dzin pa 'ong bar 'gyur// de yi lan ni 'ga' tsam gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa ster bar 'gyur// lha yi gzhal med khang 'phrog cing /
225b3(rgyud): lha yi bu mo'ang 'gugs par 'gyur// 'dod na dbang du sdod byed cing // mi 'dod sems can dor yang byed// mjug ma thur bltas byas na ni// gter rnams kyang ni mthong bar 'gyur//
225b4(rgyud): blangs pas sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// sa 'og gter gyi sgo dag la// mjug ma bskor bar byas na ni// sgo dbye bas ni 'jug par bya// lha min
225b5(rgyud): bu mo lhan cig rol// lha yi bcud dang bcud kyis len// 'phrog cing des ni zos gyur te// 'dod pa'i lha yi gzugs su 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas ni blangs pa yis// sems
225b6(rgyud): can don rnams byed cing 'gro// de nas yan lag lnga pa yi// cho ga dag tu 'gyur ba ni// spu dang pags pa sha dang ni// rus pa rkang pa blangs nas su// ji chen chu dang shu kra dang //
225b7(rgyud): mtshal rnams dag ni lhan cig tu// ril bu byas nas bsgrub par bya// lcags gsum gyis ni rnam dkris nas// kha yi nang du sbas nas ni// nam mkha' la ni 'gro bar 'gyur// ro tsa na/
226a1(rgyud): dang lhan cig tu// khams gsum du ni rgyal cher 'gyur// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ skye ba bdun pa'i phyugs chen sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa
226a2(rgyud): drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang gi chos kyi yig sgom pa// rang gi chos kyi yi ger sbyor// bdag med chos ni yang dag sgom// rang chos yi
226a3(rgyud): ge mchog dga' ba// chos kyi sku lus rang byung yin// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba// he ru ka ni rnam par sgom// yi ge hi las nges 'byung ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hUM gi
226a4(rgyud): yi ge las byung ba// rdo rje hUM mdzad rnam par sgom// hUM gi yi ge las byung ba// mi bskyod pa ni rnam par sgom// baM gyi yi ge las bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par sgom// oM b+hU
226a5(rgyud): aM hUM las byung ba// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// oM tAM ra~M s+ya las byung ba// rin chen mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// hrI d+hI a las nges byung ba// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro rnam
226a6(rgyud): bar sgom// khaM haM ho haM las byung ba// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnam par sgom// DA las mkha' 'gro ma nyid de// yaM las rnal 'byor ma de bzhin// b+h+rUM las lha mo sa la spyod// baM las
226a7(rgyud): mkha' la spyod pa yin// baM las ma mo nyid yin te// dpa' bo'i btsun mo snyan grags ma// he ni thugs kyi gtso bo ste// ru las ngag ni byung ba yin// ka ni lus kyi rdo rje ste// yig
226b1(rgyud): gsum las byung he ru ka/ maM las 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste// saM las kun tu bzang po yin// lo las 'jig rten mgon po ste// kAM las sa yi snying po'o// baM las phyag na rdo rje ste/
226b2(rgyud): mo las byams pa nyid yin te// khaM las nam mkha' snying por grags// gaM las nam mkha' mdzod yin no// sa las sgrib pa kun sel ba// ga las spos kyi glang po yin// dzA
226b3(rgyud): las ye shes tog kyang yin// a las blo gros mi zad pa// pra las spobs pa brtsegs pa ste// sa las ngan song kur 'dren pa// sa las ngan song kun 'joms pa// dza las tre
226b4(rgyud): ba can gyi 'od// tsa las zla ba'i 'od yin te// ra las byung ba'i rin chen 'od// spu las nyi ma'i 'od yin ro// ba las rdo rje 'od kyang yin// ma las mthu chen thob pa ste// su ni
226b5(rgyud): su d+ha na yin no// b+ha las bzang skyong nyid yin te// sa las blo gros rgya mtsho'o// kun tu bzang po 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'jig rten mgon po sa snying po// phyag na rdo rje byams pa dang /
226b6(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po nam mkha' mdzod// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // spos kyi glang po nyid yin te// mi zad pa dang ye shes tog/ spobs pa brtsegs pa mchog yin te//
226b7(rgyud): mya ngan kun 'joms nyid yin no// ngan song kun 'dren nyid dang ni// dra ba zla ba rin chen dang // nyi ma rdo rje 'od mchog ste// su d+ha na dang rin chen thob// rgya mtsho dang ni bzang skyong ngo // /
227a1(rgyud): de dag sngon nyid grub pa ste// 'phreng ba'i gsang sngags rnam par sbyar// de dag dam tshig tu bshad de// dngos grub kyi ni grub pa stsol// rdo rje pho nya ma nyid dang // skul/
227a2(rgyud): byed dang ni rin chen sgron// rdo rje nyi ma de bzhin te// ro langs rdo rje gzhon nu ma// kaM po dzi dang de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub ma de bzhin// ye shes sgron dang rdor 'jig ma// ye shes
227a3(rgyud): sprin dang rgyal byed ma// sgrol ma dang ni gos dkar mo// spyan dang mA ma kI mchog dang // rgyal mtshan so sor 'azang ma dang // rma bya dang ni ri khrod ma// lu gu rgyud dang phyir bzlog ma//
227a4(rgyud): lha mo gtsug tor rdor 'jig ma// sngon grub pa yi lha mo ste// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thams cad stsol// gsal byed ming dang bcas par ni// mthar ni hUM phaT sbyar bar bya// tha mar swA hA
227a5(rgyud): mnyam par sbyar// sngags kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol// gshin rje gshed dang rta mchog rgyal// bgegs ni gnon par mdzad pa yin// shes rab mthar byed bzhi po ni// 'dod
227a6(rgyud): pa'i don kun sgrub byed yin// 'dod rgyal dbyug sngon stobs po che// brgyad par mi g.yo grags pa ste// khro bo chen po sngon grub pa// gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon//
227a7(rgyud): dkar mo sogs dam tshig lha mo// khrag 'thung lha mo brgyad pa yin// sngar bshad mkha' 'gro ma rnams te// khro bo brgyad dang gnyis med gnas// rtsa ba'i brgyad dang ldan
227b1(rgyud): pa'i sngags// ming dang yang dag sbyar bar bya// gsal byed o ni kun tu yang // mthar ni hU~M phaT swA d+hAr sbyar// gsal byed ming dang d+hu dang ni// mthar ni phaT dang swA hAr sbyar/
227b2(rgyud): gzugs dang sba yi lha mo dang // dri dang ro yi lha mo ste// 'dab ma bzhi la rnam par sbyar// phyogs kyi gos con sgra grol ba// reg pas reg pa'i rdo rjer grags// gnyis su med par yang
227b3(rgyud): dag gnas// dbus su khrag 'thung rgyal po ni// lha mo'i reg pas bde bar bzhugs// snying po chos kyi dbyings su grags// shes rab pha rol phyin las byung // ye shes sems
227b4(rgyud): dpa' gnyis med bzhugs// rdo rje chos kyi dbyings ma ste// gnyis med mnyam pa'i ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings de mi dmigs pa'o// de ni gsong ba de nyid mchog/ rdo rje can ni/
227b5(rgyud): yang dag stsol// che ba'i mchog ni 'dus pa ste// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ sbyor ba rgyud kyi rjes 'brang ba// bgrod dang bgrod min rnal 'byor ma// rig pa'i rgya mtsho mchog
227b6(rgyud): yin te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro nyung zad cig/ sgyu 'phrul sdom pa'i rgyud yin no// rnal 'byor ma ni 'byung ba'i rgyud// gsang ba'i rgya mtsho rgyud yin no// nges brjod rgyud ni bla med pa/
227b7(rgyud): 'dus pa mchog ni bshad pa yin// ji ltar bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// sems can rjes su gzung ba'i rgyur// 'dus pa mchog gi dam pa 'di// sangs rgyas byang chub
228a1(rgyud): 'bras bu ste// rigs ni rnam pa lnga bshad pa// byang chub sems dpa' du ma dag/ ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar ni// bdag po nyid du bya ba yin// ji ltar ming ni rjes
228a2(rgyud): 'thun par// nges brjod rgyud kyi rim pa dag/ rdo rje sgrub pa po yis ni// nges brjod rgyud kyi las rnams bya// yid kyis dogs pa kun spangs te// gnyis su med pa'i sgom pa nyid//
228a3(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i dam pa mchog/ dngos grub che dang ldan par 'gro// de nas phyag mtshan mchog bshad bya// gzugs dang mdog gi cho ga'i rim// yi ge he las nges 'byung ba/
228a4(rgyud): bdag nyid he ru kar sgom bya// sku lus dkar la drag shul che// mche ba rnam gtsigs 'jigs pa ste// spyan gsum pa la zhal lnga pa// phyag drug zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// zod
228a5(rgyud): pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// ral pa zla phyed dbu la bcings// sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya drug gis sku lus brgyan// stag gi pags pa gos su mnabs//
228a6(rgyud): mgo bo'i do shal gyis brgyan pa// dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar// ljang khu steng zhal sngo ba'o// bzhad dang dpa' dang sgeg pa dang // rnga ma dang zhi dang drag po ste// rdo rje
228a7(rgyud): dril bu mnyam ldan pas// rdo rje reg pas gnyis med gnas// rgyal ba'i pags pa mchog kyang 'dzin// bde ba kun gyi 'bras bu stsol// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin//
228b1(rgyud): rdo rje mdung ni phyag mchog ste// g.yas brkyang ba yi gnas pa yis// bdud bzhi po ni zhabs 'og gnon// reg pa'i rdo rje ldang ba dang // dkar ba'i mdangs kyi gzugs can la// ljang dang ser/
228b2(rgyud): dang dmar ba dang // dkar ba'i g.yon pa'i zhal gdong ste// steng gi zhal gdong sngol 'jigs// skra grol ba ni rnam par myos// seng ge'i rnal grol phyag rgya can// byin pa gnyis ni legs
228b3(rgyud): par 'khril// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// spyan gsum shin tu dmar ba ste// rdo rje thod par mnyam par ldan// dril bu cang te'u yis brgyan// mdung dang kha T+wAM phyag na
228b4(rgyud): bsnams// chags pa chen po me yi 'od// phyogs kyi gos can zhi ba'i nyams// gdul dka' thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // sna tshogs sems can 'dul bar mdzad// thugs/
228b5(rgyud): rje'i nyams ni yongs su rdzogs// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su yang // sna tshogs pad+ma'i dkyil na bzhugs// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ zhabs kyis gnon pa rnam par
228b6(rgyud): sgom 'khor kun dag ni zhal gsum pa// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// drag cing zhi ba nyid yin te// rigs gsum gyis ni phye ba'i gzugs// rigs gsum gyi
228b7(rgyud): phyag mtshan 'dzin// lha mos phye ba'i gzugs can ni// dam tshig gnyis su med par sbyor// thams cad yi dgas gdan la bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnon//
229a1(rgyud): byin pa gnyis kyis legs par 'khril// shes rab thabs ni rnam par sgom// mtshams rnams su ni bum pa dag/ zod pa zla ba yongs su gang // zur rnams
229a2(rgyud): su ni sgo srungs te// ji ltar mdog ni cha rnams so// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba zhabs 'og gnon// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// thugs
229a3(rgyud): rje khro bas rnam par myos// dkar po la sogs mdog sbyor ba// ji ltar g.yas pa'i zhal rim bzhin// phyag rgya rim pa'ang de bzhin no// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog par ni//
229a4(rgyud): 'khor sogs mchog kyang dgod par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i dbus su ni// rigs kyi 'khor lo gsum dkyil na// rang gi byin rlabs 'chang ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas mu stegs can la
229a5(rgyud): sba 'di ni rab tu gsang ba ste// bla ma'i ngag la gnas pa yin// rnal 'byor ma yi zin no// gnas la sogs pa'i rim sbyor ba// sum cu rtsa bdun rnam dag dgod// shes rab
229a6(rgyud): thabs bdag 'gro ba yin// sa bcu pa yi mchog kyang 'gugs// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas// sbyor ba gsum gyi rnam dag don// 'di ni dri med sgom pa mchog/ mngon
229a7(rgyud): par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ bdag nyid chos kyi yi ge las bskyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas
229b1(rgyud): mchog tu bshad bya ba/ bdag nyid cho ga'i sgom pa'i rim// mA ma kI dang spyan dang ni// lha mo sgrol ma gos dkar mo// 'od zer can dang dzam+b+ha la// lha mo skul byed sa 'dzin ma/
229b2(rgyud): rang gi sa bon las byung ba// phyag bcu gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum pa la g.yas brkyang bzhugs// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje skyil krung
229b3(rgyud): gis gnas pa// rig byed bzhi yi zhal gdong ste// phyogs kyi gos can ro yi gdan// skra grol ba la 'jigs pa ste// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can// khro bas blta
229b4(rgyud): zhing thugs rje'i nyams// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// de nyid ye shes mchog las byung // so sor yang dag sbyor ba'i bdag/ de nyid ye shes gdon mi za// khro bo sna tshogs
229b5(rgyud): gzugs can ni// dpa' bo rang nyid las byung ba// khro mchog mkha' 'gro byung ba yang // gos pa med par nyams pa yi// bdag po sgom pa nyid yin no// mnyam par ma bzhag
229b6(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// sgom zhing rnam par bsgom par bya// phra ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje can// snying kha'i pad+ma'i dbus su ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thugs brtse can// 'di nyid du ni gnas
229b7(rgyud): mdzad cing // rdzogs sangs rgyas kun byang chub sems/ 'gro ba gsum po 'di la gnas/ 'di nyid kyis mchod pa nyid kyis// mchod 'os thams cad mchod pa yin/
230a1(rgyud): gang zhig 'di la rtag lta ba// de ni rgyal bas mchod par bzhed// nang gi sbyor ba rdo rje yis// rnal 'byor rdo rje can du 'dod// de bas rdo rje mchod pa yis// yid
230a2(rgyud): 'dod rnams kyi lus la 'dod// mchod pa lnga yi sbyor ba yis// myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob par// gang 'di rgyud las gsungs pa dag/ de ni pha rol gzhan du 'dod// dngos med gzhi
230a3(rgyud): la dgod pa yis// lha yi gzugs su sgom pa yi// mnyam nyid mchod pa chen po ste// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// sngags dang de nyid bstan pa yis// bstan pa tsam du
230a4(rgyud): legs 'byung ba'i// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam yang dag skyes pa na// ston pa med cing bstan pa'ang med// nyi shu rtsa bzhir phye ba yin// gnas sogs 'di nyid la gnas
230a5(rgyud): te 'de bas de ru 'khor ba nyid// skyo bya de nyid can gyis min// gal te de nyid med gyur na// de yi 'khrul pas ci zhig bya// 'on te de nyid ldan 'gyur na// de la 'khrul pa ci zhig yod//
230a6(rgyud): gnas dang nye ba'i gnas mchog rnams// bstan pas dri ma med par 'gyur// yang na mi nus bag med pa'i// mi yi gnas ni bsgrags par bya// nga yis 'di ltar bshad pa ni//
230a7(rgyud): sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis te// bsam gtan las gzhan bde med phyir// de bas bsam gtan mchog gzhol bya// rnal 'byor pa ni phyi rol 'khor// de yis khams rnams
230b1(rgyud): zad par 'gyur// bde bas phyi rol spangs nas ni// rnal 'byor rol pas gnas par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje rnal 'byor can// rnam dag ye shes sbyar gyis ni// thugs rje thugs
230b2(rgyud): gdungs ring po nas// rdo rje rnal 'byor can dag gzigs// de bas dgyes pas dngos grub mchog/ ci 'dod par ni stsol bar 'gyur// des ni rje btsun ye shes kyang // rab tu
230b3(rgyud): 'bad de bsgrub par bya// sna tshogs spyod pa yang dag ldan// spyod dang brtul zhugs spyod pa yi// spyod dang brtul zhugs 'dir spong la// de nyid brtul zhugs la dgar bya// gang yang rung
230b4(rgyud): ba'i zas gnas la// rnam pa des byas brtul zhugs can// bsam gtan zas mchog gzhol 'gyur bas// smyon pa'i spyod pas gnas par gyis// gcer bu'am yang na gcer bu
230b5(rgyud): min/ gang rung ji lta de ltar 'gyur// rang gi lhag pa'i lha dmigs la// de nyid gcig pu rnam par bsam// lkugs pa'i dngos por gyur pa yis// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni/
230b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor can gyis nyer bsten na// rnal 'byor chen po 'di gsal 'gyur// ye shes sgron ma'i mchog mthong na// rnal 'byor ma rnams legs 'dus te// pad+ma'i 'byung gnas nyams
230b7(rgyud): dga' bar// ngang pa'i tshogs 'dus ji bzhin no// mig 'phrul mkhan ltar 'jig rten du// 'gro kur don ni byed pa'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin par ni// mngon 'gyur/
231a1(rgyud): 'di la the tsom med// spyod pa 'di la nges par ni// ji skad bshad pa der 'gyur bar// sems ni dag par gyis shig ces// sems can rnams la bdag gsol
231a2(rgyud): 'debs// gang gis rmad byung snying rjer ldan// gang gis gsung ba de nyid 'gyur// rdo rje drag po'i sbyor ba yis// mkha' 'gro ma ni snying khar dgod// snying khar rdo rje lcags kyur sbyor//
231a3(rgyud): thugs kyi rdo rjes nang sbyar te// gzhan yang rdo rje dgod bya ba// chos kyi dbyings su rnam par brtag/ rang gis nam mkhar sbyor nas su// gzi brjid gzugs ni 'dzin par sgom/
231a4(rgyud): rang gi chos kyi yig dgod pa// rang drod rang bzhin dri ma med// rang gi sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi chos kyi yi ge sgom// ji lta ji ltar rtogs pa yi// gzhan nyid gzugs
231a5(rgyud): kyi sgom pa la// yid kyi gti mug grub pa yi// dbang po gzhan ma bsgom par bya// ji lta ji ltar mos pa yis// gzhan nyid gzugs la blta bar bya// mngon par brjod
231a6(rgyud): pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las/ bdag 'dul ba'i mchod pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa brgyud pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad//
231a7(rgyud): kyis gsang ba'i ye shes gsang ba 'di gsungs so// rang bzhin bdag med chos rnams ni// nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med// stong nyid ye shes rdo rje yis// stong nyid/
231b1(rgyud): rtag tu bsgom par bya// legs so bya ba rnams byin nas/ rgyud skyes pa yi sbyor ba las// legs so legs so ye shes che// nges par brjod pa mchog gi mchog/ legs so
231b2(rgyud): rdo rje tshul drag po// sangs rgyas byang chub bka' drin rab// legs so gnyis med sbyor ba ni// mchog dang mchog ni grub pa la// legs so zhes bya nges par sbyor// 'dod pa med
231b3(rgyud): pa'i sgom pa ni// legs so thams cad 'gro ba'i mgon// theg pa chen po bstan pa 'di// gnyis med ye shes mchog dang ni// man ngag thob pa'i dang po ste// legs so rdo rje bla ma
231b4(rgyud): kun/ de la bstan pa rnal 'byor ma// legs so 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la// dngos grub bla na med pa byin// rdzogs te cang mi gsung bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
231b5(rgyud): gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rdo rje rnams nges par brjod pa'i rgyud bla na med pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i sdom pa bcom ldan
231b6(rgyud): 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma zhes bya ba gsang ba'i yang gsang bas bde mchog rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po the tsom med par de kho na bsgom
231b7(rgyud): pa bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa dgu pa'o// // mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud bla ma'i bla ma las gsang ba las gsang ba'i bde mchog gi rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
232a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta chen po pad+ma ka ra shrI dz+nyA na dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba chen po dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur/
232a2(rgyud): cing nus te gtan la phab pa/ phyis paN+Di ta chen po dz+nyA na shrI dang / lo tsa ba khyung po chos kyi brtson 'grus kyis kyang nus pa'o// phyis paN+Di ta A nan+ta dang / lo chung gis lhag chad rnams bsabs
232a3(rgyud): nas zhu dag byas nas legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ka nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod gang du
232a4(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems
232a5(rgyud): dpa' ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa yi ni lha gcig nyid//
232a6(rgyud): 'byung gnas su tshul nges 'byung rnams// dam tshig spyod pa'i spyod yul yin// 'jig rten gsum du rnyed dka' ba// thog ma dbus mthar yang dag gnas// 'dod chags ma yin chas
232a7(rgyud): bral min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i chu// 'di ni gnyis medo ye shes mchog/ rnyed dang bde ba kun mos pas// ngan par spyod pa'ang 'grub
232b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ nam mkha' kun tu rgyu grub pas// mkha' 'gro ma nas rab tu grags// sna tshogs kun tu phyag can// sna tshogs kun gyi sdom pa yis// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam myong/
232b2(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar grub// de nyid med sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dang // kun tu gzugs brnyan yin gyis ni// lugs sogs rnal 'byor skye ba min/
232b3(rgyud): byang chub sems chen rnal 'byor gang // rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso// byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no// 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rang bzhin gyis//
232b4(rgyud): sna tshogs g.yogs te rnam bzhugs pas// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sna tshogs tshul gyis mchod par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams
232b5(rgyud): cad bdag yin te// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad nyid dang ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa
232b6(rgyud): thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
232b7(rgyud): dpal ldan bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum pa ni ma lus pa'i// 'gro/
233a1(rgyud): kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste// mthong ba dang ni reg pa'i dngos// thams cad sgyu ma ji bzhin no// gang
233a2(rgyud): gis blun po 'ching 'gyur ba// 'dir des mkhas rnams rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sa gsum ma lus bza' bar bya// gzhan du gal te sbyor ba ni// ma tshang
233a3(rgyud): mar me lta bur 'da'// gzugs ni sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// tsher rab rdo rje nyi ma yin// 'du shes pad+ma gar dbang ste// 'du byed rdo rje rgyal po yin// rnam shes rdo rje sems/
233a4(rgyud): dpa' ste// 'di dag dngos kun rang bzhin no// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes par grags// yang dag chen po gcig pu'i lha// bde ba thams cad rab ster ba// sgyu ma chen po'i
233a5(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis// chags bral chags pa zhes byar bshad// sa khams ltung byed ma yin te// de bzhin chu khams gsod ma'o// me khams 'gugs byed ma yin te//
233a6(rgyud): bzhin rlung nI gar dbang ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni sgyu ma che// rang nyid mkha' 'gro zhes byar bshad// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma ni 'bar ba'i mchog
233a7(rgyud): 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// de ni rdo rje gtso mor gnas// mig gnyis gti mug rdo rjer bshad// nyan pa zhe sdang rdo rjer brjod// sna ni ser sna rdo rje ste// kha ni 'dod chags rdo rjer//
233b1(rgyud): gsungs// lus ni phrag dog rdo rje ste// skye mched thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ gzugs 'di thams cad stong pa nyid// stong pa'i tshul gyis mig
233b2(rgyud): gis ni// dogs pa med par bsgom pa'i mchog/ rnam par mi rtog pa yis blta// nam mkha'i tshul gyi sems kyis ni// der ni thams cad nam mkha'i dngos// dogs pa med pa'i sgom
233b3(rgyud): par ldan// rnam par mi rtog skye 'gyur zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
233b4(rgyud): cad kyis thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// /
233b5(rgyud): mkha' mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i bar// de srid sems can mtshungs med don// mya ngan mi 'da' bar ni mdzad// de ltar sems can dam pa rnams// srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// /
233b6(rgyud): mi skyo bar ni brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad// nam mkha'i gnas kyi mthar thug par// smon lam rnam par spyod byed cing // sems can don brtson sems kyis
233b7(rgyud): ni dpa' bo srid pa sbyong bar mdzad// rtag tu 'dod chags myos pa yis// lha yi 'di rnams dang ni ci// gzhan yang skye bo chags can phyir// 'dod chags thams cad dag
234a1(rgyud): par mdzad// bde chen shin tu grub bya'i phyir// rtog pa rgyas par sbyin pa dang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ rtog pa thams cad dang por bshad// 'das
234a2(rgyud): pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// rtog pa dang po bde ba chen// der ni rdo rje sems chen gyi// lhag pa yi ni lha gcig bzhugs// 'jig rten khams rnams mtha' yas kyi// sems can
234a3(rgyud): kun don 'byung bya'i phyir// glu dang rol mo sogs pa'i gar// srid pa kun gyi gtso bor gyur// sems can thams cad 'byung ba yi// dga' ba yang dag bsdus pa dang // de nas sem/
234a4(rgyud): can skye 'gyur ba'i// 'dod pa'i chags pa rnam spangs te// des 'dul bar ni mkhyen nas su// yi ge las byung rnam spangs shing // nam mkha' lta bur bdag med par// dag pa nyid
234a5(rgyud): du de nas son// de nas sems can sangs rgyas kyi// bla med don ni nus med pa'i// stong pa nyid la rtag bzhugs pas// 'gro kun stong pas bcom nas ni// thams cad dmyal bar
234a6(rgyud): ltung mthong ste// slar yang bdag dang gzhan don la// mos pas gus pa nyid du gyur// de nas 'jig rten khams kun na// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun bsdus te// myur ba nyid du
234a7(rgyud): bdag la bskul// oM ma hA su kha brdzas twa wa hUM ba ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ 'dis ni bskul ba tsam gyis kyang // dag pa'i bde ba kun ster ga/ 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed cing // 'gro kun
234b1(rgyud): bde ba bskyed par gyur// nga ni 'dod pa'i gzugs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// nga nyid chos kyi sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi
234b2(rgyud): sbyor 'phrog cing // sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen yin// sangs rgyas kun
234b3(rgyud): gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa kur gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang // mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam
234b4(rgyud): sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pas na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes byar 'grub// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de nas dkyil
234b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad bri// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag par bya// zla ba'i mdog car 'dzum dang bcas// 'od zer dmar po 'khrugs pa las// sangs
234b6(rgyud): rgyas 'phreng bas mdzes pa ste// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs// zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spyan gsum dang // ral pa'i thor tsugs kyis brgyan cing // lha mo bzhi dang yang dag
234b7(rgyud): ldan sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nye bar brgyan// rtsa zhal zhi zhing g.yas dkar min// de bzhin gzhan yang g.yon pa dmar// rgyab zhal ser po gser bsregs 'dra//
235a1(rgyud): thod pa la bzhugs gar dang ldan// sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// rdo rje dang ni ral gri dang // dril bu thod pa bsnams pa nyid// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor
235a2(rgyud): los gang // skyob pa sna tshogs bri bar bya// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde mchog ces// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can
235a3(rgyud): gyis gsungs// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // de bzhin nye du mo rnams ni// dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pas// 'dod pa'i sbyor bas chags par bya// ba glang sha dang rta sha sogs/
235a4(rgyud): dogs pa med par bza' bar bya// 'jig rten la rtag g.yon la spyod// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun g.yon las byung bas ni// g.yon gyis bza' zhing g.yon mchod bya//
235a5(rgyud): pho nya ma gtogs gzhan rnams la// 'dod la rmongs pa bgrod mi bya// pho nya mo rtag zhen thar par// 'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med// sgrub pos mchog tu 'bad byas te// brtul zhugs
235a6(rgyud): min spangs brtul zhugs rdzogs// dam tshig rigs la spyod pa dang // tsa ru'i bza' ba lhan cig bya// rigs lnga la ni kun spyod par// rigs gcig nyid du brtag par bya// sbrang rtsi khrag dang /
235a7(rgyud): ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar byas la// rdo rje chu dang bsres pa ni// dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed pa'i// de dag bdud rtsi lngar ni 'gyur// mthe bong srin lag sbyar ba yis// rnal
235b1(rgyud): 'byor rig pas rtag tu bza'// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// dngos grub rtag par thob par 'gyur// 'di dag dam tshig dam pa ste// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// las rnams
235b2(rgyud): kun la thabs bcas shing // dogs pa med par gang spyod dang // rnam par mi rtog sgom pa ni// brtul zhugs rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ las rnams kun la kun tu ni// rnam par mi rtog
235b3(rgyud): sgom byed cing // dogs pa med par kun tu spyod// de ni dka' thub rnams kyi mchog/ the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni// sba zla la sogs rjes dngos kyi// yul rnams ma lus sten byed pa'i//
235b4(rgyud): dka' thub shin tu 'da' dka' ba'o// gang yang las rnams thams cad la// shes rab dang ni sbyar byas te// de yang stong pa'i gnas su sbyar// de 'dir bdag chen dka' thub yin// rnam par mi
235b5(rgyud): rtog sems kyis ni// shes rab dang ni mtshungs gzugs la// dogs med spyod pa'i kun spyod pa// de ni bdag chen dka' thub yin// shes rab thabs ni ma gtogs par// gang tshe byams gzhan
235b6(rgyud): mi g.yo na// de tshe byang chub chen po na// nges par ster ba nyid du bshad// rnam par mi rtog rjes 'jug la// rnal 'byor pa ni mngon par brtson// de ni thams cad 'byung ba yin// shes rab pa
235b7(rgyud): rol phyin pa yin// gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis su// me long lta bur rab shes pa// de ni shes rab sten pa yin// glog dang chu bur ltar min mthong /
236a1(rgyud): gang tshe 'dus byas tshul rnams ni// gang gis ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba// de ni shes rab sten pa yin// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam sgyu ma dri za'i grong //
236a2(rgyud): mig 'phrul mtshungs par gang gis mthong // de ni gtso bo yin par brjod// de ni gang du'ang mngon zhen dang // gang du'ang gnas pa yod ma yin// de ltar yang dag 'byung mod kyi// sgyu ma lta
236a3(rgyud): bus dngos dag ni// longs spyod khyad 'phags skye 'gyur ba// bde ba yongs su 'gyur bzhin pas// 'bras bu khyad 'phags thob 'gyur bar// ci yi phyir na 'dod mi bya// brtan
236a4(rgyud): g.yo'i dngos po yod min te// 'on kyang snang ba tsam mtshan nyid// sgom pa khyad par can gang zhig/ goms pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na// yid 'ong bde ba'i 'bras bu ni// bla med
236a5(rgyud): gsal ba'i blo yi mthu// 'bras bu don gnyer rgyu bsgrubs na// der ni lha mo su zhig 'gog/ de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// kun tu 'gro ba mchod par bya// dka' thub sdom pa mi zad
236a6(rgyud): bas// lus ni skams shing sdug bsngal 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyis ni sems g.yengs na// g.yengs pas dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur// lus dang sems ni brtan gyur nas// bde
236a7(rgyud): bathams cad brtan par 'gyur// sdug bsngal gyis ni g.yo gyur pas// shin tu 'gog par 'gro bar 'gyur// des na lus dang ngag sems rnams// brtan par byas nas byang chub
236b1(rgyud): 'thog/ gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de
236b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ de kho na nyid snang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rim par phye ba dang
236b3(rgyud): po'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la btsun mo rnams kyis slar yang mchod cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snying po gang gis de
236b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa 'dral ba'i lha la sogs pa'i gdug pa can rnams dang / skye bo gdug pa can gzhan dag kyang gdul ba dang / 'joms pa dang / zhum par byed pa dang //
236b5(rgyud): ltung ba dang / zhi bar byas te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ba'i snying po sdang ba thams cad rab tu 'joms pa lha yis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
236b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag pos glur blangs te 'di skad ces gsungs so// dang por rnam par snang mdzad gnas// der ni sde tshan rnams kyi mtha'/
236b7(rgyud): ta dang po yi d+ha b+ha'i mtha'// dbyangs kyi gsum pas spyir brgyan pa'i// sa yaM mtha' ni rang gis blta// sa la'i dbus kyi stan bzhugs pa'i// sa yi mtha' ri sbyar bar bya// mda' gnyis/
237a1(rgyud): kyis ni rnam par sbyang // a stan gnas pas yi mtha'// sgrar yangs mtha' mda' lnga stan// zla ba'i dum bu thig les brgyan// sa la'i dbus gnas sa bon ni/
237a2(rgyud): 'da' bcu yis ni yongs su sbyangs// sha dang sa yi dbus nas la// zhal gsum gyis ni brgyan pa dang // rlung gi phyogs gnas sa bon la// ru tra yis ni rnam par brgyan// hUM hU ha ni
237a3(rgyud): bzung nas su// dbyangs kyi dgu pas yang dag dgang // phaT ces bya ba dgod par bya// lhag ma ha yi rkang pa gang // lnga pa'i dbus gnas de nyid de// de la ha dze zhes bya'o// ra stan la
237a4(rgyud): gnas sa yi mtha'// i zhes bya ba'i mda' dang sbyor// slar yang ba zhes bya ba'i mtha'// mda' ni sar pas yongs su sbyang // sa mtha' der nir yi ge gnon// e zhes bya ba'i rna ba'i
237a5(rgyud): rgyan// i dbyangs zla dum thig les brgyan// yi ge ra zhon sa yi mtha'// slar yang sa mthar sgra lngar ldan// zla dum thog les cod pan brgyan// slar yang de nyid mgon po bzla// rin
237a6(rgyud): chen mtha' ma phaT kyis brgyan// rnam par snang mdzad sna tshogs kyis// tshig rnams kun la dgang bya zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs//
237a7(rgyud): dpa' bo drug dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// sna tshogs pad+ma'i nyi dkyil der ni hUM las byung ba yi// las kyi rdo rje'i dbus gnas par// hUM gi de nyid rnam sgom
237b1(rgyud): pa'o// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs spro ba'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum pa'i// sku mdog dmar mo drag chen mo// gdung gi dbyibs can
237b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa'i gzugs// spyan dmar kham skra gyen du brdzes// lang tshe phun sum tshogs par ldan// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can// ljags 'dril bas ni cher 'jigs te/
237b3(rgyud): 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs par mdzad// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab brags zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
237b4(rgyud): gsungs// sngon bsags las ni mthar byed pa// me dang bcas te lan gnyis bzla// ku ru ku ru sems dpa' bral// ral pa gya gyur ban d+ha gsal// de ni slar yang bzlas par bya//
237b5(rgyud): 'jig rten gzugs dang bral ba yi// tra sa ya zhes bya ste brdzun// dam pa de ni lan gnyis bzla// ka Sha zhes bya o sgrar ldan// glo na b+ha ya yang dag gnas// de yang slar ni bzlas par
237b6(rgyud): bya/ sa yi mtha' ni nyi stan gnas// mda' bcu zla du ma thig les dgang // de yang slar ni brjod par bya// 'od byed sbyangs pa'i sa yi mtha'// gshegs su gsol ba glo na gnas// nyis
237b7(rgyud): 'gyur du ni bya ba yin// zla zhon thig gsal phreM zhes bya// de yang slar ni bzlas par bya// phaT ces bya ba bsgyings te bsgrags// rnam par rtog pa kun gyi shing // da ha da ha mkha' 'gro'i sdom// lnga
238a1(rgyud): sde'i thog ma gnyis dang ldan// sde gtso de ni slar bzlas bya// b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha zhes bya dang // ba sa ru d+hir an+da// mA lA ba la bi ne dang // brihAs p+ta ste// pA tA la gAH
