295b2(rgyud): mchog 'dzir 'gyur// bsam pa gang dang gang gis ni// mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyor// de dang de yi dngos 'gyur te// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// de nyid bcus dang 'dus pa/
295b3(rgyud): gzhan yang sngon dang tha ma yi// de nyid sbyor ba'i cho ga can// bya ba'i rgyud rnams thams cad du// ji srid me yis 'jig gi bar// de der 'gro ba ston rmongs 'gyur// thams cad du ni spangs/
295b4(rgyud): pa ste/ brtson 'grus pha rol 'joms pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam ldan pa'i// rdo rje slob dpor bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub skye 'gyur ba// 'phral la yang dag yid ches byed// /
295b5(rgyud): sgrub pos phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// ston mi rmongs par 'grub par 'gyur// dam tshig mi ldan mi dag la// klog gam gal te byin gyur na// ngan pa'i bdag nyid bcom nas ni/
295b6(rgyud): ngan 'gro rnams su ltung bar 'gyur// g.yon gyi rgyud ni dmigs nas su/ skye bo g.yor gyi spyod par bya// thams cad g.yon pas byas na ni/ myur du dngos grub 'grub
295b7(rgyud): 'gyur zhes// sgyu ma kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// chud
296a1(rgyud): kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ dpa' bo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i le'u 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o//
296a2(rgyud): de nas yang dgra ba shad bya ba// snying po thams cad bsdus pa ste// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir/ sgrub po'i bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i mchog ga pur dang ni gur
296a3(rgyud): kum+ba dang // gnA d+ha dang ni pa tre ste/ shing tsha dang ni sug sbrel bcas// ku su ma dang ni de bzhin chu/ bi sa ti dang kun tu ru// de bzhin ri yi zhag dang ni// ri skyes dang ni sku
296a4(rgyud): gu'i zhag/ dril mar khu so dang ni// de bzhin lag skyes kyi ni rdul/ gangs kyi chu dang snying po dang // rgya mtsho las skyes de dag ni// lus can rnams la phan byed pa// gang
296a5(rgyud): gang la ni gangs chu bzhin// de ltar bco brgyad rdzas rnams ni// bcud kyis len mchog phar byed yin// de nas brtag pa'i las dang ni// yon tan yan lag cho ga bshad//
296a6(rgyud): tsam pa ka dang ba ku la// nA ga ge swar ku mu da// ut+pal she bA li ka dang // sbrang rtsi 'jug dang pri yang ku/ ku su ma ni nyid dag go/ shrI pha la dang po so cha/ ka
296a7(rgyud): ta dang la ku tsha// slu ba dang ni brta ki/ a ru ra dang ba ru ra// ba la ta ka skyu ru ra// a la tsi dang pu na ka/ e rand dang mi ri ci// de bzhin du ni pi bi ling / bca' ba dang /
296b1(rgyud): ni shu dag gang // yung ba dang ni ru rta dang / bca' skra dang ni sgog tu dang // rban can gyi ni do ba dang // nA ga pa la dkar po dang // de bzhin rgan po gzhon rur byed// glang chen/
296b2(rgyud): dgra dang ri mdzes dang // 'dzag dang byis pa stug po dang // ral pa dmar po smyo byed dag/ mtshan mo'i shing dang myur 'gro dang // kA tam pa dang gser shing ste// de bzhin du ni shi ri/
296b3(rgyud): karany+dza dang bri khru dang // nim pa dang na pa li si// de bzhinag du mo dzo r-i/ pa la sha dang tsan dan gnyis// de bzhin a kar nag po dang // gur kum gur shing bye ra ka
296b4(rgyud): sbrang rtsi mok+Sha pus kA ra// me tog 'bras bu rtsa ba dang / shun pa shong dang ro nyid do// khu byug zangs kyi gtsug pud can/ bya rog dang ni ga ra dang / rma bya ti bya phug ron dang /
296b5(rgyud): zang srong bu stobs 'phel bar byed// ri bo dgas dang / sa la ga dang phag dang ni// khyad par du ni byi ba rnams// nad rnams thams cad 'joms par byed// me tog 'bras bu shun pa'i chang //
296b6(rgyud): de bzhin du ni 'bru yi chang // gzhan yang chang gi bye brag dag/ mdor bsdus nas ni btung ba'i mchog/ 'di dag skyes pa bud med kyi// stobs rnams skyes pa'i sma ra yin te//
296b7(rgyud): bza' dang btung dang gzhib pa dang / bldag pa dang ni mu ra ba dang // sna sman mgo bor bslu ba dang / bkru ba dang ni dril phyis dang // bza' dang btung sogs de dag rnams/ rnal 'byor/
297a1(rgyud): pa yi sbyor ba mchog/ de ltar drug cu rtsa bzhi yi// rdzas dang bco brgyad dag tu sbyar// sbom po phra mo'i sbyor ba rnams// skyes pa dang ni bud med kyang // chung ngu la sogs/
297a2(rgyud): dbye ba ste// rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan sogs// re re zhing yang gsum du 'dod// nag po dkar po sngo bsangs te// 'dzag dang de bzhin 'pho ba la'o// dgra dang mdza' bshes bar ma ste/
297a3(rgyud): khams kyi sde tshan bsdus pa yin// dpa' bo gcig dang skye gnyis rtsa// 'bras bu chen po bska ba gsum// lhang tsher dang ni dngul chu bzhi// bdud rtsi yi ni snying po lnga// dus drug de bzhin
297a4(rgyud): drug cu ste// bdun po yal ga 'dab sogs bcas// skams dang ni rman can yul// mar dang mar nag bkru sman ni// rno dang dngul chu'i zas su sbyin// rang skyur dang ni yung ba dag
297a5(rgyud): cha mnyam dngul chu'i 'bras bu ste// nyi ma'i 'od zer bsros nas ni// sbrang rtsi yi ni thigs pa zug/ thal sman lan tshwas bu gar sgrub// ro ni bska ba rnams dang yang // lgang
297a6(rgyud): tsher dkar po'i skye ma sbyin// dngul chu drug char bya ba mchog/ skyed byed don ni rga ba 'joms// chani tshad ldar 'ching byed de// 'bras bus byed par 'gyur ba yin// sngodan du gser
297a7(rgyud): shog zugs pa yi// rang skyon 'joms pa'i cho ga yi// de nas chu dang lan tshwa dang / thal ba'am rdul ni thugs par bya// dron mo thugs na swa dkar rtse/ glang chen mgo yi
297b1(rgyud): bcung blangs la// seng ge'i chang du btso bar bya// de nas slar ni phyung nas su// ana'i shang gi khu ba zhugs// chos pa'i 'od kyis snying mig 'joms/ tsan+d+ra dang ri sa ran// klog
297b2(rgyud): sgyu dang ni ker sa dang // a tra ba tI'i ru ba dang // de bzhin du ni me tog gzung / byA gri dang ni kun du ru// sa ri ba dang sen mo dang // nor bu zla 'od na ge ser/ thigs pa'i
297b3(rgyud): rkyen dang ka tam pa/ tsam pa ki ri so ba dang // shi shu bil ba ut+pa la// rang skyur dang ni bcas ba ru// 'dzag dang dngul chu kha chos bya// phyung na sbrul gyi gzugs ltar
297b4(rgyud): 'gyur// khrag dang smyo byed mtshan shing blugs// skra dkar gyi ni nyes pa 'joms// rgas dang mdze nad sel bar byed// rnon po thal sman bcas pa yis// bkrus shing bskus
297b5(rgyud): na ga nang 'brum 'joms// lto skyes ma brnyings rdzas kyi las// bcad dang bcud len mar zhag bsngags// shi ri shi yi rtsas kyang gzug/ mgor gnas la skyes ldan par bya//
297b6(rgyud): mdog dmar dngul chu rmongs pa gso// gsos te 'khrul na 'bras bu'i lam// tshad las 'das na dug tu 'gyur// de nas pags pa shun pa dang // me tog dang ni 'bras bu sogs//
297b7(rgyud): kha dang bska dang mngar ba dang // tshwa dang skur ba la sogs pas// khyad par du ni btso bya ba// kha med rdzar ni btso bar bya// kha dang bcas par sreg pa ste// tshar gcad pa dang
298a1(rgyud): mnan pa dang / kha med pa dang thod pa'i dbyibs// 'od ma dang ni bya rog mchu// de dag btso ba'i zhi kha rdza// btso ba yi ni tshad bzhi ni// yi ba dang khros dang
298a2(rgyud): 'thor ba dang // bzhi pa chu ru 'bros pa'o// shin tu ches par gyur na ni// 'dar dang rmongs dang du ba dang // khrol khrol sbra ni sgrogs pa yin// btsir dang mnye dang dkrug pa dang // de bzhin du ni
298a3(rgyud): brdung ba'o// spang rtsi btso dang bu bar bco// glang chen btso dang seng ger btso// rnon por byas te btso bar bya// mnyes pas dri ma'i rdul 'thor 'gyur// blo gros 'khrul pa med pa yis//
298a4(rgyud): rim gyis rim gyis mnye bar bya// cha yi tshad byas gso ba ni// sbyar nas 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// de nas cha gzhan bcas pa la// gi ri kar ni'i phye ma ni// lugs las bzlog pa'i
298a5(rgyud): lam btsugs la// tshad ldan cho ga bzhin du btso// du ru ka dang ba li ka/ tsakra mar de'i sa bon dang // ba la ta shi kru yi 'bras// pa ri tsa ta ku su ma// ut+pal ma li ka sa bon/
298a6(rgyud): bar dang rus pa ka si dang // si ris sku sa bon dang // sbrang rtsi po son pa la sha/ zhi ga rje'u ni chos pa dang // de dag skyo ma bskyed phyir thugs// de dag gi ni rtogs byas la// yid la
298a7(rgyud): sems pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis// bu mo'i brgyad ni drangs te zhugs// 'di yis rab tu bsgrub par bya// gzhan du nam yang ma yin no// bu mo gcig dang gnyis dang ni// mang po
298b1(rgyud): bar du brtan par bya// ljang tsher dngum chu shing chen no// de tshe 'bras bu smin par 'gyur/ bya ba kun gyi lam gyis ni// byed pa po dang pa por 'gyur// lha min rgya mtsho bsrubs pa bzhin/
298b2(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa lnga'i cha yi bar// stobs ldan bzung ba gnas su 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni tshad dang ldan// dngum chu rma bya'i mgrin 'dra dang // sbrul gyi gzugs dang sbal pa'i gzugs/
298b3(rgyud): chu 'dzin dbyibs dang rnam pa bzhi// sa la'i dri dang dri zhim dang // de bzhin chang dang chang min dri// cha gnyis dang ni cha gsum dang // bud med mdog nyams snang 'gyur zhing / khong tshod ran/
298b4(rgyud): dang ring ba dang // yan lag rtsub 'dod mgrin pa ring // mig ni zangs ltar dmar ba ste// stobs ldan sngo bsangs nu ma med// rked pa'i 'khyud par sngar bshad dang // sbrang rtsi lta bu'i
298b5(rgyud): dri dang ldan// sgrub po dbang ba'i yon tan byed// de rnams thabs kyis sbyangs yin te// rtsub dang gnyen dang yan lag mkhrang // stobs ldan zhes ni bya ba yin// de dang 'khyud las
298b6(rgyud): byung ba ni// rdzas ni yongs su sbyor byed de// rnon po dang ni lhang tsher la// thun mong du ni brten nas su// zha nye blugs pas 'joms par 'gyur// ro ni kha dang bska bar 'gyur//
298b7(rgyud): de nas rang sgyur nang du ni// lci bas btses na nyes pa 'byang // de nas gci ba'i lan tshwa dang // phag gi zhag dang tshil dang zag/ bcas par mnyes na'ang nyes pa 'byung /
299a1(rgyud): slar yang nur dza tInA// tshe dang dmar po nyid dang ni// bin dzar dang tsam pa dang // smyo byed cha mnyam dngul chu gcig/ de dang mnyam pa'i sbrang rtsi nA// mnyes
299a2(rgyud): na nyes pa zad par 'gyur// de nas ma he'i rmig par ni// char pa'i chu dang bcas pa la// zangs kyi phyi dang sman phye ma// sman phye mar khur blugs shing btso// tshos nas sdang
299a3(rgyud): rtsi'i nang du gzhug/ de yis bcings par 'gyur ba yin// de nas khrag ni cha bdun gyis// sbyangs nas snum zhing stobs ldan la// slar yang cha mnyam khrag dang ni// mnyes
299a4(rgyud): pas snum zhing rtsub par 'gyur// ra ga na tsu ta'i shing dang ni// zangs dang yung ba la sogs drug/ byin pas nyes pa tshar gcod 'gyur// de nas tsan+ta'i shing dang ni// sbrang rtsi 'dzag/
299a5(rgyud): dang sen mo dang // thal sman 'bras zos shing phye dang // ma hA ha ta mo k+Sha dang // pus ka ra dang brta ki/ sku ba sin+du bi ra phye// btsam par na yi rkang du gzhug/ cung zad bzhag ste/
299a6(rgyud): phyung nas su// rdo yi gtun du mnye bar byed// 'od ma'i nang du thugs nas su// btso rdza rgod ma'i kha 'dra dang // kar na da yi dbyibs 'dral// bong bu'i gdong dang rnga mo
299a7(rgyud): gdong / kha che 'di dag bcing ba dang // tshar gcad pa la bsngags pa yin/ gang yang 'khrul 'khor kha che ba/ rdza rnga ya~M ni dbyibs 'dra dang / 'o ma'i dbyibs 'jal
299b1(rgyud): sogs dang // mtshan cha ral gri'i shugs 'jug/ kang+ka yi ni mgrin pa 'dra// nyes pa tshar gcod pa la bsngags/ gzhan yang dngul chu bcings pa la/ bshad pa de
299b2(rgyud): dag rjes su gzung // bzhi cha lus pa bco yin te/ phyed lus stobs chen btso ba yin// dngul chur rten pa'i thi ma ni// de bzhin du ni sbyar bar bya// sbyang ba dang ni
299b3(rgyud): rtogs pa dang / rmongs pa de bzhin gsod pa'o// de nas ljang tsher rdul bye dang / bcas par rtsi yi nang du thugs// ban du zhes bya'i bye ma ni// rgyo mar bcas pa
299b4(rgyud): nang du btung // lhang tsher dngul chu rnon po yi// cho ga yis ni so sor bcing // de nas cung zhig ngal bso bya// bzhag pa me yi gnas sam ni/ chu yi shing la brten
299b5(rgyud): par bya// lci ba 'am 'bras kyi phung po'ang rung // rdo ba li ni nang dag dang // ba glang ma he sogs pa'i lhas// bye ma yi ni phung por sbyar// de nas ngal bso phyung nas ni//
299b6(rgyud): gzugs dang sgra dang dri ro sogs// tshad dang mtshan ma ji bzhin brtag gal la'i 'bras bu la la'i rtsa// kha cig me tog 'dab ma dang // shun pa dang ni rus pa'ang rung /
299b7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa yis longs spyod ni// rnam pa sna tshogs blta bar bya// bcos pa'ang bcos min yo byad ni// rnyed na rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur// de yang stobs can bcud bral na//
300a1(rgyud): sngon bzhin nyes pa sna tshogs 'gyur// dngum chu lhung tsher kha dog ni// sna tshogs dang ldan skyon yin te// khrag dang mchis pa skyed byed la/ dkar pos
300a2(rgyud): zug gzer skyed 'gyur zhing // srog ni 'joms par byed pa yin// ldang ser dag ni ma smin dang // ser skya lam ni 'gag 'gyur zhing // nyis 'gyur cha ni shin tu 'ching // nyes
300a3(rgyud): pa dag ni brgyar ldan pas// blo dang ldan pas dpyad de bza'// sngo dang nag po bcud chen yin// de ltar bcud len rnam dpyad na// chu skyes chen po'i yon tan ldan//
300a4(rgyud): dngul chu'i 'ol se cig dang ni// rgya mtsho las byung nyis 'gyur ldan// bzhi 'gyur gyi ni me tog bcas// sna sman blugs pa'i mchog yin te// khrag dang dngul chu bcu
300a5(rgyud): 'gyur du// rim gyis spel te bza' bar bya// de phan chad ni 'bras bu med// dngul chu bso bas rmongs pa dang // khyad par du ni bsad kyang rung // sngar bstan pa yi me
300a6(rgyud): tog dang // byang chub sems dang bcas te bza'// thams cad du ni snga dri bza'// cho ga'i rim pa 'di yin no// lhang tsher chu dang dngul chu ni// dgongs mo'i dus su
300a7(rgyud): thug par bya// zla ba la ni zla ba'i lam// nyi ma la ni nyi ma ste// de dang de nas sbyin par bya// de ltar yul dang dus dang ni// rdzas rnams rgya cher bstan pa dag/ yid
300b1(rgyud): gzhung la sogs 'phel byed yin// mnga' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
300b2(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bcud len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ rgyud
300b3(rgyud): du sbas pa nges par bya// yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// bde mchog bla ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab// ye shes/
300b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la/ brda yi skad kyis
300b5(rgyud): bshad pa yin// ku lu ta dang ma ru yi// yul du gnas pa ma mo ste// sin d+hu dang ni na ga rar// rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin no// lam pa ka dang sau raSh+Ta ra// gang gnas rigs
300b6(rgyud): kyi lha mo yin// kha ba'i ri dang kany+dzin// gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya// pAny+tsa la yi yul dag dang // gri ha de ba tA dag na// lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas// ka ling ka dang /
300b7(rgyud): ko sa lar/ brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen ba// pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang // tri sha ku nir sbom dbang phyug/ khaN+Da ni ha zhes bya gnas// pul+li ra dang dz+wa lan+d+har// tsaN+Da li li
301a1(rgyud): bud med gnas// o tra dang ni kA ma ruli/ yul du bu mo mdzes ma ste/ de bI ko Ti zhes bya dang // rI me shwa ri'i bu mo'ang 'dod// go tA ba ri ar bu dang /
301a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma yi dbang phyug mchog/ gser gling ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// oM rlan yang ni de bzhin no// yul 'di rnams kyi bu mo gang // dpa' bo gnyis med khyab pa ste// kun/
301a3(rgyud): kyang 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma// yid kyi shugs kyis 'jug ma yin/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mos slar yang mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces
301a4(rgyud): gsol to// mkha' 'gro ma yi khyad par dang // zhing skyong 'jig pa chen po yi// ming dang zhing gi ming dang ni// gnas rnams kyi ni khyad par dang // gang du sgrub pa pos thos
301a5(rgyud): nu the tsom med par 'grub 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad mdor bsdus te/ gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'
301a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs// nga yis gang la'ang ma bshad pa'i// gsang chen shin tu rnyed dka' ba'i// gang yin khyod ni zhu 'dod pa// legs so legs so lha mo che// sgyu ma chen
301a7(rgyud): por rang 'gro ba// bshad kyis rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// aT+TA ha se'i yul gnas pa// zhi ba'i gdong zhes grags pa ste// rgyal po'i lha mo'i skye gnas 'byung // rdo rje
301b1(rgyud): oM ni mtshon cha bsdams/ yul der gnas pa'i lha mo dwe/ ka te ba yi shing la rten// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba'i/ k+She tra pA la stobs po che// ko la kir ni dpal chen mo//
301b2(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba// gtsigs pa'i gzugs can lha mo ste// rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs su rung // grong khyer der gnas drag shul can// ri yi rtse mor
301b3(rgyud): brten te gnas// me yi gdong ba zhes bya ba/ k+She tra pA la mdzes pa'i gdong // da ra nar ni bde byed ma// sme brtsigs chen po'i skye gnas byung // lha mo ga yi mtshon
301b4(rgyud): bsnams// chos kyi dbang phyug gsol ba mo// zhing der gnas par grags pa ste// ta la'i shing la brten te gnas// gyen du 'bar sgra zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la gtsigs
301b5(rgyud): pa chede bI ko Tir rna mo che// stobs po che yi skye gnas 'byung // lha mo lag ra mdung can te// rnal 'byor dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ gnas der lha mo drag chen mo//
301b6(rgyud): b+ha Ta'i shing la brten te gnas// k+She tra pA la lus chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu zhes bya// bi ra dza ra ni phyi mo ste// ba dan gyi ni phyag na bsnams// zhi ba'i gzugs
301b7(rgyud): can lha mo che// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rab stsol ba// zhing der gnas pa me 'bar ma// a mra'i shing la brten te gnas// ha har dgod pa sgra chen po// sems can thams cad
302a1(rgyud): 'jigs par byed// e ru dar ni me lce'i kha// zod pa dge ba'i skye gnas byung // lha mo rdo rje shag ti bsnams// zhing der shin tu myos pas gnas/ zong /
302a2(rgyud): khyer der gnas lha mo de// gser shing la ni brten te gnas// dril bu skra zhes bya ba yi// k+Shi tra pA la dpa' bo che// pre ta pu rir dmar ser te// 'jigs pa chen mo'i spyan dang ldan/
302a3(rgyud): lha mo gtun shing mtshon cha bsnams// gtsigs pa'i skye gnas las byung ba'o// zhing gnas pa yi lha mo der// dza ti'i shing la brten te gnas// byin chen zhes bya'o zhing skyong ni//
302a4(rgyud): shin tu gtsigs shing 'jigs su rung // e la pu rir bong zhon ma// rab tu gtum pa'i skye gnas byung // phyag na zhags pas 'jigs chen mo// zhing der myos pas yang dag gnas/
302a5(rgyud): phyogs der gnas pa'i lha mo de// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa mo// glang chen rna ba zhes bya ba'i// zhing skyes mchog chen las skyes pa'o// kha che'i yul du ba glang na// gtum pa'i
302a6(rgyud): skye gnas las byung ma// rdo rje lcags sgrogathogs nas ni// sgra rnams 'joms la mchog tu brtson// gnas der gnas pa'i lha mod// ri yi rtsel brten te gnas// phru gu
302a7(rgyud): byin pa can zhes bya'o// k+She rba pA la 'jigs chen po// ma ru'i yul du rim pa mo// 'jigs gdong dpa' bo'i skye gnas 'byung // lcags kyu nags thogs lha mo de// de
302b1(rgyud): der shin tu myos pas gnas// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// dbye chen la ni brten te gnas// gtsigs pa zhes bya'i zhing skyong ni// rmongs par byed pa'i gzhi na yangs pa'o// nA ga
302b2(rgyud): rar ni thong gshol ma// sme brtsegs yan lag skye gnas byung // ro langs can ni 'od chen ma// dpa' bo kun la dngos grub stsol// gnas der gnas pa'i bzang mo de/ snga yi shi
302b3(rgyud): gi ldum rar gnas// spu yi byin pa zhes bya ba'o// k+She tra pA la gtsigs pa che// puN+Da ban+d+ha'i yul du ni// tsa mur+b+hi zhes bya ba ste// stobs po che yi skye gnas byung // kha T+wAM ga
302b4(rgyud): yis lag pa brgyan// lha mo spyod dang grol bar byed// sdig pa ma lus zad byed pa/ bum pa zhes bya'o zhing skyong ni// zhing de na ni yang dag gnas// dzA lan+d+har ni bzhin dang ma//
302b5(rgyud): chags pa'i rigs kyi skye gnas 'byung // rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs nas ni// bde ba'i mchog ni kun la ster// grong khyer mchog der gnas lha mo// khang pa brtsegs mar brte
302b6(rgyud): gnas// ral pa gsum zhes bya ba yi// zhing skyong shin tu gtsigs pa che// pre ta pu rir glog gi gdong // gtsigs pa'i skye gnas yang dag byung // lha mo dbyig pa shag tu
302b7(rgyud): bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed ma// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// drag po'i gzugs can 'jigs par byed// dril bu'i sgra zhes bya ba yi// k+She tra pA la spad ba min/
303a1(rgyud): 'ug pa'i gdong can 'jigs su rung // so ba der ni ma lce'i gdong// zangs mi yis ni lag pa brgyan// sha chen gyi ni stan la gnas// bde ba'i dbang phyug rab
303a2(rgyud): ster ba// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo che// shal ma li yi shing la gnas// bya ba kun mdzes zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la 'jigs chen po// tsa ri ba yi yul du ni// ka rany+tsa gnas zhes bya/
303a3(rgyud): ba shag ti gtsigs pa'i skye gnas byung // shag ti yi ni phyag rgya thogs// dril bu chen po zhes bya ba// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// sbrul dang ldan pa'i gyen sgra can// gdug pa
303a4(rgyud): thams cad 'jigs par mdzad// oM rlan du ni lha mo che// gsang ba zhes bya'i skye gnas byung // lha mo rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs// shin tu drag cing gsal ba'i gzugs// sgra chen/
303a5(rgyud): zhes bya drag po'i gzugs// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// gnas mchog der gnas lha mo de// a sho ka yi shing brten gnas// dzA lan+d+ha rar gtum mo ni// zhi ba yi ni skye gnas
303a6(rgyud): byung / lag na zangs kyi phyar te thogs// dbang phyug thams cad ster ba mo// gnas der gnas pa drag chen mo// gser shing la ni brten te gnas/ skyed pa zhes bya'i dpa'
303a7(rgyud): po che bdud rnams thams cad 'jigs par byed// k+She re ker ni skye bo'i ma// drag cing sngo la stobs chen la// ral gri lag thogs lha mo che// dngos grub thams cad ster ba
303b1(rgyud): mo lha mo chen mo gyen skra 'bar/ sa la'i shing la brten te gnas// lhur po chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas// ma la bu rer 'dod ma ste// 'jigs pa'i/
303b2(rgyud): gdong gi skye gnas byung // rdo rje shag ti dge ba thogs// sgrub po rnams la stobs ster ba// gzugs sngon 'jigs pa chen mo ste// 'byung ba'i shing la brten te gnas// der
303b3(rgyud): gnas 'jog po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la stobs po che// pu tA nar ni a ma ke/ dgra rnams thams cad 'jigs byed pa// thong gshol dang ni ga ya thogs// sems can
303b4(rgyud): thams cad dbang byed mo// da ru Ti shing la brten te gnas// sems can thams cad 'jigs par byed// brtul zhugs chen po zhes bya ba'i// k+She tra pA la zhing der gnas/
303b5(rgyud): rgyal po'i khab tu dza na sa// khrag chen gyi ni skye gnas byung // rdo rje lcags kyur yang dag ldan// pha rol g.yul las rgyal bar mdzad// zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de//
303b6(rgyud): ji la'i sgra 'byin 'dzegs par byed// rna chen zhes bya'i zhing spyod ni// rtag tu de dang nye bar gnas// bong yul du ni ldan gyis te// rang byung gi ni kye gnas byung // chu srin
303b7(rgyud): rgyal mtshan lag na thogs// zhi zhing gsal ba'i gzugs can te// yul der gnas pa'i lha mo de// zag gi khrim la brten te gnas// longs spyod ces bya'i dpa' bo che/
304a1(rgyud): k+She tra pA la thub dka' ba'o// mo la ber ni dbang bskur ma/ zo ba yi ni phyag rgya thogs// sgrub pa po la rtag tu brdze// grags dang dpal dang bkra shis ster//
304a2(rgyud): zhing der gnas pa'i lha mo de// mngar ba'i shing la brten te gnas// skyes bu'i dbang phyug ces bya ba'i// zhing skyong sna tshogs dbang phyug yod// zhing 'di rnams kyi bu mo dang //
304a3(rgyud): dpa' bo rnams ni dngos grub ster// rtag tu mtshan mo 'dus par byed// mkha' la spyod pa rnyed dka' ba'i// dngos grub yangs pa ster 'gyur te// sgrub pa po yi las rnams ni//
304a4(rgyud): thams cad 'grub 'gyur the tsom med// de nas dngos grub kun ster ba'i// mchod pa'i cho ga bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa de bzhin du// mar me dri yis khyad par dang /
304a5(rgyud): gtor ma'i snod kyis nye bar mchod// sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs// bza' ba'i rdzas ni thams cad dang // de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga yi mchog/ g.yon gyi char ni snod yin te// g.yas//
304a6(rgyud): su khro bo bstan par bya// oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul phug/ grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par du ri khang stong dang // sems can snod dang thang
304a7(rgyud): dang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag po drag chen po// lha sbyin mnyam du sten pa dang // nag po gtsigs pa 'jigs byed dang // rga las 'das dang log 'dren
304b1(rgyud): rnams/ rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang / 'jigs byed ma dang yu ma dang // rgyul dang rnam par rgyal ma dang // mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub sa// nag mo bzang mo nag rten mo// nag
304b2(rgyud): sboms dang ni rnal 'byor mo// dbang mo dang ni za ba mo// zag tu ldang dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jigs byed zong gnas rnal 'byor ma// drag mo'i gzugs dang /
304b3(rgyud): gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang zod chenam/ zod 'phreng 'phreng can kha nA ma// sbrul chen ral gri dgra sta can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma// de nyid chen mo'i mkha'
304b4(rgyud): 'gro lnga// las kun rjes su sgrub byed pa// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyal mo che// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chen te// rdul med rnal ni 'byin pa
304b5(rgyud): rje dbang me bka' 'di yis// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig/ oM kA kA ka b+han d+ha b+han d+ha na kha khA kha d+ha na sarba duSh+TaM na/ ha na ha na/ b+hU ta ya b+hU ta ya/ a mu ka s+ya
304b6(rgyud): kA r+yaM ku ru hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT dzaHswAhA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha ba kang ste// lha rnams thams cad tshim par bya// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma yis ri// las rnams thams cad sgrub
304b7(rgyud): par sgom// oM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sarba yo ge shwa ri hUM hUM hUM dzaHswA hA/ la sogs sbyor ba ji bzhin du// gtor ma'i las ni sbyar bya ste// zhi dang dbang dang dgug pa dang // gsad
305a1(rgyud): dang sdang dang bcing ba la// sgrub pos gtor ma'i de nyid kyis// las rnams thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // ye shes lcags kyu'i bye brag gis/ rang 'dod
305a2(rgyud): lha ni tshim par bya// zhing dang gnas dang de bzhin grong // grong khyer ri yi rtse mo ru// 'byung po thams cad tshogs gyur par// 'dus na sgrub po la mchog ster// gnas la sogs
305a3(rgyud): bapar rtag gnas shing // sgrub pa po ni gus ldan la// lha mo rnams kyis mchog ster bar// sgrub pa po la the tsom med// gang gi sgrub pa po 'grub pa'i// ro yi bsgrub pa bshad
305a4(rgyud): par bya// rgan po ma yin rma med cing // mdze dang shu ba la sogs spangs// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa yis// 'byung po'i nyi ma la bsgrub bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang //
305a5(rgyud): lha yi chu yis bkru bar bya// mar khu chen pos byug pa dang // bdug pa chen pos de bdug bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi byas nas ni// de dbus 'bad pas gru gsum bya// sangs rgyas
305a6(rgyud): thams cad bdag la gson// zhes bya la sogs sngon bzhin brjod// ha hA hi hI hu hU h+ye de// zhes bya'i rgod pa rnam pa brgyad// sgrub pa po yis cho ga bzhin bya// me la gnas
305a7(rgyud): pa'i sa bon mi// rlung gis bon gyis phye ba/ spyi gtsug tu ni sbyar byas la// sa yi steng du mchod par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi dbus gnas par// 'bad pa yis ni myur du
305b1(rgyud): ba5/ sgrub pos bdag nyid pasas byu gu sku gnas dbus su rim bzhin du// 'bar bzeng gi ni rgya mtsho ste/ po ny+dza 'od dang bcas pas zhes/ sa pa' 'gro kAn+d+ha dang /
305b2(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha'
305b3(rgyud): 'gro las 'du ba'i gnas nges pa dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dge
305b4(rgyud): ba dang // lha rnams thams cad sgrub pa dang // de bzhin pho nya'i khyad par dang // 'byung po gdon gyi rig pa che// gang gzhan lus srul la sogs pa// de bzhin sngags kyi
305b5(rgyud): 'phreng ba rnams// da ni khyod la bshad kyis nyon// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud dang ni ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyams dga' bri bar bya// dngos grub kun gyi yon tan//
305b6(rgyud): gnas// 'dod yon lnga yis rab brgyan pa// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// ro la g.yogs pa'i ras sam ni// mtshon gyis brgyan pa'i ras dag dang // bu btsas pa yi
305b7(rgyud): ras dang ni/ ba glang ko ba la sogs la/ dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis// sgrub po mchog gis 'dri ru gzhug/ tshes brgyad dang ni bcu bzhi la// 'byung po'i dkyil
306a1(rgyud): 'khor bsgrub par bya// de nas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pas// mngon sum du ni mdun gsal 'gyur// tshangs pa mo dang zhi ba mo// gzhon nu mo dang phag
306a2(rgyud): mo dang // dbang mo dang ni tsa mur+t+ti// tshogs kyi dbang mo sreg byed ma// rim pa gnyis pa yi'o// dbang po gshin rje chu lha dang // lus ngan dang ni yi dgas gtso// sreg byed
306a3(rgyud): bden bral rlung gi lha// rim pa gsum pa yi'o// nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang // mig dmar dang ni gza' lhag dang // phur bu dang ni pa sangs dang // spen pa dang ni ra hU la// rim
306a4(rgyud): pa bzhi pa yi'o// tshangs pa khyab 'jug de bzhin du// ru tra ske ma byed sgo bzhir ro// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung po chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang mar
306a5(rgyud): me ma 'jib byed 'phrog byed bcas pa'i gtso// 'byung po las kyang 'byung ba'i gzugs// sgrub pos cho ga bzhin du sgrub// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// pha rol
306a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dbus su kun nas zlum por ni// ri mo mdzes pa bskor bar bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bris nas ni// ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul gyis// dbus
306a7(rgyud): su khro bo chen po zi// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// khro dang bcas shing bzhad pa'i zhal// sku mdog sngon po drag chen po/
306b1(rgyud): thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par klubs// yi dgas la zhon nyi mar bzhugs// sum cu gsum pa 'jigs par mdzad// gar dang ldan ning sdug lpags bsgrubs// spyan gsum shin tu
306b2(rgyud): gsal ba'i gzugs// rdo rje 'bar ba ba dan gsum// khrag gang ba yi gshor dang bcas// mda' dang gnu ni de bzhin te// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gis 'phyar// shar du
306b3(rgyud): mkha' 'grom ze ste// lho yi phyogs su 'brog byed ma/ 'jib byed lha mo nub tu bri// byang du lha mo 'bar ma'o// lha mo phag mo zhes bya ba// phyag bzhi yi ge hri las byung /
306b4(rgyud): sku mdog sngon mo drag chen mo// phag gi gdong can 'jigs par byed// mda' dang de bzhin gzhu dang ni// rgyal mtshan thod pa thogs pa'o// zhi ba mo ni paM las byung // mdog dmar
306b5(rgyud): gzi brjid chen mo ste// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu dang // kha T+wA~M Da ru de bzhin no// gzhon nu ma ni hi las byung // kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi pa// mdung rtse gsum dang ba dan gsum/
306b6(rgyud): mnga' dang gzhu ni de bzhin no// tsa mur+t+ti ni ho las byung // mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste/ kha T+wAM dang ni thod pa dang // ga shor dang de bzhin Da ma ru// baM las byung ba'i tshangs pa
306b7(rgyud): mo mdog dkar lag pa bzhi pa ste// pad+ma dang ni thod pa dang // de bzhin gzhan ni mda' gzhu'o// tshogs kyi dbang mo gaM las byung // sngo bsangs mdog ste lag bzhi ma/
307a1(rgyud): mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa dang // bgrang 'phreng g.yas g.yon lag tu thogs// khyab 'jug ma ni baM las byung // mdog sngo lag pa bzhi pa ste// chang dang
307a2(rgyud): chu yi thod pa dang // zhags pa kha T+wAM de bzhin gzhan// dbang mo i las byung ba ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje shag ti thod pa dang // sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa
307a3(rgyud): nyid thams cad gyen skra 'bar ba dang // sna tshogs kyis ni brgyan pa ste// ro yi stan bzhugs spyan gsum dang // stag gi pags pa rked dkris pa'o// shar skor tshangs pa bri bya
307a4(rgyud): ste mdog dkar lag pa bzhi dang ldan// zod pa dang ni bgrang 'phreng dang // ril ba spyi blugs pad+ma thogs// byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ste// mdog sngon lag pa bzhi dang ldan//
307a5(rgyud): mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dang ni dbyug pa mchog/ lho ru ru tra zi bya ste// du ba'i mdog can lag pa bzhi// rtse gsum mdung dang zod pa dang // zhags pa dang ni
307a6(rgyud): bgrang 'phreng thogs// nub tu skem byed bri bya ste// mdog ser lag pa bzhi dang ldan// shag ti dang ni dbyug pa dang // dpa' bo'i thod pa bgrang 'phreng thogs// dbang ldan khyu
307a7(rgyud): mchog stan la zhon// kha dog dkar po lag bzhi pa// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum thogs// gzhan gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po glang chen zhon pa ste// mdog ser lag pa
307b1(rgyud): gzung la sogs 'phel byed yin/ ma'a' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis
307b2(rgyud): gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ bcud len gyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bdun pa'o// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ rlung
307b3(rgyud): du sbas pa nges par bya// yang dag bsdus pa'i cho ga ni// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams nyon// bde mchog tha ma'i gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro mas ni thams cad khyab// ye shes
307b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i rang skyes gnas// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// 'di ni mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gtso mo yin// rnal 'byor ma drug sgrub po la// brda yi skad kyis
307b5(rgyud): bshad pa yin// ku lu ta dang ma ru yi// yul du gnas pa ma mo ste// sin d+hu dang ni na ga rar// rigs kyi gtso mo rnams yin no// lam pa ka dang sau raSh+Ta ra// gang gnas rigs
307b6(rgyud): kyi lha mo yin// kha ba'i ri dang kany+dzin// gang yod byis bcas mo zhes bya// pAny+tsa la yi yul dag dang // gri ha de ba tA dag na// lhan cig skyes pa'i bu mo gnas/ ka ling ka dang /
307b7(rgyud): ko sa lar/ brtul zhugs 'dzin ma sha chen pa// pre ta pu ri zhes bya dang // tri sha ku nir sbom dbang phyug/ khaN+Da ni ha zhes bya gnas// pul+lI ra dang dz+wa lan+d+har/ tsaN+Da li li/
308a1(rgyud): sa mo sprul chen ma// longs spyod la dga'i sgrub pa pos// pha nya'i las ni brnam par bya// zla ba rdo rje cho ga las// rdo rje sems dpa' ba sgoms byas te/
308a2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal po bskul ba yis// thams cad zan bzhin byed par 'gyur// dur khrod dang ni shing gcig tu// der ni dkyil 'khor ba rtsam par bya// shar dang byang dang rub dang mi
308a3(rgyud): de bzhin du ni lho phyogs su// drug drug tu ni byas nas su// de nas mchod pa brtsam par bya// gnas la sogs pa nyi shu bzhi// rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor// ji dang me tog de
308a4(rgyud): bzhin du// mar me dang ni dri yi chu// dri yi chu yis bkang ba yi// bum pa'ang gos kyis mdzes par bya// nyin mtshan phrugs gcig ga nas gyur cing // de nas mtshan gcig gnas par/
308a5(rgyud): bya gnas sogs yang yang phyag byas nas// de nas bzod pa gsol bar bya// dpa' bo yi ni ston mo yis// dang por slob dpon mnyes par bya// de ltar byas pa'i sngags pa
308a6(rgyud): yos/ phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya// gzhan du dus min 'chi ba dang // dmyal bar nges par sreg 'gyur te// bgegs kyis nye bar gtses nas ni// nges par dmyal bar ltung bar
308a7(rgyud): 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i 'dri mkhan gyis// 'byung po'i nyi ma la rnyed pa'i// bu btsas la sogs ras la ni// tshen rtsi khrag dang bsres nas su// steng du skyes pa'i nang bzhag nas/
308b1(rgyud): grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yi dgas sen rtsi mar dran dang // ga chen gyis ni bdug par bya// de la dri yis bskos nas su// de bzhin yi dgas me tog mchod// spra mo chen po/
308b2(rgyud): mchod pa 'das// me 'bar ma ni mchog tu mnyes// shing gcig gi ni drung du ni// cho ga bzhin du 'bum bzlas bya// rgyal la sogs pa'i dus su ni// slob dpon gyis ni 'dri ru gzhug
308b3(rgyud): sor ni bcu gnyis tshad du bya// gzugs bzang bzhon pa phun sum tshogs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// gos ni ser po bgos par bri// lag gnyis gyen du thal mo sbyar/
308b4(rgyud): me byabar ba ni kun tu 'od// sgrub po'i mdun du bkram nas ni// 'bad de cho ga bzhin mchod bya// me tog dmar dang dri la sogs// sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya// sha dang 1sha
308b5(rgyud): btsong la sogs// nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin// rdzas lnga dag gi dngos po yi// mchod nas 'bum du bzlas na ni// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste// gnyis pa la ni nyi dri bo//
308b6(rgyud): gsum par shing ni g.yo 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya bstan nas ni// sngags ni de la brjod par bya// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas ni// spyi bor
308b7(rgyud): bzhag ste brjod bya ga/ oM de be shwa ri dU / phung bu dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba yi// dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin
309a1(rgyud): nas ni// lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med pa/ byin gyis rlobs la yang sbubs shig/ de nas shin tu mdzes ma yis/
309a2(rgyud): babaza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang // gser zho gnyis ni ster 'gyur te/ zad pa nyid du longs spyod bya// 'dod la dga' ba'i dga' byed ma// gal te grub par ma gyur na/
309a3(rgyud): drag mo yi ni sa bon gyis// gzir te 'bum du bzlas par bya// sa bon gyis ni gzir tsam gyis// mar me ma yi spyi bo 'gem// rtag tu sems can don brtson pas// 'bar
309a4(rgyud): ma chung mar bsgrub par bya// nyon cig lha mo shes rab che// gzhan yang mkha' 'gro sgrub pa'i thabs// zang ka khros gnyis byas nas su// lhag par gnas te mchod gtor
309a5(rgyud): nas/ de nas ri mo'i dri ru gzhug/ dkar zhing dumar la shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na sdigs mdzub
309a6(rgyud): lcags kyu thogs// skra grol bas ni rnam par mdzes// me 'bar 'od zer shin tu gas so// ha har dgod cing mig g.yon ma// sa la khrag gis byubs nas su// gnas
309a7(rgyud): der bris sku dgram par bya// me tog dmar po la sogs pa// dri dang bdug pa'i khyad par gyis// nye bar mchod dang gtor ma dgang // sha dang nya dang btsing la sogs// bdud
309b1(rgyud): lnga yis dgang bar bya// rnal 'byor ma ni grom zhing thos// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// khar bcug nas ni bgad par bya/
309b2(rgyud): oM DAkanI hUM phuH/ sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang pos ni g.yo 'gyur te// gnyis pa la ni mdun du dgod// gsum pa'i mdun du snang 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni bka' nod do//
309b3(rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni bsgrubs pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams bsad cing smad pa dang // yan lag
309b4(rgyud): gzir ba gang 'dod pa'i// de la sogs pa'i thams cad ni// g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan
309b5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas gzir bar byas te bzla/ gar dag gi ni pags pa la// 'bad de thang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma ni 'dri ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes/
309b6(rgyud): lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // mdzes pa'i gos ni gyon par bri// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar/
309b7(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs bya la// me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma sbyin// khrag dang nya dang
310a1(rgyud): sha dang btsong // bza' ba dag ni sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang la sbyin// 'bad de bsam gtan gnas par bza// oM A ka rA pa phu phaT/ lag
310a2(rgyud): gnyis mnyam par byas nas su// zhags pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyod bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas pas// 'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te/
310a3(rgyud): dang po khyi na ngu ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong bar byed// bzhi par mdun du 'dug nas ni/ bdag gis
310a4(rgyud): ci bgyi bka' stsol smras// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po bdag gis khyod basbubs so// de nas nyi ma
310a5(rgyud): re re zhing // gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying pos gzir te bzla// sa bon 'di yis gzir tsam gyis// 'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems
310a6(rgyud): so/ chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kam po dzi ni bsgrub par bya// ba glang la sogs ko ba ni// brkyang ste 'phrog byed ma 'drir gzhugs// lus ni skal gyis brgyan pa ste/
310a7(rgyud): kha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis brdzes// ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs// ha har dgod cing rnam par gcig/
310b1(rgyud): khrag gis maN+Dal byugs nas ni// dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar mchod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon bzhin lha yi/
310b2(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing zlos// 'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bab// gsum par thog ni 'bab 'gyur
310b3(rgyud): te/ bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin// oM kruM phuHgu sU hA/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// de yi sngags ni brjod
310b4(rgyud): par bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar nas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur// ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// brtse phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang
310b5(rgyud): 'dir ni 'ong ba dang // rgyal po'i bu mo'am gzhan yang rung // nga 'dod pa ni khrid de shog/ gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs// bza' dang bgo dang btung ba dang // ji ltar 'dod bzhin
310b6(rgyud): khyer te 'ong // lha yi bu mo 'am mi'ang rung // ti se'i gangs kyi rtse ru ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/
310b7(rgyud): bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis// mnan te brgyar ni bzlas na ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te
311a1(rgyud): des kyang ma grub na// dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug nas ni// dum bu dum bur gtub par bya// kra zhes bya dang gsod pa dang // d+hu gis bon bsgoms pa yis// thams
311a2(rgyud): cad du ni bza' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi ni dbang phyug ma'ang // gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// ba la ka nag po/
311a3(rgyud): yi shing // me sbar ba yi dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas po'i yungs kar ni// nyi ma'i byed na hUM zhes pa// brjod de sbyin sreg byas nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur bas// gdon mi
311a4(rgyud): za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ de nas shang dkar grub pa'i thabs// nyon cig lha mo skal chen ma// dur khrod dang ni shing gcig dang // chu 'gram lam gyi bzhi mdor sdug
311a5(rgyud): dam tshig can gyi 'dri mkhan gyis// tshon gyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// sor ni bcu bzhi'i tshad dag tu// dpa' bo yi ni ras la bri// gru gsum dkyil 'khor dge ba ste// dkyil 'khor
311a6(rgyud): zlum po'i tshul du bya// sku mdog sngon po glang la zhon// lus la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// po mtsharan gyen 'greng zhi ba'i gzugs// ral pa'i cod pan mdung dang ldan// nal ban
311a7(rgyud): pa la phyag bzhi pa// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par klubs// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa nyid// de bzhin gzhan ni gshor dang ldan// bshang gcir ldan pas mchod bya ste// 'byung po kun la
311b1(rgyud): gtor ma sbyin// sngags 'di yis ni bkug nas su// 'bum du bzlas par bsgrub par bya// oM ka pA la mA la oM laM kri tA shrats+tsha hUM/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ru drul swA hA/ spyan drangs pa'i sngags/
311b2(rgyud): so/ oM AHru dra hU hUM swA hA / 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur// gal te grub par ma gyur na// de nas de ni bsreg par bya// grub nas bya ba thams cad ni// byed par 'gyur te/
311b3(rgyud): gzhan du min/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// nor lha yi ni grub pa'i thabs// ri bo dang ri rgya mtsho'i 'thab// 'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag tu// sngar bstan pa yi chog
311b4(rgyud): yis/ dkyil 'khor mchog ni bsgrub par bya// sor ni bcu gnyis tshad dag tu// khyad par du ni bsgrub par bya// kha dog nag po shin tu mdzes// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// 'khor
311b5(rgyud): lo dang ni dbyig pa bsnams// zod pa pad+ma de bzhin no// rin chen gyi ni cod pan dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// bshang gci dang ni khu ba zag/ mchod pa'i nyid du sbyin bya
311b6(rgyud): sel shams 'dus// da pa byed par 'gyubadzan rnam2/ spyan rdzo ba sngags so// ma sas su pa
311b7(rgyud): stong phrag brgyar ni bzlas pa yis// lha ma yin ni kun gyi skor// 'jug pa'i nus dang ldan 'gyur zhing // sgyu ma thams cad ston byed de// dgra rnams thams cad 'dul rus shing /
312a1(rgyud): rgyal srid dag kyang thob par 'gyur// cho ga'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis// de nas tshangs pa'ang bsgrub bya ste// chu yi 'gram ni dben pa dang // khyad
312a2(rgyud): par pad+mo'i tshal du sgrub// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// gdong bzhi yis ni mdzes par byas// zhi ba ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // mchod phyir thogs kyis rnam par brgyan// pad+ma dang ni/
312a3(rgyud): bgrang 'phreng dang // dbyug pa dang ni thod pa bsnams// sgrub pa po yi gtso bo yis// bris sku dag ni dmigs nas su// yid 'ong sna tshogs dri zhim ni// gur kum tsan dan la sogs
312a4(rgyud): pa dri chus yang yang bsgo bya zhing // rtag tu sgom dang ldan pa yis// mchod pa'i cho ga'i rim de dag/ b+ha ga'i dbus su sbyin par bya// oM pra hA gats+tsha d+hu A swAhA/ spyan zang ba'i
312a5(rgyud): sngags so// oM b+hud+hU bsta tA ba~M dru ba re Nu b+hargo de ba si d+hi ma hi d+hi yo yon pra tsod ya ta/ 'bum du bzlas pas 'grub 'gyur te// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang /
312a6(rgyud): nor bskyod pa dang mngon spyod sogs// las rnams thams cad nus 'gyur te// bzlas dang sbyin sreg kun gyis 'grub// khyod la yang dag bshad pa yin// nyon cig lha mo skal chen
312a7(rgyud): mo/ bgegs kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i thabs// ma mo ba khyim ni nyams dga' bar// bsgos pa dag pa byas nas ni// tho ldan mchod pasngon 'gribs// babad de bris kyu dmigs par/
312b1(rgyud): bya/ kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// ral pa'i thor tshugs dag dang ldan// 'od zer dmar po 'bar zhing /
312b2(rgyud): 'khrug/ mche ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par bri// dgra sta dang ni gtun shing dang // mda' dang gzhun de bzhin te// kha T+wAM ga dang lcags kyu dang // khrag gis gang ba'i thod pa dang // de bzhin/
312b3(rgyud): rdo rje ral gri ste// gzhan yang sha chen thod pa bsnams// mu sun di dang ba dan gsum// shag ti dang ni bcu gnyis so// oM a mo lo g+ha sid+d+h+ya sarbAr+tha me sA d+ha ya hUM hUM rdzardza swA hA
312b4(rgyud): spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM a ga d+hu swAhA/ bzlas pa'i sngags so// stong phrag brgyas ni 'grub 'gyur te// de nas las ni brtsam par bya// lan cig bzlas nas thig le
312b5(rgyud): dag/ sngags pas byas na skal bzang 'gyur// rgyal po sgor yang mchod 'thob ste// dgra rnams thams cad zad byed 'gyur// bgegs rnams ma lus bskrad pa dang //
312b6(rgyud): 'dod pa kun gyi 'bras ster bar// 'gyur ba 'di la the tsom med// cho ga'i sbyor ba de nyid kyis// ma mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs mchog/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis//
312b7(rgyud): gza' rnams kyang ni sgrub par 'dod// oM sarba ti thi nak+Sha tra gra he mang+ga l+ye b+h+yaHswAhA/ gza' thams cad kyi sngags so// oM zhes bya ba dang po ste// swA hA'i mtha' can byin
313a1(rgyud): brlabs ces// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje
313a2(rgyud): can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ 'byung po dang gdon thams cad kyi sgrub thabs 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste bcu dgu pa'o// /
313a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo rnams kyis mchod cing phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes de nyid khyad par dang // lus kyi mtshan ma ji ltar lags//
313a4(rgyud): ga du/ b+h+ya/ sus su
313a5(rgyud): sum cu gnyis// de dag gzhan las shin tu gtso// bcu dang gnyis ni de bzhin du// dbyangs rnams 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid de// yar ngo mar ngo'i bye brag gis// nyi shurtsa
313a6(rgyud): bzhir brjod pa yin// dus ni myur dang ring ba dag/ yan lag mtshan ma nyid dang ni// gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus la bab pas gnas// dbugs ni
313a7(rgyud): rnam par rgod gyur na// lus can drug dang gnyis kyis 'chi// snga kro ro hi ta'i dus su// de yi mtshan ma mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi gnas dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni
313b1(rgyud): rna ba'i rtsa// lce dang so ma mtshams dang ni// de bzhin mgrin pa'i phyi rol dang // snying kha'i dra ba lte ba dang // brla dang byin pa de bzhin gnan// chu so dang ni mtshan dag dang /
313b2(rgyud): mgo dang spyi gtsug gi ni phyogs// dbugs ni chad cing gyur pa yi// lus kyi mtshan ma myur ba ru// 'chi ba'i dus ni ston par byed// nyi ma'i grangs kyi tshad kyis ni/
313b3(rgyud): 'khor los dus kyi bdag nyid brtsi// sgo gcig nas ni nyin drug tu// gang tshe dbugs ni rgyu gyur pa// yon tan gsum gyi lo dag ni// zhag ni sum brgya drug cu ru/
313b4(rgyud): bgos pa yi ni tshad dag ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// lo gnyis dang ni zla ba dag/ dus kyi grangs su bstan pa dang // nyin zhag dag ni bco brgyad du// de yi
313b5(rgyud): tshad ni yang dag brjod// nyi ma dag ni bdun dang mtha'// gal te rlung ni rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis dang ni de bzhin du// zla ba drug tu 'tsho 'gyur zhing // de bzhin lo gnyis
313b6(rgyud): zla ba ni// rig byed kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// 'tsho 'gyur dus kyi grangs yin no// gal te nyin dgu rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis zla ba bzhi dang ni// nyin zhag nyi
313b7(rgyud): ma'i zangs su ni// lus can rnams kyi sbyor ba yin// gal te nyin bcur rgyu gyur na// lo gnyis las ni mi 'tshe'o// gal te nyin zhag bcu gcig tu// sgo gcig nas
314a1(rgyud): ni rgyu ba dang // lo gcig zla ba dgu dang ni// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag las ni// mi 'tsho mdzes ma khyod la bshad// nyin nag bcu gnyis rgyun ni// lo gcig dang ni/
314a2(rgyud): zla ba ni// dbyangs kyi grangs dang nyin zhag ni// dus kyi grangs las mi 'tsho'o// gal te nyi ma bcu gsum du// g.yas kyi lam nas rgyu ba ni// lo gcig dang ni zla ba dag/ rig byed/
314a3(rgyud): kyi ni grangs dang ni// nyi ma dgu las mi 'tsho zhes// mdzes ma'i gdong can khyod la bshad// gal te bdun phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgya de// lo gcig zla ba gnyis
314a4(rgyud): dang ni// nyi ma bcu yi phyed dag las// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur de yi ni// tshe tshad nges par bstan pa yin// gang zhig nyi ma lnga gsum du// g.yas kyi sgo nas rlung rgyun// lo gcig na ni/
314a5(rgyud): gdon mi za// gang zhig brgyad phrag gnyis su ni// g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba dag/ de yi tshe tshad nges pa dag/ zla ba bcu dang nyi ma ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi dag las ni// mi 'tshe bar ni/
314a6(rgyud): ngas pa gang ngo // gal te nyin zhag bcu bdun du// g.yas kyi lam nas rlung rgyan// de nas de yi tshe tshad no// zla ba dgu dang nyin nag ni// bco brgyad dag las mi 'tshe bar/
314a7(rgyud): gdon mi za bar bshad pa yin// nyin zhag bco brgyad rgyun ni// zla ba dag ni brgyad dang ni// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs su ni// de yi dbus ni bshad pa yin// gal te nyin zhag bcu dadu/
314b1(rgyud): ru dri mi bzhon pa chub dag // dza phrad 'tshob bshad par bya// zla ba dag ni bdun dang ni// 'tsho bar mi 'gyur gdon mi ga// gal te nyin zhag nyi shur ni// rtsubaza ba drug na ni/
314b2(rgyud): de yi srog ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gal te nyin zhag nyi shu gcig/ nyi ma'i lam nas rlung rgyu ba// zla ba lnga dang nyi ma ni// nyi ma'i grangs las mi 'tshe'o// nyin zhag nyi shu gnyis rgyun/
314b3(rgyud): zla ba rig byed grangs dang ni// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa bzhi las// mi 'tshe bar ni yang dag ste// nyi ma nag nyi shu gsum gyi bar// sgo gcig nas ni rlung rgyan// zla ba bzhi dang nyi ma ni/
314b4(rgyud): dus kyi grangs las mi 'tshe brjod// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rgyu ba dang // zla ba gsum dang nyi ma ni// bcu gcig dag las mi 'tshe'o// nyin nag nyi shu lnga rgyu ba// zla ba gsum las mi 'tshel
314b5(rgyud): de las gong ma sngar bsten pa'i// grangs las mdor bsdus shes par bya// bcu dang gnyis kyi rtsi las ni// bar bar gyis ni bstan pa yin// cha dang cha yis rim bzhin du
314b6(rgyud): bar bar nyi ma gsal bar byas// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs bya'i phyir// dus de dag ni bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor pa rnams la ni dus// shin tu phra ba ngas bshad pa// khams
314b7(rgyud): snyoms pa yi lus la ni// de dag blta zhing yid ches bya// sgo ni steng du 'bab pa yi// sna yi bar she tshad gyur na// nyin zhag bdun gyis the tsom med// cha shas dgu ni
315a1(rgyud): yang dag gnas// de bzhin sgo ni steng bltas las// mig gi chu ni chad gyur na// nyi ma ldan 'chi bar 'gyur// cha shas bcu ni shes bya ba// steng du bltas/
315a2(rgyud): te 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yon dang 'gram pa yi// ngos kyi mtshan ma dag las ni// nyin zhag gcig las mi 'tshe'o// cha shas bcu gcig gnas pa yi// gsal bar steng du
315a3(rgyud): 'gro ba las// rna ba g.yas par brten pa yis// nyin zhag bco brgyad dag na 'chi// cha shas bcu gnyis de bzhin gnas// lce yi skud pa nag mthong na// lus can dus
315a4(rgyud): kyi nyin zhag 'chi// cha shas bcu gsum brten pa yi// de bzhin steng du 'bar ba yi// steng 'og tu ni 'thams gyur na// 'byung ba dag ni ma lus 'dren// srog ni dus grangs
315a5(rgyud): nyi mas 'gro// dbyangs yig bcu bzhi brten pa ni// mgrin pa'i glo na gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa zhes grags kyis// nyin zhag lnga las mi 'tshe'o// cha shas bco
315a6(rgyud): lnga gnas pa yi// steng du bltas pa'i mchog de la// brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na// zla phyed na ni gdon mi za// rma shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i bdag/ lte ba'i dbus gyur steng
315a7(rgyud): bltas pa// sen mo'i khrag ni med gyur na// nyin zhag bcu na yang dag nyal// slar yang cha shas bcu bdun ni// gnas pa'i brla yi mtshan ma las// nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa
315b1(rgyud): bzhin// 'chi 'gyur 'dir ni gdon mi za// rma shas bco brgyad gnas pa yi// byin pa la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// de bzhin steng du bltas pa yis// nyin zhag nyi ma'i grangs kyis 'chi
315b2(rgyud): bcu dbu yi ni rwa shas gnas// chu so de bzhin steng bltas pas// de dang mnyam pa'i nyin zhag gis// 'chi 'gyur ba dir ni the tsom med// cha shas nyi shu gnas pa yi// pho mtshan
315b3(rgyud): la ni gnas pa'i rtsa// steng du bltas pa mchog dbang phyug/ mtshan mas nyin zhag dus kyi ni// grangs kyis 'tsho 'gyur the tsom med// re'u mig bcu gnyis brtsis pa la// bar bar/
315b4(rgyud): nyi ma bstan pa dag/ lo yi rim gyis de sbyangs te// bdun cu rtsa gnyis rim pa dang // sum cu rtsa drug bco brgyad kyis// zla ba la sogs go rims bzhin// rim gyis rim gyis
315b5(rgyud): dbri bar bya// lhag mar gang zhig gyur pa ni// bsdus te 'tshe ba'i dus su ni// lha mo chen mo shes bya zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor bar// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ba de
315b6(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las rtsa dang mnyam par sbyor
315b7(rgyud): ba'i dbugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu pa'o// // sgo dgu po yi mtshan nyid dang // rtsa ni gang bar gnas pa yi// yon tan skyon sogs ji ltar
316a1(rgyud): blta// de rnams bye brag mi 'tshal te// ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor mtshan nyid// bshad/
316a2(rgyud): kyis lha mo mnyan par gyis// sngon du bdag nyid sbyang byas la// phyi nas las ni brtsam par bya// gzugs med gnas pa mdog sngo ba'i// pad chen zla ba lta bu 'dzag/ slar yang
316a3(rgyud): gzugs su gnas pa ste// rnam pa kun gyis brgyan po'o// cha shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// kha ni thur du bltas te 'phyang // go 'phang gnas pa'i gnas nas ni// kun dang za 'dra
316a4(rgyud): rtag tu dag/ rnam shes ye shes bdud rtsi ni// lha mo chen mo 'bab pa'i mchog/ rten du gyur pa'i pad+ma gang // zla ba'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan// de ni cha dang cha yi gzugs//
316a5(rgyud): gong bu gnas pa zhes byar brjod// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gnas kyi mtha' ni dag par bya// dag nas srid pa 'pho bya yi// gzhan du na ni med par 'gyur// dgang ba yis ni/
316a6(rgyud): lus bkang na// dug dang rim gyis che ba 'phog/ bum pa can gyis sgo bcings na// sgo yi sbu gu dag par 'gyur// 'thor bas sna tshogs rdul du bya// rab tu zhi bas zhi bar 'gyur//
316a7(rgyud): rnam shes dbrog pa'i cho ga dang // gzhan du 'gro ba'ang bshad par bya// de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni sbyang bar bya// gnas gnyis dag ni bsams nas su// rlung gi
316b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi dbus su me yis ni// yang dang yang du dbye bar bya// A li kA lir ldan pa yi// sa bon der ni sbyar bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yi khyad par du// 'byung
316b2(rgyud): dang 'jug pas bzlas par bya// 'byung ba ye shes sa bon bya// bsdur dang ldan par bsam par byed// 'jug pa snying gi rnam shes la// me tog lta bur bsnun par bya// rnal 'byor pas/
316b3(rgyud): ni 'byung ba zlas te// bdag nyid las ni phyi rol bya// 'jug pa 'byung bar mtshon bya ste// de kho na nyid mnyam par sgom// mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni
316b4(rgyud): the tsom med// de nas phyi rol lus la ni// sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul// nyi ma'i lam nas dang phyung ste// lha mo cha shas ldan par bya// bsgrub bya'i snying khar zhugs nas ni// rlung dang /
316b5(rgyud): me yis 'bar ba dag/ de yi rnam shes bzung nas ni// lus kyi dkyil 'khor du ni gzhug bsgrub bya'i rnam shes bsdus nas su// 'og gi 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// ji srid zad par
316b6(rgyud): byas pa ru// de srid lkugs te gnas par 'gyur// 'chi ba'i dus la bab gyur na// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang // rims la sogs pas ma phog par// gong du 'pho ba mchog
316b7(rgyud): yin no// de nas gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis bcings nas su//
317a1(rgyud): rtag tu srog dang rtsol bar bya// khyod kyis gnas su sbyar nas ni// rang gi lus ni yongs btang ste// rim gyis sbyor bas phye nas su// cho ga 'di ltar byas pa
317a2(rgyud): yis/ sngags pa gzhan gyi lus la 'jug/ sbyor ba'i rim pa de nyid kyis// rang gi lus la sbyar bar 'dod// 'gro dang 'ong ba'i bye brag gis// mnyam par bzhag ste gang byed pa/
317a3(rgyud): dpa' bo'i dbang phyug thams cad dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyor bas mchod// gang gis ring nas thos gyur pa// de ni yang dag bshad kyis nyon// de bzhin mkhas pas gzhan sems/
317a4(rgyud): kyi bsam pa rjes su shes par bya// skom dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyi// sbyor ba'i dam pa skye bar 'gyur// gang gi lam nas bsams na ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med//
317a5(rgyud): 'khor lo gang zhig sngar bstan par// zhugs te nyan pa gnyis su ni// 'jig rten gsum dang 'dres nas ni// me stag bzhin du rnam par 'khor// rlung gis bskyod pa'i me yis ni//
317a6(rgyud): shes rab ldan pas zhugs bsams na// zla drug tsam gyis nges par ni// ring na gnas pa thos par 'gyur// bsgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// ye shes mig gis mthong gyur pa/
317a7(rgyud): shin tu ring na gnas pa yang // sgrub pos skad cig gsal bar mthong // bstan dang ma bstan gang ci'ang rung // de kun nga yos yang dag bshad// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// dge
317b1(rgyud): ba'i sgo nas 'gro ba dang // gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// thar pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba// mchog dang tha ma'i bye brag rnams// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// lte ba las ni 'dod/
317b2(rgyud): khams lha// thig ler gzugs can mtho ris te// steng nas 'gro bar steng gi ni// myur du 'gro bar byed par 'gyur// sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste// rna ba dag ni grub pa'i lha/
317b3(rgyud): gal te mig las ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i sgo las yi dgas te// de bzhin chu las dud 'gro'o// chu min gyis ni dmyal bar ltung // thar pa'i
317b4(rgyud): lam las gzhan du 'gro// sngon du bum pa brtsams pa yis// sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyi// sgo yi bu gar bsgom par bya// de la 'og gi sgo
317b5(rgyud): ru ni chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam// chu dang chu min sgo la ni// me yi sa bon 'bar ba ste// de la shin tu mnyam gzhag pas// dbugs ni bus pa can du sgom// lus ni//
317b6(rgyud): rlung gi mdog tu ste// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rlung gi mtha' ni rtsa ba can// rlung gi sa bon rtsa bar te// thig le sgra dang ldan pa yi// rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya/
317b7(rgyud): 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sgra dang sgra yis 'phrul bar byed// dus min lha rnams gsod par 'gyur// lha rnams bsad pa tsam gyis ni// dmyal bar nges par sreg
318a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// de bas 'chi ba'i mtshan pa ni// mkhas pas 'bad de shes par bya// rnal 'byor pa las sngar bstan pa'i// sngo chen bde ba phun sum tshogs/
318a2(rgyud): srub po rnams kyis smin pa la// steng gi rtsu ba bza' bar bya// chu dang skya reng ldan pa dag/ g.yon pa'i bdud rtsir sbyar byas la// zas na ni dang rgyas pa ste// dug dang rims kyi
318a3(rgyud): tsha ba 'phrog/ cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// brnyings dang smin pa 'joms par byed// lha mo slar yang bzlog pa yis// nam mkhar 'gro ba brjod par bya// rlung dang me yi bye brag
318a4(rgyud): gis// rkang pa'i 'khor lor sbyar byas te// yid kyis rab tu zhir sbyar nas// nam mkha' la ni 'gro 'gyur zhing // mkha' 'gro kun gyis bskor nas su// lha yi lus kyis kun tu
318a5(rgyud): rtse ji srid zla nyi yod kyi bar// de srid nam mkha' gnas par 'gyur// slar yang lugs las bzlog pa yis// kha dog dkar po'i pad+ma bsam// bsgrub bya'i dbus su
318a6(rgyud): sbyar na ni// rtag tu ngag gi dngos grub byed// rang gi lus dbus bsgom bya ba// rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'khrug pa ltar// rang gi kha nas byung nas su// bsgrub bya'i kha ru thim par
318a7(rgyud): bya nyi ma bdun gyis dngos grub tu// 'gyur te gzhan du yang ma yin// rlung gi lam nas bsgrub bya yi// lus la thim par gyur pa dang // de yi sems ni bzung nas su/
318b1(rgyud): bdag la gzhug sde ma la mi/ bsams te rlung dang me sbar bas// de yi lus ni 'khrug par 'gyur// tshogs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyis// mod la 'pho bar shes bya ste// nyin re zam/
318b2(rgyud): ze gsod pa dang // mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa yang // lam 'di las ni dag 'gyur te// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing // srid pa'i skyon las ring du
318b3(rgyud): 'gro 'ji ltar 'das las skyes pa yi/ pad+ma dri med yid 'ong ba/ de bzhin lus kyi 'das las ni// ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i//
318b4(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems pa de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gong du 'pho
318b5(rgyud): ba'i bsam gtan dang / seng ge rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nas
318b6(rgyud): yang dang bshad par bya// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid do// sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa// mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// b+ho g+hu
318b7(rgyud): thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// gu rtsu mthe bong 'ching bar byed pa 'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// mu gyur lag par rdebs pa ni/
319a1(rgyud): ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lur+dz+dza sna mar sbyor mo rdib pa ni// thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// dar+b+ha sha ba'i mgo ltar ston byed pa// rnam
319a2(rgyud): 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o// gno d+ho de/ gang zhig smin ma'i dbus reg pa// nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshor byed pa// 'dus nang gtor ma bza'/
319a3(rgyud): zhes pa'o// b+hak+ShA yo/ lag pa rtsal 'ju byed pa'o// khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dr-i ra ti/ lag pa snying khar nyed byed ni// da nI nga yid 'ong ba'o// ru tsA ba ta ba ta/ sA \u0f7f
319a4(rgyud): khu tshur 'chang ba ni// med do zhes ni ston pa'o// shU n+ya tAlag pa brkyang ste lho ra rde ba na/ phu na sum ldan par yod ces pa'o// tri ka sa ha lte ba ru ni nyed byed na/ kha
319a5(rgyud): zas za bar 'dod pa'o// tsaN+DA li ka/ mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na// zhe gnag gtu ma la drag po'o// nI la dan ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni da lta ston//
319a6(rgyud): a nAM ga pu ta/ lce ni 'azil bar byed pa dag/ da ltar 'chi zhes bya'o// du rag ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni// chos grangs shes par 'dod pa'o// ta rag na/ chos
319a7(rgyud): gcig nas ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya// nyi tshod yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan du ni mdun du reg/ gi ri/ steng du lta bar byed pa ni/ nyin byed
319b1(rgyud): dga' pas rol pa'o// sa ma rgal/ 'dzum dang bcas par la byed cing // lag pas lag pa bzung nus su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa/ nor zas byin nas bya ba 'o/
319b2(rgyud): dzirna ba ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// da ltar grogs la 'dod nas pa'o// sap+pa tA/ mthe bong gis ni srin lag gsal// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba'o// so ma
319b3(rgyud): mthe bong khro bo gza' la sogs// sUr+ya mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan
319b4(rgyud): rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi ngag gi phyag rgya'i brda yis rol pa'i cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste
319b5(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// // lha mos slar yang gar mdzad de// glu 'di yis ni mnyes par byas// e baM si ta ya/ ru Na ni b+ha dza ni te ma d+h+ya ma ga ma a
319b6(rgyud): ga ma d+ha d+ha ma ya ni sa/ ni ga ma sA/ ri gA mi b+hu pa ti si re re sa ri rI sa ni sam d+hu ma sar sru ta ni sa ni/ ra b+ha ga ma ya/ d+ha mA d+ha ma/ sa ra pa pA ma a a pA pA ang+ga mau te/ mo zhes bya'o//
319b7(rgyud): shar du me'o// ga shir rjer ni bre'o// rab tu ni me'o// byang du ni ku'o// me mtshams su d+ha sa'o// bden bral du ni ma ka'o// chung mtshams su ni kun na'o// dbang ldan du ni bi
320a1(rgyud): mo'o// a ni chur po'o// a ni zla ba la skyes pa'o// u ni lha'i bla ma'i'o// e ni pa wa sangs kyi'o// o neni nyi ma'i bu'i'o// a ni gza'i bdag po'iri bong
320a2(rgyud): can no// a ni nyi ma'o// gza' rnams kyi ni cho ga las// zla ba nyi ma'i brjod par bya// zla ba ka kA ra la dbang // nyi ma gdong lnga pa la ste// gza' rnams lhag ma ji snyed pa/
320a3(rgyud): rA si gnyis gnyis la ni spyod// sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod kyis bshad// skar mo dus dang nyi ma yi// bye brag dag ni mi 'tshal te// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol/ bka'
320a4(rgyud): stsal pa/ lug dang ro hi ta sogs pa// gang gis 'chi ba ba shad kyis nyon// mdor bsdus nas ni brjod par bya// zla ba dang ni tshe sa grangs dang // skar ma dang ni dus dang ldan/
320a5(rgyud): gdon dang nang ni de bzhin te// sgang ga shong rA si tshad ma ni// gang zhig las ni skyes pa'i brjod// pa tra yi ni nyi ma la// dgun zla ra ba'i zla ba yi// gza' ni mig dmar dag dang ni//
320a6(rgyud): rgyu skar smin drug ldan gyur pa// de ni de yi 'chi dus yin// sus kyang bskyab par mi nus so// khyu mchog gi ni nyi ma la// lus kyi mtshan ma la sogs dang // smyo zhing 'gul ba'i
320a7(rgyud): nid kyis ni// 'chi bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya// de bzhin dgun zla 'bring po yi// gza' lhag dang ni sngar ma ldan// nyi ma bzhi pa de la ni// dgongs mo 'chi 'byor the tsom med/
320b1(rgyud): dgun zla tha chung lha mo che// skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni gza' lhag bcas pa la// 'khrig pa'i mi ni gang yin pa// nim drug la 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid thar ba'i chos/
320b2(rgyud): brgyad la// skar ma mgo dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni pa wa sangs 'dzub zhing // nyi ma snga dro'i dus la ni/ karka Tar ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla 'bring po'i gnyis lnga la/
320b3(rgyud): skar ma mchu dang ldan pa dang // gza' ni sman par ldan pa la// seng ge'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dpyid zla tha chung bcu gnyis la// skar ma nag par ldan pa dang // gza' ni nyi ma dag
320b4(rgyud): la ni sman dang gzer ba'i nad kyis ni// bu mo'i me ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla ra ba'i bcu bzhi la// skar ma lha mtshams ldan pa dang // gza' ni mig dmar dag la ni// srang
320b5(rgyud): gi mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla 'bring po'i bcu gcig la// nag pa dang ni mig dmar la/ sdig pa'i mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// dbyar zla tha chung tshes dgu la// skar ma gro bzhir
320b6(rgyud): ldan pa dang // gzhu yi mo ni 'chi bar 'gyur// de dag nges par ldan gyur na// 'chi 'gyur bden par nga yis bshad// ston zla ra ba'i bdun pa la// skar ma rgyal dang ldan pa dang //
320b7(rgyud): gza' ni zla bar bcas pa la// chu srin mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur// ston zla 'bring po'i bcu gsum la// skar ma tha skar ldan pa dang // gza' ni tha bar bcas pa la// bum pa'i mi ni nga
321a1(rgyud): du 'gro// ston zla tha chung sgyu ma chen// nyi ma dag ni brgyad pa la// skar ma nam gru ldan pa dang // gza' ni sman par bcas pa la// nya li mi ni 'chi bar 'gyur/
321a2(rgyud): sngon du skye dus shes bya ste// phyi nas dus ni brtse bar bya// gzhan du dus ni smra ba dag/ thams cad don med nyid du 'gyur// skye dus shin tu mnyam bzhag ste// zhi dang drag po dpyad par bya//
321a3(rgyud): tshe dang 'chi dus la sogs pa// de nas de ltar lung bstan zhes// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
321a4(rgyud): bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las/ gza' dang nyi ma'i nges par 'chi ba tshar bcad pa'i dbang du byas pa'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa
321a5(rgyud): gsum pa'o// // ltas kyi mtshan nyid dge ba ni// rab tu bshad kyis lha mo nyon// A li kA li mnyam byas la// sde tshan du ni bsdeb par bya// dbyangs dang
321a6(rgyud): gsal byed dang po sogs// bltas te ming ni gzung bar bya// cha shas ldan la snying stobs can// de yi rigs ni shes par bya// mtha' yas la sogs klu rnams dang // nyi ma la
321a7(rgyud): sogs de bzhin bsal// mkha' 'gro ma sogs ma mo rnams// de yi rigs su rab tu grags// lha rnams thams cad nyid dang ni// sngags rnams thams cad de las skyes/
321b1(rgyud): skye bo thams cad skyed byed ma// des na ma zhes bya bar brjod// a yig dang ni de bzhin A// ka tsa Ta dang yang dag ldan// ta ba dang ni ya sha ste// sde dgu yi ni yi ge'o// i dang slar ya /
321b2(rgyud): lha mo I// de bzhin gzhan yang kha tshaH// tha ba dang ni ra' nyid// sde tshan gnyis pa yin par brjod// u dang lha mo de bzhir A// ga dza ba dang yang dag ldan// da ba dang ni la sa ste/
321b3(rgyud): de dag sde tshan gsum pa yin// yi ge e dang de bzhin saM// de bzhin slar yang g+ha dz+nyA D+ha// d+ha b+ha wa ha slar de bzhin// 'di dag sde tshan bzhi pa yin// o yig dang ni oM yig dang // aM zhes
321b4(rgyud): bya dang tsheg drag bcas// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// 'di dgu sde tshan lnga pa yin// kun tu bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi dang // lhag ma lnga dang bcas par bya// de dag skye bo thams cad kyi// skye dang
321b5(rgyud): 'jig par yang dag gnas// yi ge bcu gnyis sgyu 'phrul che// mtshe dang dus kyi rang bzhin brjod// de dag rI sA zhes bya ba// skar ma kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba nyi ma'i bye brag gis//
321b6(rgyud): de bzhin 'og dang steng du blta// brtan pa nyid dang g.yo ba nyid// gnyis po gnyis su brjod pa yin// brkyang ba dang ni sbyar ba ste// rang dang thung dang pham dang rgyal// de las steng
321b7(rgyud): gi rgyal ba ste// 'og ni 'chi bar shes par bya// rgyu bar de ni 'gro ba yi// gza' dang rA si skar ma rnams// nyi ma la ni gnas te 'char// rA si gza' dang gsum par 'dod/
322a1(rgyud): dbugs rgyu ba dang yang dag ldan// thams cad rA sir shes par bya// karka Ta dang glang po'i dgra// de bzhin gzhon nu ma dang srang // cha shas drug dang yang dag
322a2(rgyud): ldan gza' yis bskul nas 'char bar 'gyur// sdig pa dang ni chu skyes dang // khyu mchog dang ni bum par bcas/ cha sha sa lnga yi tshad dang ldan// gza' yis bskul nas
322a3(rgyud): 'char bar 'gyur// nya dang lug dang de bzhin du// gzhu dang zung du sprod pa dag/ rma shas bzhi dang yang dag ldan// snga ma bzhin du 'char bar 'gyur// slar yang ltas dang bcas pa yi//
322a4(rgyud): gza' rnams 'char ba bshad par bya// 'bras bu'i ming dang ldan par bya// ltas rkyen 'byung ba mnyan par gyis/ nag mo dang gtsigs ma dang / rga las 'das ma dang
322a5(rgyud): log 'dren ma dang / gtum mo dang / drag mo'i gzugs can ma dang / dka' zlog lha mo dang / rgyal ma dang / rnam par rgyal ma dang / mi thub ma dang / gzhan gyis mi thub ma
322a6(rgyud): dang nag mo bzang mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / nag mo sbom mo dang / dbang mo dang / zla ba mo dang / drag mo dang / sdang ma dang / 'phyang ba ma dang / sum cu'i dbang
322a7(rgyud): mo dang / 'phrog byed ma dang / 'bar ma dang / 'jib byed ma dang lha mo 'di rnams ming dang ni/ ltas chen nyi shu rtsa bani yi/ ming ni mtshungs pas 'bras bu ster/
322b1(rgyud): nyis 'gyur du byas nas su// dbang po'i cha dang yang dag ldan// ltas ni lhag ma bzung nas su/ ltas ni shes pa nyid du bya// nag mo dang ni 'jigs rung dang // drag mo'i gzugs
322b2(rgyud): dang dka' zlog nyid// nag po ma dang rgyal ma dang / jag mo sum cu'i dbang mo dang // 'phrog byed ma dang 'jib byed ma// bcu po 'di dag rtsub par zags// bag ma len dang
322b3(rgyud): bkra shis dang // zong dang drong 'dus gzugs pa dang // lam du sdug dang 'thab mo dang // chen po'i sar ni dbyung ba sogs// ltas de las ni 'bras med pas// dge ba'i las
322b4(rgyud): rnams mi bya ste// rigs de rnams la sgyu ma che// bzang po'i las ni spang bar bya// dge bas kyang ni gsod 'gyur na// drag mo'i las kyis smos ci dgos// lus la gnas
322b5(rgyud): pa'i dbugs dang ni// phyi rol gza' dang rA si ste// phyi dang nang du bcas pa yi// rgyu ba shes na 'grub par 'gyur// gza' gang yin pa dbyangs zhes bya// dbyangs gang yin pa
322b6(rgyud): de nyid kyang // rA si nyid du shes par bya// dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin du// skar ma'ang dbyangs kyi gzugs su blta// phan tshun sbyor ba ma gtogs par// 'bras bu 'grub
322b7(rgyud): par mi 'gyur ro// g.yo ba 'char lo g.yo ba'i las// brtan pa la ni mi g.yo bar// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren ma ste// phyi dang nang du bcas pas gsal// mkha' 'gro
323a1(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs
323a2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las gza' rnams kyi rgyu ba dang sde tshan gyi ltas kyi cho ga'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / da ni gza' dang
323a3(rgyud): skaskur ma ru// bcas pa'i rgyu ba bshad kyis nyon// nyi ma rgyu ba'i nyin mo ni// thun phyed lnga dang bdun pa la/ bya ba ci yang mi 'grub bo// zla ba yi ni bzhi dang drug/ mig dmar gyi/
323a4(rgyud): ni gsum dang lnga// gza' lhag gnyis dang bzhi pa la// gdon mi za bar 'joms par 'gyur// bla mas dang po gsum pa la// 'chi ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin// ngan spong gi ni
323a5(rgyud): gnyis pa dang // bdun pa la ni shes par bya// ngal ba yi ni dang po dang // drug pa la ni 'chi bar byed// rigs de dag gi 'chi ba yi// dus ni yongs su chad par bstan//
323a6(rgyud): de dag thun mong mtshan nyid de// rnal 'byor pa yis gzhan bshad nyon// lnga nas nyi shu lnga yi bar// 'di dag tu ni brjod bya ste// de las bcu gsum gyi bar du// re re sbal
323a7(rgyud): bar bya/ dgun za tha chung nyi ma la mtshungs gsum mig zla ba drug/ gsum zung zla lhag tshe phyogs mda' yon tan// thig le de dag gi ni 'tshe ba yang dag bshad pa yin/
323b1(rgyud): las bcu yi bar dang de bzhin bcu nas ni// bco lnga'i bar te de nas nyi shu'i bar dang ni// de nas nyi shu lnga yi bar du sbyang bar bya// de nas sgrub pos shes bya ba// gnas skabs
323b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba bshad par bya// zla ba gang la gnas pa yi// dang po skar ma bgrang bar bya// nyi ma yi ni chu tshod dag/ ji snyed 'das pa de snyed ni// zla bar gnas skabs rgyu ba'i phyir/
323b3(rgyud): de ni drug cur bsgyur bar bya// slar yang nyi tshod zla ba bsnan// drug cu ru ni bsgyur bas na// mda' dang sreg byed ro yi ni// dbang por bcas pas de bzhin bcad// bcu gnyis
323b4(rgyud): dag gi nang nas ni// lhag ma'i cha shas gzung bar bya// lhag ma'i rwa shas de yi ni// sgyid sdug gnas skabs myong bar 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan gyi sbyor ba yis// lhag
323b5(rgyud): ma'i chu tshod du ni brjod// dang po'i zla ba'i bar gnas pa// de yi bya ba nyams par 'gyur// gnyis pa bkra shis shis pa ste// gsum pa 'chi ste gsod par 'gyur// bzhi
323b6(rgyud): pargod de tshem par 'gyur// lnga pa nor te nyams par 'gyur// drug pa rims te lus 'jig 'gyur// bdun pa las ni dga' ba ste// tshim pa nyid ni 'thob par 'gyur/
323b7(rgyud): brgyad pa 'jig rten rlag par 'gyur// zla ba dgu par gnas pa yis// lus ni dgra dang bcas par 'gyur// bcu pa dga' mgur rtse 'gyur zhing // sna tshogs pas ni rgyal bar 'gyur/
324a1(rgyud): bcu gcig sna tshogs 'jigs pas gdung // bcu gnyis pa ni longs spyod de/ bde ba chen pos brtul bar 'gyur// lug la sogs pa bstan pa yis/
324a2(rgyud): zla ba rim pa bzhin du rgyu// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/
324a3(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las thams cad rgyu ba'i rim par phye ba ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha mos mchod
324a4(rgyud): cing phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// sgang gshong 'khor lo khyod bshad pa// de rnams dbye ba ci 'dra dang // dus kyi grangs ni ji bzhin gsungs// rgyu ba yi ni khyad par
324a5(rgyud): dag/ 'di la bdag ni the tsom skyes// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol pa// nyon cig lha mo sgyu ma che// dus kyi bgrang ba lus med cing // thams
324a6(rgyud): cad du ni thams cad gnas// dngos po kun la khyab pa ste// lus la gnas kyang lus mi skye// dus nyid dus ni med pa dang // 'jig rten nyid ni 'jig rten min// bden pa dang
324a7(rgyud): ni brdzun pa min// lha mo khyod kyis sngar bshad pa'i// bsam gyis mi khyab dus mtshan nyid// gang zhig khyod kyis bshad pa de// don dam shin tu rnyed dka' ba// lus las
324b1(rgyud): 'das shing dri med pa// rnal 'byor pa yis ji ltar rtogs// skye bo kun la sman slad du// dbugs kyi nges pa bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nad
324b2(rgyud): med rlung dang bral ba dang // khams ni snyoms par gnas pa dang // ran par za zhing chung bzhin rgyu// de yi mig ni btsums pa ste// mig btsums drug la cha shas ni// gcig/
324b3(rgyud): ces bya bar brjod pa yin// yud tsam drug ni skad cig ste// skad cig drug ni thang cig yin// thang cig drug ni cung zad yin// dus kyi go rims bya ba 'dis// sum cu tha ma par
324b4(rgyud): bsgyur ba la// yi ge lci ba'i dus zhes brjod// yug cig lci ba bcu la ni// srog gcig ces bya'i dus su bshad// de ni bcu gsum bsgyur ba las// de yang gnyis su bsgyur ba
324b5(rgyud): ni srang gcig ces ni brjod pa yin// srang ni drug cu tha ma pa la// chu tshod gcig tu bzhed pa yin// de brgyad thun cig ces bya'o// de bzhi las ni nyin gcig go/ nyin mtshan dus
324b6(rgyud): ni mnyam pa la// mtshan mo'ang de dang mnyam par bshad// chu srin nas ni sbal pa'i bar// nyi ma 'phel bar brjod pa ste// lha mo srong ni gsum gsum gyi// nyin re bzhin ni spel bar bya/
324b7(rgyud): chu srin las ni 'das nas su// mtshan mo srang ni gsum gsum 'bri// tshad ma de dag bstan pa'i phyir/ zangs ma srang ni bcu gnyis la// snod ni dbang du sor brgyad dang // rgyar ni
325a1(rgyud): sor mo bcu gnyis pa// legs pa nyid du brdung bar bya// gsar ni 'ol sa sum cu las// sor drug pa yi tshad tsam du// b+hur ma legs par brdungs nas ni/
325a2(rgyud): thur ma de yis bu ga ni// zangs ma'i snod la mkhas pas dbug/ chu ni rnyog ma med pa las// srang ni drug cu'i tshad du bya// srang 'dis chu tshod tshad yin te// skye bo rnams la phan
325a3(rgyud): phyir bshad// chu chod de ni yud tsam ste// thur phyed dang ni thun gcig dang // nyin dang mtshan mo'i tshad kyis ni// rim bzhin zla byed zla bar spel// zla ba gnyis ni dus yin te/
325a4(rgyud): de gsum nyi ma 'gro ldog brjod// nyi ma 'gro ldog gnyis la ni// lo gcig nyid du brjod pa yin// mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog
325a5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las dus 'byung ba'i rim par phye ba ste/
325a6(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas skar ma'i rigs gang yin// mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya// tha skar dang ni mgo dang rgyal// de bzhin du ni nab so /
325a7(rgyud): dang / me bzhi ma mtshams de bzhin du// nam grus ri gro bzhin bcas// lha yi tshogs zhes brjod pa yin// snar mgre dang chu stod dang // khrums stod dang ni pra nye dang // lag dang
325b1(rgyud): mgo dang rtswa spang dang // khrums smad mi yi tshogs yin no// srin drug dang ni mchu dang ni// mon gru dang ni mon ze dang // smug dang nag pa sbron dang ni// sa ga dang ni sbubs rnams ni// zin/
325b2(rgyud): po yi ni rigs yin par// bzhin mdzes ma ni khyod la bshad// smin drug rgya la nir yin te// mgo dang snar ma klu yin no// lag dang sbubs ni khyi yin te// lha mtshams nab so phag
325b3(rgyud): gi rigs// mchu dang gre ni byi ba'o// skag ni byi lar ba shad pa ste// nag pa sa ga stag yin no// da bo dang khrums stod gnyis po ni// khyu mchog ces ni bshad pa ste// stobs
325b4(rgyud): 'dod pas ni shes par bya// me bzhi dang ni sa re gnyis// ma her shes bya stobs kyi mchog/ tha skar dang ni khrums smad gnyis// rta yi rigs ni bya bar grags// chu stod dang ni
325b5(rgyud): gro bzhin gnyis// spre'u rigs su brjod pa yin// bra nye dang ni nam gru gnyis// glang po'i rigs kyis byin brlabs pa'o// mon gru dang ni mon gri dag/ mi yi rigs su yang dag
325b6(rgyud): gsungs// stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ru// lha mo ngas ni bden par bshad// chu smad dang ni byi bzhin dag/ ne'u le'i rigs su grags pa yin// mang po nyid kyis ci zhig bya//
325b7(rgyud): mdor bsdus pa ni bshad kyis nyon// rang gi skye ba'i skar ma ni// bya ba kun la dpyad mi dgos// skar ma mi yi srog yin te// gzhan du ngas ni ma pa shad do// skar ma'i chan
326a1(rgyud): bzlog pa dag/ bzung na nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// lug dang srang dang karka Ta// chu srin dag ni g.yo bar brjod// sdig pa bum pa seng ge dang // khru
326a2(rgyud): mchog dag ni brtan pa ste// nya dang gnyis sbyor gzhu dang ni// bu mo rnams ni 'dren ma'o// lha yi bla ma nyi ma dang // mig dmar skyes pa'i gzugs yin te// pa wa sangs dang sgra
326a3(rgyud): gcan dang // zla ba mo yi gzugs yin no// gza' lag dang ni spen pa gnyis// ma ning nyid du bstan pa ste// nam mkha'i 'khor lor gnas pa'i gza'// mkha' 'gro kun dang
326a4(rgyud): mnyam sbyor ba'i// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro las//
